10110603.Subtitle: I was just keeping watch here as you asked me to... And just like you expected, Psyche came out! I ran to her, ready to take her to you.

10110604.ContentKR: 그런데 갑자기 사납게 달려들면서 날 잡으려고 하잖아…… 다행히 내가 빨리 피하긴 했는데 그게 정말…… 프시케였을까? 평소 프시케와 달랐어. 꼭…… 짐승 같았어!
10110604.Subtitle: But she suddenly lunged at me, looking all scary... Lucky I was quick on my feet! But... was that really Psyche? She was nothing like her usual self, more like... a wild beast!

10110702.Subtitle: Mr Henrik is... in a really bad condition.

10110802.ContentKR: 아직 살아있어. 스노우, 근처에 붕대를 찾아봐. 긴 천 조각도 괜찮고.
10110802.Subtitle: He's still breathing. Snow, see if you can find any bandages or strips of cloth, anything.

10110803.ContentKR: …… 이건 내 업보야, 난 됐어. 제발, 제발……
10110803.Subtitle: ...Don't waste your time on me, I deserve this. Please, you...

10110804.ContentKR: 소용없어. 이미 손을 쓸 수가 없어. 하고 싶은 말이라도 다 하게 해.
10110804.Subtitle: Don't bother, he's a goner. Let him finish his last words.

10110808.ContentKR: 히프노스의 집에서 거둔 사람들은…… 침식자들이야…… 운명에 버림받았지……
10110808.Subtitle: The Hypnos' House shelters... Deteriorators... those forsaken by fate...

10110809.ContentKR: 그들을 기다리는 건…… 원래…… 차가운 총알이지만……
10110809.Subtitle: Their destined end... was supposed to be... a cold bullet...

10110810.ContentKR: 맞아. 휘페르보레아의 카론이 '침식'의 징후를 조금이라도 보이면, 필토이드로 변하기 전에 즉각 끌려가 처형당하지. 잠깐, 설마 당신……
10110810.Subtitle: Right. In Hyperborea, any Charons showing signs of Deterioration will be taken away immediately to prevent them from turning into Filthoids. Wait, are you saying...

10110811.ContentKR: …… 그들의 가족은…… 차마…… 그들을…… 품위 있는 방식으로…… 부드럽게 내가……
10110811.Subtitle: ...Their families... didn't have the heart to see... So they hoped... that I could...

10110812.ContentKR: 그들이…… 사람처럼…… 떠날 수 있게 하려고 했다.
10110812.Subtitle: Help end their misery... in a decent, gentle way...

10110813.Subtitle: Just like... how I... sent away Hayley...

10110814.ContentKR: …… 설마…… 스칼렛의 사건에서의 '희생된' 그 침식자가…… 헨릭 씨의 딸, 헤일리였어요?
10110814.Subtitle: ...Are you saying... that Deteriorator in Scarletriver... was your daughter Hayley?

10110815.ContentKR: …… 그것까지…… 알고 있었다니…… 그 일은 그저…… 절망에 빠진 한 아버지의…… 마지막 몸부림이었을……
10110815.Subtitle: ...You know about that too... That was merely... the last desperate struggle... of a father in despair...

10110816.ContentKR: 당신을 오해하고 있었네요. 죄송해요…… 헨릭 씨.
10110816.Subtitle: We've been wrong about you all along... We're truly sorry, Mr Henrik.

10110818.ContentKR: 내 손으로…… 영면에 빠지게 했지…… 이건 내 죄야, 용서받을 수 없는……
10110818.Subtitle: I brought them... to sleep... This is my unforgivable sin...

10110820.Subtitle: I tried... with the Crystallo of Stella...

10110822.ContentKR: 전처럼 프시케도 보냈어야 했어…… 하지만 그 아이는 정말 특별했어……
10110822.Subtitle: I was supposed to let her go... like all the others... but that child was so special...

10110823.ContentKR: 자신의 결말을 알면서도 열심히…… 웃었어…… 몇 달 동안 한 줄기 햇살처럼…… 버림받은 이곳을…… 비추었어…… 마치…… 그때의……
10110823.Subtitle: She knew what was coming, yet she's always worn... a smile... For months, she shone like a ray of sunlight... in this... godforsaken place... just like my Hayley...

10110824.Subtitle: I'm old... I couldn't... do it again...

10110825.ContentKR: …… 망설이다가 마지막 시기를 놓쳤군요. 프시케는 이성을 잃고 당신을 공격하고 도망쳤고요.
10110825.Subtitle: ...So in your hesitation, you missed the last window. Psyche lost her mind, attacked you, and ran away.

10110827.ContentKR: 너희는 '다이몬'이니까…… 그 아이를…… 막을 수 있을 거야……
10110827.Subtitle: You're Daimons... you can... stop that child...

10110828.ContentKR: 그 착한 아이는 누구도 해치고 싶지 않을 거야, 진심으로……
10110828.Subtitle: She has such a gentle soul... hurting others is the last thing she'd want...

10110901.Subtitle: Are you... off to find Psyche?

10110903.ContentKR: 프시케는 우리한테 자주 꽃을 선물했어. 꽃향기를 맡지 못해도, 꽃의 형체를 알아보지 못해도…… 꽃이 사람들에게 행운을 가져다줄 수 있다고 말하면서 계속 선물했어.
10110903.Subtitle: Psyche often gave us flowers. Even though some of us can barely smell or see them clearly anymore, she kept doing it, saying flowers bring good luck.

10110904.Subtitle: ...But by the time I wanted to return her kindness, it was already too late.

10110905.ContentKR: 이 꽃을 가져다줘. 프시케가 가장 좋아하는 꽃이야.
10110905.Subtitle: Please bring this flower to her. It's her favourite.

10110906.ContentKR: 그리고 이 말을 꼭 전해줘, 히프노스의 집 모두가 기다리고 있다고……
10110906.Subtitle: And let her know that everyone at the Hypnos' House is waiting for her...

10110907.Subtitle: I will. I'm gonna do everything I can to save her.

10110908.ContentKR: 적어도…… 자기 뜻에 반하는 일은 하지 않도록 막을 거야.
10110908.Subtitle: Or at the very least... stop her from doing something she'd regret.

10111005.Subtitle: Resonance isn't working... What should I do?

10111006.ContentKR: 레조넌스로도 안되니까 괜히 힘 빼지 마!
10111006.Subtitle: Don't waste your energy; Resonance can't stop Deterioration!

10111007.Subtitle: She's lost her mind, get ready to fight!

10111103.ContentKR: 네가 그랬잖아, 하고 싶은 게 그렇게 많다고……
10111103.Subtitle: You said it yourself, there's so much you want to do...

10111104.ContentKR: 여길 떠나서 네가 가보지 못한 곳에 갈 거라며.
10111104.Subtitle: You'll leave Icelake for those unseen places—

10111105.ContentKR: 작은 섬…… 그곳에 가서 집을 몇 채 짓는 거야……
10111105.Subtitle: ...You'll go to a small island, where you can build a few houses by the sea...

10111106.ContentKR: …… 집 주변에 하얀 꽃을 가득 심고……
10111106.Subtitle: ...and grow white flowers around them...

10111107.ContentKR: …… 눈부신 태양을 피해 챙이 넓은 모자를 쓰고, 친구들에게 아이스레이크 시티의 새하얀 눈 이야기를 해 주는 거야……
10111107.Subtitle: ...Talk about the snow in Icelake with your friends, while shading yourself with a wide-brimmed sunhat...

10111201.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10111401.ContentKR: 여보, 봐요. 프시케가 우리를 보고 웃고 있어요.
10111401.Subtitle: Honey, look, Psyche is smiling at us.

10111402.ContentKR: …… 이 아이가 이 세상에 온 게 행운인지 불행인지 모르겠어.
10111402.Subtitle: ...I wonder whether this child's birth in this world was a blessing or a curse.

10111403.ContentKR: …… 그러네요, 우린 축복을 안고 태어난 게 아니니까요.
10111403.Subtitle: ...Yes, we weren't born with blessings.

10111501.ContentKR: 엄마! 오늘 프시케랑 집에서 블록을 쌓기로 했어요……
10111501.Subtitle: Mum! I promised Psyche I'd bring her home today to play with blocks...

10111502.ContentKR: 걔랑 놀지 말라고 했지? 몇 번이나 말했잖니, 그런 존재는 가까이하면 안 돼. 사악한 마법 때문에 큰일이라도 나면 어쩌려고 그래!
10111502.Subtitle: Who says you can play with her? How many times have I told you to stay away from these unclean people? Do you want to be killed by dark magic?

10111503.ContentKR: 휴, 멀쩡한 블록만 더러워졌네. 얼른 갖다 버려!
10111503.Subtitle: Ugh, now these blocks are all dirty. Throw them away now!

10111601.ContentKR: 그날 나는 억울함과 의아함을 안고 피가 날 때까지 밤새워 목욕했다.
10111601.Subtitle: That day, feeling wronged and confused, I bathed all night until my skin bled.

10111701.ContentKR: 아닙니다, 병사님. 제 딸은 착해서 절대 손님의 목걸이를 훔치지도, 화분에 숨기지도 않는다고요!
10111701.Subtitle: So what if he hit your daughter? It was all because your daughter's stuff was an eyesore, wasn't it?

10111702.ContentKR: 변명은 집어치워, 카론 놈들 중에 깨끗한 놈이 얼마나 된다고!
10111702.Subtitle: Exactly. And it was just a pot of flowers, so cut the whimper, you little twerp. Don't get your filthy tears on my uniform.

10111703.ContentKR: 그래, 훔치지 않았다면서? 그럼 직접 가게의 모든 화분을 깨부숴서 결백을 증명해봐.
10111703.Subtitle: What are you still doing here? The Security Bureau isn't a place for your nonsense.

10111802.ContentKR: 이렇게 착한 아이에게…… 우리 가족 모두 나쁜 짓 한 번 한 적이 없는데…… 왜 이런 일이 우리한테 벌어지는 거죠?
10111802.Subtitle: She's such a kind child, and we've always been decent, law-abiding people... Why did this happen to us?

10111803.ContentKR: …… 이렇게 된 이상 헨릭 애설레드 선생님께 부탁할 수밖에 없어. 이게 우리가 마지막으로 프시케를 위해 할 수 있는 거야.
10111803.Subtitle: ...At this point, there's nothing left but to turn to Dr Henrik Ethelred. It's the last thing we can do for her.

10111902.ContentKR: 매일 이런 걸 준다고 뭐가 달라지겠어.
10111902.Subtitle: You bring these things to me every day, but what difference do they make?

10111903.ContentKR: 프시케, '히프노스의 집'에 온 게 어떤 의미인지 잘 알고 있지?
10111903.Subtitle: Psyche, you should know what it means to be sent here.

10111905.ContentKR: …… 그런데 우리는 무슨 '의미'를 위해 살아가는 거죠?
10111905.Subtitle: ...But are we just living for some kind of \"meaning\"?

10112004.Subtitle: Is someone calling out my name...

10112005.Subtitle: Are they trying to tell me not to fall asleep like this...

10112101.ContentKR: 넌 이미 자신의 일생을 보았다. 저주를 품은 삶과 무의미한 죽음이지.
10112101.Subtitle: You've witnessed your entire life. A cursed beginning, and a meaningless end.

10112102.ContentKR: 무의미해. 넌 위선적인 웃는 얼굴로 다른 사람들을 맞이했지, 하지만 정말 사심이 없었나? 그럴 리가, 넌 그냥 비겁하게 그들의 동정을 바라고 있었을 뿐이야. 네가 아직 사람의 모습이었을 때를 기억해 달라면서 말이야.
10112102.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — how you've always appeased others with a fake smile. Are you really that selfless? No, you're just cowardly begging for their pity, for them to remember you — as before you turned into a monster!

10112103.ContentKR: 다 부질없어. 그들의 연민과 기억은 한없이 짧아. 곧 시간에 깎여 시들고 말겠지. 너는 그렇게 진흙 속에서 썩어갈 테고, 완전히 잊혀질 거야.
10112103.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — their fleeting pity and memories will soon wither and decay with time, leaving you rotting in the ground, utterly forgotten.

10112104.ContentKR: 야수가 되어라…… 그러면 이 터무니없는 세상이 더 이상 너를 괴롭히지 못할 테니.……
10112104.Subtitle: Just be a beast... none of this absurdity can hurt you anymore...

10112201.Subtitle: Just be a beast... demon child...

10112301.ContentKR: 그래…… 내게 허락된 시간은, 이미…… 끝났어.
10112301.Subtitle: Right... my time... has already...

10112302.ContentKR: 그래…… 내게 허락된 시간은, 이미…… 끝났어.
10112302.Subtitle: Right... my time... has already...

10112304.ContentKR: 일어나…… 이 차가운 세상에 굴복하지 마!
10112304.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112305.ContentKR: 일어나…… 이 차가운 세상에 굴복하지 마!
10112305.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112403.ContentKR: 일어나…… 이 차가운 세상에 굴복하지 마!
10112403.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112404.Subtitle: Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!

10112502.ContentKR: 너를 모욕하고 상처 준 건 그들이야, 그들이라고! 그런데 나를 파괴하려 해?!
10112502.Subtitle: They were the ones who scorned and hurt you! Yet, you choose to destroy me?!

10112503.ContentKR: 침식은 돌이킬 수 없어. 나를 파괴하면 네가 뭐라도 더 할 수 있을 것 같아?
10112503.Subtitle: Deterioration is irreversible. Even in my destruction, what could you possibly alter?

10112601.ContentKR: 프시케, 네가 줄곧 바라왔던 소원이 뭔지 기억나니?
10112601.Subtitle: Psyche, you've always cherished a wish, haven't you?

10112603.ContentKR: 이곳을 떠나 더 넓은 세상을 여행하고 싶었어.
10112603.Subtitle: I want to leave here.

10112604.ContentKR: 꽃이 만발한 따뜻한 곳에 가고 싶었지.
10112604.Subtitle: I want to go to a place where flowers bloom in warmth.

10112605.ContentKR: 난 그곳에 도착할 거야. 반드시... 도착할 거야.
10112605.Subtitle: I will make it there.

10112701.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10112801.Subtitle: I've hurt you anyway... I'm so sorry...

10112802.ContentKR: 괜찮아. 함께 집에 가자. 모두가 널 기다리고 있대.
10112802.Subtitle: It's okay. Let's go home together. They wanted me to tell you, they're all waiting for you.

10112805.ContentKR: …… 능력자 아웃사이더, 네가 저번에 나보다 수만 배는 똑똑하다며! 얼른 방법을 생각해 봐!
10112805.Subtitle: ...Outsider, aren't you a know-it-all? Didn't you say your brain was a million times smarter than mine? Do something, now!

10112807.ContentKR: 늦었어. 부상이 너무 심해…… 이 정도 부상이면 필토이드라도 살아남기 힘들 거야.

10112808.ContentKR: 뭐?! 시종, 너무 심하게 때린 것 아냐……

10112809.ContentKR: …… 아니, {nickname}의 잘못이 아니야…… 내가…… 스스로 이렇게 된 거야…… 이런 모습으론…… 살아있다고 할 수 없으니까……
10112809.Subtitle: It was her own choice. She destroyed that body of Filthoid herself. She declared to fate in this brutal way that she wouldn't yield.

10112810.ContentKR: 정신 차려, 프시케. 꽃이 만발한 따뜻한 곳에 가고 싶다고 했잖아.
10112810.Subtitle: Chin up, Psyche. You dreamt of going to a place warm and full of blooming flowers.

10112811.ContentKR: 네가 말했잖아…… 꽃이 있는 곳에는 좋은 일이 일어난다고.
10112811.Subtitle: You've said it yourself — flowers bring good luck.

10112812.Subtitle: Yes, it must be... a beautiful place.

10112813.ContentKR: 아니, 내가 말하는 걸로는 안 돼. 네가 직접 가서 봐야 해.
10112813.Subtitle: No, don't take my word for it, you have to see it for yourself.

10112814.Subtitle: Do you know... why I love flowers?

10112815.ContentKR: 꽃의 씨앗은 부드러운 바람을 타고 먼 곳으로 날아가기 때문이야…… 성벽을 넘고, 높은 산을 지나지…… 그것들을 막을 수 있는 건 없어.
10112815.Subtitle: Because their seeds, carried by the gentle wind, travel to distant lands... Over city walls, over mountains... nothing can stop them.

10112903.Subtitle: The Deteriorator is neutralised; the hostages are safe.

10113001.ContentKR: 다행히 침식자의 동선이 시티 밖을 향해 있어서 큰 인명 피해도 없었어. 운이 좋았지.
10113001.Subtitle: It headed towards the outskirts, no casualties caused. Luck is on our side this time.

10113002.ContentKR: 안녕하십니까. 저는 제6군단 소속 코퀴투스 방위대 준위, 리듬 페실입니다.
10113002.Subtitle: Greetings, I am Rhythm Fischer, Warrant Officer of the Cocytus Escort of the 6th Legion.

10113003.ContentKR: 북부 외곽에서 '침식' 사건이 일어났다는 긴급 정보를 입수했습니다. 침식자는 아주 위험합니다. 정말 사살된 건지, 아니면 잠시 휴면에 들어갔는지 확실치 않으니 즉시 이곳에서 철수하시기 바랍니다. 나머지는 저희가 처리하겠습니다.
10113003.Subtitle: I have received an alert of a Deterioration outbreak in the northern periphery. The Deteriorator's a grave threat; it's unclear if it's truly dead or merely in a dormant state. Immediate evacuation is advised; we'll take over from here.

10113005.ContentKR: …… 괜찮습니다. 나서시기 전에 저희가 해결했습니다. 숨이 멎었으니 총알 낭비는 하지 않으셔도 됩니다.
10113005.Subtitle: No need, ma'am. We've taken care of it before you came. It's dead as a doornail now, no need to waste more of your bullets.

10113006.Subtitle: Really? That explains why this target was more stable than the average Filthoids.

10113007.ContentKR: 정말 생명 징후가 없군요. 어쩐지 이번 목표가 다른 필토이드들보다 안정적이라더니.

10113008.ContentKR: 그런데…… 둘이서 해결한 건가요? 옷차림을 보니 '월석 사냥꾼' 같은데……
10113008.Subtitle: However... was it only you two? Given your outfits, are you Phoxhunters?

10113010.ContentKR: 아닙니다! 제가 봤습니다! 좀 멀긴 했지만 미리 길을 살필 때 똑똑히 봤습니다. 이 카론들…… <W>마법</>도 사용할 수 있습니다……
10113010.Subtitle: That's not it! Ma'am, I saw it! Though from a distance, I saw these Charons... they used <W>magic...

10113011.ContentKR: 저, 저것들도 침식자와 한 패거리일지 모릅니다! 이 천한 것들, 하나같이 사악한 마법사에 좋은 놈은 하나도 없지! 저라면 죄다……
10113011.Subtitle: They might be accomplices of the Deteriorator! These low-life beings, all wicked sorcerers! They should all be...

10113013.ContentKR: …… 어, 아니…… 저, 저는 저것들을 말한 겁니다. 모, 모든 카론 사람들이…… 아무튼 제 말뜻은 그게 아닙니다!
10113013.Subtitle: ...Er, I'm not saying... I was just referring to them, ma'am. It's not that all Charons are... Anyway, I didn't mean anything by it!

10113014.ContentKR: …… 죄가 있는 사람만 처벌하면 돼. 무고한 사람들을 연루시킬 필요는 없어.
10113014.Subtitle: ...Punishing the guilty shouldn't affect the innocent.

10113015.ContentKR: 군단에 대한 협조에 감사하는 바입니다. 저희와 함께 치안서로 가시죠. 적절한 보상이 있을 겁니다.
10113015.Subtitle: We appreciate your support of the Legion. Please come with us to the Security Bureau; we shall offer you handsome rewards.

10113016.ContentKR: 지나가는 사람들이 무서워하지 않게 최대한 빨리 침식자를 처리해.
10113016.Subtitle: Dispose of the Deteriorator ASAP to avert public alarm.

10113019.ContentKR: 프시케는…… 사람들을 피해 필사적으로 시티 밖으로 도망쳤어.
10113019.Subtitle: She... was trying to keep away from the crowds, that's why she ran towards the outskirts so desperately.

10113020.ContentKR: …… 마지막 순간까지 최선을 다해서…… 사람들을 위해 뭐든 하려고 했어……
10113020.Subtitle: ...Even in her last moments, she was still trying... to do something for others...

10113023.ContentKR: 무슨 일이시죠? 혹시 다친 곳이라도 있으십니까?
10113023.Subtitle: Are you alright? Injured perhaps? Should I arrange a military medic for you?

10113024.ContentKR: 아니에요, 아니에요, 아니에요. 제 친구는 그저 약간 놀랐을 뿐이에요. 나중에 '아스포델'에 가서 따뜻한 음료 좀 마시면 괜찮아질 거예요.
10113024.Subtitle: Not at all, ma'am. My friend is just a bit shaken, we'll be fine after a few warm drinks at the Asphodel.

10113025.ContentKR: 보상은 다음에 다시 얘기하시죠. 다음 의뢰 기한이 되어서 서둘러야 해서요. 저희는 먼저 가보겠습니다.
10113025.Subtitle: We'll talk about the reward another time. We're pressed for time with an upcoming task, we'll take our leave now.

10113026.ContentKR: (침착하게 행동하고 조용히 있자. 더 이상 군단의 의심을 살 순 없어.)
10113026.Subtitle: (Calm down and remain silent — it's unwise to draw more attention from the Legion.)

10113028.ContentKR: (계속 말하자. 위험할지라도 프시케의 결백을 밝혀야 해.)
10113028.Subtitle: (Continue the speech despite the risk — you've made up your mind to set the record straight for Psyche.)

10113029.ContentKR: 아니, 필토이드가 아니야. 너희가 마음대로 처리할 수 있는 쓰레기 같은 게 아니라고.
10113029.Subtitle: She was not a Filthoid or some trash for you to dispose of.

10113030.ContentKR: 프시케는 아이스레이크 시티의 시민이야. 그리고 오늘 밤에 '침식'으로부터 모든 아이스레이크 시티 사람을 지켜낸 거라고.
10113030.Subtitle: Her name was Psyche. She was a citizen of Icelake. Tonight, she protected everyone in the city from Deterioration.

10113031.ContentKR: 내 손으로 직접 묻어줄 거야. 아무도 다가오지 마.
10113031.Subtitle: I will make sure she receives a proper send-off. Stay away from us.

10113032.ContentKR: 설마 필토이드를 지키겠다는 건가? 리듬 님, 이 애꾸눈 녀석, 뭔가 수상합니다. 잡아다가 제대로 심문해야 하는 게……
10113032.Subtitle: What are you talking about? You're defending a Filthoid? Ma'am, this one-eyed brat is highly suspicious — might need a thorough interrogation...

10113034.ContentKR: 카론의 장례 방식은 땅에 묻는 게 아닙니다. 대신 물에 띄워서 멀리 보내죠. 물이 그들의 영혼을 싣고 영원한 안개의 바다로 향한다고 믿거든요.
10113034.Subtitle: In Charon tradition, we don't bury the deceased. Instead, we set them adrift on water, believing it carries their souls to the eternal Misty Sea.

10113035.ContentKR: 여기 일은 내가 직접 설명할 테니 이만 가지.
10113035.Subtitle: Let's move on. I'll explain the situation to the higher-ups.

10113102.ContentKR: 네가 계획을 세우는 걸 보고 충동적으로 움직이지 않을 줄 알았는데, 넌 그래도 너네. 하지만 괜찮아, 이래야 너답지.
10113102.Subtitle: I thought you wouldn't act so recklessly anymore. Yet, you remain false to yourself, which isn't bad — it suits you.

10113103.ContentKR: 하지만 우리는 이미 용감한 친구 하나를 떠나보냈잖아…… 너까지 위험에 빠뜨릴 순 없어.
10113103.Subtitle: Still, I have to say something you might not wanna hear: if you defend a Deteriorator, it's bound to raise suspicions. If the Escort decides to probe into your identity, a travel permit wouldn't be enough to protect you.

10113104.Subtitle: We've just said goodbye to a brave young lady. I can't let you risk yourself again. As for that officer... she was just doing her job, there's no point in blaming her.

10113106.ContentKR: 고마워할 거 없어. 여기서 벌써 몇 년인데 세상 물정 모르고 고슴도치처럼 가시 세우던 건 벌써 지난 일이야. 이젠 잔머리 굴리는 쥐처럼 매일 살아남는 것 외에는 생각하지 않게 되어버렸지. 넌 나처럼 되지 마.
10113106.Subtitle: There's nothing to thank me for. After all these years, I've gone from a hedgehog to a rat, living only to see another day. Don't end up like me.

10113107.ContentKR: 뾰족한 가시를 가진 고슴도치라는 것에 긍지를 가져, 이런 일은 쥐한테 맡기고.
10113107.Subtitle: A hedgehog has its dignity; better leave the grovelling to the rat.

10113109.ContentKR: {性别:슬프면 실컷 울어, 친구.|울고 싶으면 실컷 울어. 참지 않아도 돼.}
10113109.Subtitle: If you wanna cry, go ahead.

10113110.ContentKR: 바람이 세서 아무것도 안 들려. 혹시 뭐라도 들리면, 그건 새가 지저귀는 소리겠지.
10113110.Subtitle: The wind here is so strong, I can't hear a thing. Even if I do hear some noise, it's just the sparrows chirping.

10113111.ContentKR: …… 나한텐 이런 일이 벌써 하루 이틀은 아니지만 매번 눈물은 하루면 충분하다며 스스로를 타이르곤 해.
10113111.Subtitle: ...I've seen this kind of thing countless times. But I tell myself, you've only got one night for tears.

10113113.ContentKR: 괜찮아, 난 괜찮아질 거야…… 곧 괜찮아질 거야.

10113114.ContentKR: 눈물은 약한 사람이나 흘리는 거야. 언젠가 그들에게 대가를 치르게 할 거야.

10113115.ContentKR: 어떻게든 잘 살아남아. 그 아이도 분명히 네가 웃으면서 내일을 맞이하길 바랄 거야.
10113115.Subtitle: Anyway, pull yourself together. That girl would surely wish for you to face tomorrow with a smile.

10113116.ContentKR: 설령…… 우리가 한때 이 세상에 속았다 해도 말이야.
10113116.Subtitle: ...Even if we were once deceived by this world.

10113202.ContentKR: 어쩌면 이미 새로운 곳에서 새로운 친구를 사귀었을지도 모르겠네……
10113202.Subtitle: Perhaps you've explored new places, and have met new friends...

10113206.ContentKR: 슬픈 꿈을 꿨어. 아니, 그게 꿈인지도 모르겠어.
10113206.Subtitle: I had a sad dream — well, I'm not sure if it was a dream.

10113207.ContentKR: 아주 중요한 걸 잃어버린 것 같아.
10113207.Subtitle: I feel like I've lost something important.

10113208.ContentKR: …… 무언가를 잡으려고 안간힘을 쓰면 모래처럼 우리 손에서 빠져나가는 법이야.
10113208.Subtitle: Trying hard to hold onto something, yet it slips away like sand through our fingers.

10113209.Subtitle: Time, and life... it's all like this.

10113210.ContentKR: 탄생은 파멸을 위한 것이고, 만남은 이별을 위한 거야. 이 세상에 유일하게 영원한 게 있다면 그건 '소멸'뿐이야.
10113210.Subtitle: To be born is to be destroyed; to meet is to part ways. The only thing that ever lasts in this world is \"oblivion.\"

10113212.ContentKR: 너와 마찬가지로, 내 여정을 시작하러 가는 거지.
10113212.Subtitle: Like you, I'm starting my own journey.

10113215.ContentKR: 언젠가 우린 또 만나게 될 거야.
10113215.Subtitle: Our paths may cross again one day.

10113301.ContentKR: 다시 한 번 무너지는 꿈 속에서, 그 목소리가 바람을 타고 들려왔다.
10113301.Subtitle: Once again in the collapsing dream, that voice whispered through the wind.

10113302.Subtitle: Only this time, I finally made it out.

10113303.ContentKR: 나무의 뿌리가 물 한 방울도 놓치지 않듯이, 나는 온 힘을 다해 그 이름을 기억하려 했다.
10113303.Subtitle: Like tree roots absorbing every drop of water, I tried my best to engrave that name in my mind.

10113401.ContentKR: 난 고통을 겪었고, 증오를 느꼈어. 그로 인해 지치기도 했고, 슬퍼하기도 했지만……
10113401.Subtitle: Pain and hatred have been my acquaintances. They've wearied and grieved me—

10113402.ContentKR: <H>그래도 난 이 세상에 태어난 것을 기쁘게 생각해.</>
10113402.Subtitle: Yet, I find joy in having existed in this world.

10113502.ContentKR: 지금 꽥꽥대는 이 고철 기계를 네가 지키고 싶은 사람으로 생각하고, 저 필토이드들은 그 사람을 공격하려는 놈으로 생각해.

10113503.ContentKR: 그리고 이걸 지킬 방법을 생각해. 필토이드가 망가트리게 둬서는 안 돼.

10113505.ContentKR: 우리 월석 사냥꾼은 갑작스러운 상황이 터질 때가 많으니까. 당황하지 마, 필요하면 나도 도와줄 테니까!

10113702.ContentKR: 쓰레기를 개조한 거잖아. 쓸 수 있는 게 어디야!

10113901.Content: 本次技术性测试剧情流程已结束。

10114001.ContentKR: 왜 이렇게 빨리 돌아왔어? 헨릭이 어디 가는지 뒤쫓아 간 거 아니었어?

10114301.ContentKR: 헨릭 아저씨가 허락하면 또 나랑 놀 수 있어?

10114401.ContentKR: 너와 상관 없는 일에 쓸데없이 끼어들지 마라.

10115001.ContentKR: …… 프시케가 헨릭 씨를…… 대체 왜…… 이렇게……

10115002.ContentKR: 프시케는 언제나 웃고 있었어…… 헨릭 씨는 말수는 적었지만, 우리를 자식처럼 챙겼다고…… 모두 그렇게 좋은 사람인데……

10115101.ContentKR: 헨릭 씨는 많이 지쳐 있었어요. 그에겐 어쩌면…… 이런 결말도 괜찮을지 몰라요.

10115202.ContentKR: 내 기억력이 얼마나 좋은데, 물론 기억하지! 프시케는 성문을 향해 갔어!

10115301.ContentKR: 바람이 너무 많이 불어! 으악, 이러다 날아갈 것 같아……

10115401.ContentKR: 이게 가장 빠른 길이야. 이 얼음 조각을 밟고 가자.

10115601.Content: 突然，恩里克出现了【待包装】

10115701.Content: 一个熟悉的少女叫住了一行人【待包装】

10115801.ContentKR: (이미 아웃사이더와 스노우에게 오늘 있었던 일을 다 얘기했는데.)

10115802.ContentKR: (이제 할 수 있는 건, 약속 장소에서…… 기다리는 것뿐이야.)

10116801.Content: 我们开始狩猎吧！【待包装】

10116902.ContentKR: …… 대단하네. 아웃사이더한테 이런 능력도 있을 줄이야.

10117002.ContentKR: 아하하, 확인하다가 실수로 인기척을 냈더니, 이렇게 되어 버렸네……

10117004.ContentKR: 이게 무슨 말도 안 되는……! 휴, 됐다.

10117102.ContentKR: 그 도둑은 검은 머리에…… 파란색 옷을 입고 있었던 것 같아요.

10117201.ContentKR: 어…… 빈민가의 바디 할아버지잖아! 할아버지께 물어봐야겠어요!

10117302.ContentKR: 오호, 우리 쓰레기통 꼬마 공주 아니냐? 오늘은 동생들도 같이 주우러 온 거니?

10117304.Subtitle: Okay, so... you are the \"Demon King of Rubbish Bin\" then?

10117305.Subtitle: Nuh-uh! It's the \"Demon King of Light\"!

10117306.ContentKR: 하하하…… 그나저나, 할아버지, 혹시 검은 머리에 파란 옷 입은 카론 남자가 지나가는 거 보셨어요?
10117306.Subtitle: Hahaha... let's not get hung up on titles for now... Mr Badi, did you happen to see a Charon man in a blue shirt with dark hair just now?

10117307.ContentKR: 방금 젊은이 하나가 지나갔지. 허둥대면서 길도 안 보고 <H>광장 맞은편</> 쓰레기 더미 쪽으로 곧장 달려가더구나! 어이구, 설마…… 네 일감을 뺏으려는 건 아니겠지?
10117307.Subtitle: I think so... A young man just came barreling down the street — clumsy kid, wasn't even watching where he was going, headed straight for the rubbish bins across the square! Wait, was he trying to poach on your turf?

10117308.ContentKR: 음…… 그런 셈이죠! 감사합니다, 바로 가볼게요.
10117308.Subtitle: Um, in a way! Thanks, I'm going after him.

10117402.Subtitle: He meant Big Bin No. 3! Now come with me!

10117501.ContentKR: 어서 가 보렴…… 옛말에 뭐라 그랬더라? \"일찍 일어난 새가 쓰레기를 줍는다!\"였나?
10117501.Subtitle: Go get 'em! As the old saying goes, \"Strike while the rubbish is hot!\"

10117602.ContentKR: …… 괜찮아요! 명탐정의 예리한 감각이 이 근처에 분명 단서가 있다고 말해주고 있어요!
10117602.Subtitle: ...No worries! My detective instincts are telling me there's a clue nearby!

10117701.ContentKR: 벽화 옆에 상자가 두 겹으로 쌓여 있네요…… 아래쪽 상자가 비스듬히 놓여 있고, 표면에 어른 남자의 어지러운 발자국도 있고요. 흠흠, 제가 모두 간파했답니다!
10117701.Subtitle: Check this out — two layers of crates against the wall. The bottom one is skewed, and there are messy footprints all over it — busted!

10117702.ContentKR: 흠, 목격자 마르제의 증언에 따르면, 오늘 아침 3번 대형 쓰레기통에 '물건을 구하러' 왔을 때 이쪽 상자들을 가로로 정리해 놨다고 하는군요.
10117702.Subtitle: Ahem, according to the statement of Margie the Witness, she just straightened these crates when she did her \"shopping\" at Big Bin No. 3 this morning.

10117703.ContentKR: 그러니까, '침묵의 탐정' 마르제의 추리는 명백해요. 도둑놈이 급한 김에 이 상자들을 쌓아 올리고, 그걸 밟고 올라가 담을 넘어갔을 거예요! 즉, 옥상에 숨어 있을 가능성이 높아요!
10117703.Subtitle: Thus, Margie the Reticent Detective deduces — that desperate thief must have stacked these crates to climb the wall! He's likely hiding on the rooftop right now!

10117704.ContentKR: 오! 그럴 듯해! 우리도 올라가서 확인해보자.
10117704.Subtitle: Huh! Smart thinking! Let's get up there and check it out.

10117801.ContentKR: '침묵의 탐정'이 마르제의 별명이었구나. 꽤 멋진데…… 좀 짧아서 뭔가 아쉬운 느낌이야!
10117801.Subtitle: So \"Reticent Detective\"... that's your title, Margie? Sounds cool... A bit short though — could use more punch!

10117802.ContentKR: 맞아요! 그럼 꼬마 마왕님한테 더 좋은 의견을 부탁해도 될까요?
10117802.Subtitle: Makes sense! Any suggestions, Demon King?

10117803.ContentKR: 아까 그 할아버지가 말한 '쓰레기통 공주'가 괜찮지 않아?
10117803.Subtitle: That old man back there called you \"Princess Rubbish Bin\"... That's a good one!

10117804.ContentKR: 침묵의 탐정☆쓰레기통 공주, 이러면 기세가 확 살아날 것 같지 않아?!
10117804.Subtitle: \"Reticent Detective ☆ Princess Rubbish Bin\", has a nice ring to it, doesn't it?

10117805:
{
		["ContentKR"]="으아
		["DialogueId"]=10117805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="19543062",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="Argh—! Noooo way! Can we please drop that nickname? It's embarrassing!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101178/19543062",
	},
	[10117901]={
		["Camera"]="742.518555,-651.300049,387.801758,0.00002,-12.800081,134.397263,35.0,100000.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="왜 그러세요, 쓰레기통에 뭐라도 있는 건가요?",
		["DialogueId"]=10117901,
		["GUID"]="19544022",
		["NextDialogue"]=10117902,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="What, something in the bin?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/19544022",
	},
	[10117902]={
		["ContentKR"]="그냥 혹시 여기에 숨어 있나 해서……",
		["DialogueId"]=10117902,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1954404C",
		["NextDialogue"]=10117903,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Just making sure he wasn't hiding in—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/1954404C",
	},
	[10117903]={
		["ContentKR"]="어어, 이건…… 반쯤 남은 포도주 병에 골동품 브로치까지?! 세상에, 설마 쓰레기통의 신에게 선택받기라도 한 건가요?!",
		["DialogueId"]=10117903,
		["GUID"]="19544076",
		["NextDialogue"]=10117904,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="Whoooa! Is that... half a bottle of wine and an antique pin!? Wow, aren't you the chosen one blessed by the gods of rubbish bins!?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/19544076",
	},
	[10117904]={
		["ContentKR"]="으아아, 하필이면 이런 때에…… 잠깐만 있어봐요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10117904,
		["GUID"]="195440A0",
		["NextDialogue"]=10117905,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="But this really isn't the best time… just a sec!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/195440A0",
	},
	[10117905]={
		["ContentKR"]="(마르제가 폐품 더미에서 낡은 신문 두 장을 꺼내 방금 발견한 보물들을 조심스럽게 싸서 구석에 놓는다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=10117905,
		["GUID"]="195440CA",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=10117906,
		["Subtitle"]="(Margie fishes out two old newspapers from the rubbish, wraps her newly discovered treasures carefully, and stashes them in a corner.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/195440CA",
	},
	[10117906]={
		["ContentKR"]="자, 이러면 됐어요! 도둑놈을 잡고 나면 다시 와서 가져가면 될 거예요. 발견한 사람끼리 나누는 거예요. 도둑놈 일이 해결되면 포도주도 반으로 나누자고요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10117906,
		["GUID"]="195440F4",
		["NextDialogue"]=10117907,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="There, all set! I'll come back for these later. Finders keepers — I'll share this wine with you once we've caught the thief!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/195440F4",
	},
	[10117907]={
		["ContentKR"]="어…… 그럴 필요까진 없을 것 같은데!",
		["DialogueId"]=10117907,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1954411E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Um... I think I'll pass, thanks.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101179/1954411E",
	},
	[10118001]={
		["ContentKR"]="방금 누가 한 명 올라오더니 이번엔 또 셋이나 왔네?",
		["DialogueId"]=10118001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954508A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200055,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101180/1954508A",
	},
	[10118101]={
		["ContentKR"]="요즘 왜 이러는지 모르겠네. 자꾸 사람들이 지붕 위로 뛰어다니고. 아이스레이크 시티에 무슨 대회라도 있는 거야? 빨리 오르면 상 주는 그런 거?",
		["DialogueId"]=10118101,
		["GUID"]="195460F2",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200055,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101181/195460F2",
	},
	[10118102]={
		["ContentKR"]="음…… 그러고 보니 정말 어떤 루나 선배가 그런 도전을 한 적이 있었던 것 같기도……",
		["DialogueId"]=10118102,
		["GUID"]="1954611C",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118103,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101181/1954611C",
	},
	[10118103]={
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 어서 쫓아가봐! 아까 그 선수는 벌써 한참 전에 지나갔어.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118103,
		["GUID"]="19546146",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200055,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101181/19546146",
	},
	[10118201]={
		["ContentKR"]="아, 저기 보세요, 저기 지붕 위에 있는 놈이에요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954715A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101182/1954715A",
	},
	[10118202]={
		["Camera"]="511.43457,-638.664795,108.855957,0.000021,0.99912,141.602325,35.0,100000.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="뭐…… 뭐야…… 굳이 여기까지 쫓아와야 했던 거야? 그 돈은 사람들한테 나눠주는 거라며, 그럼 나한테 조금 나눠준 셈 치면 되는 거잖아?",
		["DialogueId"]=10118202,
		["FinalCamera"]="362.795898,-526.832092,112.098877,0.000021,0.99912,141.602325,35.0,100000.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="19547184",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="200002:n(200053)",
			[2]="200053:n(100001)",
			[3]="100001:n(200053)",
			[4]="200011:n(200053)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=10118203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200053,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Man_12",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200053:Angry01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101182/19547184",
	},
	[10118203]={
		["Camera"]="-473.043945,-52.758255,212.282837,0.000035,-14.400661,20.994717,35.0,100000.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="진짜 형편이 어려우면 도와줄 수 있어. 하지만 이런 식으로 그냥 훔쳐가려고 들면, 내 삽에 한 대 맞을 줄 알아!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118203,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200011:Maer_Angry01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-425.005371,-34.323517,199.071167,0.000035,-14.400661,20.994717,35.0,100000.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="195471AE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["Subtitle"]="If you're hard up, I can help you. But you can't just grab money of people — that'll earn you a whack on the head with my shovel!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200011:Angry01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101182/195471AE",
	},
	[10118204]={
		["ContentKR"]="(청년이 반박할 말을 찾지 못하고 화가 난 듯 담을 뛰어내린다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=10118204,
		["GUID"]="195471D8",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101182/195471D8",
	},
	[10118301]={
		["ContentKR"]="또, 또 사라졌어? 정말 유령이라도 되는 걸까?",
		["DialogueId"]=10118301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="195481C2",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101183/195481C2",
	},
	[10118302]={
		["ContentKR"]="아니에요…… 보세요, 여기 맨홀 뚜껑에 움직인 흔적이 있어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="195481EC",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101183/195481EC",
	},
	[10118303]={
		["ContentKR"]="제 추리에 의하면 틀림없이 하수도로 들어갔을 거예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19548216",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101183/19548216",
	},
	[10118401]={
		["ContentKR"]="물이 이렇게 깊으면…… 도저히 건널 수가 없잖아! 그 녀석은 어떻게 한 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=10118401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954922A",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101184/1954922A",
	},
	[10118402]={
		["ContentKR"]="조급해하지 마세요, 이럴 때야말로 '침묵의 탐정'의 정보망을 동원할 때예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19549254",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118403,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101184/19549254",
	},
	[10118403]={
		["ContentKR"]="8번 작은 통에서 나온 '하수도 수리 매뉴얼'에 따르면, 이곳의 수위는 인위적으로 조절할 수 있대요! 기계장치가 분명 근처에 있을 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118403,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954927E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101184/1954927E",
	},
	[10118501]={
		["ContentKR"]="와
		["DialogueId"]=10118501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954A292",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118502,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101185/1954A292",
	},
	[10118502]={
		["ContentKR"]="앞부분은 빼주면 안 될까요…… 으으.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954A2BC",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118503,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101185/1954A2BC",
	},
	[10118503]={
		["ContentKR"]="수위가 조금 내려갔어. 비슷한 스위치가 더 있나 찾아보자.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1954A2E6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101185/1954A2E6",
	},
	[10118601]={
		["ContentKR"]="봐, 아래에 정말 길이 있어!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954B2FA",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118602,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101186/1954B2FA",
	},
	[10118602]={
		["ContentKR"]="맞아요, '하수도 수리 매뉴얼'에 따르면, 하수도에 가끔 따뜻하고 습한 걸 좋아하는 필토이드가 살기도 한대요.",
		["DialogueId"]=10118602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954B324",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101186/1954B324",
	},
	[10118603]={
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 마주친다고 해도 개나 고양이 정도 크기로 엄청 크진 않지만 무리 지어 다니면 좀 위험할 수도 있어요…….",
		["DialogueId"]=10118603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954B34E",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118604,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101186/1954B34E",
	},
	[10118604]={
		["ContentKR"]="준비 단단히 하고 가도록 하죠!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954B378",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101186/1954B378",
	},
	[10118701]={
		["ContentKR"]="거기 서! 도망가지 마!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954C362",
		["NextDialogue"]=10118702,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101187/1954C362",
	},
	[10118702]={
		["ContentKR"]="헉…… 헉…… 다리만 쓸데없이 길어서는…… 기다려……",
		["DialogueId"]=10118702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954C38C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101187/1954C38C",
	},
	[10118801]={
		["ContentKR"]="콜록, 콜록…… 숨 막혀 죽겠네…… 비겁하긴……",
		["DialogueId"]=10118801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954D3CA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101188/1954D3CA",
	},
	[10118901]={
		["ContentKR"]="발소리가 들려요, 이쪽이에요 이쪽!",
		["DialogueId"]=10118901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954E432",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101189/1954E432",
	},
	[10119001]={
		["ContentKR"]="방금 뭔가 날아왔는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=10119001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954F49A",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119002,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101190/1954F49A",
	},
	[10119002]={
		["ContentKR"]="으악…… 뭐야, 돌멩이잖아!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1954F4C4",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101190/1954F4C4",
	},
	[10119101]={
		["ContentKR"]="저 높은 곳에 있잖아! 흥, 이번엔 안 통하지…… 으앗!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19550502",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101191/19550502",
	},
	[10119102]={
		["ContentKR"]="진짜…… 뭔 돌을 자꾸 그렇게 던져대는 거야, 무슨 원숭이의 환생이라도 되는 거야?",
		["DialogueId"]=10119102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955052C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101191/1955052C",
	},
	[10119201]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 발자국들은 방금 찍힌 거예요. 이쪽 젖은 발자국을 따라가면 될 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955156A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101192/1955156A",
	},
	[10119301]={
		["ContentKR"]="이건…… 새로 묻은 핏자국 같은데? 도둑 녀석이 다친 걸까요?",
		["DialogueId"]=10119301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="195525D2",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101193/195525D2",
	},
	[10119302]={
		["ContentKR"]="뭔가에 공격당했을지도 몰라…… 우리도 조심해야 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="195525FC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101193/195525FC",
	},
	[10119401]={
		["ContentKR"]="역시…… 여기 필토이드 무리한테 걸려서 포위당한 모양이야.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955363A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101194/1955363A",
	},
	[10119501]={
		["ContentKR"]="흥흥, 이제 더는 못 도망가겠지!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="195546A2",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119502,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101195/195546A2",
	},
	[10119502]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname}, 저 사람 잡는 걸 도와주세요!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="195546CC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200011,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101195/195546CC",
	},
	[10119601]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 문은 고장 난 게 아니라 그냥 잠긴 거네……",
		["DialogueId"]=10119601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955570A",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119602,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101196/1955570A",
	},
	[10119602]={
		["ContentKR"]="아, 폐광이 됐는데도 이렇게까지 도둑 걱정을 할 필요가 있나?",
		["DialogueId"]=10119602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19555734",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101196/19555734",
	},
	[10119603]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 어쩌면 사람들이 실수로 들어와 필토이드에게 공격당하는 걸 막으려는 건지도 몰라.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955575E",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119604,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101196/1955575E",
	},
	[10119604]={
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 근처에 열쇠가 있는지 찾아보자. 운이 좋으면 찾을 수 있을지도 몰라.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19555788",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101196/19555788",
	},
	[10119701]={
		["ContentKR"]="와…… 광갱에 이런 좋은 물건이 있었다고? 마르제가 알면 좋아하겠는걸!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="19556772",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119702,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101197/19556772",
	},
	[10119702]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 이 광석은 너무 단단해 보이는데, 마르제 씨의 삽이 망가질지도 몰라.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955679C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101197/1955679C",
	},
	[10119801]={
		["ContentKR"]="나도 도와줄게!",
		["DialogueId"]=10119801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="195577DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101198/195577DA",
	},
	[10119802]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아. 프시케, '마왕님'이 보고 있지 않을 때…… 우리끼리 나눠 가지는 건 어때?",
		["DialogueId"]=10119802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="19557804",
		["NextDialogue"]=10119803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101198/19557804",
	},
	[10119803]={
		["ContentKR"]="그냥 네가 다 가져가. 예쁜 옷도 사고 그래. 난…… 돈 쓸 데가 별로 없어서.",
		["DialogueId"]=10119803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955782E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101198/1955782E",
	},
	[10119901]={
		["ContentKR"]="이게 뭐지?",
		["DialogueId"]=10119901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="19558842",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101199/19558842",
	},
	[10120001]={
		["ContentKR"]="음…… 문을 여는 장치였네! 정말 잘 숨겨놨는걸.",
		["DialogueId"]=10120001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="195598AA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101200/195598AA",
	},
	[10120101]={
		["ContentKR"]="뭐가 이렇게 많아…… 으…… 으으……",
		["DialogueId"]=10120101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955A912",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A912",
	},
	[10120102]={
		["ContentKR"]="일단 내 다리에서 내려와, 스노우. 네가 그러고 있으면 내가 못 움직이잖아…… 먼저 아이스레이크 시티로 돌아가. 놀리지 않을 테니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=10120102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955A93C",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120103,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A93C",
	},
	[10120103]={
		["ContentKR"]="아, 안 안 돌아갈 거야, 모모모험을 경험해보지 못한 인생은 부부분명 완벽하지 않으니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=10120103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955A966",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120104,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A966",
	},
	[10120104]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아, 그럼 나도 {nickname}(이)랑 마왕님과 함께 인생을 좀 더 '완전하게' 만들어볼게.",
		["DialogueId"]=10120104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955A990",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A990",
	},
	[10120105]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금까지 내가 발목 붙잡은 일은 없었던 것 같은데…… 그러니까 앞으로도 걱정하지 않아도 괜찮아!",
		["DialogueId"]=10120105,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1955A9BA",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120106,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200006,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A9BA",
	},
	[10120106]={
		["ContentKR"]="응, 그러면 계속 앞으로 가보자.",
		["DialogueId"]=10120106,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955A9E4",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120107,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955A9E4",
	},
	[10120107]={
		["ContentKR"]="(그저 평범한 필토이드일 뿐이야. 연옥도에서 마주쳤던 것만큼 위험하진 않아……)",
		["DialogueId"]=10120107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955AA0E",
		["NextDialogue"]=10120108,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955AA0E",
	},
	[10120108]={
		["ContentKR"]="(베레가 가르쳐준 호신술을 잘 떠올리며, 조심스럽게 칼을 휘두르면…… 할 수 있어.)",
		["DialogueId"]=10120108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="1955AA38",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/101201/1955AA38",
	},

	},

	[11010101]={
		["Camera"]="-3847.1875,2457.945312,-1282.195801,0.000086,16.599463,-32.207474,28.0,502.63504,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="-65898.53125,-64185.589844,560.368103,0.000755,-1.807036,-174.521179,35.0,100000.0,true,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(또…… 또 이 꿈인가……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010101,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Pain01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-3599.351562,2301.796875,-1194.868286,0.000086,16.599463,-32.207474,28.0,502.63504,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["GUID"]="1B9008B2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010102,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(I... I'm having this dream again...)",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B9008B2",
	},
	[11010102]={
		["Camera"]="146.34375,121.84375,126.50769,0.000098,-24.201326,-169.002151,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="-66269.390625,-63920.886719,468.861389,0.001182,9.187184,-62.508495,35.0,100000.0,true,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>…… 지금 괴수가 널 가로막고, 네 숨통을 조이고 있다.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11010102,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="116.328125,115.898438,112.620361,0.000098,-24.401335,-168.802078,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["GUID"]="1B9008DC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010103,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...That giant beast blocked your path, its grip tightening around your throat.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B9008DC",
	},
	[11010103]={
		["Camera"]="138.929688,18.707031,107.624329,0.000043,-26.202394,152.990067,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="-65960.085938,-64241.90625,578.563599,0.001257,-11.41091,160.491211,35.0,100000.0,true,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>너의 그 몸뚱이는 질식으로 부들부들 떨리고, 고통이 너의 가장 깊숙한 곳에 숨겨진 욕망을 두드리고 있지.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11010103,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="138.929688,18.707031,131.753906,0.000043,-26.202394,152.990067,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["GUID"]="1B900906",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010104,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Your body shakes as you suffocate, sharp pains triggering the deepest desire within your soul.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900906",
	},
	[11010104]={
		["Camera"]="80.007812,123.242188,115.345276,0.000047,-32.004726,-160.221619,28.0,121.418312,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["ContentKR"]="(또 이 목소리인가……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010104,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="65.46875,118.03125,105.693848,0.000047,-32.004726,-160.221619,28.0,121.418312,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["GUID"]="1B900930",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010105,
		},
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(That voice again...)",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900930",
	},
	[11010105]={
		["ContentKR"]="(그만해. 내 머릿속에서 꺼지라고.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010105,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90095A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010106,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Enough. Get out of my head.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B90095A",
	},
	[11010106]={
		["Camera"]="-162.023438,188.144531,-14.760071,0.000057,25.19714,-32.413078,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="-66596.53125,-63975.3125,444.297272,0.001361,9.787613,-28.920835,35.0,100000.0,true,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>녀석을 죽여. 녀석의 울부짖음을 듣고, 녀석의 피로 널 적시며, 그 달콤한 죽음을 받아들이는 거다.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11010106,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-313.984375,284.59375,-99.471802,0.000057,25.19714,-32.413078,28.0,179.473755,false,Manual,10.963819",
		["GUID"]="1B900984",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010107,
			[2]=11010108,
		},
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Kill it. Listen to its death throes, bathe in its blood, and embrace the sweet release of death.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900984",
	},
	[11010107]={
		["ContentKR"]="(귀를 막는다. 최선을 다해 이상한 목소리를 무시한다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9009AE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Cover your ears to shut out that strange voice)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B9009AE",
	},
	[11010108]={
		["ContentKR"]="(여기를 벗어날 방법을 찾는다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B9009D8",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Find a way to leave this place)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B9009D8",
	},
	[11010115]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이 문은…… 언제부터 여기에 있던 거지?)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010115,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B900AFE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010116,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(This door... When did it show up here?)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900AFE",
	},
	[11010116]={
		["ContentKR"]="(…… 어쨌든, 여기서 벗어나야 해. 이 끔찍한 생각들로부터 도망쳐야 해.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010116,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B900B28",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(...Anyway, I must get out of here, and get rid of these terrible thoughts that cling to me like a plague.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900B28",
	},
	[11010117]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… {nickname2}, 일어나요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010117,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B900B52",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="..., wake up!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110101/1B900B52",
	},
	[11010203]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님, 드디어 깨어나셨군요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90196E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010204,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Captain! You're finally back with us!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B90196E",
	},
	[11010204]={
		["ContentKR"]="필토이드가 약해진 지금이 기회입니다. 어서요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010204,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901998",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010205,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="That Filthoid is on its last breath! Keep it up and finish it!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901998",
	},
	[11010205]={
		["ContentKR"]="율리안, 저랑 같이 뒤로 물러나요! 그러다 상처가 벌어질 거예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010205,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9019C2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010206,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Urien, retreat to the rear with me! Your wound is opening up again!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B9019C2",
	},
	[11010206]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}님, 그러니까 대장님을 믿어봐요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010206,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9019EC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Trust {性别2:him|her}.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B9019EC",
	},
	[11010207]={
		["Camera"]="-526.527344,88.693359,257.779175,0.000053,-14.399083,-24.98942,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다 해치웠나…… 으윽!",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010207,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Angry01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-285.453125,67.541016,115.755859,0.000059,7.001421,-39.57933,35.0,203.27417,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B901A16",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010208,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SEQ{\
LookAt{_delay{0.1},LookAtDescription{\"110022:p(P11010207Nanzhu1)\"}},\
LookAt{_delay{0},LookAtDescription{\"110022:p(P11010207Nanzhu2)\"}},\
},\
MoveTo{_delay{0.1},ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"EX01_FixSimple_02_1\"},MoveSpeed{60},Visibility{\"Show\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It's done... Argh...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=4,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901A16",
	},
	[11010208]={
		["Camera"]="-200.65625,-98.636719,169.075317,0.000085,-12.398438,27.824162,35.0,29.231426,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>네 두 손의 그 축축하고 끈적이는 것들이 과연 필토이드의 점액일까? 아니면 내장? 넌 모르겠지. 하지만 그것들이 네 영혼마저 떨리게 할 만큼 기쁘게 한다는 것만은 알고 있어.</>",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010208,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Pain01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-178.675781,-111.355469,166.543213,0.000094,-12.598413,44.824142,35.0,100.319092,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B901A40",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010209,
		},
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Your hands are drenched in wet, slimy filth, uncertain whether it's the Filthoid's secretions or its innards. Yet, a sudden joy tingles through your soul, bringing an inexplicable elation.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901A40",
	},
	[11010209]={
		["ContentKR"]="(닥쳐! 그렇지 않아!)",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010209,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Angry01"],
		["GUID"]="1B901A6A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010210,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Shut up! That was not how I felt!)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901A6A",
	},
	[11010210]={
		["Camera"]="-324.003906,-95.212891,-1.13916,0.000209,34.396191,6.017485,35.0,346.996704,false,Manual,8.49763",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>저항할 필요 없어. 나야말로 진정한 너이자, 네가 가진 죽음의 본능이니. 언젠가 넌 나의 인도와 태초의 의지를 따르게 될 테니까……</>",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010210,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-303.917969,24.761719,-1.13916,0.000229,36.19495,-27.584492,35.0,346.996704,false,Manual,8.49763",
		["GUID"]="1B901A94",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010211,
		},
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Do not resist, because I am what you actually are. I am your instinct for death. One day you shall follow my lead and obey the ancient will...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901A94",
	},
	[11010211]={
		["ContentKR"]="(더는 헛소리를 듣고 싶지 않아 이성을 유지하려 애쓴다.)",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010211,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B901ABE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010212,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(You refuse to let the ramblings erode your will and try to stay sane.)",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901ABE",
	},
	[11010212]={
		["Camera"]="-366.199219,109.310547,189.971191,0.000101,-11.7984,-32.981709,35.0,299.071411,false,Manual,17.255875",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=11010212,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-483.328125,191.716797,228.791748,0.00008,-16.998346,-34.983372,25.0,299.071411,false,Manual,17.255875",
		["GUID"]="1B901AE8",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=2,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901AE8",
	},
	[11010215]={
		["ContentKR"]="(…… 짜증 나는 목소리는 이제 멈춘 건가.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010215,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B901B66",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010216,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(...That annoying voice has finally stopped.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901B66",
	},
	[11010216]={
		["ContentKR"]="다른 사람들은 어떤지 빨리 확인해 봐야겠어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010216,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B901B90",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I should go check on the others.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901B90",
	},
	[11010221]={
		["ContentKR"]="으윽…… 다프네 선생님, 이걸로 임무는 완수한 건가요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010221,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901C62",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Hssss... Dr Daphne, we've completed our mission, right?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901C62",
	},
	[11010222]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아뇨. 무사히 살아 돌아가야 임무를 완수하는 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010222,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901C8C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...No, not until when we get back alive.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901C8C",
	},
	[11010223]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아, 다프네. 진정해, 다 괜찮을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010223,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901CB6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="It's alright, Daphne. Calm down. Everything's going to be okay. Come down.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901CB6",
	},
	[11010224]={
		["ContentKR"]="아, 돌아오셨군요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010224,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901CE0",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="You're back!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901CE0",
	},
	[11010225]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 어서 일어나요!!! 이러다간 죽을 수도 있다고요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010225,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90191A",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...Wake up!! Or you'll die!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B90191A",
	},
	[11010226]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010226,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B901944",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Captain!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110102/1B901944",
	},
	[11010227]={
		["ContentKR"]="앗, 대장님, 깨어나셨군요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010227,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Whoa, Captain's awake!",
	},
	[11010301]={
		["Camera"]="-109.082031,36.296875,134.294678,0.000056,-2.6,-29.789249,35.0,251.174286,false,Manual,4.041561",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 다치진 않으셨나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-105.990234,34.535156,134.13269,0.000056,-2.6,-29.789249,35.0,251.174286,false,Manual,4.041561",
		["GUID"]="1B902982",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11010302,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110005:n(110022)\"}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Are you injured?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902982",
	},
	[11010302]={
		["Camera"]="180.990234,-58.054688,136.406006,0.000081,-3.999752,173.611221,35.0,237.587646,false,Manual,14.702451",
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9029AC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11010303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm all right.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B9029AC",
	},
	[11010303]={
		["Camera"]="-26.443359,-22.296875,131.742676,0.000208,-0.800321,-17.784128,35.0,195.280243,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다행이에요. 당신이 아까 필토이드한테 붙잡혔을 때, 저는 정말……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110005:Happy01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B9029D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010304,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Good to hear that. When you got tangled up by that Filthoid, I thought I'd never...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B9029D6",
	},
	[11010304]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 어쨌든, 무사하셔서 다행이에요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010304,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B902A00",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010305,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...I'm just glad to see you're okay.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902A00",
	},
	[11010305]={
		["Camera"]="-124.117188,230.78125,138.991333,0.000193,-5.000238,-63.189613,35.0,195.280243,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만…… 이제 남은 사람이 별로 없어요. 운 좋게 살아남은 사람들도 모두 부상이 심하고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010305,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B902A2A",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:p(0301)",
			[2]="110005:p(0302)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11010306,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{0}},\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110005:p(45)\
\"},_delay{false},_nowait{false},_skip{false}},\
LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110022:p(Fix03_1),110005:p(Fix03_2)\"},_delay{false},_nowait{false},_skip{false}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...There are so few of us left. And those who survived are heavily wounded.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_End"],
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110005:p(45)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902A2A",
	},
	[11010306]={
		["Camera"]="-40.748047,16.859375,133.757568,0.000049,-2.400326,-29.795933,35.0,139.800323,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 괜찮으시다면, 부상자들과 이야기 좀 나눠주실 수 있을까요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010306,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902A54",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11010307,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{3},TargetPosition{\"79.496094,-28.96875,129.912231,0.000204,1.19906,172.210571,35.0,189.147873,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Agree\"},Duration{1}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="If you have the time, would you stay and talk to the wounded?",
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110005:p(-45)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902A54",
	},
	[11010307]={
		["Camera"]="-124.117188,230.78125,138.991333,0.000193,-5.000238,-63.189613,35.0,195.280243,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="고마워요. 제가 찾을 게 좀 있어서 잠깐 부탁드릴게요. 모두 당신에게 의지하고 있으니, 한 마디라도 해주시면 큰 힘이 될 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010307,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902A7E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010308,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Thank you. I'm heading back to find something, so please take care of them for the time being. The soldiers look up to you. Your encouragement will make them feel better.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902A7E",
	},
	[11010308]={
		["Camera"]="188.554688,-135.480469,136.286865,0.000072,-3.400293,147.398621,35.0,281.843994,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="뭘 찾으려고요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010308,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="178.708984,-129.195312,135.592773,0.000072,-3.400293,147.398621,35.0,281.843994,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B902AA8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010309,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Where are you going?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902AA8",
	},
	[11010309]={
		["Camera"]="-31.5,-4.214844,98.260132,0.000095,10.799259,-24.393532,35.0,155.397324,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="작전 지도를 보니 우리 위치에서 멀지 않은 곳에 창고가 있어요. 운이 좋다면 그 안에 구급상자가 있을지도 몰라요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010309,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902AD2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010310,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{3.5},TargetPosition{\"-4824.253906,-1793.578125,399.504517,0.000149,-14.800787,8.606606,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The battle map shows several warehouses near our location. We might find some first-aid kits there if we're lucky.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902AD2",
	},
	[11010310]={
		["Camera"]="-31.5,-4.214844,98.260132,0.000095,10.799259,-24.393532,35.0,155.397324,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지혈제랑 진통제가 다 떨어졌는데, 아직 치료받지 못한 부상자가 더 있거든요…… 더 늦어지면 위험할 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010310,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-33.328125,-3.296875,97.719482,0.000093,10.999268,-24.594616,35.0,169.901962,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B902AFC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010311,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm already out of coagulants and painkillers, but some of the soldiers haven't been treated yet... Their injuries can't afford any more delays.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902AFC",
	},
	[11010311]={
		["Camera"]="78.613281,-79.519531,135.044678,0.000173,-2.401023,150.605286,35.0,196.017685,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="제가 다녀올 테니, 여기 계세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010311,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B902B26",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010312,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You should stay. I'll go.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902B26",
	},
	[11010312]={
		["Camera"]="-157.597656,136.789062,135.529663,0.000177,-2.801231,-46.195469,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이건 의무관인 제가 해야 할 일이에요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010312,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902B50",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010313,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="This is the medic's job—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902B50",
	},
	[11010313]={
		["Camera"]="82.341797,-82.976562,124.904297,0.000209,0.799241,151.606491,35.0,189.147873,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="제 말 듣고 여기 있어요. 다프네, 아직 당신 실력으로는 필토이드라도 마주치면 위험하고, 또 마지막 남은 의무관이 여기서 죽으면 더 큰일이니까요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010313,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B902B7A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010314,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="And the medic stays. You aren't strong enough to deal with the Filthoids out there alone. We can't afford to lose our only medic.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902B7A",
	},
	[11010314]={
		["Camera"]="-96.363281,-22.546875,132.876343,0.000186,-2.60095,-7.595559,35.0,203.938095,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11010314,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902BA4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010315,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110005:Explain02_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902BA4",
	},
	[11010315]={
		["ContentKR"]="알겠어요…… 그러면 여기 있을게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010315,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902BCE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010316,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Understood... I'll follow your orders.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902BCE",
	},
	[11010316]={
		["ContentKR"]="아! 통신기는 혹시 아직 사용할 수 있나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010316,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B902BF8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010317,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Is your radio still working?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902BF8",
	},
	[11010317]={
		["Camera"]="116.833984,-102.40625,136.085327,0.000208,-4.200894,148.006485,35.0,189.147873,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="네, 아직은 괜찮은 것 같네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010317,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B902C22",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010318,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, it still works.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902C22",
	},
	[11010318]={
		["Camera"]="-200.285156,169.671875,157.805542,0.000194,-7.601222,-43.996536,35.0,203.938095,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다행이네요. 그럼 통신 상태를 유지해 주세요. 언제든 연락할 수 있도록요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010318,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B902C4C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Then please stay on the channel so we can keep in touch.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110103/1B902C4C",
	},
	[11010401]={
		["Camera"]="469.621094,-821.636719,219.922485,0.000145,-11.999488,-29.793802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="젠장…… 이 빌어먹을 놈들!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9039EA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Damn those friggin' rotters!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B9039EA",
	},
	[11010402]={
		["ContentKR"]="다친 곳은 좀 어떤가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B903A14",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Are you okay?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903A14",
	},
	[11010403]={
		["Camera"]="469.621094,-821.636719,219.922485,0.000145,-11.999488,-29.793802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="대장님! 전, 괜찮습니다. 움직일 수 있습니다…… 으윽……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010403,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="442.111328,-971.160156,179.715576,0.000149,-8.999238,-14.996659,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B903A3E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010408,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Captain! I'm fine, I can still move... HSSSSS—",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=50,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903A3E",
	},
	[11010404]={
		["ContentKR"]="모두 내 잘못이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010404,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B903A68",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I failed to protect you. I'm sorry.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903A68",
	},
	[11010405]={
		["Camera"]="469.621094,-821.636719,219.922485,0.000145,-11.999488,-29.793802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아닙니다, 대장님께서도 최선을 다하지 않으셨습니까. 그렇게 말씀하지 마십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010405,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="442.111328,-971.160156,179.715576,0.000149,-8.999238,-14.996659,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B903A92",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010408,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Please don't say that, Captain! You did your best!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=50,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903A92",
	},
	[11010406]={
		["ContentKR"]="방금 누굴 욕한 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010406,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B903ABC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Who are you cursing at?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903ABC",
	},
	[11010407]={
		["Camera"]="469.621094,-821.636719,219.922485,0.000145,-11.999488,-29.793802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰 놈들 말고 누가 있겠습니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010407,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="442.111328,-971.160156,179.715576,0.000149,-8.999238,-14.996659,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B903AE6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010408,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Who else could it be? The bastards who call themselves The Forsakens.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=50,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903AE6",
	},
	[11010408]={
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰…… 양심은 개나 줘버린 놈들, 필토이드를 무기처럼 쓰다니…… <W>포세이큰 동맹</>은 진짜 인간이 아니라 필토이드랑 같은 취급을 해야 하는 것 아닙니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010408,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903B10",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010409,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Those despicable cowards are using Filthoids as their weapon... The Forsakens are monsters, just like their Filthoid pets!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903B10",
	},
	[11010409]={
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 위의 그 멍청이들도 마찬가지입니다. 이렇게 필토이드가 많이 있는데, 우리 선발대 작전 계획서에는 한 글자도 언급이 없었다는 게 말이 안 되지 않습니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010409,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903B3A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010410,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="And those blasted airheads giving us the orders are just as bad. The mission brief mentioned nothing about the Filthoid hordes down here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903B3A",
	},
	[11010410]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 죄송합니다. 이렇게 큰 소리 내는 걸 안 좋아하실 텐데, 제 싫은 소리만 한 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010410,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903B64",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010411,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="...Sorry about that. I shouldn't have vented my frustration in front of you, Captain.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903B64",
	},
	[11010411]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아. 속으로만 삭이는 것보다 말로 푸는 게 낫지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010411,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B903B8E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010412,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It's alright. Letting out emotions is better than being unable to speak at all.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903B8E",
	},
	[11010412]={
		["ContentKR"]="하하, 대장님도 위로라는 걸 할 줄 아시는 분인걸 이제야 알았습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010412,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903BB8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010413,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Hah! You always know how to soothe people, Captain!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903BB8",
	},
	[11010413]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래도 대장님이 계셔서 다행입니다. 아니었다면 저희들 따위 목숨은 여기서 끝났을 텐데 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010413,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903BE2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010414,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="And thank goodness we have you. We thought we were goners.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903BE2",
	},
	[11010414]={
		["ContentKR"]="<Highlight>아바르 님</>이라도 계셨다면…… 우리 중에서 작전 경험이 가장 많은 분이시니, 분명 좋은 방법을 알려주셨을 텐데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010414,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B903C0C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="It's just that we're too green. If only Commander Avar were here... As a veteran, he must have a way to get us out.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903C0C",
	},
	[11010415]={
		["ContentKR"]="(아바르 교관님은…… 아직 소식이 없어.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010415,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B903C36",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Sir Avar... Still no words from him.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110104/1B903C36",
	},
	[11010501]={
		["Camera"]="-3.996094,-1946.070312,162.821411,0.000149,-8.797147,-118.375465,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="선생님…… 다프네 선생님…… 아, 이렇게 갇혀 버리다니, 진짜 여기까지 인가 봐요. 정말 이 끔찍한 곳에서 죽게 된다면, 절 묻어주실 수 있나요…… 다프네 선생님……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B904A52",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="Doctor... Dr Daphne... We're stuck in this bloody dump. Please, Dr Daphne, if I don't make it, do me a favour and bury me...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904A52",
	},
	[11010502]={
		["ContentKR"]="그만 말해, 상처가 덧날 수 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B904A7C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't be discouraged. It'll worsen your wounds.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904A7C",
	},
	[11010503]={
		["Camera"]="-3.996094,-1946.070312,162.821411,0.000149,-8.797147,-118.375465,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="진통제도 없어서, 뭐라도 말하는 게 차라리 나은 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="19.119141,-1903.257812,170.347046,0.000149,-8.797147,-118.375465,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B904AA6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010506,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="We're out of painkillers... so I have to grumble a bit to make myself feel better.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904AA6",
	},
	[11010504]={
		["ContentKR"]="그렇게 소리가 작아서 필토이드한테 들리기나 하겠어?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B904AD0",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Right, keep raising your voice to attract the Filthoids.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904AD0",
	},
	[11010505]={
		["Camera"]="-3.996094,-1946.070312,162.821411,0.000149,-8.797147,-118.375465,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="진통제도 없으니 뭐라도 말하면 나아질까 싶어서 그런 건데…… 주의하겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="19.119141,-1903.257812,170.347046,0.000149,-8.797147,-118.375465,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B904AFA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010506,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="Sorry, Captain. I'll zip it. With no painkillers left, I can only grumble a little to help distract me from the pain.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904AFA",
	},
	[11010506]={
		["ContentKR"]="아까 다프네 선생님과 후방에 계시는 걸 본 것 같은데, 선생님은 괜찮으십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010506,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B904B24",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010507,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="Dr Daphne and you covered our retreat just then. How is she?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904B24",
	},
	[11010507]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아. 나한테 너희가 어떤지 봐달라고 하더군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010507,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B904B4E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010508,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="She's all right. She told me to come check on all of you.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904B4E",
	},
	[11010508]={
		["ContentKR"]="그렇다면 다행입니다. 참…… 다프네 선생님은 사실 그냥 연금원에서 편하게 계셔도 되는 분인데 굳이 13군단에 오셔서 이런 고생을 하고 계시니…… 솔직히 무슨 생각을 하고 계신지 모르겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010508,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B904B78",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010509,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="Good to hear that. *sigh* A high-born lady like her could've stayed at the Academy, but no, she chose to serve with the 13th Legion. What was she thinking?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904B78",
	},
	[11010509]={
		["ContentKR"]="귀족님들이야 항상 말로는 언제나 폐하께 영광과 충성을 바친다고 하신다지만, 이곳까지 와서도 그런 소리가 나올지는 모르겠습니다. 그때 그런 말을 꺼냈던 자신의 입을 스스로 꿰매 버리고 싶을 것 같은데 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010509,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B904BA2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010510,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="...\"Eternal glory and loyalty to our Emperor!\" Those aristocrats say that all the time. I wonder if any of them would still be so keen on that when they're actually in a filth pit like this.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904BA2",
	},
	[11010510]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 다프네 선생님은 실력도 뛰어나시고 말씀도 따뜻하게 하십니다. 대장님, 다프네 선생님을 절대 여기서 돌아가시게 두면 안됩니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010510,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B904BCC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="But Dr Daphne has real medical skills and a soft, pretty voice. We gotta keep her safe, Captain. Don't want her to die here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110105/1B904BCC",
	},
	[11010601]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="怎么样？他们有没有稍微好一点？",
		["DialogueId"]=11010601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905ABA",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010602,
			[2]=11010604,
		},
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905ABA",
	},
	[11010602]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="精神多了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
