		["GUID"]="1B905AE4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905AE4",
	},
	[11010603]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="那就好。不过大家伤得这么重，也不知道还能撑多久。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905B0E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010606,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905B0E",
	},
	[11010604]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="还是很糟。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905B38",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010605,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905B38",
	},
	[11010605]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="……嗯，我明白……只是心理安慰远远不够……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010605,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905B62",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010606,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905B62",
	},
	[11010606]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11010606,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905B8C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010607,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905B8C",
	},
	[11010607]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="抱歉，可以再麻烦您一次吗？我要回去一趟，可否请您继续照看一下伤员？",
		["DialogueId"]=11010607,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905BB6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010608,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905BB6",
	},
	[11010608]={
		["Camera"]="63.992188,77.589844,119.761597,0.000242,-1.800629,-155.788162,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="回去？",
		["DialogueId"]=11010608,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905BE0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010609,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905BE0",
	},
	[11010609]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="是的。来的路上有些军需箱，应该是原本储备在要塞的应急物资。当时我在忙着掩护大家，没来得及……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010609,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905C0A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010610,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905C0A",
	},
	[11010610]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="我再回去找找，运气好的话，里面说不定会有急救包……就这么办吧！他们的伤情耽误不得了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010610,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905C34",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010611,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905C34",
	},
	[11010611]={
		["Camera"]="63.992188,77.589844,119.761597,0.000242,-1.800629,-155.788162,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="你留下，我去。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010611,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905C5E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010612,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905C5E",
	},
	[11010612]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="但这是医务官的职责——",
		["DialogueId"]=11010612,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905C88",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010613,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905C88",
	},
	[11010613]={
		["Camera"]="63.992188,77.589844,119.761597,0.000242,-1.800629,-155.788162,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="所以你更应该留下。你身手没那么好，要是遇到秽兽，应付不来。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010613,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905CB2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010614,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905CB2",
	},
	[11010614]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="……明白了。我听从您的安排。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010614,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905CDC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010615,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905CDC",
	},
	[11010615]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="对了，您的通讯器还完好吗？",
		["DialogueId"]=11010615,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905D06",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010616,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905D06",
	},
	[11010616]={
		["Camera"]="63.992188,77.589844,119.761597,0.000242,-1.800629,-155.788162,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="嗯，能用。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010616,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905D30",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010617,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905D30",
	},
	[11010617]={
		["Camera"]="-107.146484,-105.058594,119.472778,0.000237,-0.200623,61.812572,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="好，那么我们随时保持联络。",
		["DialogueId"]=11010617,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905D5A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905D5A",
	},
	[11010618]={
		["ContentKR"]="창고에 정말 군수품 상자가 있긴 하네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010618,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905D84",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010619,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The warehouse does have a few military supply crates.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905D84",
	},
	[11010619]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아요. 상자를 열기 전에 주변에 함정은 없는지 잘 살피셔야 해요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010619,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905DAE",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Great. But before your search, make sure the crates are safe to be approached.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905DAE",
	},
	[11010621]={
		["ContentKR"]="찾았습니다. 약품도 모두 멀쩡해요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010621,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B905E02",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010622,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I got it. The medicine appears to be in good condition.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905E02",
	},
	[11010622]={
		["ContentKR"]="감사합니다! 돌아오실 때도 조심하셔야 해요. 주변에 아직 필토이드가 있을 수 있으니까요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010622,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905E2C",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Happy",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="That's great! Thank you! Be careful on your way back. Filthoids are probably lurking around this place.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905E2C",
	},
	[11010623]={
		["ContentKR"]="다른 사람들은 어떻게 됐을까……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010623,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905E56",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010624,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Wonder how the other guys are doing...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905E56",
	},
	[11010624]={
		["ContentKR"]="썩을 놈들…… 반드시 되갚아줘야 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010624,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905E80",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Gotta make those rotters pay.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905E80",
	},
	[11010625]={
		["ContentKR"]="빌어먹을 필토이드…… 빌어먹을 포세이큰……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010625,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905EAA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010626,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Damn those Filthoids... Damn The Forsakens...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905EAA",
	},
	[11010626]={
		["ContentKR"]="잠들면 안 돼…… 여기서 쓰러질 순 없어……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010626,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905ED4",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Can't fall asleep... Can't die here...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905ED4",
	},
	[11010627]={
		["ContentKR"]="으윽…… 팔이 말을 안 듣는 것 같아……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010627,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905EFE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010628,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Hsss— I can't feel my arm...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905EFE",
	},
	[11010628]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님은 무사하셔서 다행입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010628,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B905F28",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Thank goodness our Captain is all right. We're gonna make it.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110106/1B905F28",
	},
	[11010701]={
		["Camera"]="-181.388672,-39.609375,130.604614,-0.015137,-0.715817,67.630249,35.0,171.964966,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="돌아오셨군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906B22",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11010702,
		},
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{_delay{0.5},ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pNanzhumove\"},MoveSpeed{80},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{1.5},TargetPosition{\"-101.953125,413.027344,207.724121,-0.015137,-12.916167,-98.55867,35.0,155.193787,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{3}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="You're back!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906B22",
	},
	[11010702]={
		["ContentKR"]="(약을 다프네에게 건넨다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11010702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906B4C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010703,
		["Subtitle"]="(Give the medicine to Daphne)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906B4C",
	},
	[11010703]={
		["Camera"]="-362.734375,-126.394531,148.611084,0.000269,-5.800961,36.800026,35.0,396.962982,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="좋아요. 이 정도면 부상자들의 상태를 어느 정도 안정시킬 수 있을 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010703,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-358.041016,-122.882812,148.015259,0.000269,-5.800961,36.800026,35.0,396.962982,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906B76",
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1.5},_delay{false},_nowait{false},_skip{false}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Great, this would help stabilise the wounded.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906B76",
	},
	[11010704]={
		["Camera"]="-38.066406,117.800781,137.944946,0.000298,-5.401026,-146.592728,29.45373,261.978973,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="'스노우 울프'의 연락은 아직입니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010704,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B906BA0",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11010705,
		["Scripts"]="SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pNanzhumove\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Any news from the Snow Wolves?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906BA0",
	},
	[11010705]={
		["Camera"]="-191.169922,2.410156,140.592285,0.000278,-3.600862,52.200577,35.0,130.402435,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아직이에요. 안 계신 동안 제가 '스노우 울프'의 아바르 중령님, 그리고 총지휘부의 풀비스 장관님과 연락을 시도했지만 모든 통신 채널이 끊겨버렸어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010705,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906BCA",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:n(110026)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11010706,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{1100050},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1.5}},\
CameraMoveTo{TargetPosition{\"-744.447266,-1296.125,176.616455,0.000267,-8.001067,112.406685,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0},_delay{2},_nowait{false},_skip{false}},\
CameraMoveTo{TargetPosition{\"-847.738281,-1338.699219,176.616455,0.000268,-8.001067,112.406708,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{15}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Not yet. While you were away, I tried reaching out to Commander Avar of the Snow Wolves and Chief Commander Fulvis, but none of the comm channels were working.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_End"],
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110022:p(100)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906BCA",
	},
	[11010706]={
		["Camera"]="-515.240234,50.238281,106.900269,0.000249,0.398227,-7.393137,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="계속 시도해 보죠. 지금은 우선 부상자를 눕힐 수 있는 더 안전한 곳을 찾아보죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010706,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B906BF4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010707,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SEQ{\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110022:n(110005)\"}},\
LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110022:n(110005)\"}}\
},\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{1.5},TargetPosition{\"-129.167969,149.335938,131.636841,0.000255,-1.001859,-106.992546,35.0,190.165726,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Keep trying. And meanwhile, let's see if we can find a safer place for the wounded.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906BF4",
	},
	[11010707]={
		["Camera"]="-365.529297,-63.316406,169.275757,0.000246,-12.001523,22.80418,35.0,312.469208,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그것과 관련해서 말씀드릴 게 하나 있어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010707,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-346.34375,-87.652344,150.890503,0.000338,-7.800048,30.019533,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906C1E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010708,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{3}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Actually, I have a plan.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906C1E",
	},
	[11010708]={
		["Camera"]="-346.34375,-87.652344,150.890503,0.000338,-7.800048,30.019533,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="무슨 일이시죠?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010708,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B906C48",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010709,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What is it?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906C48",
	},
	[11010709]={
		["Camera"]="-346.34375,-87.652344,150.890503,0.000338,-7.800048,30.019533,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="우선 이 지도를 한번 보시겠어요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11010709,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-286.345703,-87.492188,152.207397,0.000344,-7.199763,40.221565,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906C72",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010710,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Take a look at this map.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=60,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906C72",
	},
	[11010710]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금 우리가 있는 창고 구역 출구는 막혔지만, 아직 확인하지 않은 곳이 하나 있어요…… 바로 <H>지하 통로</>예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010710,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906C9C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010711,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We're currently in the storage area where the exit is blocked. However, there are some underground tunnels that we haven't checked yet.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906C9C",
	},
	[11010711]={
		["ContentKR"]="제국의 대부분 도시와 요새에는 잘 정비된 하수도가 있어요. 또 최근 10년이 훌쩍 넘는 기간 동안 공습이 있을 때 대피할 목적으로 이런 지하 하수도를 전면 확장했다고 들었어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010711,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906CC6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010712,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Most imperial cities and fortresses have elaborate networks of underground sewers. In recent years, some of these tunnels were expanded and reinforced to serve as air raid shelters.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906CC6",
	},
	[11010712]={
		["ContentKR"]="운이 좋아서 포세이큰 동맹이 지하에 매복해 있지 않다면, 어쩌면…… 어쩌면 부상자들을 그곳으로 옮겨 쉬게 할 수 있을지도 몰라요. 지하 수로가 요새 밖과 연결되어 있어서 구조대가 오면 접선하기도 편할 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010712,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906CF0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010713,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="If we're lucky enough and The Forsakens didn't set up any ambushes, maybe we could get the wounded there to rest and recover. Besides, the sewer tunnels run all the way outside the fortress, so if our reinforcements arrive, they can easily get to us.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906CF0",
	},
	[11010713]={
		["ContentKR"]="물, 물론…… 지하도 위험할 수 있지만요. 괜찮으시다면 제가 먼저 가서 확인해 볼게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010713,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906D1A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010714,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Of course... the tunnels might be risky as well. If you think it's feasible, allow me to scout ahead first.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906D1A",
	},
	[11010714]={
		["Camera"]="-132.943359,121.832031,131.186157,0.000256,0.3982,-111.990349,35.0,190.165726,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮은 생각이네요. 하지만 다프네, 당신 혼자 확인하러 가는 건 너무 위험합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010714,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-138.074219,112.890625,131.25708,0.000256,-0.401793,-110.989861,35.0,190.165726,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906D44",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010715,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It's worth a try, but we can't risk having our medic do this alone.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906D44",
	},
	[11010715]={
		["Camera"]="-765.152344,-143.957031,167.94812,-0.001739,-7.41055,15.226987,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지금 움직일 수 있는 건 우리 둘뿐이에요. 필토이드가 이곳을 습격할 수도 있으니, 그들을 보호하려면 대장님이 멀리 떨어질 수도 없고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010715,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-794.794922,3.945312,167.952271,-0.001739,-7.41055,2.827789,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906D6E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010716,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But now only the two of us can move or act... And the Filthoids might attack this place anytime. You should stay and keep the squad safe.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=7,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906D6E",
	},
	[11010716]={
		["Camera"]="-236.480469,-19.691406,150.981567,0.000378,-8.399657,44.019459,35.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저는…… 전문 정찰병은 아니지만, 어느 정도 지식은 있으니까요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11010716,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-229.025391,-12.492188,149.450317,0.000378,-8.399657,44.019459,35.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906D98",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010717,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I may not be a professional scout, but over time I've picked up some useful skills, so...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=7,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906D98",
	},
	[11010717]={
		["Camera"]="-134.585938,137.484375,132.803467,0.00038,-2.599795,-102.382423,28.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다. 움직일 때 조심하시고, 적과 마주치면 정면 충돌은 절대로 피해야 합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010717,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-135.685547,132.480469,132.570435,0.00038,-2.599795,-102.382423,28.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906DC2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010718,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Alright, be careful down there. Make sure to sidestep any confrontation with the enemies.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110005:Explain02_End",
			[2]="110022:Agree",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=7,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906DC2",
	},
	[11010718]={
		["Camera"]="-229.025391,-12.492188,146.342163,0.000379,-7.399601,41.019707,35.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠어요. 계속 연락드릴게요. 당신도 다른 사람들과 연락을 유지해 주세요. 만약 제가 30분 이상 연락이 없으면…… 다른 방법을 찾아주세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010718,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B906DEC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010719,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Understood. I'll stay on the radio while you keep contacting the others. And if I lose contact for more than half an hour, please... lead the squad to find another way.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906DEC",
	},
	[11010719]={
		["Camera"]="-216.220703,27.652344,122.164429,0.000382,5.200349,33.623096,35.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="겁먹지 마, 다프네. 모두가 살아남을 수 있는 희망이 너한테 달려 있어…… 두려워할 필요 없어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010719,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Iyada01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-208.587891,32.714844,122.998535,0.000381,5.200349,33.623184,35.0,178.234528,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B906E16",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110005:p(0501)",
		},
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't be scared, Daphne. Everyone's survival depends on you... Don't be scared.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110107/1B906E16",
	},
	[11010803]={
		["Content"]="玩法教学预留",
		["DialogueId"]=11010803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B907BDE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010804,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110108/1B907BDE",
	},
	[11010804]={
		["Content"]="玩法教学预留",
		["DialogueId"]=11010804,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B907C08",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010805,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110108/1B907C08",
	},
	[11010805]={
		["Content"]="玩法教学预留",
		["DialogueId"]=11010805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B907C32",
		["NextDialogue"]=11010806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110108/1B907C32",
	},
	[11010806]={
		["Content"]="玩法教学预留",
		["DialogueId"]=11010806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B907C5C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110108/1B907C5C",
	},
	[11010901]={
		["ContentKR"]="필토이드다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B908BF2",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Filthoids!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110109/1B908BF2",
	},
	[11010902]={
		["ContentKR"]="다프네, 부상자들을 지켜요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11010902,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B908C1C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne, protect the wounded.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110109/1B908C1C",
	},
	[11010903]={
		["ContentKR"]="네!",
		["DialogueId"]=11010903,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B908C46",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, Captain!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110109/1B908C46",
	},
	[11011001]={
		["ContentKR"]="조금만 버텨주세요. 다시 '스노우 울프'와 연락을 취해볼게요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909C5A",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011002,
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Hang in there, I'll try contacting the Snow Wolves!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909C5A",
	},
	[11011002]={
		["ContentKR"]="여전히…… 그대로예요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909C84",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011003,
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Still... got nothing...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909C84",
	},
	[11011003]={
		["ContentKR"]="통신보안, 통신보안!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909CAE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011004,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...Copy? Do you copy?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909CAE",
	},
	[11011004]={
		["ContentKR"]="연결됐어요……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011004,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909CD8",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Shock",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011005,
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We've got a response...!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909CD8",
	},
	[11011005]={
		["ContentKR"]="<H>휘페르보레아의 오늘 날씨는 어떤가?</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11011005,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909D02",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011006,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909D02",
	},
	[11011006]={
		["ContentKR"]="<H>디즈마니아는 오늘 밤 비가 오겠습니다.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11011006,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909D2C",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Confident",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011007,
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="It's raining tonight in Dismania.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909D2C",
	},
	[11011007]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 헤데란 중령이다. 연결된 자는 '그리핀 소대'의 누구인가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011007,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909D56",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011008,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="This is Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland. Report your position, Squad Griffins.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909D56",
	},
	[11011008]={
		["ContentKR"]="의무관 다프네 세오도어입니다. 지원을 요청합니다. 저희는 지금……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011008,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909D80",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011009,
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="This is Medic Daphne Theodore requesting backup. We're currently at...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909D80",
	},
	[11011009]={
		["ContentKR"]="끝도 없군……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011009,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B909DAA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Filthoids just keep showing up...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909DAA",
	},
	[11011010]={
		["ContentKR"]="꼬맹이, 조금만 버텨!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011010,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909DD4",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Hang in there, kid!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909DD4",
	},
	[11011011]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 교관님!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011011,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B909DFE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011012,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir Avar!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909DFE",
	},
	[11011012]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래, 내가 왔으니 뒤는 나한테 맡기고 앞만 신경 써라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011012,
		["GUID"]="1B909E28",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Focus on the fight. I've got your six.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909E28",
	},
	[11011013]={
		["ContentKR"]="우선 이곳의 필토이드를 처리하고 임시 정비 구역을 마련했지만, 여기도 오래 버티긴 힘들 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011013,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B909E52",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011014,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We've repelled the Filthoids and set up a temporary shelter, but I don't think this place will hold.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909E52",
	},
	[11011014]={
		["ContentKR"]="부상자들은 다프네가 임시 치료를 하긴 했지만, 부상 정도를 볼 때 지금 상태로 싸우기는 무리입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011014,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B909E7C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011015,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne has tended to the wounded, but due to their injuries they're currently unable to fight.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909E7C",
	},
	[11011015]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그래. 고생이 많았겠군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011015,
		["GUID"]="1B909EA6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...Okay. You two have done pretty well.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909EA6",
	},
	[11011016]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 중령님! 휴, 후우…… 오셨군요! 아바르 중령님이 오셨으니 이제…… 이 요새를 공격하러……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011016,
		["GUID"]="1B909ED0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011017,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110019,
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar! Huff... Huff... you're here! I knew it... You'll lead us all... to take this damned fort...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909ED0",
	},
	[11011017]={
		["ContentKR"]="가슴에 달린 제국 휘장에 걸맞은 용기를 가졌다니, 모두 훌륭하군. 제국은 자네들이 흘린 피를 절대 헛되이 만들지 않겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011017,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B909EFA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Each one of you is a credit to the squad. You've shown courage that is truly worthy of your badge. The Empire will not let your efforts go to waste.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909EFA",
	},
	[11011018]={
		["ContentKR"]="중령님, '스노우 울프' 쪽은 어떻습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011018,
		["GUID"]="1B909F24",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011019,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110013,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, what about the Snow Wolves?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909F24",
	},
	[11011019]={
		["ContentKR"]="모두 임무를 잘 수행하고 있다. 내가 총지휘관님께 연락을 취했으니, 마음 놓고 쉬어도 된다. 나머지는 우리에게 맡겨라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011019,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B909F4E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="They are performing their duties, and I've reached out to the chief commander. Have a good rest and leave the fighting to us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909F4E",
	},
	[11011020]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 중령님? 제가…… 꿈을 꾸는……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011020,
		["GUID"]="1B909F78",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011021,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110027,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar...? Am I... in a dream...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909F78",
	},
	[11011021]={
		["ContentKR"]="꿈이 아니다. 조금만 더 버텨라. 잠들지 마라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011021,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B909FA2",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="This is not a dream. Stay with us, and don't fall asleep.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909FA2",
	},
	[11011022]={
		["ContentKR"]="중령님, 부디…… 황제 폐하께…… 영광을……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011022,
		["GUID"]="1B909FCC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011023,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110028,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="I salute you, sir... All glory... to our Emperor...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909FCC",
	},
	[11011023]={
		["ContentKR"]="황제 폐하께 영광을.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011023,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B909FF6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="All glory to our Emperor.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909FF6",
	},
	[11011024]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님, 그리고 중령님…… 이번 작전에 아직 희망이 있겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011024,
		["GUID"]="1B90A020",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011025,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110026,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Hurtsoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, do you think we still have the chance?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B90A020",
	},
	[11011025]={
		["ContentKR"]="현재 상황으로 볼 때……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011025,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90A04A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011026,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="From what I see of the battle—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B90A04A",
	},
	[11011026]={
		["ContentKR"]="현재 전황으로 볼 때, 지원군도 오는 중이니 금방 요새를 점령하고, 그 놈들을 박살 낼 수 있을 것이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011026,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90A074",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The tide of battle is in our favour. Reinforcements are on their way. Soon we will take the fortress and crush those bastards.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B90A074",
	},
	[11011101]={
		["Camera"]="71.980469,21.617188,152.551147,0.000053,1.200426,-127.457375,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="현재 상황이 어떤지는 모두 잘 확인했다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="65.123047,12.664062,152.787476,0.000053,1.200426,-127.456856,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90ACC2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011102,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
LookAt{_delay{0},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110005)\"}},\
LookAt{_delay{0},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I've checked on everyone.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90ACC2",
	},
	[11011102]={
		["Camera"]="-26.388672,-95.464844,131.351807,0.000051,-1.198971,55.32172,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-27.910156,-97.722656,130.594116,0.000051,-1.198971,55.321609,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90ACEC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011103,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90ACEC",
	},
	[11011103]={
		["Camera"]="123.90625,8.054688,151.992065,0.000143,-0.199039,-144.862152,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="모두 팔다리는 멀쩡한 것에 위안을 삼아야겠군. 그래도 여기서 멍하니 있을 수는 없지 않나, 정신 차려!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="116.300781,2.699219,151.960693,0.000143,-0.199039,-144.862152,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AD16",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Why the grief? You still have your arms and legs, so stand up straight and pull yourself together!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AD16",
	},
	[11011104]={
		["Camera"]="47.953125,70.066406,136.06958,0.000162,-0.799071,-141.862808,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="55.464844,75.96875,136.202271,0.000162,-0.799071,-141.863129,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AD40",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Talk01_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk03_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AD40",
	},
	[11011105]={
		["Camera"]="101.982422,20.207031,139.349487,0.000166,4.400902,-138.460251,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 어떤 상황이었는지 알 것 같군. 희생된 병사는…… 오는 길에 이미 두 눈으로 모두 확인했다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011105,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="121.832031,37.753906,137.308228,0.000167,3.600766,-138.059387,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AD6A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011106,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...I know what you've been through. I've seen many of our fallen soldiers along the way.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=25,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AD6A",
	},
	[11011106]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 너희는 군인이다. 애도는 무사히 전장을 벗어난 후에 해도 늦지 않아.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011106,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90AD94",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011107,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Angry01_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But you are soldiers. Save your condolences for when you're home and safe.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AD94",
	},
	[11011107]={
		["Camera"]="78.527344,246.535156,106.876709,0.000156,4.201119,-107.056519,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래서, 너희 둘은 괜찮은 거냐?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90ADBE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011108,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
LookAt{_delay{0},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110005)\"}},\
LookAt{_delay{2},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="So, are you two okay?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90ADBE",
	},
	[11011108]={
		["Camera"]="-45.003906,-58.433594,135.476929,0.000162,-1.998841,41.544678,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-56.105469,-68.359375,134.581909,0.000162,-2.198761,41.54657,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90ADE8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011109,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90ADE8",
	},
	[11011109]={
		["ContentKR"]="물론입니다. 상부에서 지시하신 일을 진행하느라 이곳에서 모두 죽을 뻔했지만 괜찮습니다. 걱정해 주셔서 정말 감사합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011109,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90AE12",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011110,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We're doing fine. Just carrying out the orders from higher-ups and almost got killed. Thanks for asking, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AE12",
	},
	[11011110]={
		["Camera"]="112.615234,-17.351562,142.853027,0.000149,4.000756,-147.449371,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너…… 아니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011110,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="139.703125,-0.066406,140.586426,0.000149,2.400723,-147.448318,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AE3C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011111,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Daph — Ugh, never mind.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AE3C",
	},
	[11011111]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 자네가 보고하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011111,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90AE66",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110010:n(110022)",
			[2]="110005:n(110022)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011112,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]=". You, do the report please.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Sigh_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk03_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AE66",
	},
	[11011112]={
		["Camera"]="112.685547,-61.25,143.060913,0.000137,-4.200498,164.748749,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다. '그리핀'은 계획대로 '스노우 울프'와 나뉘어 론샤 요새를 공격했지만, 요새에 잠입한 후 매복 공격을 받았습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011112,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="126.886719,-61.386719,141.004639,0.000137,-4.600248,166.146973,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AE90",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011113,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{1}},\
PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir. As planned, the Griffins and the Snow Wolves were expected to launch a two-way assault on Lonza Fortress. However, the Griffins were ambushed shortly after we began our infiltration.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AE90",
	},
	[11011113]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 구역의 통로가 봉쇄되었고, 우리 측 인원들과도 연락이 끊겼으며, 나머지는 심각한 피해를 입었습니다. 외부와의 통신도 끊기는 바람에…… 여기 갇히게 된 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011113,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90AEBA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011114,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{2}},\
PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{1}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The passageways between the zones were blocked. We lost contact with some of our men, and the rest have suffered heavy casualties. Our commlinks have been severed, too — we're essentially trapped here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AEBA",
	},
	[11011114]={
		["Camera"]="49.236328,128.921875,106.10083,0.000092,7.199074,-119.454262,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="'스노우 울프'의 상황도 크게 다르지 않다. 이건 너희들만 알고 있어라. 부상자들에겐 말하지 마라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011114,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="66.128906,158.828125,101.760864,0.000092,7.199074,-119.454262,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AEE4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011115,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Actually, the Snow Wolves went through the same situation as yours. Keep this between us, don't let the wounded know.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AEE4",
	},
	[11011115]={
		["ContentKR"]="흠…… 그렇다면 지금 '그리핀'에 작전을 수행할 수 있는 건 자네 둘 뿐이라는 건데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011115,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90AF0E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011116,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="So, seems like the two of you are the only combat-capable Griffins left in the squad...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AF0E",
	},
	[11011116]={
		["Camera"]="105.605469,231.957031,106.675293,0.000097,3.598758,-114.049339,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네, 아까 창고 구역과 공장 구역 사이의 통로를 뚫어서 이제 중간 구역은 그나마 괜찮을 거다. 내가 신호를 보내놨으니, 나중에 사람이 오면 함께 그곳으로 이동해 정비할 수 있도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011116,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="112.126953,246.582031,105.66687,0.000097,3.598758,-114.048561,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AF38",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011117,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne, we've opened the passage between the storage area and the processing area, and there's a place in the middle that's reasonably secure. I've given the signal, and you'll be escorted there for a better rest.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AF38",
	},
	[11011117]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 자넨 나와 함께 움직이지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011117,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90AF62",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011118,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]=", you come with me and continue the mission.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AF62",
	},
	[11011118]={
		["Camera"]="-59.236328,-28.296875,130.930908,0.000099,-0.201081,27.949673,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저도 움직일 수 있습니다. 제발 저를…… 으윽!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011118,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Iyada01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-66.517578,-31.847656,128.999756,0.000099,-0.201081,27.149368,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AF8C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011119,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I can take action with you. Please, let me... Argh!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AF8C",
	},
	[11011119]={
		["Camera"]="126.355469,-19.980469,124.82605,0.000118,7.598749,-150.648972,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다리를 다친 건가? 여기까지는 어떻게 온 거지? 설마 아픈데도 억지로 버틴 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011119,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="139.808594,-12.4375,122.766846,0.000118,7.598749,-150.648972,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AFB6",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110010:n(110005)",
			[2]="110022:n(110005)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011120,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{2}},\
PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{1}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You hurt your leg? Are you okay? ... How did you manage to make it here?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AFB6",
	},
	[11011120]={
		["Camera"]="48.253906,-111.925781,105.008301,0.000083,9.198721,85.749557,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮습니다. 아, 아직 제 몫으로 마취제 한 대가 남아있습니다. 연금원에서 새로 연구한 약인데 통증 억제에 아주 효과가 좋습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011120,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="19.960938,-104.507812,107.484009,0.000065,7.598688,71.947227,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90AFE0",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011121,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't mind me. I—I've saved one last dose of anaesthetic for myself. The latest Academy potion is quite effective at killing pains, so it's okay—",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90AFE0",
	},
	[11011121]={
		["Camera"]="139.851562,-87.132812,125.874512,0.00008,8.59834,-173.047867,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네 의무관, 휘페르보레아 제국 군단 규칙, 12번째 조항이 무엇이지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011121,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B00A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011122,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Medic Daphne, what is Article 12 of the Hyperborean Legionary Code of Conduct?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B00A",
	},
	[11011122]={
		["Camera"]="-55.128906,-65.300781,131.739624,0.000084,-1.801148,40.549191,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아닙니다! 전 아직……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011122,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Unhappy01"],
		["GUID"]="1B90B034",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011123,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Now is not the time for rules! I can still—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B034",
	},
	[11011123]={
		["Camera"]="38.558594,11.074219,135.661499,0.000085,8.397895,-120.646034,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네 의무관, 지금 상관이 물었다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011123,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="33.539062,2.589844,137.115601,0.000085,8.397895,-120.646065,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90B05E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011124,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Medic Daphne, answer your superior officer.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B05E",
	},
	[11011124]={
		["Camera"]="-81.117188,31.203125,151.484375,0.00012,-8.602172,2.351627,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 군사 작전 중에는 상관의 지시를 따른다……입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011124,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-98.779297,28.40625,157.52063,0.00012,-10.202144,2.351639,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90B088",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011125,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...The chain of command must be respected during all military operations...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B088",
	},
	[11011125]={
		["Camera"]="1.457031,230.828125,111.127563,0.000128,3.397582,-83.443466,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아 제국 제13군단 의무관 다프네 세오도어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011125,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-28.587891,278.816406,108.095337,0.000128,3.397582,-83.443466,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90B0B2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011126,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne Theodore, Medic of the 13th Legion of the Hyperborean Empire.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B0B2",
	},
	[11011126]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 예.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011126,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B0DC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011127,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Yes, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B0DC",
	},
	[11011127]={
		["ContentKR"]="자네는 작전을 중단한다. '스노우 울프' 인원과 합류한 다음, '그리핀'의 부상자와 함께 공장 구역으로 이동해 그곳에서 정비하며 명령을 기다려라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011127,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B106",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011128,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Hold all actions and stand by. After joining up with the Snow Wolves, proceed with the wounded Griffins to the processing area for rest and await further orders.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B106",
	},
	[11011128]={
		["Camera"]="-108.376953,32.101562,111.59314,0.000105,5.59624,0.356756,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011128,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B130",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011129,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B130",
	},
	[11011129]={
		["Camera"]="42.205078,-16.015625,166.346191,0.000109,-2.203918,-128.439957,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="대답은?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011129,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B15A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011130,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Is that clear?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B15A",
	},
	[11011130]={
		["Camera"]="0.955078,-101.402344,161.949951,0.000127,-13.004393,65.965378,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 알겠습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011130,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B184",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011131,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Sir, yes sir...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B184",
	},
	[11011131]={
		["Camera"]="23.228516,144.847656,94.399902,0.000101,10.396067,-111.437241,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 자네는 나를 따라 임무를 계속 수행하도록 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011131,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="28.728516,158.832031,91.641846,0.000101,10.396067,-111.437241,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90B1AE",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)","[2] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011132,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Okay. , follow me and proceed with the mission.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B1AE",
	},
	[11011132]={
		["ContentKR"]="예. 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011132,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90B1D8",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B1D8",
	},
	[11011133]={
		["ContentKR"]="언제…… 다치신 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011133,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90B202",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011134,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="When did you get injured?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B202",
	},
	[11011134]={
		["ContentKR"]="거대한 필토이드에게 습격당했을 때요. 일부러 숨기려고 한 건 아니에요. 그저……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011134,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B22C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011135,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="During the attack by that giant Filthoid. I didn't mean to hide it from you, but...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B22C",
	},
	[11011135]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 푹 쉬십시오. 교관님 말씀대로 정비 구역으로 가는 게 좋겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011135,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90B256",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011136,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...You need a break. Listen to Sir Avar and go to the processing area.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B256",
	},
	[11011136]={
		["ContentKR"]="수도로 복귀하면 연락드리죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011136,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90B280",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011137,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll go see you when we're back in the capital.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B280",
	},
	[11011137]={
		["ContentKR"]="네. 중령님이 저렇게까지 말씀하시니 저도 어쩔 수 없네요. 하지만 걱정되는 건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011137,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B2AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011138,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Okay. After what Commander Avar said, I guess I don't have a choice. But I'm still worried...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B2AA",
	},
	[11011138]={
		["ContentKR"]="아니에요, 중령님이 계시니 괜찮을 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011138,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90B2D4",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Forget it. Now that he's here, there shouldn't be any problems.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110111/1B90B2D4",
	},
	[11011201]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 장치를 개조했다는 건…… 포세이큰 동맹에도 뛰어난 엔지니어가 있다고 봐야 하겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90BD2A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011202,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Since they've reworked the mechanisms, does that mean there are some elite engineers in The Forsakens?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BD2A",
	},
	[11011202]={
		["ContentKR"]="물론이지. 그래서 상부에도 포세이큰 동맹을 단순히 '야만인'으로 취급해서는 안 된다고 진작에 말했는데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90BD54",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Of course. I've repeatedly warned the bigoted higher-ups not to take The Forsakens as mere illiterate barbarians.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BD54",
	},
	[11011203]={
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰 동맹이 야만인이라면…… 그 야만인이 반년 넘게 요새를 차지하고 있도록 그냥 둔 제국은 야만인만도 못하다는 얘기 아닌가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90BD7E",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Happy",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011204,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="They have controlled the fortress for over six months. If they are barbarians, what does that make us?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BD7E",
	},
	[11011204]={
		["ContentKR"]="으음…… 상부에서 적을 너무 얕잡아 본 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011204,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90BDA8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011205,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...The higher-ups were way too complacent.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BDA8",
	},
	[11011205]={
		["ContentKR"]="'지휘의 예술'을 논하자면, 풀비스만 한 사람이 없지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011205,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90BDD2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011206,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Well, no one grasps the \"Art of Command\" better than Fulvis after all.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BDD2",
	},
	[11011206]={
		["ContentKR"]="나중에 그 위대한 예술가가 직접 군단장 사무실에 가서 해명하는 날이 왔을 때, 과연 그 신이 내린 혀로 시빌라 군단장님한테서 사면까지 얻어낼 수 있을지 궁금하긴 하군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011206,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90BDFC",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Happy",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Let the great commander explain himself to the Chief! And let's see if his silver tongue can charm Sibylle into letting him off the hook this time.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110112/1B90BDFC",
	},
	[11011301]={
		["Camera"]="166.125977,-57.675781,170.566757,0.000298,-0.001434,115.615288,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐 여기서 현재 상황을 정리해 보지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CD92",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's sort through the situation here first.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CD92",
	},
	[11011302]={
		["Camera"]="166.125977,-57.675781,170.566757,0.000298,-0.001434,115.615288,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="작전 계획서에 따르면, 이번 작전의 총지휘관인 풀비스 대령이 인원이 비교적 많은 '나르왈' 부대를 이끌고, 론샤 요새로 향하는 다리에서 위장 공격을 통해 포세이큰 동맹의 주의를 끌기로 되어 있었지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="183.930664,-91.992188,161.849106,0.000299,1.198445,116.01577,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90CDBC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Our battle plan involved Colonel Fulvis and his numerically superior Squad, the Narwhals, launching a diversionary attack on the bridge leading to Lonza Fortress to distract The Forsakens.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CDBC",
	},
	[11011303]={
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 우리 '스노우 울프'와 '그리핀', 두 소대가 요새 위에서 내려온 다음 둘로 나뉘어 동력실과 무기고로 잠입해 빠르게 기습해서 요새의 핵심인 중앙 관제실을 직접 점령하기로 했었고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CDE6",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011304,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Meanwhile, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins would parachute right on top of the fortress. Our two squads would infiltrate the fortress via the engine room and the arsenal, then launch a direct strike and seize the central control room.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CDE6",
	},
	[11011304]={
		["Camera"]="163.692383,-37.078125,162.242844,0.000341,4.197397,118.619072,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011304,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CE10",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011305,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="However...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CE10",
	},
	[11011305]={
		["Camera"]="139.96875,143.5625,187.941818,0.00034,-14.802392,-108.567909,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰 동맹에서 저희 작전을 알고 있었습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011305,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90CE3A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011306,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The Forsakens predicted our moves.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CE3A",
	},
	[11011306]={
		["Camera"]="209.121094,-167.242188,133.941452,0.000355,4.197588,125.216652,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래. 어쩌면 우리의 통신이 노출되었거나 군단 내에 포세이큰 동맹의 스파이가 있는 걸 수도 있겠군……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011306,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="217.574219,-179.199219,132.866104,0.000355,4.197588,125.216652,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90CE64",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011307,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes. Either they have intercepted our communications, or there is a spy working for The Forsakens in the Legion.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CE64",
	},
	[11011307]={
		["ContentKR"]="어떻게 정보가 새어나갔는지는 일단 나중에 생각하지. 놈들도 철두철미하게 준비한 것 같으니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011307,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CE8E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011308,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Regardless of how our plans got out, The Forsakens were undoubtedly well-prepared.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CE8E",
	},
	[11011308]={
		["Camera"]="364.328125,-137.121094,131.9561,0.000375,1.600532,150.810944,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="요새 방어 장치 근처에 매복한 것도 모자라 필토이드 무리까지 끌어들이다니…… 대형 필토이드를 상대할 때 쓰는 무기는 챙기지 않았으니 맨몸으로 뛰어들 수밖에 없었지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011308,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="319.65332,-196.4375,131.9561,0.000378,1.000493,137.609741,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90CEB8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011309,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="They used the fortress's defense systems to ambush us, and even lured a bunch of Filthoids here... We planned for an infiltration strike, so none of us were equipped with heavy weapons for large beasts. The only option was to throw our lives at it.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CEB8",
	},
	[11011309]={
		["Camera"]="54.036133,85.851562,171.834763,0.000337,-9.999908,-75.182961,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="론샤 요새는 제국 엔지니어가 설계한 걸로 알고 있는데, 교관님께서 해제하실 수는 없는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011309,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90CEE2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011310,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Given that Lonza Fortress was designed by Imperial engineers, you might know how to disable its defense systems, right?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CEE2",
	},
	[11011310]={
		["Camera"]="162.833984,-75.03125,166.37291,0.000377,0.000205,112.807961,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이 자식, 사관학교에서 암호학 시간에 졸 때부터 이럴 줄 알았지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011310,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CF0C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011311,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You literally slept through your cryptography courses, didn't you?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CF0C",
	},
	[11011311]={
		["Camera"]="56.007812,138.363281,178.738358,0.000355,-12.999844,-73.778244,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그걸 아직도 기억하고 계셨습니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011311,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90CF36",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011312,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I cannot believe you're still sore about that, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CF36",
	},
	[11011312]={
		["Camera"]="204.382812,-76.167969,151.698227,0.000372,3.800713,125.00248,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아니다, 됐다. 이런 상황에선 암호학을 아무리 잘 알아봤자 소용없겠지. 요새의 모든 장치가 개조되어서 처음부터 분석하고 있을 시간도 없을 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011312,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="178.587891,-35.714844,156.094467,0.000373,6.000642,123.603111,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90CF60",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011313,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Never mind. Acing those courses wouldn't be much help in this case anyway. The Forsakens have modified the mechanisms in the fortress. We don't have time to go through each hardpoint and crack every code.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Confident_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CF60",
	},
	[11011313]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 '먼저 장치를 처리한다'는 판단은 좋았다. 이제 바로 <H>동력실</>로 이동한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011313,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CF8A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011314,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But disabling the systems first would be the right call, so we should reach the engine room next.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CF8A",
	},
	[11011314]={
		["ContentKR"]="우선 동력을 끊어 장치를 멈춘 다음 갇혀 있는 다른 병사들을 구조한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011314,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CFB4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011315,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Cutting their power will shut down the systems, giving us the time to rescue our trapped soldiers. That's our main objective in the next move.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CFB4",
	},
	[11011315]={
		["ContentKR"]="저쪽 장치는 적어도 두 명이 힘을 합쳐야 하는데, 다행히 너도 함께니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011315,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90CFDE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011316,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Operating the devices there requires two people. Thank god I took you with me.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90CFDE",
	},
	[11011316]={
		["Camera"]="39.513672,-54.691406,160.989563,0.00036,3.000318,67.597328,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐, 누군가 연락이……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011316,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D008",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011317,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Hold on, we're getting a call...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Call"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D008",
	},
	[11011317]={
		["Camera"]="-4.147461,-84.023438,209.185547,0.000071,-11.599573,57.385395,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="통신보안? 통신보안? 들리십니까? <H>휘페르보레아의 오늘 날씨는 어떤가?</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11011317,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="130.579102,-94.488281,189.368927,0.00009,-6.599581,99.386292,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90D032",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011318,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Voice",
		["Subtitle"]="Hello? Does anyone copy? What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D032",
	},
	[11011318]={
		["ContentKR"]="<H>디즈마니아는 오늘 밤 비가 오겠습니다.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11011318,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D05C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011319,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's raining tonight in Dismania.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D05C",
	},
	[11011319]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 중령님? 맞으십니까? 빅입니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011319,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D086",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011320,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Voice",
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar? Is that you? I'm Vic!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D086",
	},
	[11011320]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래, 나다. 현재 상황은 어떻지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011320,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D0B0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011321,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Avar listening. Give me a report.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D0B0",
	},
	[11011321]={
		["ContentKR"]="중령님과 연락이 끊긴 후, 저와 모니카는 외곽 노선을 따라 동력실 가까이 접근했습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011321,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D0DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011322,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="After we split our forces, Monica and I took the path along the outer perimeter. We're about to reach the engine room.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D0DA",
	},
	[11011322]={
		["Camera"]="130.579102,-94.488281,189.368927,0.00009,-6.599581,99.386292,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="동력실? 너희도 혹시……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011322,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="275.771484,-66.421875,158.367874,0.000104,0.39999,140.982803,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90D104",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011323,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Engine room? Are you trying to—",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=40,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D104",
	},
	[11011323]={
		["ContentKR"]="예, 이제 동력 장치의 전원을 끊으려고 하는데, 시도 전 보고 드리려고 연락드렸습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011323,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D12E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011324,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="I'm calling you specifically to give you an update, sir. We'll make an attempt to shut down the power unit.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D12E",
	},
	[11011324]={
		["ContentKR"]="동력실에 함정이 있을 수 있으니 서두르지 마. 나와 {nickname2}, 우리 둘이 10분 정도면 도착하니 우선 그곳에서 기다리고 있도록. 함께 진입하도록 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011324,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90D158",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011325,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The engine room is probably full of traps. Cease your actions and stay where you are. Captain  and I will get to your place in about fifteen minutes.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D158",
	},
	[11011325]={
		["ContentKR"]="저희가 우선 시도해 보겠습니다, 중령님! 1분이 지체될수록 다른 사람들이 더 위험해질 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011325,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D182",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011326,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="Please, let us try, sir! Every moment we delay puts our comrades in greater danger.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D182",
	},
	[11011326]={
		["ContentKR"]="빅, 자네……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011326,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D1AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011327,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D1AC",
	},
	[11011327]={
		["Camera"]="216.523438,234.703125,186.789169,0.000391,-6.199831,-121.005493,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 마지막으로…… {nickname2}이(가) 중령님과 함께 있다면, 혹시 '그리핀'의 상황을 물어봐 주실 수 있습니까? 제 동생 시몬은 지금……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011327,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90D1D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011328,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="And one more thing... Since Captain  is with you, may I ask how the Griffins are doing? My brother Simon is in that squad...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D1D6",
	},
	[11011328]={
		["Camera"]="165.202148,77.617188,132.166397,0.000375,3.799743,-120.80011,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011328,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="186.375977,113.113281,129.420273,0.000375,1.999688,-120.400436,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90D200",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011329,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D200",
	},
	[11011329]={
		["ContentKR"]="아직 시신은 찾지 못했습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011329,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90D22A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011330,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We have yet to secure his body.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D22A",
	},
	[11011330]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 바, 방금 무슨……?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011330,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90D254",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011331,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="...Wha...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D254",
	},
	[11011331]={
		["Camera"]="173.25,-67.320312,146.132385,0.000371,7.199121,114.79187,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="크흠, 아니, 아닐세. 부상으로 지금 정비 구역에서 쉬고 있을 뿐이네. 의무관이 함께 있으니 걱정하지 말게.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011331,
		["FinalCamera"]="194.328125,-112.945312,139.783936,0.000371,4.799048,114.590935,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90D27E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011332,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Ahem, he means Simon's got some injuries, but the medic is taking care of him in a temporary shelter. There's no need to worry about him.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D27E",
	},
	[11011332]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 알겠습니다. 감사합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011332,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90D2A8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011333,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="...Understood. Thank you, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D2A8",
	},
	[11011333]={
		["ContentKR"]="입만 열면…… 넌 위로 같은 건 절대 하지 마라, 절대로.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011333,
		["GUID"]="1B90D2D2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011334,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Your way with words... Take my advice, never try to comfort anyone. Okay?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D2D2",
	},
	[11011334]={
		["Camera"]="145.246094,101.285156,163.213669,0.000364,-7.600402,-109.198669,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011334,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90D2FC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Loud and clear, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110113/1B90D2FC",
	},
	[11011401]={
		["Camera"]="36.462402,-126.707031,154.997314,0.000981,-2.997927,125.787392,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="오셨습니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="56.989136,-155.175781,156.835449,0.000981,-2.997927,125.787392,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90DDFA",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110020:n(110010)",
			[2]="110010:n(110020)",
			[3]="110022:n(110020)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011402,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110010},TargetPoint{\"pAwamove081\"},MoveSpeed{80},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pNanzhumove081\"},MoveSpeed{80},Visibility{\"Show\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="You've made it!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110020:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DDFA",
	},
	[11011402]={
		["Camera"]="284.85199,-918.78125,667.094727,0.000991,-12.598543,75.181,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="빅은 폭시코르를 해제하려다 저 아래에 갇혔습니다…… 이 조작대는 다시 잠기는 바람에 지금 다른 방법을 찾고 있는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="348.562256,-935.632812,667.094727,0.000991,-12.598543,75.181,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011403,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/console\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Vic is down there. He was trying to shut down the Phoxichor tank, but he got locked behind a door... They've re-encrypted the control panel... I gotta figure out something else...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011403]={
		["Camera"]="-855.458252,1758.097656,-643.220276,0.00082,25.000942,53.20303,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="모니카, 들…… 려……?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011403,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="2.20343,1572.757812,-382.174683,0.000727,22.798645,70.400337,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90DE4E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011404,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="Monica! Can... hear me?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=25,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DE4E",
	},
	[11011404]={
		["ContentKR"]="동력실…… 빨리 나가…… 아악!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011404,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90DE78",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011405,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="The engine room... Run... Argh...!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DE78",
	},
	[11011405]={
		["ContentKR"]="……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011405,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011406,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Weike",
		["Subtitle"]="... ...",
	},
	[11011406]={
		["Camera"]="292.675171,455.347656,300.802979,0.001465,-18.194756,-140.788177,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="빅?! 무슨 일이야? 빅!!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011406,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="250.090332,423.597656,283.583984,0.001486,-18.194666,-144.788071,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90DECC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011407,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Vic?! What happened?! VIC!!!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110020:Explain02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=25,
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110020:p(180)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DECC",
	},
	[11011407]={
		["ContentKR"]="조금만 기다려! 금방 들어갈 테니까…… 조금만……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011407,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90DEF6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011408,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/console\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Hang in there! I'm nearly finished... Almost there...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DEF6",
	},
	[11011408]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011408,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90DF20",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011409,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110020},TargetPoint{\"pAimamove08\"},MoveSpeed{150},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110020:p(-90)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DF20",
	},
	[11011409]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 왜 자꾸 안 되는…… 하필이면 지금!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011409,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90DF4A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011410,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110010},TargetPoint{\"pAwamove082\"},MoveSpeed{80},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pNanzhumove082\"},MoveSpeed{80},Visibility{\"Show\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="...It just won't crack...! Ugh! Of all times...!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DF4A",
	},
	[11011410]={
		["Camera"]="443.727875,-491.714844,434.906128,0.001429,-22.196712,131.997604,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 당황하지 마라. 내가 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011410,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="520.311035,-576.023438,481.671143,0.001432,-22.596737,132.797684,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90DF74",
