		["NextDialogue"]=11011411,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/console\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...Pull yourself together. I've got this.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=25,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DF74",
	},
	[11011411]={
		["ContentKR"]="문은 내가 맡겠다. {nickname2}, 넌 아래로 내려가서 동력 장치의 작동을 종료하고 빅을 구해오도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011411,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011412,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll take care of the door. , get down there, and help me shut down the device to save Vic.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011412]={
		["ContentKR"]="내 지시에 따라 행동해. 우리가 빨리 움직일수록 동료들이 살아남을 확률도 커진다. 알겠나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011412,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90DFC8",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Follow my lead. The quicker we are, the higher our chances of saving our comrade. Understood?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90DFC8",
	},
	[11011413]={
		["ContentKR"]="빅을 찾긴 했는데…… 저희가 한발 늦은 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011413,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011414,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I found Vic... Vic's body.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011414]={
		["ContentKR"]="……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011414,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011415,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011415]={
		["ContentKR"]="임무를 속행한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011415,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011418,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Continue our mission.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011416]={
		["ContentKR"]="독립 전원을 가진 중앙 관제실을 제외하고, 요새 전체에 공급되어야 하는 액체 폭시코르가 모두 그곳에 있다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011416,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011417,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Besides the independently powered central control room, this place stores all the Phoxichor that powers the whole fortress.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011417]={
		["ContentKR"]="거기 있는 동력 장치만 파괴하면 요새 내 대부분 장치는 작동하지 않을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011417,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="If we destroy the power unit here, we'll disable most of the facilities in the fortress.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011418]={
		["ContentKR"]="빅의 희생을 헛되게 만들지 않으려면…… 저 장치들의 작동을 반드시 종료해야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011418,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We must shut down the systems... We can't let Vic die in vain.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011419]={
		["Content"]="哦？已经处理好一个了吗，小心些，我好像听到秽兽靠过来的声音了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11011419,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90E0EE",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E0EE",
	},
	[11011420]={
		["Content"]="好，{nickname2}，动力链接已经断开了，我们得趁现在去把整个动力装置都毁了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11011420,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90E118",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011421,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E118",
	},
	[11011421]={
		["Content"]="核心的动力炉就在下面，小心些……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011421,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90E142",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011422,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E142",
	},
	[11011422]={
		["Content"]="有些脏东西围过来了……事办妥了再上来集合！",
		["DialogueId"]=11011422,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90E16C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011423,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E16C",
	},
	[11011423]={
		["Content"]="好……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011423,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90E196",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E196",
	},
	[11011424]={
		["ContentKR"]="내가 방어막을 하나씩 해제할 테니, 신호가 들어오면 폭시코르를 부수면 된다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011424,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90E1C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011425,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll disable the protective barriers one by one. When the signal light's on, smash the Phoxichor tank as fast as you can!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E1C0",
	},
	[11011425]={
		["ContentKR"]="어떤 폭시코르에는 자폭 장치가 있을 수 있어. 카운트다운 소리가 들리면 즉시 행동을 중지하고 빠져나와.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011425,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Some Phoxichor tanks may be equipped with self-destruct devices; if you hear a timer, evacuate immediately.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011426]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금이다. 파괴해!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011426,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Now! Smash it!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011427]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아. 이제 두 개만 처리하면 된다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011427,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Excellent work. We got two more tanks to go.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011428]={
		["ContentKR"]="2호 폭시코르 방어막이 해제됐다. 지금이다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011428,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The 2nd one has been disabled. Now!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011429]={
		["ContentKR"]="휴…… 이제 하나 남았군. 괜찮나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011429,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011430,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Whew... One more left. You okay down there?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011430]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011430,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Shock",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="No problems here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011431]={
		["Content"]="抓紧时间打碎那玩意儿，快从那儿离开！",
		["DialogueId"]=11011431,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90E2E6",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/1B90E2E6",
	},
	[11011432]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아, 3호, 마지막이다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011432,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Alright, this is the last one!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011433]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 자폭 카운트다운인가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011433,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011434,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...A self-destruct timer?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011434]={
		["ContentKR"]="동력실이 폭발한다. 빨리 나와!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011434,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The engine room is about to explode. Evacuate now!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110114/",
	},
	[11011501]={
		["Camera"]="110.491699,-158.824219,121.822083,0.000098,1.200488,146.408463,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="수고했다, 꼬맹아. 역시 같은 기수 중 탑이라 할 만하군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="99.416016,-151.462891,122.100525,0.000098,1.200488,146.408463,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90EE62",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011502,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Fantastic job, kid — you are indeed the best among your peers.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EE62",
	},
	[11011502]={
		["Camera"]="-96.81543,26.603516,123.857544,0.000119,-3.398893,-55.78355,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-100.175781,30.820312,114.571045,0.000118,-1.398925,-56.583813,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90EE8C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011503,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Talk02_End",
			[2]="110022:Agree",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EE8C",
	},
	[11011503]={
		["Camera"]="215.526367,-208.007812,108.881775,0.000105,1.200665,151.207382,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="됐다, 요새 내의 방어 장치는 거의 작동을 멈췄으니 다른 대원들도 조금은 수월해질 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EEB6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011504,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Okay, most of the defensive weapons within the fortress have been disabled. The rest of our squads should have an easier time.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EEB6",
	},
	[11011504]={
		["Camera"]="52.847168,-80.384766,126.455688,0.000148,3.401345,151.391953,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아직 괜찮나? 바로 사람들을 구조하러…… 잠깐, 새로운 교신이군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EEE0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011505,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="So can you continue? Let's go if you can, we've got other comrades to rescue— Hold on, new communication coming in.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Call"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EEE0",
	},
	[11011505]={
		["DialogueId"]=11011505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EF0A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011506,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EF0A",
	},
	[11011506]={
		["Camera"]="32.20459,-111.064453,133.04126,0.000151,2.201254,141.389984,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아바르, 지금 어디인가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011506,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="80.955566,-13.558594,135.693237,0.000151,1.401165,172.787323,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90EF34",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011507,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Avar, where are you?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EF34",
	},
	[11011507]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011507,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EF5E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011508,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EF5E",
	},
	[11011508]={
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아의 오늘 날씨는 어떤가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011508,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EF88",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011509,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The weather in Hyperborea today.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EF88",
	},
	[11011509]={
		["ContentKR"]="뭐? 지휘관 목소리도 못 알아듣는 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011509,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EFB2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011510,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="What's your problem? Can't even recognise the chief commander's voice?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EFB2",
	},
	[11011510]={
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아의 오늘 날씨는 어떤가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011510,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90EFDC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011511,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Weather.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90EFDC",
	},
	[11011511]={
		["ContentKR"]="디즈마니아는 오늘 밤 비가 오겠습니다. 쯧, 미술관의 대리석 조각상보다 더 고집불통이군. 그래서, 자네 부대는 지금 어떤 상황인가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011511,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F006",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011512,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="It's raining tonight. Tsk, I've seen marble sculptures in the gallery with more flexibility than your mind. Now, report on your squad.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F006",
	},
	[11011512]={
		["ContentKR"]="대령님의 탁월한 결정 덕분에 '스노우 울프'와 '그리핀' 두 선발대가 전멸은 면했습니다. 왜 그러십니까, 또 통찰력을 발휘하시려는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011512,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F030",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011513,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Thanks to your \"brilliant\" decision-making, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins haven't been completely annihilated yet. What, got any new insight?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F030",
	},
	[11011513]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금 어디서 빈정대는 건가? 전세가 이 지경이 됐으면 부끄러워할 줄도 알아야지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011513,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F05A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011514,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Enough with your snide attitude. You should be ashamed of how this battle has turned out.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F05A",
	},
	[11011514]={
		["ContentKR"]="대령님이 비밀 유지와 작전에 조금만 더 신경을 쓰셨더라면 병사들은 지금 차가운 철판에 누워 있는 게 아니라 중앙 관제실에서 축하 파티를 열고 있었을 텐데 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011514,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F084",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011515,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I would like to achieve glory, sir. If you exercised proper secrecy and came up with a more credible plan, our soldiers would be popping champagne bottles in the central control room at this very moment instead of waiting for body bags.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F084",
	},
	[11011515]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 헤데란, 다시 경고한다. 제대로 보고해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011515,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F0AE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011516,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Avar Hrodland, I'm warning you — Watch your tone when speaking to your superior!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F0AE",
	},
	[11011516]={
		["Camera"]="416.243896,-32.257812,336.303223,0.000193,-25.998737,-173.613037,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="안토니 풀비스 대령님, 저도 경고하는데 다시는 제 병사들 가지고 장난치지 마십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011516,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="326.074951,-41.75,293.30304,0.000194,-23.598602,-177.612625,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F0D8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011517,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Antonius Fulvis, I'm also warning you — Stop wasting the lives of my comrades.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F0D8",
	},
	[11011517]={
		["ContentKR"]="한가하게 잡담할 시간 없다. 공격 임무는 어떻게 됐지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011517,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F102",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011518,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="I have no time for this right now. I am here to demand a progress update on the mission.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F102",
	},
	[11011518]={
		["ContentKR"]="두 선발대 모두 매복 공격을 받아 피해가 막심합니다. 우선 실종된 병사들을 찾은 다음, 공장 구역에서 정비하면서 지원을 기다릴 예정입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011518,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F12C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011519,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The two squads have been ambushed and suffered heavy losses. I'm preparing to search and rescue the missing soldiers first, then regroup in the processing area, waiting for your support.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F12C",
	},
	[11011519]={
		["ContentKR"]="자네들의 임무는 신속하게 돌격하는 거다. 무단으로 작전을 중단해선 안 돼.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011519,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F156",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011520,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Your mission is a rapid infiltration assault. No field officer of mine is permitted to make their own bloody choices.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F156",
	},
	[11011520]={
		["ContentKR"]="기존 작전 경로를 이탈하면 요새 내 적들에게 노출되기만 할 뿐이다. 원래 경로를 따라서 중앙 관제실로 진격해. 명령이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011520,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F180",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011521,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Straying off the planned course of action will only alert the entire fortress. I order you to stick to the plan and launch a direct assault on the central control room.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F180",
	},
	[11011521]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금 적에게 노출되면 안된다고 하셨습니까? 적들은 이미 다 알고 진작에 매복하고 있었단 말입니다! 80%입니다! 80%가 넘는 병력 손실을 입고도 부족하단 말씀이십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011521,
		["GUID"]="1B90F1AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011522,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Are you even listening to yourself? Alert the fortress? They're already in ambush positions, waiting to wipe us all out! We've sustained eighty percent casualties — eight zero! Isn't that enough for you!?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F1AA",
	},
	[11011522]={
		["ContentKR"]="손실, 손실, 손실! 그 빌어먹을 손실 얘기 좀 그만해. 지금 뒤처진 걸 몰라서 아직도 그런 소리가 나오는 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011522,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F1D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011523,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Casualties? Forget about your bloody casualties. All I know is that you're significantly behind schedule!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F1D4",
	},
	[11011523]={
		["ContentKR"]="군단의 명예를 더럽히지 마라. 휘페르보레아 제국 군인은 그깟 손실 때문에 멈추는 겁쟁이가 아니라고!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011523,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F1FE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011524,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="You've brought shame to the legion's banner — the soldiers of Hyperborea are not cowards who would stop because of trivial losses like this!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F1FE",
	},
	[11011524]={
		["ContentKR"]="위대하신 디스 1세 폐하부터 '신의 엘레지'를 공격한 퀸투스 군단장에 이르기까지, 우리 휘페르보레아의 위대한 지휘관 중 누가 그런 손실을 두려워했던가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011524,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F228",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011525,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="From Emperor Dis I to Legion Chief Quintus, the mastermind of the Divine Elegy offensive, no Hyperborean commander ever baulked at taking losses.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F228",
	},
	[11011525]={
		["ContentKR"]="자네 옆에 있는 건 13군단의 정예병들이야. 이 작은 요새 하나 점령하는 게 뭐가 그리 어렵다는 건가.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011525,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F252",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011526,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="I gave you the elites of the 13th Legion. You should have more than enough resources to take this puny fort.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F252",
	},
	[11011526]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011526,
		["GUID"]="1B90F27C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F27C",
	},
	[11011527]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(아무 말도 하지 않는다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11011527,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F2A6",
		["Subtitle"]="(Stay silent)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F2A6",
	},
	[11011528]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="계속 임무를 수행하겠습니다. 하지만 지원이 필요합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011528,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F2D0",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011535,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We can continue the mission, but only with additional support.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F2D0",
	},
	[11011529]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="충분한 지원이 있어야만 승리할 수 있습니다. 저희의 승리가 결국 지휘관님의 승리 아니겠습니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011529,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F2FA",
		["Subtitle"]="Receiving enough support gives us a better chance of victory. A victory in your name, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F2FA",
	},
	[11011530]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스 지휘관님, 저희가 여기서 목숨을 잃는다면 지휘관님의 전술 지식으로는 이 요새를 손에 넣을 수 없을 겁니다. 그럼 패배의 책임은 지휘관님이 지셔야 할 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011530,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-82.985352,51.541016,131.751343,0.000089,-5.599737,-62.78595,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F324",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011531,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Fulvis, if we all fall here, your tactical acumen alone won't stand a chance to take this fortress. And you'll surely have to answer for such a failure.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F324",
	},
	[11011531]={
		["ContentKR"]="저희는 지휘관님의 적이 아니라 지휘관님과 한 배를 탄 부하입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011531,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90F34E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011532,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We are your soldiers who fight for the glory of the Empire, not your enemies.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F34E",
	},
	[11011532]={
		["Camera"]="-110.046387,314.720703,266.5,0.000116,-22.99999,-83.390305,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이게 누구야? 아, 아바르의 그 우등생, '그리핀' 소대장 {nickname2} 아닌가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011532,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-120.473633,313.515625,266.5,0.000118,-22.999937,-83.390305,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F378",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011535,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F378",
	},
	[11011533]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그렇게 용감하시다면 직접 전선에 오시지 그러십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011533,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["Subtitle"]="Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?",
	},
	[11011534]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이게 누구야? 아, 아바르의 그 우등생, '그리핀' 소대장 {nickname2}인가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011534,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-82.985352,51.541016,131.751343,0.000089,-5.599737,-62.78595,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F3CC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011535,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F3CC",
	},
	[11011535]={
		["Camera"]="179.030273,36.109375,768.0271,0.000185,5.399223,150.822723,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너무 초조해하지 마라. 작전 회의는 이미 끝났고, '나르왈' 부대가 지원을 가는 중이다. 나도 곧 병사들과 함께 전선에 합류할 예정이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011535,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="269.858887,-14.625,758.194946,0.000185,5.399223,150.822723,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F3F6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011536,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="What's the hurry? We have concluded our tactical meeting. Reinforcements from the Narwhals are on their way, and I'll be gracing the front with them.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F3F6",
	},
	[11011536]={
		["ContentKR"]="원래 계획대로 계속 전진해. 알겠나? 휘페르보레아 제국의 군인이라면 숨이 붙어있는 한 마지막 순간까지 싸워야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011536,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F420",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011537,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Stick to the plan, you hear me? As Hyperborean soldiers, you fight until your last breath or face the consequences!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F420",
	},
	[11011537]={
		["Camera"]="-149.175781,-123.015625,127.497986,0.000078,-3.800385,-0.186127,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 교관님……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011537,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-144.398438,-82.482422,127.497986,0.000078,-4.40039,-16.587202,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F44A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011538,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir Avar...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Awa_Idle",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F44A",
	},
	[11011538]={
		["Camera"]="-80.898438,-130.59375,113.594666,0.000112,11.199208,106.414024,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011538,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-71.393555,-162.867188,106.933411,0.000117,9.799204,106.414307,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F474",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011539,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F474",
	},
	[11011539]={
		["Camera"]="-157.872559,-71.9375,126.752991,0.000103,-3.800385,-17.384687,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["DialogueId"]=11011539,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-114.064941,-75.335938,127.855469,0.0001,-3.000331,-22.783552,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F49E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011540,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/call_02\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F49E",
	},
	[11011540]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님, 대장님!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011540,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F4C8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011541,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_HelpVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Captain! Captain!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Call",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F4C8",
	},
	[11011541]={
		["ContentKR"]="'그리핀' 소대의 시몬입니다. 대장님, 들리십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011541,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F4F2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011542,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_HelpVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="This is Simon from the Griffins. Do you copy, Captain?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F4F2",
	},
	[11011542]={
		["ContentKR"]="듣고 있다. 시몬, 지금 어디 있지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011542,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90F51C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011543,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Copy that. Simon, where are you?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F51C",
	},
	[11011543]={
		["Camera"]="-1101.448242,-314.363281,973.365723,0.000098,-0.200862,-106.786194,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="선로에 엄청난 규모의 필토이드가 몰려있고, 저희 병사들이 안에 갇혀 있습니다. 지원이 필요한 상황입니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011543,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["FinalCamera"]="-1164.543945,-295.335938,973.365723,0.000098,-0.200862,-106.786194,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F546",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011544,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_HelpVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="We're trapped by a Filthoid horde along the rail track. If you have any forces to spare, we need an extraction!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F546",
	},
	[11011544]={
		["ContentKR"]="제발…… 부탁드립니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011544,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["GUID"]="1B90F570",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011545,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_HelpVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Please... Captain!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F570",
	},
	[11011545]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011545,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90F59A",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Weita_Idle",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F59A",
	},
	[11011546]={
		["Camera"]="39.583984,-68.548828,124.84668,0.000093,5.399045,152.415588,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나도 방금 풀비스와의 통신이 끝나자마자 다른 소대 병사들의 위치 신호를 받았다. {nickname2}, 넌 어떻게 할 생각이지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011546,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="62.339355,-80.433594,122.420105,0.000093,4.399045,152.415588,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F5C4",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I also picked up a signal from another squad reporting their position, right after Fulvis ended his call. , what are you gonna do?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F5C4",
	},
	[11011547]={
		["ContentKR"]="우선 다른 병사들을 구하러 가는 게 좋을 것 같습니다. 지금 상황에 저희 둘로는 승산이 없습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011547,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F5EE",
		["Subtitle"]="I intend to get to the soldiers first. We don't stand a chance on our own.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F5EE",
	},
	[11011548]={
		["Camera"]="87.789062,-151.041016,118.975464,0.000103,1.598503,145.610703,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너…… 역시 내가 사람을 제대로 봤군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011548,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F618",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011550,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You kiddo... I knew I was right about you.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F618",
	},
	[11011549]={
		["ContentKR"]="승산이 크지 않더라도 총지휘관의 명령을 수행해야 한다고 봅니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011549,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F642",
		["Subtitle"]="Even though our chances are slim, we must adhere to the Chief Commander's orders.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F642",
	},
	[11011550]={
		["Camera"]="37.340332,-118.78125,156.396729,0.000075,-4.800509,140.406082,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스는 교만하고 공을 세우는 데만 혈안이 된 자야. 풀비스 가문이 원로원에서 작위를 세습한 덕에 지휘관 자리에 앉아서 명령을 내리는 것뿐이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011550,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="8.283203,-94.757812,153.230225,0.000076,-3.400416,140.406082,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F66C",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011551,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Fulvis is nothing but an arrogant and greedy bastard. His senatorial lineage is the only reason he's up there, barking orders at you.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=60,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F66C",
	},
	[11011551]={
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스 눈에 병사들은 그저 보고서의 숫자에 불과하고, 훈장의 한 조각일 뿐이야. 살아 있는 사람으로 보지 않는다고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011551,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F696",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011552,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="He sees soldiers as mere numbers in his reports, treating them as fodder for medals to pin on his uniform, not as living, breathing humans.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F696",
	},
	[11011552]={
		["ContentKR"]="게다가 전장은 순식간에 변하는 법인데 달랑 지도 한 장만 보는 걸로, 뭘 알 수 있겠는가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011552,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F6C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011553,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Besides, battlefields are ever-changing. What true insight can he gain from just staring at a map?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F6C0",
	},
	[11011553]={
		["ContentKR"]="전우들을 구하러 가라, {nickname2}. 풀비스가 나중에 책임을 물으면 내 명령이었다고 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011553,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F6EA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011554,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Go rescue your comrades, . In case Fulvis seeks someone to blame later, consider this a direct order from me.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F6EA",
	},
	[11011554]={
		["Camera"]="-68.195312,9.0625,119.776978,0.000111,-0.400693,-59.195786,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011554,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90F714",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011555,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F714",
	},
	[11011555]={
		["Camera"]="8.495117,-50.013672,123.488586,0.000077,9.199294,154.404694,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="4호 포대 근처에 다른 무리가 갇혀 있다고 하니까, 난 모니카와 그쪽 병사들을 구조하러 가겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011555,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="30.564941,-60.601562,116.625183,0.000076,9.199294,155.205215,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90F73E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011556,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Monica and I will be on our way to rescue another team of soldiers trapped near Turret 4.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=60,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F73E",
	},
	[11011556]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 방금 우리가 동력을 차단해서 포대의 자동 방어 시스템은 멈췄을 테니…… 포대부터 점령하는 것도 괜찮겠군……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011556,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90F768",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011557,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We disabled most defensive weapons within the fortress. The turret's auto-defences should be offline now... We might be able to seize the Turret first.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/1B90F768",
	},
	[11011557]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그렇게 하면 폭시코르 캐논을 조작해서 중앙 구역의 방어 설비를 폭파할 수 있을 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011557,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011558,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...And once we do that, we can blow apart the defence system around the central area with the Phoxichor Cannon.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/",
	},
	[11011558]={
		["ContentKR"]="이렇게 하지. 그쪽 상황에 별다른 문제가 없으면 이따 4호 포대로 와라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011558,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's settled then. Meet me at Turret 4 once you've finished everything on your side.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110115/",
	},
	[11011601]={
		["Camera"]="-77.379883,97.109375,67.881653,0.000121,-8.79953,-17.485575,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-126.40625,112.523438,75.838806,0.000121,-8.79953,-17.485575,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90FECA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011602,
		["Scripts"]="\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110014:Onground01",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FECA",
	},
	[11011602]={
		["Camera"]="133.62793,95.1875,108.403076,0.000046,7.40053,167.994019,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 시몬!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90FEF4",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:n(110014)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Simon!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FEF4",
	},
	[11011603]={
		["Camera"]="-10.583008,431.132812,176.382568,0.000074,-24.399231,-79.079048,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 대장님, 오셨습니까……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-29.290039,528.0625,221.21582,0.000076,-23.599176,-78.87867,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B90FF1E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011604,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110014,
		["Subtitle"]="...Captain! Thank god... you're here...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=60,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FF1E",
	},
	[11011604]={
		["ContentKR"]="빨리…… 선로에…… 다들…… 필토이드가 너무 많아…… 시간이……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90FF48",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011605,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110014,
		["Subtitle"]="Quick... the rail tracks... Everyone is trapped by the Filthoids there... Go save them...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FF48",
	},
	[11011605]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님도…… 조심하십시오……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011605,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90FF72",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011606,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110014,
		["Subtitle"]="And... be careful out there, Captain...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FF72",
	},
	[11011606]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 엄마, 필토이드가 제 다리를 물어뜯고 있어요…… 너무 아파요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011606,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90FF9C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011607,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110014,
		["Subtitle"]="...Ma... the Filthoids are feasting on my leg... It hurts so much...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FF9C",
	},
	[11011607]={
		["ContentKR"]="……너무 아파요, 엄마……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011607,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B90FFC6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011608,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110014,
		["Subtitle"]="...Ma... it hurts...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FFC6",
	},
	[11011608]={
		["Camera"]="133.62793,95.1875,108.403076,0.000046,7.40053,167.994019,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="정신 차려!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011608,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B90FFF0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011609,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Hang in there, Simon!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110014:Onground03",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B90FFF0",
	},
	[11011609]={
		["Camera"]="-3.4375,256.753906,136.859375,0.000129,-25.396786,-67.088867,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011609,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-36.387695,334.722656,177.047852,0.000129,-25.396786,-67.088867,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91001A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011610,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B91001A",
	},
	[11011610]={
		["ContentKR"]="시몬? 내 말 들려?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011610,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B910044",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011611,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Simon! Are you still with me?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B910044",
	},
	[11011611]={
		["Camera"]="119.782227,74.542969,108.005493,0.000132,8.602869,158.107101,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011611,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="135.738281,68.152344,105.40387,0.000132,8.602869,158.107101,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B910045",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B910045",
	},
	[11011612]={
		["ContentKR"]="시몬의 눈을 감겨 준다",
		["DialogueId"]=11011612,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91006E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Close his eyes for him",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B91006E",
	},
	[11011613]={
		["ContentKR"]="떠난다",
		["DialogueId"]=11011613,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B910098",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Leave",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B910098",
	},
	[11011614]={
		["Camera"]="-71.202637,15.898438,121.658752,0.000084,-1.799809,-61.785873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그렇게 용감하시다면 직접 전선에 오시지 그러십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011614,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011534,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?",
	},
	[11011619]={
		["Content"]="这段音乐应该就是秽兽发狂的罪魁祸首了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11011619,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9101BE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011620,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B9101BE",
	},
	[11011620]={
		["Content"]="二号广播室应该就在附近……在救人前，也许可以先去关停广播。",
		["DialogueId"]=11011620,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9101E8",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110116/1B9101E8",
	},
	[11011701]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B910F32",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011702,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B910F32",
	},
	[11011702]={
		["ContentKR"]="*통신기 신호음*",
		["DialogueId"]=11011702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B910F5C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011703,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/call_02\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["Subtitle"]="*Radio calling*",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B910F5C",
	},
	[11011703]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011703,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B910F86",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B910F86",
	},
	[11011704]={
		["ContentKR"]="*통신기 신호음*",
		["DialogueId"]=11011704,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B910FB0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011705,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/call_02\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["Subtitle"]="*Radio calling*",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B910FB0",
	},
	[11011705]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 통신보안?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011705,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B910FDA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011706,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Hello?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B910FDA",
	},
	[11011706]={
		["ContentKR"]="통신보안? 저는 '그리핀' 소대 의무관 다프네 세오도어입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011706,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B911004",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011707,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Do you copy? I'm Daphne Theodore, the Medic of Squad Griffins.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B911004",
	},
	[11011707]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… {nickname2} 대장? 맞죠? 왜 아무 말도 안하세요? 설마 다치신 건가요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011707,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91102E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011708,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...? Is that you? Why aren't you saying anything? Are you hurt?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B91102E",
	},
	[11011708]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금 어디에 계세요? 제가 지금 바로 갈테니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011708,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B911058",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011709,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Where are you!? I'll seek permission and come for you right away...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B911058",
	},
	[11011709]={
		["ContentKR"]="그냥…… 목소리라도 들으려고 연락했습니다. 저는 괜찮아요. 그쪽 상황은 어떻습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011709,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B911082",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011710,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I... I just need to hear the voices of my squad. I'm okay. How is everyone on your side?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B911082",
	},
	[11011710]={
		["ContentKR"]="'스노우 울프'의 남은 병사들이 합류해서 지금은 안전해요. 그쪽은요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011710,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9110AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011711,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The Snow Wolves have joined us. We're safe here for now. What about you?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B9110AC",
	},
	[11011711]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 여기도…… 괜찮습니다. 임무를 마저 해야 해서, 그럼 이만.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011711,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9110D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011712,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...I... I'm okay. I need to go, I should continue the mission.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B9110D6",
	},
	[11011712]={
		["ContentKR"]="몸조심하세요…… 디즈마니아에서 꼭 다시 만나요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011712,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B911100",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Please be careful... I'll see you in Dismania.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110117/1B911100",
	},
	[11011801]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님! 이쪽입니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B911F9A",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Captain! Captain, over here!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B911F9A",
	},
	[11011802]={
		["Camera"]="-505.368164,51.275391,145.7323,0.000104,-5.599607,-66.201973,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 대장님, 사랑하는 대장님!! 드디어 오셨군요!! 저희 무전기 주파수에 문제가 생겨서 계속 연락을 못했는데, 시몬이 구조 요청을 하러 나갔는데요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-593.21875,88.818359,152.113525,0.000106,-4.999541,-52.602745,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B911FC4",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110043:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011803,
		["Scripts"]="MoveTo{\
_delay{0},ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pNanzhumove11\"},MoveSpeed{50},Visibility{\"Show\"}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110043,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, Captain! My dear Captain!! You finally came for us!! Something's gone wrong with our comm channels and we couldn't get in touch with nobody. Simon went out looking for help.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110043:Talk01_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110043:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B911FC4",
	},
	[11011803]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님은 대단한 분이시니까 금방 우릴 구하러 오실 거라면서 얘기 중이었습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B911FEE",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110043)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011804,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110043},AnimationId{\"Talk01_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110043,
		["Subtitle"]="I was just trying to get everyone to keep it together — told them how good you are and how you're gonna come flying in and get everyone out of this mess.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B911FEE",
	},
	[11011804]={
		["Camera"]="-434.556641,79.037109,125.259644,0.000362,-1.19531,-62.781265,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그런데 혹시 혼자 오셨습니까? 시몬은 못 보셨습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011804,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-461.147461,130.738281,126.472168,0.000363,-1.19531,-62.581318,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912018",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110016:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011805,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="Captain, did you come alone? Did you see Simon?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912018",
	},
	[11011805]={
		["Camera"]="-258.754883,-197.992188,84.505371,0.000368,8.204471,136.018234,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="시몬은…… 죽었어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-248.538086,-207.955078,82.489502,0.000372,8.404466,135.819092,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912042",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:n(110016)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="He's dead.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912042",
	},
	[11011806]={
		["Camera"]="-541.703125,-15.865234,121.283081,0.000383,-0.795164,-32.178303,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="……!! 우리 중에 제일 뛰어난 친구인데, 어떻게……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-579.172852,7.703125,121.897827,0.000383,-0.795164,-32.178303,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91206C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011807,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="...!! He... He's the smartest among us. How come...?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110016:Shock_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91206C",
	},
	[11011807]={
		["Camera"]="-725.708984,-44.509766,153.346069,0.000365,-6.395324,-21.97484,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="시몬 생각은 잠시 묻어 둬. 일단 전투에서 살아남아야지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011807,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912096",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011808,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Now is not the time to dwell on Simon. We need to focus on this battle and surviving.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912096",
	},
	[11011808]={
		["Camera"]="-747.857422,-100.232422,153.894409,0.000368,-5.795408,-11.976184,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011808,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-841.025391,-80.472656,163.561279,0.000368,-6.795471,-11.976337,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9120C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011809,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9120C0",
	},
	[11011809]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 맞는 말씀입니다…… 무능하게 여기서 울고나 있으라고 시몬이 목숨 걸고 구조 요청하러 간 건 아니니 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011809,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9120EA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011810,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="...You're right... He didn't risk his life going out there to look for help so that we could end up here like crybabies.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110016:Shock_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9120EA",
	},
	[11011810]={
		["ContentKR"]="준비됐으면 가지. 오는 길에 아바르 중령님을 만났는데, 나중에 4호 포대에서 모이기로 했다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011810,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912114",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011811,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Get going once you're ready. I ran into Commander Avar on my way here. We plan to join them at Turret 4.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912114",
	},
	[11011811]={
		["ContentKR"]="4호 포대 말씀이십니까? 거긴 여기서 꽤 먼데, 가는 길에 필토이드가 얼마나 있을지도 모르는데 저희 인원으로만 가기엔 위험하지 않겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011811,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91213E",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110043)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011812,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110043,
		["Subtitle"]="Turret 4? Are you sure about that, Captain? That's pretty far, and god knows how many Filthoids there are along the way. There aren't many of us... Can we make it?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91213E",
	},
	[11011812]={
		["Camera"]="-341.263672,17.800781,158.867676,0.000316,-5.595393,-69.767799,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="갈 수 있는 길이 하나 더 있습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011812,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912168",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011813,
		["Scripts"]="MoveTo{_delay{0},ActorId{110017},TargetPoint{\"pFulankemove11\"},MoveSpeed{50},Visibility{\"Show\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_OldKarong",
		["Subtitle"]="There's actually another way...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912168",
	},
	[11011813]={
		["Camera"]="-661.43457,-440.044922,189.099976,0.000373,-8.995358,6.625711,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="입 다물어, 카론 놈.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011813,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-618.448242,-435.052734,182.24939,0.000373,-8.995358,6.625711,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912192",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110016:n(110017)",
			[2]="110022:n(110017)",
			[3]="110043:n(110016)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011814,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="Shut up, Charon.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Angry01_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912192",
	},
	[11011814]={
		["Camera"]="-437.293945,188.294922,132.274658,0.000366,-4.595057,-70.774467,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저들은?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011814,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-450.489258,226.125,135.494873,0.000366,-4.595057,-70.774467,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9121BC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110016:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011815,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Who are they?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9121BC",
	},
	[11011815]={
		["Camera"]="58.533203,-721.191406,190.62854,0.000374,-7.995207,128.821793,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰 동맹 사람들인데, 길에서 포로로 붙잡았습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011815,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="29.120117,-684.632812,184.039062,0.000374,-7.995207,128.821793,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9121E6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011816,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="The Forsakens. We captured them on the way.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9121E6",
	},
	[11011816]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 내 형제들이 너희가 기른 몬스터에 죽었다. 말 나온 김에 널 죽여 형제들을 위로해야겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011816,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912210",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110016:n(110017)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011817,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="...Your pet Filthoids killed a close buddy of mine. Reminded me just now — I ought to carve a few holes in you to honour his memory.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912210",
	},
	[11011817]={
		["ContentKR"]="그만둬.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011817,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91223A",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110016:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011818,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Stop it.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Angry01_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk03_End",
		},
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110016:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91223A",
	},
	[11011818]={
		["ContentKR"]="포로는 산 채로 제국 교도소로 넘겨서 심문받게 해야지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011818,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912264",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011819,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We should keep the captives alive. We need to take them back for interrogation in the Imperial Prison.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912264",
	},
	[11011819]={
		["Camera"]="-99.042969,334.480469,417.671692,0.000374,-27.193481,-110.762871,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 나리……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011819,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-117.944336,284.636719,390.27948,0.000374,-27.193481,-110.762871,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91228E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011820,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_KarongGirl",
		["Subtitle"]="...Sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110034:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91228E",
	},
	[11011820]={
		["ContentKR"]="카론 하나의 목숨으로 분노를 잠재울 수 있다면 저에게 총을 쏘세요. 하지만 그 전에…… 제 얘기를 들어주시면 안될까요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011820,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9122B8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011821,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_KarongGirl",
		["Subtitle"]="If sacrificing one Charon can quell your anger, then take me. But first, please, let me explain...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9122B8",
	},
	[11011821]={
		["Camera"]="-90.183594,42.298828,244.939453,0.000363,-17.39352,-111.95507,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="카지아, 허튼짓 말고 이리 와!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011821,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-78.478516,71.333984,254.746216,0.000362,-17.39352,-111.954918,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9122E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011822,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_OldKarong",
		["Subtitle"]="Come back, Katya! Don't be silly!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110017:Disagree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9122E2",
	},
	[11011822]={
		["Camera"]="-243.551758,-114.046875,94.999512,0.000362,4.20683,-109.153801,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나리, 저희는 카론이지만 포세이큰 동맹 소속은 아니에요. 그저 근처 작은 마을에 사는 평범한 사람이죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011822,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-259.630859,-160.347656,98.604614,0.000362,4.20683,-109.153801,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91230C",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011823,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, we may be Charons but we are not part of The Forsakens. We're just ordinary folk living in a town nearby.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91230C",
	},
	[11011823]={
		["ContentKR"]="저희는 포세이큰 동맹이 요새를 개조하는 데 일손이 필요해서 끌려왔을 뿐이에요. 심지어 인간은 쏙 빼고 카론만 골라서 끌려왔죠……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011823,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912336",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011824,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="The Forsakens grabbed us from our homes and forced us to help rebuild this fortress. They left the humans in peace and only took the Charons...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912336",
	},
	[11011824]={
		["Camera"]="-347.466797,-7.962891,83.622925,0.000372,6.006693,-69.753349,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="무슨 말 같지도 않은 소리야. 포세이큰 놈들이 같은 동족인 카론을 납치했다고?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011824,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-357.94043,20.417969,80.439209,0.000372,6.006693,-69.753349,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912360",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110016:n(110034)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11011825,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="You can't be serious — The Forsakens are enslaving their own people?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110016:Shock_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912360",
	},
	[11011825]={
		["Camera"]="-366.760742,96.222656,104.53894,0.000381,0.606603,-84.949913,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="맞아요. 인간보다 힘이 세고 추위나 더위를 덜 탄다는 이유만으로요. 사람들 눈에는 저희가 포세이큰 동맹과 같은 부류로 보이겠지만, 그 사람들은 단 한 번도 저희를 '동족'으로 대한 적이 없어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011825,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-365.126953,-6.355469,113.579712,0.00038,-1.193446,-79.747726,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91238A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011826,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Exactly. They exploit us because Charons are stronger and withstand extreme heat and cold better than humans. You may think we're the same as The Forsakens, but they've never accepted us as their own.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=60,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91238A",
	},
	[11011826]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011826,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9123B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011827,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Think_Start",
			[2]="110016:Shock_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9123B4",
	},
	[11011827]={
		["ContentKR"]="프랭크 할아버지는 제 은인이세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011827,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9123DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011828,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Mr Frank saved my life.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9123DE",
	},
	[11011828]={
		["ContentKR"]="며칠 전, 배가 아파서 잠시 쉬고 있었을 뿐인데 동맹 놈들이 채찍질하더군요. 죽어가던 저에게 할아버지가 물과 음식, 그리고 이 낡은 옷을 주셨고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011828,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912408",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011829,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912408",
	},
	[11011829]={
		["ContentKR"]="할아버지가 아니었으면 저는 분명 죽었을 거예요. 할아버지 대신 제 목숨을 내놓을 테니 저를 쏘세요. 그리고 할아버지는 진심으로 여러분을 돕고 싶으신 거예요. 저희도 포세이큰 동맹을 용서할 수 없으니까요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011829,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912432",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011830,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="I would have died if not for Mr Frank. So if you must shoot him, could you please shoot me instead? He just wants to help, because none of us can forgive what The Forsakens did to us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912432",
	},
	[11011830]={
		["ContentKR"]="하수도는 사방으로 이어져 있어서 여러분끼리 가면 길을 찾기 쉽지 않을 거예요. 할아버지는 밸브 수리 때문에 자주 불려 가셔서 길을 잘 아시니까 할아버지를 살려 주시면 분명 길을 찾는데 도움이 될 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011830,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91245C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011831,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="The sewer tunnels are like a maze. You'd easily get lost without help. The Forsakens always get Mr Frank to fix the sewer valves, so he knows the place like the back of his hand. Let him live and he'll get you where you need to go.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91245C",
	},
	[11011831]={
		["Camera"]="-256.792969,-198.869141,124.994751,0.000378,-4.393464,140.25087,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="됐어. 마르코, 총 내려…… 내리라고. 명령이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011831,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-231.882812,-219.580078,118.856079,0.000377,-4.393464,140.2509,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912486",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011832,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Alright. Marco, lower your gun — Holster it, this is an order.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110016:Shock_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912486",
	},
	[11011832]={
		["ContentKR"]="레온, 몸수색해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011832,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9124B0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011833,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Leon, frisk him.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9124B0",
	},
	[11011833]={
		["Camera"]="-549.676758,73.400391,152.960693,0.000416,-6.392483,-57.146404,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011833,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9124DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011834,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110043,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110043:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9124DA",
	},
	[11011834]={
		["Camera"]="-255.510742,-167.703125,57.033203,0.000406,-9.592256,-108.345261,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011834,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-255.510742,-167.703125,37.694702,0.000406,-9.592256,-108.345261,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912504",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011835,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912504",
	},
	[11011835]={
		["Camera"]="-255.510742,-167.703125,105.311523,0.00041,3.207825,-110.344246,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="며칠 전, 배가 아파서 잠시 쉬고 있었을 뿐인데 포세이큰 동맹 놈들이 채찍질하더군요. 죽어가던 저에게 할아버지가 물과 음식, 그리고 이 낡은 옷을 주셨고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011835,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-244.583008,-138.228516,103.549683,0.00041,3.207825,-110.344246,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91252E",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11011835.11011835'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011836,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91252E",
	},
	[11011836]={
		["Camera"]="-268.169922,-183.080078,103.549683,0.000412,1.807944,141.255859,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011836,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-252.99707,-195.251953,102.834351,0.000412,1.207919,141.256744,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912558",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011837,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912558",
	},
	[11011837]={
		["ContentKR"]="그 여자는 내버려둬.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011837,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912582",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011838,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="No need to frisk her.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912582",
	},
	[11011838]={
		["Camera"]="-275.535156,181.640625,127.565308,0.00042,-3.59201,-99.54377,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="예, 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011838,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-265.369141,242.121094,131.415405,0.000419,-3.792025,-99.54377,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9125AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011839,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110043,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110043:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9125AC",
	},
	[11011839]={
		["ContentKR"]="노인장, 하수도 길에 익숙하시다고 하니 안내를 부탁하죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011839,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9125D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011840,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I've heard you're familiar with these sewers. Please lead the way then.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9125D6",
	},
	[11011840]={
		["Camera"]="-206.292969,-136.675781,110.456665,0.000413,-0.992126,167.654282,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너희는 다른 포로들이 허튼수작 못 부리게 잘 지키고 있어. 근처에 수상한 움직임이 있으면 바로 철수하고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011840,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-206.214844,-105.244141,110.456665,0.000413,-0.992064,177.854065,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B912600",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Stay alert and keep a close watch on them. If anything seems amiss, we pull out immediately.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912600",
	},
	[11011841]={
		["Camera"]="-279.490234,-108.070312,122.690674,0.000132,-2.15875,-124.058014,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="가만히 있어! 움직이지 말라는 말 못 들었어?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011841,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91262A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011842,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Behave! Captain's orders — no sudden moves or funny business, alright?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110015:Angry01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91262A",
	},
	[11011842]={
		["Camera"]="-291.725586,191.083984,110.099609,0.000108,-1.159022,-90.659668,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 움직이지 않으면…… 길을 안내할 수 없는걸요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011842,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B912654",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011843,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="But if I'm not allowed to move, how am I supposed to lead the way...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912654",
	},
	[11011843]={
		["Camera"]="-279.490234,-108.070312,122.690674,0.000132,-2.15875,-124.058014,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 그렇네.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011843,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91267E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011844,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Right, you have a point there.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110015:Angry01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91267E",
	},
	[11011844]={
		["Camera"]="-291.725586,191.083984,110.099609,0.000108,-1.159022,-90.659668,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그렇게 경계하지 않아도 돼요. 평범한 카론도 사람이에요. 여러분처럼 저희도 모두 엄마가 있고 또 어서 돌아가 엄마를 만나고 싶은 마음 뿐이에요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011844,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9126A8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011845,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="There's no need to so on guard. We Charons are ordinary people too, with families we're desperate to see again.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9126A8",
	},
	[11011845]={
		["ContentKR"]="……아아, 카지아……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011845,
		["GUID"]="1B9126D2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011846,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="...*sigh* Katya...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110017:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9126D2",
	},
	[11011846]={
		["ContentKR"]="……대장님, 왜 저를 막으신 겁니까?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011846,
		["GUID"]="1B9126FC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011847,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="...Captain, why did you stop me!?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Talk01_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9126FC",
	},
	[11011847]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 카론이 포세이큰 같이 적인 건 아니야. 아바르 중령님도 카론이잖아. 이 중 몇 명이 정말로 포세이큰 동맹 소속이라 해도 죽이는 것보단 살려 두는 게 더 쓸모 있을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011847,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912726",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011848,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Not all Charons are rebels from The Forsakens — Commander Avar is a Charon, remember? And even if they are, they'd be worth more to us alive.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912726",
	},
	[11011848]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 마음속에서 어떤 소리가 들리더라도 그것에 굴복하지 마라, 마르코. 충동에 사로잡히면 안돼.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011848,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B912750",
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{4},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain01_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...An inner voice might tell you otherwise, Marco, but don't listen to it. Don't let emotions cloud your judgment.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110016:Talk01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B912750",
	},
	[11011849]={
		["Camera"]="-184.896484,-331.09375,196.984009,0.000248,-12.787199,78.826126,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="고마워요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011849,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91277A",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011850,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Thank you...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B91277A",
	},
	[11011850]={
		["Camera"]="-129.498047,871.613281,642.47821,0.000279,-40.586578,-85.372604,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나한테 말한 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011850,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9127A4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011851,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You're talking to me?",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110034)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9127A4",
	},
	[11011851]={
		["Camera"]="-57.026367,516.775391,162.880371,0.000242,-8.786833,-95.173096,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아까 몸수색을 하지 않으셨죠. 제국인이시면서도 카론 여자인 저의 존엄성을 지켜주신 것에 감사드리고 싶었어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011851,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9127CE",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011852,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes. You didn't let your man frisk me, and I really appreciate it — it's rare to see an Imperial officer respect the dignity of a Charon girl like me.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110034:Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9127CE",
	},
	[11011852]={
		["Camera"]="-79.321289,325.380859,142.960449,0.000233,-6.786892,-88.972565,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="은혜는 절대 잊지 않을게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011852,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9127F8",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Your kindness will reap a just reward.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110118/1B9127F8",
	},
	[11011901]={
		["Camera"]="241.089844,2.313599,175.642456,0.000021,0.399819,-122.454819,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 무슨 말씀이십니까? 지원이 늦을 거란 말입니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="395.255859,-124.115417,179.499146,0.000021,-3.200319,-178.657104,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B913002",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011902,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...What did you say!? The reinforcements are delayed!?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Call"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=50,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913002",
	},
	[11011902]={
		["ContentKR"]="'나르왈' 부대가 포세이큰 동맹 놈들의 작은 장난질에 당해서 다리 위에서 발이 묶였다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011902,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91302C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011903,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="The Forsakens sabotaged the Narwhals at the bridge. Now we're stuck here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B91302C",
	},
	[11011903]={
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 지금 남아있는 병력만으로 중앙 관제실에 쳐들어가란 말입니까? 이 인원으로 적들의 '연락책'을 치란 말씀이십니까? 풀비스 님, 제발 정신 좀 차리십시오. 상대는 '다이몬'입니다! 게다가 가는 길에 매복이 얼마나 있을지도 모르지 않습니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011903,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B913056",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011904,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You expect me to break into the central control room with just two battered squads and directly confront their Messenger? You can't be serious, Fulvis. The enemies are Daimons, and god knows how many more ambushes lie ahead!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913056",
	},
	[11011904]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래. 상대는 '다이몬'이지. 하지만 너도 그렇잖아? 게다가 네 쪽에는 '다이몬'에 버금가는 {nickname2}도 있지 않은가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011904,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B913080",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011905,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="So what if they are Daimons? You're one too! Besides, don't you have  on your side, who's as strong as any Daimon?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913080",
	},
	[11011905]={
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 관제실은 지금 너희가 있는 4호 포대에서 50m도 안 떨어져 있을 것이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011905,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9130AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011906,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="The central control room is just right ahead. It's less than fifty yards away from the Turret you're at.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9130AA",
	},
	[11011906]={
		["ContentKR"]="50미터만 더 전진하면 승리를 폐하께 바칠 수 있는데, 뭐가 그리 어려운 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011906,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9130D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011907,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
