		["Subtitle"]="Fifty yards further, and we can dedicate the victory to His Majesty! What's so hard about that?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9130D4",
	},
	[11011907]={
		["Camera"]="262.195312,-74.495239,199.955078,0.000036,-7.59991,-153.050873,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11011907,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9130FE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011908,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9130FE",
	},
	[11011908]={
		["Camera"]="-307.916016,-10.313782,130.371277,0.000038,0.9994,-22.646984,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}? 어떻게 됐나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011908,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-298.832031,11.644348,131.292114,0.000038,0.399518,-28.847132,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B913128",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011909,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"None\"},Duration{1}},\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}},\
LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="? How are things going on your side?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913128",
	},
	[11011909]={
		["Camera"]="2.179688,-41.762146,130.270447,0.000048,-0.600251,-160.846527,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="시몬이 전사했고, 다른 이들은 모두 구출에 성공했습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011909,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-23.964844,-50.842102,135.165588,0.000048,-0.800252,-162.646271,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B913152",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011910,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Simon sacrificed himself. Thanks to him, I managed to save the rest.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913152",
	},
	[11011910]={
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 포세이큰 동맹에 납치 당했다는 카론 난민 무리를 만났는데, 그 사람들이 여기까지 길을 안내해 줬습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011910,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91317C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011911,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We also met a few Charon refugees enslaved by The Forsakens. They led us here.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B91317C",
	},
	[11011911]={
		["Camera"]="4.611328,38.731445,141.863403,0.000034,-4.40039,-153.85318,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="난민? 혹시 포세이큰 동맹 놈들이 위장한 건 아닐까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011911,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-17.615234,83.60199,141.942139,0.000034,-4.40039,-153.653152,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9131A6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011912,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Refugees? Not Forsakens rebels in disguise, I hope.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_End","[2] = \"110010:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9131A6",
	},
	[11011912]={
		["Camera"]="-25.244141,-19.76947,126.718811,0.000041,2.199444,-151.652344,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래서 병사들이 주시하고 있습니다. 정말 평민이라면 멋대로 돌아다니는 것보다 저희가 데리고 있는 게 안전할 거고, 포세이큰 동맹의 일원이라면 그대로 체포해서 제국으로 데려가면 될 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011912,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-30.107422,-10.751892,126.705505,0.000041,2.199444,-151.652344,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9131D0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011913,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="That's why I asked the soldiers to keep an eye on them. If they are indeed civilians, they'd be safer with us. If they turn out to be from the Forsakens, we'll detain them and bring them back to the capital.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Agree",
			[2]="110010:Talk03_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9131D0",
	},
	[11011913]={
		["Camera"]="-116.570312,-12.911438,163.313293,0.000043,-0.600742,-30.050236,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그들이 적일 경우, 우리가 데리고 있으면 동료의 목숨이 걸려 있으니, 매복 중인 동맹도 섣불리 공격할 수 없을 테지. 흠, 좋은 생각이야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011913,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-107.238281,-18.375061,166.597534,0.000043,-0.600742,-30.050236,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9131FA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011914,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="In that case, the ambushing Forsakens may think twice about attacking for fear of harming their fellows. Mm, you made a smart decision.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9131FA",
	},
	[11011914]={
		["Camera"]="-23.972656,-30.946106,171.037842,0.000044,1.199067,-37.048267,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이쪽은…… 지원군이 오는 길에 문제가 생겨서 제시간에 오지 못할 것 같은데, 상부에서는 '임무를 계속하라'고 지시가 내려왔다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011914,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="11.693359,-57.871765,182.456726,0.000044,1.199067,-37.048267,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B913224",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011915,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="As for this side... Our reinforcements met a problem on the way here and can't make it... And we're ordered to continue the mission.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913224",
	},
	[11011915]={
		["Camera"]="-50.632812,-54.376953,137.91333,0.000055,0.398863,-162.446289,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="예, 저도 들었습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011915,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-17.349609,-43.803284,137.670593,0.000055,0.398863,-162.246277,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91324E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011916,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I heard.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B91324E",
	},
	[11011916]={
		["Camera"]="34.552734,-41.949524,187.588501,0.000064,-2.200987,-46.44751,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 좋은 쪽으로 생각하자. 이제 마지막 임무만 남았다. 길을 막는 놈들은 때려눕히고 어떻게든 중앙 관제실 문을 연 다음 암호키를 콘솔에 꽂아 권한을 회수하면 모든 게 끝나.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011916,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-9.326172,4.203552,179.615051,0.000064,-2.200987,-46.247524,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B913278",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011936,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...Look on the bright side, the mission is almost done. Knock out everything that gets in the way, breach the central control room, insert the key, we reclaim access, and then mission accomplished. That's all that stands between us and home.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B913278",
	},
	[11011917]={
		["Camera"]="-22.394531,-48.055237,156.619995,0.00007,-7.800322,-164.04863,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 방어막을 해제하는 게 급선무일 것 같은데, 그렇다면 여기 폭시코르 캐논을 이용하는 건 어떻겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011917,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-14.953125,-45.923645,157.682129,0.00007,-7.800322,-164.04863,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9132A2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011918,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...So the first thing to do now is disable the barrier up ahead, right? How does this cannon work?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/1B9132A2",
	},
	[11011918]={
		["Camera"]="-4.816406,-6.338318,179.877502,0.000095,-1.000575,-45.047215,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="방금 폭시코르 캐논에 사용할 폭시코르가 다 떨어진 참이라 지금……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011918,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-21.675781,10.563416,180.294556,0.000095,-1.800533,-45.047245,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011919,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The cannon just ran out of Phoxichor primers. I was about to—",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Talk02_End",
			[2]="110010:Think_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011919]={
		["Camera"]="-54.783203,111.192444,135.942932,0.000055,-2.400723,-155.452408,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나리, 나리!",
		["DialogueId"]=11011919,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-70.373047,102.649536,128.868347,0.000056,-0.40057,-152.8535,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110017)，110017:n(110022"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011920,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir! Sir!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110017)，110017:n(110022"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011920]={
		["ContentKR"]="폭시코르가 필요하신 거라면, 제가 폭시코르가 있는 창고 위치를 아는데, 괜찮으시다면 안내해드릴 수도 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011920,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011921,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="It sounds like you need Phoxichor. I know where the nearest storage is. I can take you there.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110017:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011921]={
		["Camera"]="-6.033203,-285.19043,132.766541,0.000062,-1.800199,143.14183,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 음……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011921,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-15.679688,-316.977051,130.002502,0.000064,-2.599884,137.739395,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011922,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Okay.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110017:Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011922]={
		["ContentKR"]="따라와.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011922,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110034)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011923,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="And you. Come with us.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011923]={
		["Camera"]="-209.833984,-22.960693,135.643921,0.000057,-2.800658,-139.652802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 여기까지 안전하게 모셔다드렸는데도 아직 저를 믿지 못하시는군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011923,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-164.667969,15.409241,138.542725,0.000057,-2.800658,-139.652802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11011924,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="...You still don't trust me? Even after I brought you here safely?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011924]={
		["ContentKR"]="죄송해요, 그냥 조금…… 아니에요, 따라갈게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011924,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="...Fine, I'll go with you.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110034:Disagree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011925]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011925,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011926,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="Here it is, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011926]={
		["ContentKR"]="제가 들고 있을게요. 더 힘든 일도 해봤으니 괜찮아요. 전 힘이 세거든요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011926,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011927,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Allow me to carry that for you, sir. I've done all kinds of heavy work and have great strength.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011927]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 앗, 필요 없으신가요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011927,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="...Er, sure you don't want my help...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011928]={
		["ContentKR"]="투명하고 반짝거리는 게…… 이 액체 폭시코르, 참 예쁘네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011928,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011929,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="The Phoxichor is beautiful, all clear and shimmering.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011929]={
		["ContentKR"]="사람을 해치는 게 아니라면 참 좋을 텐데요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011929,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011930,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="If only it wasn't used for killing people.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011930]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그러게.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011930,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Yeah.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011931]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아, 다 모았어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011931,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011932,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="That's all of them.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011932]={
		["ContentKR"]="이제 집에 돌아갈 수 있는 건가요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11011932,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011933,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, does that mean we're going home soon?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011933]={
		["ContentKR"]="그러길 바라야지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011933,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011934,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I hope so.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011934]={
		["ContentKR"]="살아서 돌아가면, 예전엔 살 엄두를 못 냈던 옷을 맘껏 사고 싶어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011934,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011935,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="If I make it back alive, I'm going to a fashion boutique to buy all the dresses I've dreamed of.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011935]={
		["ContentKR"]="예쁜 양말도 한 켤레 사고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011935,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="And it would be nice to have a pair of pretty stockings, too.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110119/",
	},
	[11011936]={
		["Camera"]="-448.179688,233.121948,194.934875,0.000092,-8.000822,-37.045151,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 문제는 중앙 관제실의 문이 밖에서는 열 수 없다는 사실인데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011936,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011937,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The trouble is, though, we can't open the door to the central control room from the outside...",
	},
	[11011937]={
		["Camera"]="423.117188,-6.329834,189.872375,0.000092,-8.600895,-169.241806,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래서 지금 이 폭시코르 캐논을 사용하시려고……",
		["DialogueId"]=11011937,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11011938,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="That's why you're adjusting this cannon now...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Talk01_Start",
		},
	},
	[11011938]={
		["Camera"]="-448.179688,233.121948,194.934875,0.000092,-8.000822,-37.045151,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래, 지금 요새의 동력이 마비됐으니 우선 이 캐논을 옮길 방법을 찾아야 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011938,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011939,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Exactly. But the power to the entire fortress has been cut off, we need to get this thing there first.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
	},
	[11011939]={
		["ContentKR"]="중령님, 인근 창고에서 통에 담긴 액체 폭시코르를 찾아, 지시하신 대로 나머지 회전체에 연결했습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011939,
		["NextDialogue"]=11011940,
		["SnapShot"]="TELEPHONE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, we've found some Phoxichor Canisters at a nearby warehouse, and got them connected to the remaining Phoxynamo Wheels as you instructed.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Call"],
	},
	[11011940]={
		["Camera"]="423.117188,-6.329834,189.872375,0.000092,-8.600895,-169.241806,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="좋아…… 이 정도면 폭시코르 캐논을 중앙 관제실 근처로 옮기기엔 충분할 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11011940,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Excellent. That should be enough to move this cannon near the central control room.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
	},
	[11012001]={
		["ContentKR"]="잘했다. 이만 출발하지. 중앙 관제실 포격에 가장 좋은 위치로 포대를 옮겨야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Well done. Now let's move the cannon to an optimal spot to bombard the central control room.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012002]={
		["ContentKR"]="예, 이 둘의 도움이 컸습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Thanks to the help of these two refugees.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Agree",
			[2]="110010:Talk01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012003]={
		["ContentKR"]="포대를 조심해라. 필토이드가 망가뜨리면 안 된다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Keep the cannon from the Filthoids.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012004]={
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 구역 방어막을 포격할 수 있는 최적의 위치를 찾아야 해. 그리고 넌 필토이드가 포대를 망가뜨리지 못하게 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012004,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's find an optimal spot to bombard the barrier of the central area. Stay vigilant and protect the turret from the Filthoids.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012005]={
		["ContentKR"]="조심해, 필토이드다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012005,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Heads up! Filthoids approaching!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Angry01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012006]={
		["ContentKR"]="또 왔다, 포대를 지켜!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012006,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Shock",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Another wave! Defend the turret!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110120/",
	},
	[11012101]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 시야가 괜찮은 것 같으니, 여기서 멈추지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Confident",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We have a clear view from here. This is our stop.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012102]={
		["ContentKR"]="이제 이 폭시코르 캐논으로 앞에 있는 방어막을 포격하면 된다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Next, we'll use the Phoxichor cannon to blow apart the barrier ahead.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012103]={
		["ContentKR"]="필토이드가 몰려들고 있다. 바로 포격해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Some Filthoids picked up the scent. Just fire away.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012104]={
		["ContentKR"]="방어막이 너무 단단합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What a tough barrier...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012105]={
		["ContentKR"]="폭시코르 캐논도 버틴다니, 공학 연금원 기술은 정말 인정할 수밖에 없군……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012105,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11012106,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Took a Phoxichor cannon shot with barely a dent. Those guys at the Aeolipile have some real skills...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012106]={
		["ContentKR"]="멈추지 말고 계속 포격해! 고성능 폭탄은 되는대로 계속 사용하고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012106,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11012107,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't stop, keep firing! Use the high explosive shells!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012107]={
		["ContentKR"]="방어막을 뚫지 못하더라도 안에 있는 놈들이 스스로 문을 열게 만들 수는 있을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Even if we fail to tear down the barrier, continious fire can force the enemies from the inside to open the gate themselves.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012108]={
		["ContentKR"]="옆에서 뭐가 튀어나왔는데…… 포세이큰 놈들입니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11012109,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Someone's running out from the side gate — it's the Forsakens!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012109]={
		["ContentKR"]="거의 끝난 것 같은데, 가서 확인해 보자.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012109,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="That should do it. Let's go check it out.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012110]={
		["ContentKR"]="꼬맹이, 그만 놀고 얼른 이쪽으로 와!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012110,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Hey, quit fooling around. Get over here!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110121/",
	},
	[11012201]={
		["Camera"]="-507.54541,-397.79126,-135.757874,0.000019,-8.799681,31.148724,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="정말로 스스로 문을 열다니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-65.992188,-135.824219,-212.646179,0.000021,-7.799652,29.548767,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012202,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="They've actually opened the gate from the inside...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110122/",
	},
	[11012202]={
		["ContentKR"]="안에 있으면 더 큰 충격을 받으니까 버틸 수 없었을 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The blast impact was far stronger inside. They would've perished had they not opened it.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110122/",
	},
	[11012203]={
		["ContentKR"]="내가 {nickname2}(와)과 앞장설 테니까 나머지도 조심히 따라와라!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91618E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Captain  and I are taking the lead. Everyone else, fall in behind us!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110122/1B91618E",
	},
	[11012301]={
		["ContentKR"]="웅크려 앉아서 뭐 하는 거야? 왜 그래?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=11012302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="What's wrong? Why squatting down?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110123/",
	},
	[11012302]={
		["ContentKR"]="카지아?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Katya?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110123/",
	},
	[11012303]={
		["ContentKR"]="나리, 잠깐만요. 준비할 게 좀 있어서요~",
		["DialogueId"]=11012303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9171F6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012304,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Easy, sir. I'm just doing some preparation—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110123/1B9171F6",
	},
	[11012304]={
		["ContentKR"]="음, 준비 끝!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012304,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B917220",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Now, I'm ready.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110123/1B917220",
	},
	[11012401]={
		["Camera"]="507.241577,252.382324,731.451355,0.000103,-56.797882,131.392502,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="이 미친 여자가 뭘 웃어! 대장이 베푼 은혜를 원수로 갚아 놓고 미안하지도 않아?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="415.760742,171.621094,731.451294,0.000103,-56.797882,131.592514,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91820A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012402,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0062_story_kajia_jazz\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="You crazy girl! What are you laughing at? Is this how you repay the Captain's kindness? Don't you feel guilty at all?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110015:Angry01_Start",
			[2]="110009:Talk03_Loop",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110015:n(110009)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91820A",
	},
	[11012402]={
		["Camera"]="154.983948,454.995605,227.682953,0.000017,-36.796558,119.391602,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="미안……? 여보세요. 연금원의 약을 너무 많이 먹어서 머리가 어떻게 되기라도 하셨어요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="148.089355,467.236816,217.238342,0.000021,-36.596516,119.391594,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918234",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012403,
		["Scripts"]="\
SEQ{\
\9CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"261.425964,343.004395,192.928375,0.000055,-14.795685,122.388268,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}},\
\9LookAt{_delay{0},LookAtDescription{\"110009:n(110015)\"}}\
\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Guilty...? Ha, have you had too many alchemical concoctions from your Academy that damaged your brain?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918234",
	},
	[11012403]={
		["Camera"]="147.973511,486.398926,157.291321,-0.000916,-9.414274,125.794289,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 미안한 게 있긴 있네. 방금 너희 그 멍청한 대장을 속이느라 제국이 우리한테 한 짓을 전부 포세이큰 동맹의 짓이라고 했거든. 하아, 우리 형제자매들아, 정말 미안해!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012403,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy01"],
		["GUID"]="1B91825E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012404,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh wait, I do feel guilty about one thing — to manipulate that stupid captain of yours, I lied about The Forsakens and blamed them for what the Empire did to us. I'm so sorry to The Forsakens!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Talk02_Start",
			[2]="110015:Angry01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91825E",
	},
	[11012404]={
		["Camera"]="-7.962341,604.226074,148.144958,-0.000916,-1.014133,-30.008789,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너 이……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012404,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918288",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012405,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{1}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="You—!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110015:Angry01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918288",
	},
	[11012405]={
		["Camera"]="62.402527,436.002441,145.641113,-0.000915,-3.414124,84.192467,27.090816,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이게 누구야? 아, 우리 대장 나리!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012405,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9182B2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012406,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_02\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}, \
\9LookAt{_delay{1},LookAtDescription{\"110009:n(110022)\"}},\
LookAt{_delay{1},LookAtDescription{\"110015:n(110022)\"}},\
\9\9PARA{\
\9\9\9CameraMoveTo{_delay{3},TargetPosition{\"-2.039429,736.236328,153.04126,-0.000915,-7.215364,-71.569633,25.735075,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}}, \
\9\9\9MoveTo{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_01\"},MoveSpeed{20},Visibility{\"Show\"}}\
\9\9\9\9}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, look what the cat dragged in. Hello, dear sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9182B2",
	},
	[11012406]={
		["Camera"]="43.476685,566.656738,145.273438,-0.001221,-4.610227,-84.771599,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="내가 얘기해 볼 테니 나와.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012406,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9182DC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012407,
		["Scripts"]="SetLocation{ActorId{110015},TargetPoint{\"fix14_03\"},Visibility{\"Hide\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll take it from here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9182DC",
	},
	[11012407]={
		["Camera"]="-11.74884,372.333008,153.90332,-0.00119,-7.212523,56.819756,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="날 왜 찾아오셨을까? 우리 휘페르보레아 제국 장교 나리는 아량이 넓다는 걸 보여 주려고? 아니면 '잘못된 길로 빠진' 불쌍한 소녀를 동정하는 척 날 '구원'하려고 그러시나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012407,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110009:Uninterested01",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="-21.347717,378.61084,153.903748,-0.00119,-7.212523,56.820061,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918306",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012408,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{3}}, \9\
PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{1}}, \
PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_Start\"},Duration{10}}\
}\9",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="So what are you doing here? Come to show off the benevolence of a Hyperborean officer? Or perhaps you pity this poor girl who's been led \"astray,\" trying to save me from my \"sins\"?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk03_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918306",
	},
	[11012408]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 알았다! 포세이큰 동맹에 가입하고 싶어서 나한테 부탁하러 왔구나!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012408,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B918330",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012409,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Shock_Start\"},Duration{6}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, I get it! You want to join The Forsakens, right? Need a reference?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918330",
	},
	[11012409]={
		["Camera"]="-21.347717,378.61084,153.903748,-0.00119,-7.212523,56.820061,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="뭐야, 다들 들었어? 너네 대장 나리가 포세이큰 동맹에 가입하고 싶다는데?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012409,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-34.135986,359.14209,156.802002,-0.00119,-7.012507,56.419113,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91835A",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110015)"],
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Hey — you guys hear that? Your captain wants to join The Forsakens!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91835A",
	},
	[11012410]={
		["Camera"]="-21.347717,378.61084,153.903748,-0.00119,-7.212523,56.820061,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="소리쳐도 소용없어. 여기에는 널 상대해 줄 사람 없으니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012410,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918384",
		["Subtitle"]="Save it. No one would give you any attention.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918384",
	},
	[11012411]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="흑흑흑, 이거 정말 너무 슬프네요, 흑흑흑.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012411,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110009:Unhappy01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B9183AE",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012419,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1}},\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, no. This is so sad. Boohoo whoo.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9183AE",
	},
	[11012412]={
		["Camera"]="-2.039429,736.236328,153.04126,-0.000915,-7.215364,-71.569633,25.735075,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="맞아, 포세이큰 동맹에 들어가려면 누구한테 연락하면 되지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012412,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9183D8",
		["Subtitle"]="Yeah, I'm interested. Who's your contact?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9183D8",
	},
	[11012413]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="우리 대장 나리, 수법이 너무 구리다. 에헷, 관두세요, 내 입에서 정보가 나올 일은 없을 테니까. 전우를 배신하고 적한테 정보를 팔아넘기는 쓰레기는 당신네 군단에나 있지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012413,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="1B918402",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012419,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{1}},\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh honey, you really suck at this. Save it — you won't get anything from me. Lowlives who betray their comrades and sell intel to their enemy only exist in your beloved Legion.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Shock_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918402",
	},
	[11012414]={
		["Camera"]="-2.039429,736.236328,153.04126,-0.000915,-7.215364,-71.569633,25.735075,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그동안 기회가 그렇게 많았을 텐데 왜 하필 지금이지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012414,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91842C",
		["Subtitle"]="You had many chances for an ambush. Why played the long game?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91842C",
	},
	[11012415]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="우리 대장 나리가 워낙에 경계심이 많으셔서 말이지. 단둘이 있는데도 기회가 없더라니까. 그래서 몇 변 도와주면서 경계심을 풀길 기다린 거지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012415,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110009:Syouganai01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B918456",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012416,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1}},\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk01_Start\"},Duration{1}},\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Because you're always so on guard. I couldn't find a chance, even while we were alone. I had to bide my time patiently. Even offered you help a couple of times to lower your guard.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Shock_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918456",
	},
	[11012416]={
		["Camera"]="-34.135986,359.14209,156.802002,-0.00119,-7.012507,56.419113,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 이게 더 재밌잖아! 낯선 사람보다 믿었던 사람한테 배신당하는 게 더 재밌지 않아?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012416,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B918480",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012419,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="And it's more fun this way! Betrayal by a trusted friend is far more memorable than a stab from a stranger, isn't it?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918480",
	},
	[11012417]={
		["Camera"]="-2.039429,736.236328,153.04126,-0.000915,-7.215364,-71.569633,25.735075,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(주먹으로 한 대 쳐서 입을 다물게 만든다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012417,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9184AA",
		["Subtitle"]="(Give her a punch to shut her up)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9184AA",
	},
	[11012418]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아앗! 누가 좀 말려 주세요! 무방비 상태인 연약한 여자를 때리다니!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012418,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Angry02"],
		["GUID"]="1B9184D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012419,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{1}},\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Oww, it hurts! Someone do something about this! An armed soldier's hitting a helpless young girl!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Shock_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9184D4",
	},
	[11012419]={
		["Camera"]="48.391357,567.070801,145.273499,-0.001221,-4.810249,-85.17157,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012419,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9184FE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012420,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9184FE",
	},
	[11012420]={
		["Camera"]="46.353943,471.012207,143.984436,-0.001191,-5.212465,74.018982,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="왜, 눈을 왜 그렇게 부릅떠? 어머, 죄송해요. 나리! 제 이런 말투를 좋아하시는 걸 깜박했네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012420,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B918528",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012421,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{3},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{6}}\
\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Aww, you look like an angry bull. I'm so sorry, sir! I forgot you like it better when I talk like this.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918528",
	},
	[11012421]={
		["Camera"]="54.230835,671.196777,146.352112,-0.000915,-4.615384,-88.168091,34.548912,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그만해. 지루한 연기는 집어치우고, 묻는 말에 대답이나 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012421,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918552",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012422,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Cut the act, and answer my question.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918552",
	},
	[11012422]={
		["Camera"]="53.116638,469.101074,143.984436,-0.00119,-5.412467,74.219116,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="히힛! 얼마든지 물어봐. 물론 대답해 줄지 말지는 내 마음이지만!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012422,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="1B91857C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012423,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Agree\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Sure! Ask away. I'll answer whenever I feel like it.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Explain02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91857C",
	},
	[11012423]={
		["Camera"]="116.284424,-719.358398,907.055359,-0.001131,-35.2113,93.399628,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이 난리를 피운 이유는 말해 줘야지? 휘페르보레아 제국 병사를 노린 건가? 아니면 내가 목적이었나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012423,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-89.136353,-161.509766,558.398071,-0.001127,-38.011406,74.597076,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9185A6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012424,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I deserve to know why you stabbed us in the back after I helped you. Is it out of plain hatred for the Hyperborean Legion, or an assassination attempt targeting me specifically?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9185A6",
	},
	[11012424]={
		["Camera"]="83.635193,356.111328,148.412354,0.000044,-5.00021,92.191154,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그거라면…… 그래. 너 덕분에 재미도 봤으니까 이 정도는 보너스로 알려줄까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012424,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B9185D0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012425,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{1}},\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{0},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Agree\"},Duration{6}}\
\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="If this is your question... Sure, I can answer that — given that you've been naive enough to fall for my trick.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9185D0",
	},
	[11012425]={
		["Camera"]="45.249512,241.304688,255.586395,0.000023,-24.795778,83.583382,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="포세이큰은 휘페르보레아의 개들을 죄다 여기에 묻어 버릴 생각이었어. 너희가 자기들이 만든 살상 기계에 죽는 게 최고의 시나리오였지. 어때, 우리가 준비한 선물 마음에 들었어?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012425,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="36.910339,177.242676,285.156952,0.000022,-24.595762,82.58326,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9185FA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012426,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{0}},\
\9PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk01_Start\"},Duration{5}}\
\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="The Forsakens simply want all Hyperborean dogs to die here, and preferably at the hands of the killing machines they created — I hope you enjoyed our fiery gift.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9185FA",
	},
	[11012426]={
		["Camera"]="71.12146,466.588867,144.062866,0.000011,-6.000054,85.194328,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 나는…… 난 말이야, 당연히 <Highlight>너</>를 만나러 왔지!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012426,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="1B918624",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012427,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_Start\"},Duration{1}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="As for me... Well, I personally came for you!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918624",
	},
	[11012427]={
		["Camera"]="71.12146,466.588867,144.062866,0.000011,-6.000054,85.194328,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="황립 사관학교 작년 최우수 졸업생에 '창백의 사신'이라고 불리는 분이 론샤 요새에 왔다고 하는데, 내가 어떻게 가만히 있을 수 있었겠어?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012427,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="65.125793,395.280273,151.631897,0.000011,-5.800053,85.194313,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91864E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012428,
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{6},TargetPosition{\"54.926514,644.137207,150.351501,0.000109,-5.399715,-88.606766,30.83161,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="I heard that you, the top graduate of the Imperial Military College, who is also known as the \"Pale Reaper,\" were coming to Lonza Fortress. How could I not come have a good look at the Pale Reaper myself?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91864E",
	},
	[11012428]={
		["Camera"]="74.723572,543.212402,144.459839,0.00008,-4.400049,-104.610237,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="날 전부터 알았다고? 우리가 만난 적이 있던가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012428,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918678",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012429,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You've heard about me? Have we met before?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918678",
	},
	[11012429]={
		["Camera"]="61.194885,357.783203,157.238953,0.000008,-6.999967,84.794708,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="히힛, 궁금하면 맞춰보던가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012429,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy01"],
		["GUID"]="1B9186A2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012430,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Hehe, that's for you to guess.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9186A2",
	},
	[11012430]={
		["Camera"]="154.276062,634.318848,151.499023,0.000187,-13.798129,-128.797638,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,17.849516",
		["ContentKR"]="우리 정보원 말로는 우리 위대하신 창백의 사신님께서는 최근 몇 년을 빼고는 기억이 싹 사라지셨다고, 어디서 온 누구인지 자신도 모른다고 했던가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012430,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Smile01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="38.18573,671.567383,151.499023,0.000178,-14.398189,-80.596359,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,17.849516",
		["GUID"]="1B9186CC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012431,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_Start\"},Duration{13}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="My sources said that our great {性别2:Mr|Miss} Pale Reaper only has a few years' worth of memories. You know nothing of your past. You don't even know where you came from.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk03_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9186CC",
	},
	[11012431]={
		["Camera"]="46.64032,534.217773,136.427002,0.000167,-2.998255,-84.995979,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,17.849516",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11012431,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="72.972229,506.399902,141.351379,0.000186,-3.398162,-115.398468,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,17.849516",
		["GUID"]="1B9186F6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012432,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Think_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9186F6",
	},
	[11012432]={
		["Camera"]="-44.177917,252.597168,264.462585,0.000094,-23.801937,70.14489,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 나랑 게임 하나 할까? 내가 누군지 맞혀 봐. 나는 네 이웃일까? 오랜 원수일까? 아니면……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012432,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-35.003906,278.002441,252.548553,0.000094,-23.801937,70.14489,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918720",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012433,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk01_End\"},Duration{0}},\
\9PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Think_Start\"},Duration{5}}\
\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's play a game then! Now, honey, take a guess — was I your neighbour, an old nemesis—",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918720",
	},
	[11012433]={
		["Camera"]="-8.447388,354.300781,219.516052,0.000095,-23.602072,65.943413,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아니면…… 사실 널 모르지만, 휘페르보레아 제국이 그렇게 아끼고 감싸고 드니 그냥 싫어서 죽이고 싶어 하는 사람일까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012433,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91874A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012434,
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{1.5},TargetPosition{\"48.845947,502.055176,163.810852,0.000122,-19.002064,66.944237,21.413908,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Or a complete stranger? Maybe I just hate you for being one of Hyperborea's honorable people, and I simply wish to destroy that which they cherish?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91874A",
	},
	[11012434]={
		["Camera"]="46.64032,534.217773,136.427002,0.000167,-2.998255,-84.995979,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,17.849516",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11012434,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="65.379517,541.772949,131.01178,0.000144,8.400107,-101.606186,24.040375,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918774",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012435,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918774",
	},
	[11012435]={
		["Camera"]="-2.780457,362.16748,155.493103,0.000103,-4.201385,66.952652,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>머리 아파 죽겠지? 저 미친 여자가 지껄이는 말이 피에 굶주린 거머리처럼 네 두개골과 뇌를 갉아 먹고 있거든.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012435,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="11.451538,395.618652,152.822998,0.000103,-4.201385,66.952858,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91879E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012436,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Your head hurts, right? The jabbering of this mad girl is worming through your skull like a leech sucking at your brains.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91879E",
	},
	[11012436]={
		["Camera"]="-18.244873,445.63623,87.171692,0.0009,-10.214472,14.329519,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>자, 네 손의 칼을 봐. 그렇지, 네 손에 착 감기는 그 칼. 칼자루에 네 체온이 남아 있지. 그리고 넌 날카로운 칼날이 살을 베는 순간에 느껴지는 묘한 감각을 잘 알고 있잖아.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012436,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-9.202332,447.946289,85.490234,0.000901,-10.214472,14.329842,15.314365,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9187C8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012437,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="See, you have a sword in your hand. That's right — it's the one you've wielded in countless battles. The hilt still carries your warmth. You're familiar with the slick feeling and the subtle tug of resistance when its blade slices through flesh.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9187C8",
	},
	[11012437]={
		["Camera"]="66.767517,539.030762,150.53717,-0.003631,-24.395166,70.171555,14.33448,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>저 목만 가볍게 베어버리면 돼. 그러면 저 역겨운 입에서 고통스러운 신음만 나오게 할 수 있다고.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012437,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="71.206848,551.341797,144.602112,-0.003631,-24.395166,70.171555,14.33448,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9187F2",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="You can easily slit this creature's throat and make its detestable lips gurgle and whimper in pain.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9187F2",
	},
	[11012438]={
		["Camera"]="75.797852,583.980957,214.383362,0.000147,-30.600645,-100.449409,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="(또…… 목소리가! 왜 하필 이 타이밍에……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012438,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Angry01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="74.802673,578.584473,211.163635,0.000148,-30.400604,-100.449409,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91881C",
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}},\
\9PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Sigh_Start\"},Duration{5}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(It's... that voice again! Why now...?)",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91881C",
	},
	[11012439]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(이성을 유지하려 노력한다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012439,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918846",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Try to stay rational)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918846",
	},
	[11012440]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(목소리가 인도하는 대로 칼을 향해 손을 뻗는다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012440,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918870",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Follow the voice and reach for the sword)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918870",
	},
	[11012441]={
		["Camera"]="-14.277161,350.584961,146.904907,0.000382,-2.397157,67.148865,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="왜 갑자기 말이 없어? 방금까지만 해도 잘난 척하면서 혼자 잘 떠드시더니 갑자기 벙어리가 되셨네?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012441,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91889A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012442,
		["Scripts"]="\
SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Why suddenly so quiet? You seemed ready to lecture me. Cat got your tongue, honey?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91889A",
	},
	[11012442]={
		["Camera"]="69.305481,533.301758,168.266022,0.000427,-19.797787,-103.259354,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>난 네 안의 가장 오래된 영혼이자, 너 자신 내면 깊숙한 곳의 충동일 뿐이니까. 날 거부하지 말고 잘 봐. 네가 이렇게 강해진 건 모두 나 덕분이니까.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012442,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="63.17865,509.941895,160.034912,0.000434,-18.397823,-102.660294,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9188C4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012443,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="I am the origin of your soul, the impulse within the deepest recesses of your mind. Do not refuse me... Listen — I am the one who gave you power and made you invincible in battle.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9188C4",
	},
	[11012443]={
		["Camera"]="63.17865,509.941895,160.034912,0.000434,-18.397823,-102.660294,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>검을 뽑아. 너의 그 날카로운 검을.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012443,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="63.17865,509.941895,160.034912,0.000438,-45.397362,-112.458748,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9188EE",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Unsheathe your sword, the one that bears the killing razor.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9188EE",
	},
	[11012444]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",

	[11012445]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(목소리가 인도하는 대로 칼을 뽑으려고 한다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012445,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918942",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Follow the voice and try to draw the sword)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918942",
	},
	[11012446]={
		["Camera"]="53.254211,413.618652,137.893188,0.000421,0.805348,80.333221,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="어서 맞춰봐, 맞춰보라니까! 물론 맞춰도 맞는지 안 알려 줄거지만!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012446,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="55.282471,425.526367,138.062866,0.000421,0.805348,80.333221,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91896C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012447,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Go on, make your guess — any guess would do, because I won't tell you the truth anyway!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B91896C",
	},
	[11012447]={
		["Camera"]="40.759521,367.240234,187.191528,0.000443,-47.594418,80.529449,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>뭘 망설이는 거야! 어서 칼을 휘둘러! 칼이 피와 살의 달콤함과 기쁨을 갈망하는 소리가 들리지 않아?</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012447,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="31.787292,313.454102,246.897583,0.000443,-47.594418,80.529449,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918996",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012448,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Do not hesitate! Use your sword! It's calling to you! It thirsts for the sweet joy that can only be sated by flesh and blood.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918996",
	},
	[11012448]={
		["Camera"]="27.323547,292.583984,261.073975,0.000452,-34.594013,81.126724,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>어서! 저 미친 여자를 닥치게 하라고!</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012448,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="32.356995,324.825195,238.567291,0.000452,-34.594013,81.126724,19.90061,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9189C0",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Quick! Silence this mad lass for good!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B9189C0",
	},
	[11012449]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",

		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,

	},
	[11012450]={
		["Camera"]="103.995544,480.992676,146.073059,0.0,-2.000214,-155.653473,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(목소리가 인도하는 대로 칼을 휘두른다.)",
