	},
	[11012451]={
		["Camera"]="77.402893,599.605469,434.362213,0.00044,-66.19149,-100.658791,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="닥쳐!! 입 다물라고!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012451,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="112.763733,691.101562,749.622009,0.000302,-74.590828,-104.858871,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918A3E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012452,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="ENOUGH!!! Shut up!!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.1,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918A3E",
	},
	[11012452]={
		["Camera"]="-55.615479,263.875977,320.699982,0.001617,-34.205566,68.34333,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 닥치면 되잖아. 뭘 그렇게 화를 내!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012452,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918A68",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012453,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110015},TargetPoint{\"fix14_03\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110015:n(110022)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="...Okay, looks like somebody needs anger management here.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918A68",
	},
	[11012453]={
		["Camera"]="51.083435,754.490234,236.146576,0.001538,-23.201229,-82.837135,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 레온, 저 여자, 자결하지 못하도록 잘 감시해. 온전하게 데려가야 하니까. 필요하면 프랭크의 목숨으로 협박해도 돼.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012453,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="51.083435,754.490234,236.146576,0.001536,-21.801144,-77.636307,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918A92",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110015)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012454,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Leon, keep a close watch on her. Bring her back in one piece, and make sure she doesn't harm herself. Use Frank as leverage if necessary.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918A92",
	},
	[11012454]={
		["Camera"]="-66.782776,436.404785,190.778076,0.001528,-15.001123,7.163672,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="예, 알겠습니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012454,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918ABC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012455,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110015:Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918ABC",
	},
	[11012455]={
		["Camera"]="223.074341,171.670898,171.84671,0.00152,-9.200531,105.165863,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012455,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918AE6",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110009:n(110015)",
			[2]="110015:n(110009)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012456,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
LookAt{_delay{1},LookAtDescription{\"110009:n(110022)\"}}\
\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918AE6",
	},
	[11012456]={
		["Camera"]="73.607178,353.802246,147.390198,0.001516,-3.800781,89.763344,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="포대로 갈 때 내가 은혜는 절대 잊지 않을 거라고 말했던 거 기억해?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012456,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918B10",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012457,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Remember what I said back on our way to the turret? \"Your kindness will reap a just reward.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918B10",
	},
	[11012457]={
		["Camera"]="73.607178,353.802246,147.390198,0.001516,-3.800781,89.763344,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["ContentKR"]="잠시 귀 좀 가까이 대 봐. 너한테만 해 줄 말이 있어서 그래. 걱정하지 마, 아까 몸수색도 했잖아. 이번엔 진짜 숨겨둔 무기 같은 건 없으니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012457,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="73.732483,384.226562,145.475586,0.001516,-3.600766,89.763336,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918B3A",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:n(110009)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012458,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Lend me your ear. I've got a secret that's just for you. Rest assured, you've just frisked me. I am really out of weapons.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Explain01_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918B3A",
	},
	[11012458]={
		["Camera"]="56.10968,455.893066,141.847839,0.00152,-1.800991,77.361992,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너한테 엄청 중요한 얘기일 텐데, 정말 안 들을 거야?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012458,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918B64",
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{3},TargetPosition{\"162.912354,662.755859,159.478699,0.001558,-8.20068,-123.830544,31.563139,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="It may be extremely important to you. You sure you don't want to hear it?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918B64",
	},
	[11012459]={
		["ContentKR"]="안 듣는다",
		["DialogueId"]=11012459,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918B8E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Refuse to hear",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918B8E",
	},
	[11012460]={
		["Camera"]="368.190308,599.033691,186.266266,0.001516,-12.60079,-158.632828,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="레온, 저 여자 입 막아.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012460,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="372.338745,588.361328,186.266083,0.001515,-13.200747,-159.232849,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918BB8",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110015)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012461,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"fix14_04\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110009)\"}}\
\9\9\9\9\9}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Leon, shut her up.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918BB8",
	},
	[11012461]={
		["Camera"]="154.981201,214.890625,189.154327,0.001518,-13.000943,96.966736,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="히히, 그래, 알았어. 부디 네 선택을 후회하지 않길 바라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012461,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918BE2",
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{5}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Hehe, fine. I hope you won't regret your choice.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Explain01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918BE2",
	},
	[11012462]={
		["ContentKR"]="듣는다",
		["DialogueId"]=11012462,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B918C0C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Hear her out",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918C0C",
	},
	[11012463]={
		["Camera"]="73.177124,392.162598,149.657959,0.001535,-10.600801,89.366707,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<W>너희 군단 안에 네 목숨을 노리는 사람이 또 있어.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012463,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="72.936951,370.398926,153.731689,0.001535,-10.600801,89.366707,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B918C36",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012464,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{ActorId{110009},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{5}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Someone in your Legion wants you dead.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918C36",
	},
	[11012464]={
		["Camera"]="162.912354,662.755859,159.478699,0.001558,-8.20068,-123.830544,31.563139,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="뭐라고?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012464,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Angry01"],
		["GUID"]="1B918C60",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012465,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What did you say?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918C60",
	},
	[11012465]={
		["Camera"]="73.177124,392.162598,149.657959,0.001535,-10.600801,89.366707,24.800102,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="딱 한 마디만 한다고 했잖아. 후훗…… 행운을 빌게, 우리 대장 나리.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012465,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="1B918C8A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Secrets are meant to be whispered once. Take care, sir.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110009:Think_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918C8A",
	},
	[11012466]={
		["ContentKR"]="뭐야? 갑자기 마음이 바뀌어서 무슨 말인지 듣고 싶어진 거야?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012466,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918CB4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012467,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="You're back, honey. Changed your mind already? Desperate to hear out the secret?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918CB4",
	},
	[11012467]={
		["ContentKR"]="근데 어쩌지? 지금은 영 말할 기분이 아닌데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012467,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918CDE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Sorry to disappoint, but I'm no longer in the mood for sharing.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918CDE",
	},
	[11012468]={
		["ContentKR"]="분명 더 궁금한 게 있겠지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012468,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918D08",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012469,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="I know what you want, honey.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918D08",
	},
	[11012469]={
		["ContentKR"]="근데 어쩌지? 이 불쌍한 죄인은 이제 말할 기분이 아니라서 말이야~",
		["DialogueId"]=11012469,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B918D32",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="But I'm just a poor little captive now, not in the mood to talk.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110124/1B918D32",
	},
	[11012501]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>그렇지, 바로 그렇게…… 칼자루를 꽉 쥐는 거야. 그래, 잘했어. 이제 목을 겨냥하고……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012501,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B919272",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012502,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="That's right — you've made the right choice. Grip the hilt tightly. Yes, just like that. Now aim at the creature's throat...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B919272",
	},
	[11012502]={
		["ContentKR"]="너…… 너 미쳤어?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91929C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012503,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Are... Are you insane?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B91929C",
	},
	[11012503]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>옳지, 망설이지 말고 찔러.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012503,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9192C6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012504,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, do it. Do not hesitate.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B9192C6",
	},
	[11012504]={
		["ContentKR"]="아…… 으아아아악!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9192F0",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/kill\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="Ahhh... Ahhhhhh!!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B9192F0",
	},
	[11012505]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}…… 세상에, 무슨 짓이야!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91931A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012506,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...My god, what have you done!?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B91931A",
	},
	[11012506]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>저 사람도 같이 보내 버려. 너한테 있어 족쇄일 뿐이잖아.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012506,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B919344",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012507,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="This one too. The old fool is just dead weight.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B919344",
	},
	[11012507]={
		["ContentKR"]="으흑…… 컥, 커헉!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012507,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91936E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012508,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/kill\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Argh... Arrrgh...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B91936E",
	},
	[11012508]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>다른 놈들도……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012508,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B919398",
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}},\
PlayNormalSound{_delay{2},EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/kill\"},PlayAs2D{true}}\
}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="And the others too...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B919398",
	},
	[11012509]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>그렇지! 필요 없는 이성은 집어 치우고 내 인도를 따라……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11012509,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9193C2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012510,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}},\
PlayNormalSound{_delay{2},EventPath{\"eevent:/sfx/common/story/ex01/kill\"},PlayAs2D{true}}\
}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="That's right! Forget about meaningless reason. Just follow my lead...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B9193C2",
	},
	[11012510]={
		["ContentKR"]="대장님! 아바르 중령님! \
대장이 미쳤습니다! \
오지 마십시오! 살려 줘! \
멈추라고! 안 돼!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012510,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9193EC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012601,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{_delay{4},EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/kill\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["Subtitle"]="Captain! Commander Avar! The Captain's gone mad! Stay away from me! Help! STOP! NOOOO!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110125/1B9193EC",
	},
	[11012601]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 게 고요해졌다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A2DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012602,
		["Subtitle"]="Everything fell silent.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A2DA",
	},
	[11012602]={
		["ContentKR"]="아니, 완전히 고요해진 건 아니다. 소란스러운 소리가 내 양손을 타고 천천히 흐르고 있을 뿐이다. 뚝, 뚝.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A304",
		["Subtitle"]="No, not dead silent. It's just that every noise had coalesced into a warmth flowing down my arms, dripping to the floor.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A304",
	},
	[11012603]={
		["ContentKR"]="이건 쏜살같이 흐르는 시간의 발소리이자 생명의 울부짖음이다. 양수 속 태아의 심장 박동 소리이며 내 마음속에 봉인된 오랜 메아리다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A32E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012604,
		["Subtitle"]="It was the sound of passing time, the roar of life that once was, the heartbeat of an embryo, and an ancient echo sealed deeply within my heart.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A32E",
	},
	[11012604]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 영원한 소리와 하나가 된 것 같은 기분이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A358",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012605,
		["Subtitle"]="I felt as though I had become one with this primal voice.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A358",
	},
	[11012605]={
		["ContentKR"]="뚝, 뚝.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012605,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A382",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/blood\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["Subtitle"]="Plop... Plop... Plop...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A382",
	},
	[11012607]={
		["Camera"]="74.723572,543.212402,144.459839,0.00008,-4.400049,-104.610237,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012607,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Pain01"],
		["GUID"]="1B91A3D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012608,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="AARGH...!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A3D6",
	},
	[11012608]={
		["Camera"]="61.194885,357.783203,157.238953,0.000008,-6.999967,84.794708,25.707079,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="뭐야, 갑자기 소리는 왜 지르는 거야, 깜짝 놀랐잖아!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012608,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Angry02"],
		["GUID"]="1B91A400",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012609,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110009,
		["Subtitle"]="What's gotten into you? You scared me!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110009:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A400",
	},
	[11012609]={
		["Camera"]="74.723572,543.212402,144.459839,0.00008,-4.400049,-104.610237,22.483778,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(방금 그건…… 환각이었나……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012609,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B91A42A",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Were those just... an illusion...?)",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A42A",
	},
	[11012610]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 일을 다 끝낸 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012610,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91A42B",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Is everything done?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110126/1B91A42B",
	},
	[11012701]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="당장은 풀비스의 지원군이 금방 도착하길 기대하긴 힘들 것 같군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012701,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["GUID"]="1B91B342",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110016:n(110010)",
			[2]="110015:n(110010)",
			[3]="110020:n(110010)",
			[4]="110026:n(110010)",
			[5]="110024:n(110010)",
			[6]="110009:n(110010)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012702,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{MoveTo{ActorId{110016},TargetPoint{\"pNpcmove1541\"},MoveSpeed{100},Visibility{\"Show\"}},TurnTo{_skip{false},TurnToDescription{\"110016:n(110010)\"}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I doubt Fulvis will bring reinforcements anytime soon.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Disagree"],
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110015:n(110010)",
			[2]="110020:n(110010)",
			[3]="110026:n(110010)",
			[4]="110024:n(110010)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B342",
	},
	[11012702]={
		["Camera"]="-276.886139,193.092285,106.6297,0.0,0.0,-7.715736,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="최종 목표인 중앙 관제실이 바로 앞에 있습니다. 계속 전진해야 되겠습니까? 동맹의 '연락책'은 그 안에 있을 텐데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B36C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012703,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="The central control room is just ahead. Should we push forward? The Messenger of The Forsakens might be inside...",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110016)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B36C",
	},
	[11012703]={
		["Camera"]="-276.886139,193.092285,106.6297,0.0,0.0,-7.715736,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="다만 저 여자 같은 매복이 얼마나 더 있을지 모른다는 문제가 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012703,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B396",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm not sure how many assassins like her are waiting for us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B396",
	},
	[11012704]={
		["Camera"]="28.438263,122.493164,96.427307,0.0,0.0,-33.314411,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="맞습니다. 자칫하다간 저희나 여기 모두가 죽을 수도 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012704,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B3C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012705,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110022:n(110016)\"}},LookAt{_delay{1},LookAtDescription{\"110022:n(110022)\"}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, death is a real possibility — for you, me, and probably all of us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B3C0",
	},
	[11012705]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11012705,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B3EA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012706,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{\
_skip{false},_delay{0},_nowait{true},ActorId{110020},TargetPoint{\"pAimamove15\"},MoveSpeed{50},Visibility{\"Show\"}\
},\
MoveTo{\
_skip{false},_delay{0},_nowait{true},ActorId{110024},TargetPoint{\"pNpcmove152\"},MoveSpeed{50},Visibility{\"Show\"}\
},\
MoveTo{\
_skip{false},_delay{0},_nowait{true},ActorId{110025},TargetPoint{\"pNpcmove153\"},MoveSpeed{100},Visibility{\"Show\"}\
}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110010:p(-60)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B3EA",
	},
	[11012706]={
		["Camera"]="39.968369,-1411.875488,335.425446,0.000002,-6.999967,89.278366,25.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="제13군단의 남은 병사들은 잘 들어라. 저 앞이 바로 론샤 요새의 중추이자 이번 임무의 최종 목표인 중앙 관제실이다…… 공을 세워 휘페르보레아 제국에 영광을 바칠 기회이기도 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012706,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="39.968369,-1256.0,335.425446,0.000002,-6.999967,89.278366,25.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="1B91B414",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012707,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Angry01_Start\"},Duration{5}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Angry01_End\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Soldiers of the 13th Legion! Before us lies the central control room of Lonza Fortress, the ultimate goal of this mission. This is our chance to claim glory for Hyperborea.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B414",
	},
	[11012707]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 미안하게도, 난 제일 큰 공을 너희한테 양보할 생각이 없다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012707,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B43E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012708,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="However, I must apologize, as I won't be giving you the lion's share of this victory.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B43E",
	},
	[11012708]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그, 그게 무슨 말씀이십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012708,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B468",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012709,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="...Huh?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B468",
	},
	[11012709]={
		["Camera"]="-551.52771,-179.0,73.564819,0.0,0.0,33.487602,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이번 작전은 지금까지 공도 세웠지만 위험이 함께했지. 물론 위험한 상황이 더 많았지만.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012709,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-551.52771,-201.0,73.564819,0.0,0.0,33.487602,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="1B91B492",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110020)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012710,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="With glory comes great danger, and this action is more dangerous than ever.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B492",
	},
	[11012710]={
		["Camera"]="591.42688,-206.899414,74.848633,0.000001,0.0,139.685715,25.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="너희는 젊고 앞날이 창창하니, 영광을 누릴 기회는 많을 것이다. 이번 공은 내가 가져가야겠어. 나 혼자 들어가서 훈장 하나 더 달 생각이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012710,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="591.42688,-164.0,74.848633,0.000001,0.0,139.685715,25.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="1B91B4BC",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012711,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You're young, with many years ahead. There will be other opportunities for glory. But today, the old man here will seek one more medal, and he isn't keen on sharing it with any of you.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B4BC",
	},
	[11012711]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="너희는 여기서 포대를 지키다가 내가 연락이 끊기면 중앙 관제실을 계속 포격해. 절대 무리하게 나서지 말고 후속 지원을 기다려라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012711,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B4E6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012712,
		["Scripts"]="LookAt{_delay{2},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110020)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Stay at your posts by the turret. If you lose contact with me, continue to shell the control room from a distance and wait for reinforcements. Do not assault it directly.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B4E6",
	},
	[11012712]={
		["Camera"]="-276.886139,193.092285,106.6297,0.0,0.0,-7.715736,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="중령님, 혼자서는 안 됩니다…… 진심으로 말씀하시는 게 아니라는 것 다 알고 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012712,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B510",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110010:n(110010)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012713,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar, you can't do this alone... I know you didn't mean what you just said.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110016)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B510",
	},
	[11012713]={
		["Camera"]="569.201416,-45.750488,111.6073,0.0,0.0,144.285187,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="진심이고 자시고, 이건 명령이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012713,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B53A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012714,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="What are you talking about? I just simply gave you orders.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B53A",
	},
	[11012714]={
		["Camera"]="760.296936,55.916992,131.968933,0.0,-0.600005,64.076653,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="쳇, 허세는……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012714,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B564",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110009:n(110015)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012715,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Tsk, pretentious old geezer.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B564",
	},
	[11012715]={
		["Camera"]="370.016266,-80.672363,100.168213,0.0,0.0,143.474762,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="뭘 걱정하는지 아는데, 난 이런 일을 많이 겪었다. 죽음을 각오하고 잘난 척하는 상관을 보면서, 나도 너희처럼 눈물지으며 못난 모습을 보였었지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012715,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B58E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012716,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Agree\"},Duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I understand your concerns, but I've been through a lot things like this. I was once like you, young and tearful, thinking my commanding officer had a death wish.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B58E",
	},
	[11012716]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 상관은 멀쩡히 돌아왔다. 그러니까 걱정할 것 없다. 벽난로 옆에서 뜨개질하며 너희를 기다리시는 어머니를 생각해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012716,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B5B8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012717,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But he always returned safely. So I'm telling you that there's no need to worry. Think of your mother, probably by the fireplace knitting a sweater, waiting for you to come home.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B5B8",
	},
	[11012717]={
		["Camera"]="212.663971,275.65625,139.028748,0.000007,-4.999999,-152.322205,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="중령님은 늘 저를 보살펴 주셨고 방금도 제 목숨을 구해 주셨습니다. 어머니가 여기 계셨어도 죽음을 두려워 말고 중령님을 따라 휘페르보레아 제국의 전사답게 목숨을 걸고 제국을 지키라고 말씀하셨을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012717,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B5E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012718,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar, you've always looked out for me, and you just saved my life. Even if my mother were here, she would say, \"Follow your officer, do not fear death. You're a Hyperborean warrior and you're supposed to defend the Empire with your life.\"",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110020)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B5E2",
	},
	[11012718]={
		["Camera"]="-324.312103,-274.160645,96.635254,0.0,0.0,59.474545,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="죽음을 두려워하는 게 아니다. 그저 무의미하게 죽을까봐, 그것이 두려운 거지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012718,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B60C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012719,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's not about fearing death. I just don't want any lives lost in vain.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B60C",
	},
	[11012719]={
		["Camera"]="68.330086,152.115723,93.672241,0.0,0.0,-48.925529,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="무의미하지 않을 겁니다. 우리가 한 발 전진하면 전선도 한 발 전진하니 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012719,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B636",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012720,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It won't be in vain. Every step we take pushes the frontline forward.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B636",
	},
	[11012720]={
		["Camera"]="68.330086,152.115723,93.672241,0.0,0.0,-48.925529,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 우리에게 이후의 상황을 '알 수 없다'는 건 '생환'도 가능하다는 뜻입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012720,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B660",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012721,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{3}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="And since we don't know what lies before us, it means that survival is also a possibility.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B660",
	},
	[11012721]={
		["Camera"]="-21.304375,68.000977,93.658936,0.0,0.0,-7.125434,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="저도 '그리핀' 소대의 일원입니다. {nickname2} 대장님 말씀에 따르겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012721,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B68A",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110016:n(110022)",
			[2]="110022:n(110016)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012722,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm a Griffin and I stand with Captain .",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B68A",
	},
	[11012722]={
		["Camera"]="713.723511,115.799316,138.375671,0.0,0.0,8.475199,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="저도 똑똑히 들었습니다! 저도 {nickname2} 대장 말을 따르겠습니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012722,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B6B4",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110015:n(110022)",
			[2]="110022:n(110010)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012723,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Yeah! I heard that loud and clear this time! I stand with Captain !",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B6B4",
	},
	[11012723]={
		["Camera"]="370.016266,-80.672363,100.168213,0.0,0.0,143.474762,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11012723,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B6DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012724,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B6DE",
	},
	[11012724]={
		["Camera"]="370.016266,-80.672363,100.168213,0.0,0.0,143.474762,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="……{nickname2}(이)가 있다면, 아까 그 실력으로 봤을 때…… 확실히…… 승산이 없는 것도 아니야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012724,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B708",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012725,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...Well, since we have , maybe {性别2:he|she} does have what it takes to lead us to victory.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B708",
	},
	[11012725]={
		["Camera"]="48.0037,403.117188,141.462952,0.000005,-6.0,-78.92424,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="예. 모두 준비해라. 준비가 끝나면 바로 출발한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012725,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B732",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012726,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Alright, prepare yourselves. We set off together.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B732",
	},
	[11012726]={
		["Camera"]="370.016266,-80.672363,100.168213,0.0,0.0,143.474762,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="허, 이젠 상관 말도 다 뺏는구나.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012726,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B75C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012727,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Heh, you've even learned how to take over your commander's speech.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Confident_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B75C",
	},
	[11012727]={
		["Camera"]="-21.304375,68.000977,93.658936,0.0,0.0,-7.125434,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아니면 일단 이 여자 입부터 연 후에 출발하는 건 어떻습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012727,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B786",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012728,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="Maybe we could wait for a while to gather more intel from this lass first—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B786",
	},
	[11012728]={
		["Camera"]="760.296936,55.916992,131.968933,0.0,-0.600005,64.076653,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="뭐? 날 심문하겠다고?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012728,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B7B0",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110009:n(110016)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11012729,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh? Are you going to interrogate me?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B7B0",
	},
	[11012729]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아니. 저 여자가 얼마나 교활한지 다들 봤잖아. 정보를 들어봤자 우리 판단만 흐릴 뿐이야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012729,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B7DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012730,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="No. I've seen how crafty this girl is. Her \"intel\" will only mess with our judgment.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B7DA",
	},
	[11012730]={
		["Camera"]="159.350952,12.51709,113.6073,0.0,0.0,116.685173,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이렇게 하지. 두 팀으로 나눠서 움직이자. 나와 {nickname2}, 우리 둘이 먼저 조사할 테니 나머지는 준비하고 있다가 공격 신호를 받으면 바로 출발해. 단 후퇴 신호가 보이면 바로 후퇴해서 4호 포대를 지킨다. 레온은 남아서 포로들을 감시하도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012730,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91B804",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012731,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Here's the plan: we split into two groups.  and I will scout ahead. The rest prepare and initiate the assault upon our signal. If we call it off, retreat to Turret 4. Leon, you stay back and guard the captives.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B804",
	},
	[11012731]={
		["Camera"]="39.968369,-1256.0,335.425446,0.000002,-6.999967,89.278366,25.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="예!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012731,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B82E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012732,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_All",
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B82E",
	},
	[11012732]={
		["Camera"]="52.865227,-8.727539,121.6073,0.0,0.0,89.285393,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="가자. 포세이큰 동맹 놈들이 또 어떤 서프라이즈를 준비했을지 궁금하군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012732,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91B858",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's move, and see what surprises The Forsakens have prepared for us.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:p(180)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110127/1B91B858",
	},
	[11012801]={
		["Camera"]="104.0,7.739258,139.0,0.0,0.0,128.999893,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="다친 곳은 괜찮습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="113.477051,7.739258,139.0,0.0,0.0,128.999924,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="1B91C3AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You're injured, are you alright?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C3AA",
	},
	[11012802]={
		["Camera"]="113.477051,7.739258,139.0,0.0,0.0,128.999924,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="작은 상처일 뿐이야, 좀 쉬면 괜찮아. 잘 쳐줘도 길고양이랑 다를 게 없는걸. 공격은 무슨, 손에 든 총으로 자기 발이나 안 찧으면 다행이지……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C3D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012803,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{TurnTo{TurnToDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{3}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk03_End\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Just a scratch; it'll heal soon. That little girl was just bluffing. Even a stray cat would've put up a better fight.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Explain01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C3D4",
	},
	[11012803]={
		["Camera"]="113.477051,7.739258,139.0,0.0,0.0,128.999924,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아니, 어디 갔지? 분명 여기 뒀던 것 같은데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C3FE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012804,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Ugh, where did it go? I thought I had it right here...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C3FE",
	},
	[11012804]={
		["Camera"]="-57.621643,470.810059,166.302124,0.000003,-3.999943,-84.199791,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 뭐라도 잃어버리셨습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012804,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C428",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012805,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Lost something important?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Think_End",
			[2]="110022:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C428",
	},
	[11012805]={
		["Camera"]="113.477051,7.739258,139.0,0.0,0.0,128.999924,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="별건 아니고, 그냥 사진. 넌 어서 가서 저 여자애나 심문해 봐. 널 노리고 온 것 같던데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C452",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Just a mere photo. Why don't you go interrogate that girl? She seems to be after you.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Disagree",
			[2]="110022:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C452",
	},
	[11012806]={
		["Camera"]="-25.785645,274.145508,142.302124,0.000004,-2.999996,-80.799667,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="(사진? 혹시 찾을 수도 있으니 잘 살펴봐야겠네.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11012806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C47C",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(A photo? Maybe I should have a look around for it when I can.)",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C47C",
	},
	[11012807]={
		["ContentKR"]="도대체 어디로 간 거지……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012807,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C4A6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012808,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Where could it be...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C4A6",
	},
	[11012808]={
		["ContentKR"]="음? 바닥에 뭔가 있는데 설마……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012808,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C4D0",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Hmm? What's that on the floor...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C4D0",
	},
	[11012809]={
		["ContentKR"]="이건, 젊은 시절의 교관님과…… 다프네?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012809,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:showpic;dir:Texture2D'/Game/UI/Texture/Dynamic/Image/Guide/T_Guide_Ex01_Pic.T_Guide_Ex01_Pic'}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C4FA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012810,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It's a younger Sir Avar with… Daphne?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C4FA",
	},
	[11012810]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 교관님께 돌려드려야겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012810,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C524",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I should take it back to Sir Avar.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C524",
	},
	[11012811]={
		["Camera"]="516.956909,565.548828,-317.148438,0.000076,-5.00034,-19.779175,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="참, 방금 이걸 주웠는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012811,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="505.877869,569.530762,-316.076965,0.000076,-5.200349,-19.779173,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C54E",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)","[2] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012812,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, I found this...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C54E",
	},
	[11012812]={
		["Camera"]="573.138245,631.430176,-287.933014,0.00008,-8.000487,-142.579651,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="오! 네가 주웠구나. 고맙다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012812,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="600.062866,652.03125,-304.734009,0.000082,-3.400478,-141.980698,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C578",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012813,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, you found it! Thanks for bringing it back.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Agree",
			[2]="110022:Give",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C578",
	},
	[11012813]={
		["Camera"]="498.335205,550.260742,-332.473572,0.000083,1.399936,-11.381549,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네가 교관님의……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012813,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="482.41803,553.464844,-332.825806,0.000083,0.199926,-11.382158,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C5A2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012814,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="So, is Daphne your...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C5A2",
	},
	[11012814]={
		["Camera"]="701.11969,551.572266,-324.111938,0.000082,-0.599581,-170.97052,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 그래. 예전에 우리 옆집에 살았지. 하하……",
		["DialogueId"]=11012814,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="671.47229,546.860352,-324.425903,0.000082,-0.599581,-170.97052,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C5CC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012815,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk01_Start\"},Duration{3}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk01_End\"},Duration{2}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, ah... She is just my neighbour's little girl. Haha...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C5CC",
	},
	[11012815]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 됐다, 솔직히 말하지. 다프네는 내 딸이야. 네가 생각한 게 맞아.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012815,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C5F6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012816,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...I suppose it's time for the truth — You're right. Daphne is my daughter.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C5F6",
	},
	[11012816]={
		["ContentKR"]="말하고 나니 민망하군. 이건 그 아이와 함께 찍은 마지막 사진이지…… 얼마 후에 아이 엄마가 다프네를 데리고 떠났거든. '세오도어'라는 성도 제 엄마 성을 따른 거지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012816,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C620",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012817,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="This is the last photo we took together before she and her mother left. Daphne took the last name \"Theodore\" from her mother.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C620",
	},
	[11012817]={
		["ContentKR"]="이건 비밀로 해 줘. 다프네가 내 딸인 걸 감추기 위해 이혼한 거거든.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012817,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C64A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012818,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't tell anyone about this. We divorced specifically to keep people from knowing that Daphne is my daughter.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C64A",
	},
	[11012818]={
		["ContentKR"]="수석 연금술사가 다프네를 무척 마음에 들어 하면서 그 아이가 미래에 제국 최고의 연금술사가 될 거라고 하더군. 이미 더 이상 학생을 받지 않겠다고 선언했는데도 다프네를 위해 그 말을 번복할 정도였으니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012818,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C674",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012819,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The chief alchemist thinks very highly of Daphne and believes she has what it takes to become the Empire's top alchemist. He'd sworn off taking more apprentices, but he made an exception for this kid.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C674",
	},
	[11012819]={
		["Camera"]="517.877747,597.183594,-340.196655,0.000097,3.795495,-30.984356,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네가 천재라서 말입니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012819,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="490.818176,613.429199,-342.2901,0.000097,2.995489,-30.784616,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C69E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012820,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Because of Daphne's talent?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C69E",
	},
	[11012820]={
		["Camera"]="543.789429,659.168457,-320.966675,0.0001,2.395149,-128.980087,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그 아이가 연금술에 재능이 있는 건 사실이지만, 소드 연금원에 넘쳐 나는 게 천재이지 않은가. 수석 연금술사 말로는 다프네에게 다른 이들에겐 없는 특별한 무언가가 있다고 하더군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012820,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="581.446167,615.759766,-320.966675,0.000096,2.795146,-147.378418,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C6C8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012821,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="She's talented, but it's more than that. The Spathatoi is never short on talent. The chief alchemist said Daphne has a unique gift that sets her apart.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C6C8",
	},
	[11012821]={
		["ContentKR"]="나도 그게 뭔지는 잘 모르겠지만 명확한 건 다프네의 장래가 밝다는 거야. 그러니까 아이의 앞날에 카론 아버지가 걸림돌이 되면 안 된다고…… 아이 엄마는 생각했던 거지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012821,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C6F2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012822,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Talk01_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I don't quite understand what he meant by that, but it's clear that Daphne has a promising future. So, we must not let a Charon father stand in her way — at least that's what her mother thought.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C6F2",
	},
	[11012822]={
		["Camera"]="536.272278,461.708008,-325.316711,0.000097,-0.20425,30.823881,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네도 알고 있습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012822,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="512.302368,447.352051,-334.868164,0.000097,2.395682,30.625114,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C71C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012823,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Does Daphne know?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C71C",
	},
	[11012823]={
		["Camera"]="809.165527,708.029785,-354.017395,0.00011,2.594973,-143.373062,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="모르지. 어릴 때부터 나를 많이 따랐는데, 어떻게 그런 말을 할 수 있겠어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012823,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="796.531982,613.89502,-333.871948,0.00011,0.194872,-158.972031,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C746",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012824,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="No. She has a heart of gold and adores her old man. How can I tell her?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Disagree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C746",
	},
	[11012824]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래서 내가 아내와 자식을 버린 나쁜 아빠인 척했지. 다프네가 길에서 날 아빠라고 부를 때면 \"조용히 해. 어디서 아빠라고 부르며 친한 척이야. 중령님이라고 불러\"라고 꾸짖곤 했지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012824,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C770",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012825,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="So, I play the part of a bad father who's done with family life. And when Daphne calls me dad, I tell her, \"Zip it. I'm not your father. Address me as your superior officer.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C770",
	},
	[11012825]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 너무 철이 일찍 들어서 그런지, 나한테 아쉬운 소리 한번 못하고 혼자 힘들어하더군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012825,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C79A",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11012826,
			[2]=11012829,
		},
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"488.291199,554.584961,-332.441101,0.000108,1.19514,-12.372578,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But Daphne's such a sweet kid. She couldn't bring herself to curse at me, and always ended up blaming herself instead.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C79A",
	},
	[11012826]={
		["ContentKR"]="사실 다프네는 연금원을 좋아하지 않습니다. 다프네 생각도 물어보셨어야 합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012826,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C7C4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012827,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Actually, she doesn't like the Academy. Perhaps you and the missus should also take her preferences into consideration.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C7C4",
	},
	[11012827]={
		["Camera"]="600.402588,599.958984,-324.47052,0.000104,3.994984,-154.577316,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나도 알고 있어. 다프네가 제 엄마 말도 무시하고, 나 몰래 풀비스에게 신청서를 제출하면서까지 이 론샤 특별 행동대로 왔다는 건, 그만큼 연금원에 있기 싫었다는 거겠지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012827,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="608.752625,577.323242,-324.47052,0.000104,3.394877,-162.175476,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C7EE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012828,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I knew about that already. Daphne volunteered to join the Lonza Fortress mission and refused to be dissuaded by her mother. She even submitted her application to Fulvis behind my back. That girl was dead set on quitting the Academy.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C7EE",
	},
	[11012828]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 돌아가면, 아이 엄마와 잘 얘기해 봐야지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012828,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C818",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012830,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...I'll talk to her mother about this when we return.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C818",
	},
	[11012829]={
		["ContentKR"]="너무 많은 걸 희생하신 것 같습니다…… 정말 고생 많으셨겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012829,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91C842",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012830,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You've made a huge sacrifice... You're a good father.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C842",
	},
	[11012830]={
		["Camera"]="608.752625,577.323242,-324.47052,0.000104,3.394877,-162.175476,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="……나는 오히려 다프네가 나를 더 미워했으면 좋겠는데 말이지. 적어도 그렇게 하면 그 아이 마음은 좀 더 편해질 수 있을 테니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012830,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="613.874512,547.90918,-324.47052,0.000105,3.394788,-170.973236,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C86C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012831,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...I'd rather her resent me if it spares her any pain.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C86C",
	},
	[11012831]={
		["ContentKR"]="휴, 무사히 복귀할 수 있다면 함께 공연이라도 보러 가야겠군. 난 병사 출신이라 젊을 땐 말단 병사 주머니로는 오페라 하우스 한 번 못 데려갔거든. 그때 못해준 걸 다 해주고 싶은데 말이지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012831,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C896",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012832,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="If we make it back, I'll take her to the opera house. When I was just a grunt, I never got the chance to take her to any fancy places. I guess it's time to make it up to her.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Sigh_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C896",
	},
	[11012832]={
		["ContentKR"]="디즈마니아에 북쪽 코퀴투스에서 왔다는 새로운 공연이 열린다던데, 설국 뭐라더라…… 나중에 표 한 장 더 살 테니 같이 보러 가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012832,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91C8C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012833,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I heard there's a new show in Dismania, coming from the northern province of Cocytus. It's called \"something... in the Snowfield\"... You know what — why don't you come along? I'll buy an extra ticket.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C8C0",
	},
	[11012833]={
		["Camera"]="500.397156,570.856934,-340.374207,0.000109,3.594865,-17.773417,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="좋습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012833,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="490.545166,574.012207,-341.02417,0.000109,3.194855,-18.173622,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91C8EA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sure.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110128/1B91C8EA",
	},
	[11012901]={
		["ContentKR"]="보통 놈들이 아니다, 조심해!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D412",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="These ones are tough to deal with. Be cautious!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D412",
	},
	[11012902]={
		["ContentKR"]="매복이다! 방어 태세!",
		["DialogueId"]=11012902,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D43C",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Awa_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012903,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's an ambush! Defend yourselves!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D43C",
	},
	[11012903]={
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐, 장치가 가동을 안 하잖아?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012903,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D466",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012904,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait... The defence system here is off?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D466",
	},
	[11012904]={
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 관제실에 아무도 없는데…… 포세이큰의 '연락책'은 벌써 철수한 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012904,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D490",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The central control room is empty... Has the Messenger left already?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D490",
	},
	[11012905]={
		["Camera"]="39.005341,-496.773438,249.36821,0.005568,-6.569091,85.39138,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 여기 뭔가 이상해. 요새 원래 설계도에 따르면, 중앙 관제실은 핵심 시설이라 최고 수준의 방어 시스템을 갖추고 있어. 심지어 자폭 장치까지 있다고 알고 있는데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012905,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="48.08194,-384.173828,236.35968,0.005568,-6.569091,85.39138,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D4BA",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11012906,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]=", something's off here. The original blueprints of the fortress show this room should have the strongest defence system, including a self-destruct mechanism.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D4BA",
	},
	[11012906]={
		["Camera"]="40.968079,-172.832031,80.915192,0.005569,6.030278,48.981243,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 지금은…… 문이 잠겼다는 것 말고는 어떤 방어 장치도 작동한 흔적이 없어. 어떻게 생각하나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012906,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="3.947464,-185.009766,77.265686,0.00557,5.630268,44.78133,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D4E4",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110010},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{1}},\
TurnTo{_delay{2},TurnToDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But they've only locked the door, and there's no sign of any defence systems engaging. What do you make of this?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D4E4",
	},
	[11012907]={
		["ContentKR"]="우리 경계심을 흐트러트리려는 수법일 겁니다. 분명 다른 함정이 있을 것 같습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012907,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91D50E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Probably a ruse to lower our guard. There might be other traps.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D50E",
	},
	[11012908]={
		["Camera"]="74.408562,49.787109,88.77771,0.005587,1.630489,-64.006371,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="우리가 이곳으로 신중하게 움직일 걸 예상하고, 함정을 더 은밀히 배치한 걸 수도 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012908,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="65.295509,68.521484,88.215393,0.005587,0.830394,-64.20723,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D538",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012909,
		["Scripts"]="SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="They probably predicted we would be extra cautious around this place, so they cleverly concealed their real traps.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D538",
	},
	[11012909]={
		["Camera"]="50.248306,-81.654297,106.540619,0.005592,2.830014,44.989742,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="흠, 중앙 관제실은 요새를 탈환할 마지막 단계야. 동맹 녀석들이 지금까지는 그렇게 많은 함정을 설치해 놓고, 마지막에 와서 포기하진 않았을 텐데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012909,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="36.057968,-95.833984,102.943756,0.005592,2.830014,44.989742,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D562",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012913,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="True. The central control room is key to regaining control of the fortress. It doesn't add up that they'd leave it undefended after all the elaborate traps we've encountered.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_End","[2] = \"110010:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D562",
	},
	[11012910]={
		["ContentKR"]="저희가 너무 복잡하게 생각한 걸지도 모르겠습니다. 포세이큰 놈들은 이런 걸 건드릴 기술이 없을지도 모르지 않습니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012910,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91D58C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Maybe we're overthinking it. Perhaps The Forsakens never figured out how to operate the controls in this room.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D58C",
	},
	[11012911]={
		["Camera"]="75.575516,-95.462891,143.428009,0.005599,-7.970338,54.588627,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="앞에는 장치를 그렇게 많이 배치해 놓고 마지막 단계에서 아무런 대비도 하지 않았을까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11012911,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="62.144112,-114.351562,146.756073,0.005598,-8.970394,54.588474,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D5B6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012912,
		["Scripts"]="SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110010:n(110022)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But given the number of traps they've set up along the way, it seems unlikely they'd ignore this crucial area.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=45,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D5B6",
	},
	[11012912]={
		["ContentKR"]="어찌 됐든…… 함정이라고 해도 각오하고 들어온 이상 임무에 집중하도록 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012912,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D5E0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012913,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Trap or not, we have our objectives. Proceed with caution and stay mission-focused.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D5E0",
	},
	[11012913]={
		["ContentKR"]="내가 가진 암호키를 콘솔에 연결하겠다. 중앙 관제실까지 들어왔고 이제 마지막 한 단계 남았어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012913,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D60A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11012914,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm about to access the fortress's control panel with my key. If all goes well, that should complete our mission.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D60A",
	},
	[11012914]={
		["Camera"]="86.446342,56.869141,99.56601,0.005594,-3.370234,-71.41069,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다. 그럼 저는 주변을 둘러보면서 수상한 점이 있는지 확인해보겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012914,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="80.652214,74.099609,100.636353,0.005594,-3.970279,-71.210564,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B91D634",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Understood. I'll take a look around for anything suspicious.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D634",
	},
	[11012915]={
		["ContentKR"]="안에 적이 더 있을지 모르니 조심해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11012915,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91D65E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Be careful, there may be more enemies inside.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110129/1B91D65E",
	},
	[11013001]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"13군단이 며칠 내로 기습 공격을 감행할 거다. 안토니 풀비스가 시빌라에게 자신의 총구가 요새의 방어벽을 뚫지 못하면 자기 머리를 쏘겠다며 각서까지 썼다네. 그래서 시빌라가 정예병들을 내준 거야.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E47A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013002,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"The 13th Legion will attack in two days. Antonius Fulvis has vowed before Sibylle that if his forces fail to breach the fortress, he would shoot himself with his own gun. Sibylle then assigned him the best troops.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E47A",
	},
	[11013002]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"군단은 어떻게든 론샤 요새를 되찾으려고 할 테니, 요새를 지킬 생각은 말고 당장 요새에서 철수해서 우리 포세이큰 동맹의 전력을 아끼도록 해.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E4A4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013003,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"The Legion will do everything they can to take Lonza Fortress back. We should not attempt to defend the Fortress against such odds. Withdraw our forces and ensure the survival of The Forsakens.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E4A4",
	},
	[11013003]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"그냥 철수하긴 아까운데…… 휘페르보레아의 개들에게 뭐라도 한방 먹일 방법은 없나?\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E4CE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013004,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_UnsatisfiedVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Merely retreating would squander a perfect opportunity. We should make the Hyperboreans pay dearly.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E4CE",
	},
	[11013004]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"그건 쉽지. 아바르한테 맡겨. 아바르가 이번에 나오는 2개의 선발대의 지휘를 맡았는데, 그 얼뜨기들이 아바르 말을 아주 잘 듣는다더군.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013004,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E4F8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013005,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Easy. Leave it to Avar. He'll be commanding two vanguard squads in the operation. Those fools always listen to him.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E4F8",
	},
	[11013005]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"너희는 장치 준비나 잘해 둬. 아바르가 알아서 그들의 공격 속도를 늦춰서 여길 놈들의 무덤으로 만들어줄 테니까.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013005,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E522",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013006,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Avar will hold off their assault. Use this time to lay traps and fortify our defences. The fortress will become their graveyard.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E522",
	},
	[11013006]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"그리고 우린 신문에서 이런 기사를 보게 되겠지.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013006,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E54C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013007,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"We'll soon read this headline in the news—\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E54C",
	},
	[11013007]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"'론샤 전투에서 황제 폐하의 신성한 땅을 지키기 위해 혈전을 치르던 제13군단 선발대의 부사관 90%가 전사했습니다.'\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013007,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E576",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013008,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"'During the battle in Lonza Fortress, the 13th Legion valiantly defended the Emperor's lands. The vanguard suffered ninety percent casualties in the fierce conflict...'\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E576",
	},
	[11013008]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"살아남은 아바르 중령은 전사들의 죽음에 애도를 표하며 최고 영예 표창을 수여했습니다.\"라던가 말야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013008,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E5A0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013009,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_CalmVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"'Lieutenant Colonel Avar, one of the survivors, mourned the fallen and delivered a eulogy of unmatched honour.'\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E5A0",
	},
	[11013009]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"역시 아바르라니까! 그러면 그대로 진행하지. 휘페르보레아의 개들이 죽어서 명예를 얻는다는 게 마음에 안 들긴 하지만.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013009,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91E5CA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013010,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_UnsatisfiedVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Good for Avar! Let's go with this plan then. Shame those dead dogs will receive posthumous honours, though.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E5CA",
	},
	[11013010]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아바르라고?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013010,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91E5F4",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Avar?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110130/1B91E5F4",
	},
	[11013101]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"우리 카론은 더 이상 휘페르보레아 제국의 횡포를 견딜 수 없습니다.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91F4E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013102,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Docs",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Charons like us can no longer stand Hyperborean tyranny.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110131/1B91F4E2",
	},
	[11013102]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"포세이큰 동맹에 충성을 바치겠습니다. 이는 제국이 치러야 할 죗값입니다.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91F50C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013103,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Docs",
		["Subtitle"]="\"I hereby pledge my allegiance to The Forsakens. The Empire must be held accountable for its actions.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110131/1B91F50C",
	},
	[11013103]={
		["ContentKR"]="\"아바르 헤데란\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11013103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B91F536",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013104,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Docs",
		["Subtitle"]="\"—Avar Hrodland\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110131/1B91F536",
	},
	[11013104]={
		["ContentKR"]="……?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11013104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B91F560",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...!?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110131/1B91F560",
	},
	[11013201]={
		["Content"]="{nickname2}队长。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92054A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013202,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B92054A",
	},
	[11013202]={
		["Content"]="我刚刚检修了通往中控室的升降机，发现升降机的零件遭到了破坏，需要备用零件才能启动。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B920574",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B920574",
	},
	[11013203]={
		["Content"]="阿瓦尔长官受了伤在休息，莱昂在看管那个疯女人。得麻烦你一下，帮我一起找一下备用零件。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92059E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013204,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B92059E",
	},
	[11013204]={
		["Content"]="嗯。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013204,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9205C8",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B9205C8",
	},
	[11013205]={
		["Content"]="多谢队长。加上我找到的这些，应该已经够了。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013205,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9205F2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013206,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B9205F2",
	},
	[11013206]={
		["Content"]="请稍等，我去修一下升降机。",
		["DialogueId"]=11013206,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92061C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110132/1B92061C",
	},
	[11013401]={

	},
	[11013403]={

		["ContentKR"]="아바르 헤데란 중령님, 안녕하십니까! 휘페르보레아 군단 격언 제16조, 적이 사정거리에 있다면 자신도 적의 사정거리에 있다는 것을 잊지 마십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013403,
		["Duration"]=3,

		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",

		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110134/1B92266E",
	},

		["GUID"]="1B924714",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You fabricated all this \"evidence,\" didn't you? I didn't know you old-line aristocrats would stoop to such nasty tricks.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Die",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924714",
	},
	[11013603]={
		["Camera"]="178.707245,-11.683594,124.376953,-0.001526,-5.395323,-85.402832,32.272373,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="난 거기 꽉 막힌 늙은이들이랑은 달라서 말이야. 실용주의자는 쓸 수만 있다면 방법을 가리지 않지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92473E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013604,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{3},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk01_Start\"},Duration{5}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm nothing like those stubborn old fools. I'm a pragmatist and would do anything that works.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92473E",
	},
	[11013604]={
		["Camera"]="902.807739,996.966797,365.8013,-0.001617,-38.995537,97.787613,39.663486,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이 사람은…… 그렇게 자랑하던 제자 아닌가? 네가 이렇게 한 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="779.072021,980.046875,365.804016,-0.001617,-38.995537,97.787613,39.663486,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924768",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110011:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11013605,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Isn't this your favourite protege? You did this?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110011:Talk01_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924768",
	},
	[11013605]={
		["Camera"]="-52.89296,-410.628906,153.90033,-0.001526,-9.395328,57.990803,32.272373,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="흥, 난 너와 거래를 하고 싶어서 말이지. 여기서 일어난 일은 우리 둘만 알면 되니까, 제3자의 귀는 필요치 않고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013605,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924792",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013606,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Heh, I was just setting the stage for a deal with you. I don't think we need a third person for this.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924792",
	},
	[11013606]={
		["Camera"]="-141.896973,217.300781,153.200623,-0.001587,-8.196172,-54.00251,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11013606,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9247BC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013607,
		["Scripts"]="LookAt{_delay{1},LookAtDescription{\"110012:n(110011)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9247BC",
	},
	[11013607]={
		["Camera"]="138.605865,249.871094,147.580017,-0.001587,-7.99671,-87.396423,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="나가 있어, 펄시. 괜찮다. 요새 전체가 우리 손안에 있으니 녀석도 섣불리 공격할 수 없을 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013607,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9247E6",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110011:n(110012)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11013608,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{5}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Off you go, Falsi. It's alright, the entire fortress is in our hands. This old man dares not make a move.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9247E6",
	},
	[11013608]={
		["Camera"]="138.605865,249.871094,147.580017,-0.001587,-7.99671,-87.396423,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="예. 문 밖에서 대기하겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013608,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924810",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110011:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11013609,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9MoveTo{_delay{1.5},_nowait{true},ActorId{110012},TargetPoint{\"pFalumove19\"},MoveSpeed{75},Visibility{\"Hide\"}},\
\9CameraMoveTo{_delay{4.5},TargetPosition{\"135.177307,-360.964844,134.066956,-0.001587,-3.396236,79.182655,48.326878,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir. I shall wait outside the door.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110012:Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924810",
	},
	[11013609]={
		["Camera"]="135.177307,-360.964844,134.066956,-0.001587,-3.396236,79.182655,48.326878,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="거짓 증거로 나한테 누명을 씌우려는 이유부터 말해 보시지. 상부에 바보만 있는 줄 아는 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013609,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92483A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013610,
		["Scripts"]="SetLocation{ActorId{110012},TargetPoint{\"pFalumove19\"},Visibility{\"Hide\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Now, why bother making up all this false evidence? You really think the higher-ups are that stupid?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92483A",
	},
	[11013610]={
		["Camera"]="179.358322,112.949219,115.859833,-0.001587,-1.797514,-87.381775,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="오히려 똑똑한 사람이 많으니까 전부 바보인 척하겠지. 아바르, 머리 좀 굴려봐. 설마 내가 혼자서 이런 일을 꾸몄을 거라 생각하는 건 아니겠지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013610,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924864",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013611,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{10}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Of course not. They're actually smart enough to turn a blind eye and play along. Use your head, Avar. Why do you think I dare to make this bold move? It's naturally because someone wants me to.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924864",
	},
	[11013611]={
		["Camera"]="203.98494,1479.292969,763.651184,-0.001588,-27.597679,-89.974663,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="어차피 넌 이제 죽은 목숨이니까 내가 특별히 좀 더 자세히 말해주지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013611,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="203.914673,1638.189453,846.713135,-0.00159,-27.797693,-89.974632,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B92488E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013612,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{10}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Since you're a goner already, I'll show some mercy so you won't die a fool.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110011:Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92488E",
	},
	[11013612]={
		["Camera"]="63.081985,-248.052734,771.118164,-0.001586,-10.59576,89.421349,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="폐하께서 막 즉위하셨을 때…… 그러니까 세르비우스 공작이 섭정하는 동안 두 분은 휘페르보레아의 오랜 규칙에서 벗어나 제국이란 큰 나무에 쓸모없는 가지를 너무 많이 붙이셨지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013612,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="63.081985,-248.052734,843.376953,-0.001586,-10.59576,89.421349,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9248B8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013613,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="When His Majesty was first crowned, Duke Servius was our Imperial Regent. But the Regency strayed from established Hyperborean traditions and grafted too many useless scions onto the great Imperial oak.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9248B8",
	},
	[11013613]={
		["Camera"]="179.358322,112.949219,115.859833,-0.001587,-1.797514,-87.381775,43.321198,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="카론이 추밀원과 군단에 들어가는 것도 모자라 요직까지 맡을 수 있게 하셨다. 너 같은 놈 말이야. 말도 안되는 소리지!",
		["DialogueId"]=11013613,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9248E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013614,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Angry01_Start\"},Duration{10}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
