		["Subtitle"]="Those fools allowed Charons into the Military Council and the Legion, and even appointed a few — like you — into high offices. This is ridiculous.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9248E2",
	},
	[11013614]={
		["Camera"]="92.38076,-594.587891,3.646637,0.00075,2.989136,77.42524,23.640343,100000.0,false,Manual,2.654159",
		["ContentKR"]="지금은 폐하께서 일들을 바로잡으셨지만, 썩은 가지들은 여전하니 말이야. 폐하를 대신해 썩은 가지를 쳐 내는 게 내가 할 일이고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013614,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="45.276184,-584.09375,3.64621,0.00075,2.989136,77.42524,23.640343,100000.0,false,Manual,2.654159",
		["GUID"]="1B92490C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013615,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Though His Majesty is now aware of these mistakes, they continue to plague us. I'm merely helping him prune the oak.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92490C",
	},
	[11013615]={
		["Camera"]="183.530197,63.621094,114.315247,-0.001587,-2.196589,78.218575,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 결국 내가 카론인 게 마음에 안 들었다는 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013615,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924936",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013616,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...So you went through all the trouble, just because you don't like Charons?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Talk03_End",
			[2]="110011:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924936",
	},
	[11013616]={
		["Camera"]="79.446671,-336.03125,-12.336609,-0.001588,8.197681,71.421906,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그럴 거면 진작에 말하지. 이런 짓까지 할 필요 없었잖아? 여기서 살려만 보내줘. 그러면 최대한 빨리 은퇴하고 너한테 더는 걸림돌이 되지 않을테니.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013616,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924960",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013617,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You should've told me earlier. There's no need for such an elaborate ruse. Just let me off this time, and I'll retire early and stay out of your way forever.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110010:Talk01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924960",
	},
	[11013617]={
		["Camera"]="195.072495,65.363281,123.704468,-0.000366,-4.399809,84.827629,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="충성을 바치라면 그것도 할 수 있어. 이번 작전이 새어나간 책임을 저 녀석에게 뒤집어씌우면 돼. 그럼 우리는 무사히 빠져나갈 수 있을 뿐만 아니라, 스파이를 잡았다는 공로까지 인정받게 될 거야. 그리고…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11013617,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92498A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013618,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="If you need my loyalty, I can do that too. We can blame {性别2:him|her} for leaking our battle plans. Both of us walk away clean. Hell, we might even get a reward for uncovering a spy. And...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92498A",
	},
	[11013618]={
		["Camera"]="180.590164,557.460938,342.56488,-0.000367,-27.400169,-90.37088,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고, 넌 말 잘 듣는 개 한 마리 더 생기는 거고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013618,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92498B",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013619,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You'll gain an old dog obedient enough to follow your orders.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110010:Talk01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B92498B",
	},
	[11013619]={
		["Camera"]="181.433853,-48.1875,128.48053,-0.001587,-6.59549,-85.3731,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이야, 너도 꽤 비열하군. 하지만 좀 더 머리를 써봐, 아바르. 널 살려 두는 게 과연 죽이는 것보다 쓸모 있을까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013619,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9249B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013620,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{4},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk03_Start\"},Duration{10}},\
\9CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"133.68956,-252.070312,138.269318,-0.001587,-10.195525,75.224785,21.125469,100000.0,false,Manual,4.655909\"},duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Hah, how quaint, Avar — didn't expect you to stoop this low too. But you don't know the half of it, Avar. You're worth far more to us dead than alive.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9249B4",
	},
	[11013620]={
		["Camera"]="161.380234,-60.710938,68.19278,-0.001556,19.000055,-75.349945,16.66153,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="머리가 달렸으면 생각이라는 걸 좀 해보라고! 카론 장교가 군단을 배신하고 포세이큰 동맹에 붙어서 제국의 젊고 용감한 정예병들이 몰살당했다는 소문이 퍼지면 어떻게 될까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013620,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9249DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013621,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{4},ActorId{110011},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{10}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Use your head! Imagine the uproar if it came out that a high-ranking Charon officer defected and joined The Forsakens, resulting in the deaths of many of our best young soldiers.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110011:Sigh_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B9249DE",
	},
	[11013621]={
		["Camera"]="139.678741,-311.3125,182.732239,-0.001556,-15.799893,78.248161,26.751381,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="안그래도 고위직에 있는 카론에 대한 말이 많은데, 그런 일이 터지면 과연 지금 자리를 지킬 수 있을까? 예를 들자면…… 우리 모두가 '존경하는' 군단장님 같은 사람 말이야. 시빌라 군단장이 추락하기만을 기다리는 사람들이 얼마나 많은 줄 알아?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013621,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="147.068558,-275.791016,172.735626,-0.001557,-14.999846,78.447952,26.751381,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924A08",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013622,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="High-ranking Charons are already a thorn in many's flesh. Such a scandal will discredit them. Take our beloved superior — do you know how many people wish to see her crash and burn?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk03_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924A08",
	},
	[11013622]={
		["Camera"]="184.448441,92.933594,118.087585,-0.001556,-4.799984,75.248985,16.66153,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="시빌라? 군단장이 추락…… '군단장'이 목표였군?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013622,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924A32",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013623,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You mean Sibylle? You wish her gone... You're after her position and power?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924A32",
	},
	[11013623]={
		["Camera"]="189.67868,15.958984,136.09494,-0.002015,-10.214329,-90.517456,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그럴 수도 있지. 어쩌면 그 이상일 수도 있지만, 이제 그건 네가 신경 쓸 일은 아니고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013623,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924A5C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013624,
		["Scripts"]="TurnTo{_delay{4},TurnToDescription{\"110011:p(-180)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Perhaps. Maybe I want more. But that's no longer your concern.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924A5C",
	},
	[11013624]={
		["Camera"]="210.827393,674.720703,413.820465,-0.001556,-29.802395,-90.315331,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐!",
		["DialogueId"]=11013624,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924A86",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013625,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924A86",
	},
	[11013625]={
		["Camera"]="162.144745,68.888672,113.184418,-0.001556,0.5984,70.482254,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐 화제를 바꿔서…… <Highlight>'제로'</> 이야기를 좀 해볼까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013625,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924AB0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013626,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We should talk about one more thing... About No. 0.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924AB0",
	},
	[11013626]={
		["Camera"]="189.029434,168.939453,125.990936,-0.001556,-8.801573,-87.316956,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 제로?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013626,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924ADA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013627,
		["Scripts"]="TurnTo{_delay{2},TurnToDescription{\"110011:p(180)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="...Oh?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924ADA",
	},
	[11013627]={
		["Camera"]="181.894211,-418.75,253.359711,-0.002013,-22.01486,89.074043,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="제로는 13군단이 가장 아끼는 무기지. 지금 시빌라 손에 제로가 있긴 하지만, <Highlight>'두 번째 새싹' 계획</>을 완성하는데 가장 중요한 <Highlight>'촉매'</>가 아직 부족해……",
		["DialogueId"]=11013627,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="183.055939,-359.378906,229.347443,-0.002013,-22.01486,88.674042,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924B04",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013628,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="She is the most precious weapon of the 13th Legion. Sibylle controls her now, but to complete the Second Scion Program, she still needs the crucial \"Catalyst\"...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924B04",
	},
	[11013628]={
		["Camera"]="173.69519,337.558594,140.737854,-0.002014,-9.614563,-83.122658,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="6",
		["ContentKR"]="시빌라가 너한테 플래그슨 주에서 '촉매제'를 찾아오라고 했다 하지 않았던가. 그다지 순조롭지는 않은 것 같던데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013628,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="173.69519,337.558594,140.737854,-0.002014,-9.614563,-83.122658,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,5.187092",
		["GUID"]="1B924B2E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013629,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Sibylle has ordered you to find the Catalyst in Flagson. But your search doesn't seem to be enjoying much success.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924B2E",
	},
	[11013629]={
		["Camera"]="187.021362,28.638672,123.15155,-0.002014,-4.014833,-86.322136,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하고 싶은 말이 뭐야? 돌려 말하지 말고 핵심만 말해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013629,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924B58",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013630,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Get to the point, Avar.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924B58",
	},
	[11013630]={
		["Camera"]="213.016678,838.005859,501.626373,-0.002011,-30.014738,-89.91877,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스, 군단장이 되는 길이 하나만 있는 건 아니야. 이번 일로 시빌라를 끌어내리는 데 성공한다고 해도, 폐하께서 너를 그 자리에 앉힐 거라고 장담할 수 있나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11013630,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="212.958069,879.345703,525.508728,-0.002011,-30.014738,-89.91877,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924B82",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013631,
		["Scripts"]="TurnTo{_delay{1},TurnToDescription{\"110010:p(180)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="There are many paths to power, Fulvis. Even if this charade pushes Sibylle off her seat, how can you be sure the Emperor will let you take her place?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924B82",
	},
	[11013631]={
		["Camera"]="204.015961,379.583984,193.683502,-0.002014,-17.614374,-90.51786,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="널 그 자리에 올려놓을 수 있는 건 대체 불가능한 '공로'야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013631,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924BAC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013632,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You need some kind of unparalleled credit to propel you to the Legion's head.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924BAC",
	},
	[11013632]={
		["Camera"]="190.016266,53.332031,142.965149,-0.002014,-10.414337,-90.517456,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="계속 말해봐.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013632,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924BD6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013633,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm listening.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924BD6",
	},
	[11013633]={
		["Camera"]="186.09317,-403.412109,208.933746,-0.002015,-18.014582,88.081749,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="제국에선 론샤 요새 100개를 장악하는 것보다 '두 번째 새싹' 계획이 성공하는 게 훨씬 중요해. 네가 '촉매제'를 찾아서 계획의 마지막 퍼즐을 완성하면 온 제국에 안토니 풀비스라는 네 이름이 울려 퍼질 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013633,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="188.086197,-358.794922,195.577118,-0.002014,-16.414248,87.68145,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924C00",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013634,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The Second Scion Program is too important to the Empire. It's worth far more than a hundred Lonza Fortresses combined. If you find the \"Catalyst,\" which is the final piece of the puzzle, the entire capital will chant your name — Antonius Fulvis.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924C00",
	},
	[11013634]={
		["Camera"]="170.228027,-3.333984,134.198151,-0.002014,-7.014645,77.879852,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그게 바로 대체 불가능한 공로다. 우연히 내가 마침 그 행방을 알게 되었는데, 그 공로, 너한테 양보하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013634,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="176.157852,23.050781,130.399994,-0.002015,-7.614684,77.47937,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924C2A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013635,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's the unparalleled credit you need. And I, by circumstance and chance, happen to know of its whereabouts. I am willing to concede this to you.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924C2A",
	},
	[11013635]={
		["Camera"]="186.523621,-21.591797,116.276825,-0.002014,-1.214025,-89.917381,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그것 참 흥미롭군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013635,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924C54",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013636,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Now we're talking.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110011:Think_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924C54",
	},
	[11013636]={
		["Camera"]="84.502541,-388.667969,200.999573,-0.002014,-17.614866,70.476227,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이게 내가 제안하는 '거래'다. 나와 밖에 있는 병사들을 살려 주겠다고 약속해 줘. 저 중에 내 친딸이 있어서 내게 다른 방법이 없어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013636,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="62.221085,-451.496094,222.168152,-0.002014,-17.614866,70.476227,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924C7E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013637,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="That would be my end of the deal. All I ask in return is for you to spare me and my troops — my daughter is among them, so I have to make sure they're safe.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924C7E",
	},
	[11013637]={
		["Camera"]="178.929428,33.230469,137.781097,-0.001221,-12.207118,-86.919952,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="눈물겨운 부성애군! 좋아, 지금 당장 '촉매제' 행방을 말해. 너한테 다른 협상 조건은 없으니까 수작 부릴 생각 말고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013637,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B924CA8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013638,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="What a loving father! Alright, tell me where the \"Catalyst\" is, here and now, and don't try to pull any tricks — you don't have leverage.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110011:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924CA8",
	},
	[11013638]={
		["Camera"]="184.829819,-580.787109,486.069153,-0.001221,-37.00769,90.276413,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠다. 그건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11013638,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110011:Confident02",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="184.988251,-613.628906,510.822937,-0.001221,-37.00769,90.276413,23.660713,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924CD2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013639,
		["Scripts"]="TurnTo{_delay{2},TurnToDescription{\"110010:p(-180)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Fine. It's at...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924CD2",
	},
	[11013639]={
		["Camera"]="192.382339,273.615234,140.145172,0.000043,-12.797786,-91.975365,25.129547,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="음, 그런 거였군. 그럼 이제 남은 건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11013639,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="191.726547,254.601562,135.823425,0.000043,-12.797786,-91.975365,25.129547,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B924CFC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, thanks. As for now, I just need one last thing...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110136/1B924CFC",
	},
	[11013701]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르, 실용주의자를 너무 믿지 말라고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B925752",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Remember, Avar, never trust a pragmatist.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B925752",
	},
	[11013702]={
		["ContentKR"]="펄시, 넌 남아서 여길 처리해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92577C",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=11013703,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110011,
		["Subtitle"]="Stay behind, Falsi. Clean up this mess.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B92577C",
	},
	[11013703]={
		["ContentKR"]="예, 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013703,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9257A6",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=11013704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B9257A6",
	},
	[11013704]={
		["ContentKR"]="(뒤적거림)",
		["DialogueId"]=11013704,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9257D0",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=11013705,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/searchcloth\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["Subtitle"]="(*rummaging sound*)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B9257D0",
	},
	[11013705]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 소형 녹음기잖아…… 이런 걸 갖고 있다니.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013705,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9257FA",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=11013706,
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/searchcloth\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="...A mini recording device...? Why would {性别2:he|she} have this?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B9257FA",
	},
	[11013706]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 헤데란 중령님, 아직 명령을 입력하지 않으셨습니다. 휘페르보레아 군단 격언 제17조: 명령에 복종하고 전우를 신뢰해야 전장에서 더 오래 살아남을 수 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013706,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B925824",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland, you have yet to enter any command. Motto 17 of the Hyperborean Legion: Obeying orders and trusting your comrades give you a better chance of survival on the battlefield.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110137/1B925824",
	},
	[11013801]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>…… 영원한 허무에 빠지지 마라……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11013801,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9267BA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013802,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...Do not indulge in the eternal void...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110138/1B9267BA",
	},
	[11013802]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>…… 깨어나라……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11013802,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9267E4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11013803,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...Wake up...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110138/1B9267E4",
	},
	[11013803]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>……피가 흘러 강을 이루기 전에…… 아직 끝나지 않았다……</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11013803,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92680E",
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/evilvo\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MONSTER",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="...Before blood flows like swollen rivers... This is far from over...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110138/1B92680E",
	},
	[11013901]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아직…… 살아 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11013901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B927822",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...I'm still... alive.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110139/1B927822",
	},
	[11014001]={
		["Camera"]="104.132019,5.728516,57.772827,0.000035,-20.799707,-131.596558,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="(아바르에게 어떤 생명의 징후도 보이지 않는다. 몸에는 평범한 군용 칼, 전술 손전등, 부서진 통신기 외에 아무것도 없다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11014001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="163.446655,55.132812,101.440063,0.000035,-25.599636,-131.191254,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B92888A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014002,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Aside",
		["Subtitle"]="(Avar shows no sign of life. There is nothing on him except for a military knife, a tactical flashlight, and a broken radio.)",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B92888A",
	},
	[11014002]={
		["Camera"]="21.600922,84.398438,21.665161,0.000077,-20.199579,-112.073257,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 이건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="6.485443,47.134766,6.866577,0.000074,-20.199579,-112.073105,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9288B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014003,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...What's this...?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B9288B4",
	},
	[11014003]={
		["Camera"]="21.600922,84.398438,21.665161,0.000077,-20.199579,-112.073257,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014003,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:showpic;dir:Texture2D'/Game/UI/Texture/Dynamic/Image/Guide/T_Guide_Ex01_DirtyPic.T_Guide_Ex01_DirtyPic'}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9288DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014004,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B9288DE",
	},
	[11014004]={
		["Camera"]="-254.610107,-310.542969,14.450928,0.000098,-6.399566,68.926117,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="으윽!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014004,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-236.130478,-263.0625,20.126465,0.000097,-6.599581,68.726463,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B928908",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014005,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Argh!!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B928908",
	},
	[11014005]={
		["Camera"]="508.594055,-4106.466797,1392.813965,-0.000213,-4.605992,-128.67778,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="론샤 요새에 있는 13군단 병사들은 모두 명령에 따르라. '그리핀' 소대 의무원 다프네 세오도어가 포세이큰 동맹 스파이로 확인되어 수배령이 내려졌다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014005,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="591.160767,-4172.571289,1392.814087,-0.000214,-4.605992,-128.677704,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B928932",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014006,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="BROADCAST",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Broadcast",
		["Subtitle"]="Attention to all 13th Legion soldiers in Lonza Fortress. Daphne Theodore, the former Medic of Squad Griffins, is now classified as a Forsakens spy.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B928932",
	},
	[11014006]={
		["ContentKR"]="누구든지 다프네 세오도어를 발견하는 즉시 처형하라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014006,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92895C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014007,
		["SnapShot"]="BROADCAST",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Broadcast",
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne Theodore is to be executed upon sight.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B92895C",
	},
	[11014007]={
		["Camera"]="-250.394073,-261.6875,33.83667,0.000106,-9.000242,63.321144,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 다프네에게…… 수배령이?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014007,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-260.739868,-282.271484,33.250977,0.000106,-9.000242,63.321144,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B928986",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014008,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_off\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Daphne? A wanted spy?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B928986",
	},
	[11014008]={
		["ContentKR"]="(우선…… 여기를 빠져나가야 해!)",
		["DialogueId"]=11014008,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9289B0",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(I must... get out of here first!)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110140/1B9289B0",
	},
	[11014101]={
		["ContentKR"]="한 명이 더 있다. 같이 죽여!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9298F2",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="She's got an accomplice! Kill 'em both!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110141/1B9298F2",
	},
	[11014201]={
		["Camera"]="229.133667,-283.860352,133.092957,0.0,0.0,109.000267,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="마취제예요. 잠깐은 괜찮을 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92A95A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014202,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Give\"},Duration{1}},TurnTo{_delay{2},TurnToDescription{\"110005:p(180)\"}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Here, take this painkiller. It should hold you over for a while.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92A95A",
	},
	[11014202]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐, 어딜 가려는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92A984",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait, where are you going?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92A984",
	},
	[11014203]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 관제실이요. 아버…… 아바르 중령님이 아직 거기 계세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92A9AE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014204,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="To the central control room. My fa... Commander Avar is still in there.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Talk02_End",
			[2]="110005:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92A9AE",
	},
	[11014204]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="가지 마십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014204,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92A9D8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014205,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="No, don't go.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92A9D8",
	},
	[11014205]={
		["Camera"]="207.774231,39.564453,129.50293,0.0,-0.999994,-105.998978,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이미 돌아가셨습니다. 이제 아무런 반응도 없으시고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014205,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92AA02",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014206,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="He's d— Sir Avar is no longer with us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AA02",
	},
	[11014206]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 제가 확인해야겠어요. 그냥 중상일 수도 있어요. 그쪽으론 제가 전문가라고요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014206,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92AA2C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014207,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...I have to check on him myself. Maybe he's just heavily wounded... As a medic, I can probably...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AA2C",
	},
	[11014207]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="돌아오십시오. 중앙 관제실은 다 불탔습니다. 중령님께서 눈 감으시기 전에 다프네, 당신을 데리고 여기서 빠져나가라고 하셨어요. 마지막 유언도 안 들을 셈입니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014207,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92AA56",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014208,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{1}},PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Get back here. They burned down the entire central control room. Sir Avar's final words were for me to bring you safely out of this place. At least respect the man's dying wish.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AA56",
	},
	[11014208]={
		["Camera"]="207.774231,39.564453,129.50293,0.0,-0.999994,-105.998978,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="으윽!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014208,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Pain01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92AA80",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014209,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Argh!!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AA80",
	},
	[11014209]={
		["Camera"]="186.685211,-95.413086,128.554749,0.0,-0.399935,97.800514,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="……!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014209,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Iyada01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92AAAA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014210,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...!!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Sigh_End",
			[2]="110005:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AAAA",
	},
	[11014210]={
		["Camera"]="248.495285,210.181641,131.50293,0.0,0.0,-113.598816,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="일단 가죠. 여길 떠나서 안전한 곳을 찾아야 합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014210,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B92AAD4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014211,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's get out of here and find somewhere safe.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AAD4",
	},
	[11014211]={
		["Camera"]="207.774231,39.564453,129.50293,0.0,-0.999994,-105.998978,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="무사히 살아남기 전까진 뒤돌아보지 마십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014211,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92AAFE",
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Explain01_End\"},Duration{1}},PlayAnimation{_delay{1},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="There's no turning back now. We have to keep moving.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110142/1B92AAFE",
	},
	[11014301]={
		["ContentKR"]="어디로 가는 거죠?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92B9C2",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Where are you going?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92B9C2",
	},
	[11014302]={
		["ContentKR"]="하수도로 갈 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92B9EC",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Weita_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The underground sewers.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92B9EC",
	},
	[11014303]={
		["ContentKR"]="요새 안에는 풀비스의 사람들이 깔려 있으니 아래로 가서 운에 맡겨 볼 수밖에 없습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92BA16",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Weita_Angry",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014304,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The fortress is filled with Fulvis's men. We have to try our luck with the sewer tunnels.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BA16",
	},
	[11014304]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 알겠어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014304,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92BA40",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014305,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Okay.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BA40",
	},
	[11014305]={
		["ContentKR"]="이곳에 있는 병사들을 조심하세요. 이제 '전우'는 없고 '적'만 있을지도 몰라요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014305,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92BA6A",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Watch out for the soldiers around here. We may no longer have any allies.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BA6A",
	},
	[11014306]={
		["ContentKR"]="경고, 통행 권한이 없습니다. 통행 권한이 없습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014306,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92BA94",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014307,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Warning. No access privileges.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BA94",
	},
	[11014307]={
		["ContentKR"]="……벌써 우리의 권한을 삭제해버렸군요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014307,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92BABE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014308,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...They've already revoked our authorizations...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BABE",
	},
	[11014308]={
		["ContentKR"]="목표를 발견했다! 이쪽이다!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014308,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92BAE8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014309,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_WhaleSoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Target sighted! Over here!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BAE8",
	},
	[11014309]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11014309,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92BB12",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014310,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BB12",
	},
	[11014310]={
		["ContentKR"]="저 녀석들을 기절시키고 녀석들이 가진 암호키로 문을 열어야겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014310,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92BB3C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Knock them out and use their keys to open the door.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110143/1B92BB3C",
	},
	[11014401]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하, 하아, 하아……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110005:Pain01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B92CA2A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014402,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0061_scene_ex01_escape\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Huff, huff, huff...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110005:Sigh_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CA2A",
	},
	[11014402]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="솔직히 말하면…… 지금 머리가 너무, 너무 복잡해요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CA54",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014403,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Sigh_End\"},Duration{2}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="To be honest... My head's spinning. Everything's a mess.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CA54",
	},
	[11014403]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아버…… 아바르 중령님은 돌아가셨고, 밖에 있는 제국 병사들은 제가 스파이라면서 절 죽이려 하고…… 전 정말…… 정말 모르겠어요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014403,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CA7E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014404,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Fa... Sir Avar's gone. Those Hyperborean soldiers out there are shooting us on sight. They're calling me a spy. But I... I don't understand any of this...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CA7E",
	},
	[11014404]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="부탁이에요…… 당신을 믿어도 된다고…… 말해줘요…… 그렇게만 말해주면 당신을 믿을게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014404,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CAA8",
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{2}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{1}},CameraMoveTo{_delay{3},TargetPosition{\"-55.753174,3.790039,38.96936,0.0,0.0,110.5215,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0\"},duration{0}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Please... I need to know I can trust you... I'll believe whatever you tell me.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CAA8",
	},
	[11014405]={
		["ContentKR"]="(살며시 안으며 나를 믿어도 된다고 말해 준다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11014405,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CAD2",
		["Subtitle"]="(Hold her gently and reassure her you can be trusted.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CAD2",
	},
	[11014406]={
		["ContentKR"]="(나를 너무 의지하는 것 같다. 스스로 강해지도록 놔둔다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11014406,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CAFC",
		["Subtitle"]="(Tell her she needs to be strong and face reality on her own.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CAFC",
	},
	[11014407]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11014407,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CB26",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014408,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0061_scene_ex01_escape\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CB26",
	},
	[11014408]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이, 이제 조금 좀 괜찮은 것 같아요. 죄송해요. 많이 다치신 걸 알고 있으면서도 제가……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014408,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CB50",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014409,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I... I've pulled myself together now. Sorry, you're so heavily injured, yet I was there acting like a crying baby...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CB50",
	},
	[11014409]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아까 찾아주신 약이 아직 조금 남아있어요. 제가 치료해 드릴게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014409,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CB7A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014410,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I still have some of the medication you found. Let me help with your injuries.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain01_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CB7A",
	},
	[11014410]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="약효가 나타나려면 시간이 필요하니까 지금은 움직이지 마세요…… 일단 밖에서 일어난 일부터 알려 드릴게요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014410,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CBA4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014411,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's rest here until the medicine takes effect... I'll explain everything that happened outside.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain01_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CBA4",
	},
	[11014411]={
		["ContentKR"]="다 처리하지 못했다고? 하나를 놓쳤다는 건가?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014411,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CBCE",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014413.11014413'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014412,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="One of them got away?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CBCE",
	},
	[11014412]={
		["ContentKR"]="예, 여자 의무관 다프네 세오도어를 놓쳤습니다. 선발대 부상병들이 목숨을 걸고 시간을 끄는 바람에 그 여자가 도망쳤습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014412,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CBF8",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014413.11014413'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014413,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, ma'am. A female medic named Daphne Theodore. The vanguard squads fought back fiercely, allowing her to escape.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CBF8",
	},
	[11014413]={
		["ContentKR"]="지금 '나르왈' 분대가 요새로 들어오고 있는데, 선발대 소탕에 대해선 우리 외의 누구도 알아선 안 됩니다. 만약 다프네가 그들에게 도움을 요청한다면, 일이 복잡해질 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014413,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CC22",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014412.11014412'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014414,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="The Narwhals are entering the fortress. But no one else must know that we cleaned up the vanguards. The situation may turn for the worse if Daphne contacts them for help.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CC22",
	},
	[11014414]={
		["ContentKR"]="게다가 전황이 좋지 않아 시빌라 군단장님도 론샤 요새로 오고 계십니다. 상황이 좀 복잡해지긴 했지만, 그래도 중요한 아바르는 처리했습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014414,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CC4C",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014412.11014412'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014415,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="The situation is delicate. Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned. Luckily, Avar is already out of the picture.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CC4C",
	},
	[11014415]={
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 다프네 그 여자는 어떻게 해야……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014415,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CC76",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014412.11014412'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014416,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="As for Daphne, what do you want us to do with her...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CC76",
	},
	[11014416]={
		["ContentKR"]="지휘관님의 명령을 전해라. 요새 전체에 비상 경계령을 내리고 다프네 세오도어를 찾아서 처형해. 명목은…… 똑같이 '포세이큰 동맹과 결탁해 군단에 잠입한 스파이로, 요새 공격 계획을 방해한 죄'로 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014416,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CCA0",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014412.11014412'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014417,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Relay Commander Fulvis's order: lock down the fortress, find, and eliminate Daphne Theodore. As for the charges… claim she conspired with The Forsakens, infiltrated the Legion as a spy, and compromised the fortress assault.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CCA0",
	},
	[11014417]={
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014417,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CCCA",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014412.11014412'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014418,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, ma'am.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CCCA",
	},
	[11014418]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그 후에……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014418,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CCF4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014419,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...And after that...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CCF4",
	},
	[11014419]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저는 동료들의 상황을 확인하면서 중앙 관제실 쪽으로 향했어요. 그나마 다행인 건, 가는 길에 어느 병사와도 마주치지 않았단 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014419,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CD1E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014420,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I checked on our squad mates while making my way to the central control room. Luckily, I avoided all the soldiers.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CD1E",
	},
	[11014420]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 제가 아무리 치료해도 동료들은 이미 대부분 치명상을 입어서 결국 모두 구할 수 없었어요. 정말 우습지 않나요…… 그토록 가장 완벽한 공격을 적이 아닌 동료에게 가하다니요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014420,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CD48",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014421,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But it was too late for most. They all suffered precise, fatal shots — ironically from our own men rather than the enemies.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CD48",
	},
	[11014421]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이게 제가 알고 있는 전부예요…… 이제 당신 차례예요, 중앙 관제실에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 말씀해 주세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014421,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CD72",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014422,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="That's all I know... Now, tell me what happened in the central control room.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CD72",
	},
	[11014422]={
		["Camera"]="-55.753174,3.790039,38.96936,0.0,0.0,110.5215,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지금은 말해줄 수 없습니다, 하지만 언젠가는 말해 주겠다고 약속하죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014422,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92CD9C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014423,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll explain later, now isn't the right time.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CD9C",
	},
	[11014423]={
		["Camera"]="-96.0,117.0,31.0,0.000001,0.0,97.92305,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 당신 판단이 틀린 건 아닙니다. 지금 이 요새 안에 있는 병사들은 전부 적이라고 봐야겠죠. 풀비스 명령에 따라 우릴 죽이고 비밀을 지키려 할 게 분명합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014423,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-96.0,129.0,31.0,0.000001,0.0,97.92305,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B92CDC6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014424,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Think_Start\"},Duration{3}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{1}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="But you were right about the situation — every soldier in this fortress is now our enemy. Fulvis has ordered them to eliminate us.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CDC6",
	},
	[11014424]={
		["Camera"]="-107.126953,209.223145,40.0,0.000001,0.0,98.323044,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스……가 포세이큰 동맹에 계획을 누설한 배신자였군요. 그 인간 때문에 우리가 많은 피를 본 거였어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014424,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CDF0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014425,
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Fulvis... He's the despicable traitor who leaked our plans to The Forsakens. He's the one who decimated our squads.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CDF0",
	},
	[11014425]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11014425,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CE1A",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110005:p(P11014402)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11014426,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CE1A",
	},
	[11014426]={
		["Camera"]="-55.753174,3.790039,38.96936,0.0,0.0,110.5215,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이제 괜찮아졌습니다. 고맙습니다. 약효가 좋군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014426,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92CE44",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11014427,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Thanks to your medicine, I'm feeling much better.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CE44",
	},
	[11014427]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="좋아요. 당신이 지금 말하고 싶지 않다면, 그럴 만한 이유가 있다고 믿겠어요. 다만, 한 가지만 대답해 주실 수 있나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014427,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CE6E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014428,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Fine. You must have your own reasons for withholding the information. But there's one thing I must know—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CE6E",
	},
	[11014428]={
		["Camera"]="-67.697754,282.563477,32.679565,0.0,0.0,-109.676758,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="<Highlight>제 아버지</>…… 아바르는…… 임무를 완수하셨나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11014428,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92CE98",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11014429,
		},
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="My father... Avar... Did he complete his mission?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CE98",
	},
	[11014429]={
		["ContentKR"]="완수하셨습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014429,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92CEC2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014430,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="He did.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CEC2",
	},
	[11014430]={
		["Camera"]="-41.312256,440.168945,35.679565,0.0,0.0,-113.278038,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아, 고마워요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014430,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B92CEEC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014431,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Thank you.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CEEC",
	},
	[11014431]={
		["Camera"]="-6.479004,242.549316,145.0,0.000142,-35.197266,-133.273102,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잘 가요, 아빠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014431,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="22.06665,272.869141,173.373291,0.000144,-35.197258,-133.273071,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B92CF16",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014432,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110005:p(P11014401)\"}},PlayAnimation{ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_Start\"},Duration{2}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Farewell, Dad.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CF16",
	},
	[11014432]={
		["Camera"]="-93.028564,117.413574,31.0,0.000001,0.0,97.92305,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="갑시다. 우리가 살아있는 한, 언젠가는 풀비스에게 이 빚을 갚을 수 있을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014432,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B92CF40",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's go. So long as we're alive, we'll find a chance to make Fulvis pay.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110144/1B92CF40",
	},
	[11014501]={
		["Content"]="我来这儿的路上发现这里到处都是海伯利亚的追兵，我们可以试着从下水道离开。",
		["DialogueId"]=11014501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92DA92",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Angry",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110145/1B92DA92",
	},
	[11014502]={
		["Content"]="那家伙应该是个小军官，它身上应该有通行权限的钥匙卡！",
		["DialogueId"]=11014502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92DABC",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Angry",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110145/1B92DABC",
	},
	[11014601]={
		["ContentKR"]="다프네 세오도어와 정체불명의 조력자가 하수도로 숨어들었다. 지금 1번 저수조 근처에 있다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014601,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92EAFA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014602,
		["SnapShot"]="BROADCAST",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne Theodore and an unknown accomplice are currently hiding in the sewers near Reservoir 1.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110146/1B92EAFA",
	},
	[11014602]={
		["ContentKR"]="1번 저수조로 물을 방류해서 밖으로 나오게 만들어라!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014602,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92EB24",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014603,
		["SnapShot"]="BROADCAST",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Initiate the flooding of Reservoir 1 to force them out.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110146/1B92EB24",
	},
	[11014603]={
		["ContentKR"]="결국 들켰네요…… 이곳이 물에 잠기기 전에 빠져나가야 해요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92EB4E",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="They found us... We need to get out before this section floods completely!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110146/1B92EB4E",
	},
	[11014701]={
		["ContentKR"]="현재 수위가 기준치보다 높아 안전문을 가동할 수 없습니다. 수위를 조절한 후 다시 시도하세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92FB62",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014702,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Current water level exceeds safety threshold. Safety gate will remain closed. Reduce water level to reopen.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110147/1B92FB62",
	},
	[11014702]={
		["ContentKR"]="주입 장치는 놈들이 통제하고 있는데…… 하지만 여긴 저수조니까 분명 배수 장치가 있을 거예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B92FB8C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="They're controlling the inlets... But since this is a reservoir, it must also have drainage outlets.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110147/1B92FB8C",
	},
	[11014801]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 사용 방법이 새겨져 있어요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11014801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B930BCA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The instructions here say...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930BCA",
	},
	[11014802]={
		["ContentKR"]="'급속 배수 방법, 저수조 밸브 3개를 동시에 연다……'",
		["DialogueId"]=11014802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B930BF4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="\"For rapid discharge, activate three reservoir valves simultaneously.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930BF4",
	},
	[11014803]={
		["ContentKR"]="멀리 못 갔을 거다! 남은 필토이드들도 지하로 몰아넣어!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014803,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B930C1E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014804,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="They can't be far! Herd the remaining Filthoids into the tunnels!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930C1E",
	},
	[11014804]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 지하 출구를 봉쇄하고, 반역자들이 나오면 즉시 처형해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11014804,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B930C48",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014805,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930C48",
	},
	[11014805]={
		["ContentKR"]="시간이 얼마 없으니 서둘러!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014805,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B930C72",
		["NextDialogue"]=11014806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Hurry up! We're running out of time!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930C72",
	},
	[11014806]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 우리도 서두르죠!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B930C9C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...We should hurry up too!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110148/1B930C9C",
	},
	[11014901]={
		["ContentKR"]="수위가 낮아졌어요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11014901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B931C32",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The water's receding!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110149/1B931C32",
	},
	[11015001]={
		["ContentKR"]="마지막 밸브 하나 남았어요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B932C9A",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Angry",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Just one more valve!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110150/1B932C9A",
	},
	[11015002]={
		["Content"]="再坚持一下，第二个水阀的位置找到了！",
		["DialogueId"]=11015002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B932CC4",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Angry",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110150/1B932CC4",
	},
	[11015003]={
		["Content"]="最后一个……！关闭最后一个水阀后，再去门那儿试试吧？",
		["DialogueId"]=11015003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B932CEE",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Confident",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110150/1B932CEE",
	},
	[11015101]={
		["Camera"]="5.064453,-47.199432,146.200714,0.000109,-3.600404,17.225021,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="일단은 안전한 것 같네요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="29.699219,-39.826668,144.779388,0.000113,-2.00018,14.432239,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933D02",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015102,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We should be safe for now...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933D02",
	},
	[11015102]={
		["ContentKR"]="저 앞이 출구일 거예요. 하지만……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B933D2C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015103,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The exit should be up ahead, but...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933D2C",
	},
	[11015103]={
		["Camera"]="184.916016,-61.012665,145.951035,0.000085,-1.799372,155.628265,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="놈들이 매복해 있을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="207.275391,-71.141312,146.722122,0.000085,-1.799372,155.428955,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933D56",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015104,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="They're definitely waiting to ambush us there.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933D56",
	},
	[11015104]={
		["Camera"]="50.191406,-61.684036,121.714935,0.000108,8.400572,23.04035,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="상처가 이렇게 깊은데, 우리에게…… 승산이 있을까요…… 그리고 요새에서 탈출한다고 해도, 군단이 우릴 가만두지 않을 텐데…… 추적과 암살 시도가 계속될 거예요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="32.810547,-69.076233,118.901154,0.000109,7.400571,23.039328,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933D80",
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain02_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="You're heavily wounded... Is there any chance of us escaping this place...? Even if we make it out, the Legion will hunt us down... We'll be fugitives forever, constantly dodging assassins...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933D80",
	},
	[11015105]={
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 하수도에서 평생 사는 수밖에 없겠군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015105,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933DAA",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Maybe we should just live in the sewers forever.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933DAA",
	},
	[11015106]={
		["Camera"]="39.349609,-74.855362,160.701706,0.000115,-7.799802,25.839321,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 여긴 음식과 옷이 없는…… 아니지, 같이 제대로 된 방법을 생각해 보자니까요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015106,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="23.103516,-82.726669,163.175507,0.000116,-8.599856,25.63818,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933DD4",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015111,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But this place doesn't have enough food or clothing — Please, let us figure something out!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Disagree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933DD4",
	},
	[11015107]={
		["ContentKR"]="나가서 놈들과 목숨 걸고 싸우는 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933DFE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We should just head out and fight to the death.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933DFE",
	},
	[11015108]={
		["Camera"]="39.349609,-74.855362,160.701706,0.000115,-7.799802,25.839321,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="안 돼요…… 당신이 있다고 해도, 부상이 심해서 힘들 거예요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="23.103516,-82.726669,163.175507,0.000116,-8.599856,25.63818,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933E28",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015109,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="No... You might be a skilled soldier, but you're heavily wounded. We wouldn't stand a chance...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Disagree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933E28",
	},
	[11015109]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 다른 방법은 없을까요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015109,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B933E52",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015111,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Do you have another idea...?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933E52",
	},
	[11015110]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 진정해요. 반드시 방법이 있을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015110,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933E7C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Let's take a deep breath. We'll come up with something.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933E7C",
	},
	[11015111]={
		["Camera"]="184.492188,-49.928711,137.304932,0.000086,2.99945,161.84729,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11015111,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="200.958984,-55.329666,136.396576,0.000086,1.799379,162.846802,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933EA6",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015112,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933EA6",
	},
	[11015112]={
		["ContentKR"]="겉옷을 벗으세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015112,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933ED0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015113,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Take off your clothes.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933ED0",
	},
	[11015113]={
		["Camera"]="-17.943359,-63.457489,146.000702,0.000093,-3.202395,18.475502,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="네?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015113,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-0.720703,-57.570724,144.94313,0.000094,-3.00238,17.275826,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933EFA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015114,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="What?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110005:Shock_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933EFA",
	},
	[11015114]={
		["Camera"]="489.007812,-334.206299,292.918701,0.000068,-19.202305,139.670319,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저와 옷을 바꿔 입자고요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015114,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="445.892578,-297.610748,273.224854,0.000065,-19.402313,139.27037,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933F24",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015115,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We're switching outfits.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933F24",
	},
	[11015115]={
		["ContentKR"]="놈들은 제가 중앙 관제실에서 죽은 줄 압니다. 지금 당신과 함께 있는 사람이 누군지 몰라요. 저쪽에서 확인할 수 있는 타깃은 당신뿐이죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015115,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933F4E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015116,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="They think I died in the central control room and they have no idea who your accomplice is. You are the only target they can identify.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933F4E",
	},
	[11015116]={
		["ContentKR"]="제가 당신인 척하고 밖으로 나가겠습니다. 의무관 제복은 눈에 잘 띄니까 놈들을 유인할 수 있을 테니 그때 어떻게든 빠져나가세요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015116,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933F78",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015117,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{3},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll wear your uniform and make a run out there. The medic's uniform is conspicuous enough to draw their attention. You'll make your escape during the chaos.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933F78",
	},
	[11015117]={
		["Camera"]="30.167969,-51.420792,112.9972,0.000112,8.79729,16.678789,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지금…… 농담하는 거죠? 체형이 달라서 금방 발각될 거라고요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015117,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="49.683594,-45.570618,123.095779,0.000108,7.997291,16.280628,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933FA2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015118,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Shock_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Are you serious? We're completely different sizes! They'll quickly realise they're chasing the wrong person!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933FA2",
	},
	[11015118]={
		["Camera"]="174.623047,-31.802631,151.059662,0.000112,-2.002987,168.472702,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저들에게 혼란을 주면 당신이 도망갈 시간을 1초라도 더 벌 수 있을 겁니다. 다프네, 교관님 유언을 따르셔야 합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015118,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="182.253906,-34.744297,148.60463,0.000112,-1.403016,167.073715,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B933FCC",
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Stop\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The longer I can distract them, the better your chances. This is the plan, Daphne. Honour Sir Avar's last wishes.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933FCC",
	},
	[11015119]={
		["ContentKR"]="망설일 시간 없습니다. 어서요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015119,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B933FF6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't hesitate, hurry up.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B933FF6",
	},
	[11015120]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 안 돼요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015120,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["GUID"]="1B934020",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...No.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934020",
	},
	[11015121]={
		["ContentKR"]="아버지의 바람을 기억해 줘서 고마워요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015121,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93404A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Thank you for respecting my father's wish.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93404A",
	},
	[11015122]={
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 <Highlight>제 바람</>도 들어 주실 수 있나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015122,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934074",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But could you at least hear my wishes?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934074",
	},
	[11015123]={
		["Camera"]="81.068359,-101.422974,129.361847,0.000125,4.718909,46.462204,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="디즈마니아엔 비가 자주 내려요. 제가 아주 어렸을 때, 제 친구들은 비 때문에 예쁘게 빗은 머리카락이 젖고 깨끗한 새 치마가 더러워진다며, 모두 비를 싫어했죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015123,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="54.875,-18.257599,133.25174,0.000129,4.718895,2.462883,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B93409E",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110005:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110005)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015124,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0065_story_daphnis_theme\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Dismania is a rainy place. When I was a little girl, all my friends hated the rain because it would mess with their hair and soil their pretty dresses.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93409E",
	},
	[11015124]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 전 아니었어요. 제 어깨에는 빗방울이 닿지 않았거든요. 제가 보는 비는 장화 아래에서 튀고, 우산 끝에서 떨어지는 물방울이 전부였어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015124,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9340C8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015125,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But I didn't hate the rain, because it never reached my shoulders. In my eyes, the rain was just little ripples sprouting around my boots and droplets dripping off the brolly.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9340C8",
	},
	[11015125]={
		["Camera"]="54.875,-18.257599,133.25174,0.000129,4.718895,2.462883,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="좀 크고 난 후에야 제가 비를 좋아하는 게 아니었다는 걸 깨달았어요. 어릴 땐 아빠가 곁에서 대신 비를 맞아 주신 거였죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015125,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="93.048828,40.788128,133.998138,0.00015,6.718611,-32.736683,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9340F2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015126,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But as I grew older, I realised that rain wasn't that nice. It used to look nice, only because my dad was there to bear it for me.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9340F2",
	},
	[11015126]={
		["ContentKR"]="아빠는 무뚝뚝하셨지만 정말 좋은 분이셨어요. 하지만 평생 남을 챙기느라 자신은 돌보지 않으셨죠, 평생을요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015126,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93411C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015127,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="My dad is such a kind man, and such a stubborn one too. He always put others first. Always.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93411C",
	},
	[11015127]={
		["Camera"]="164.265625,52.641933,152.843292,0.00016,-3.081446,-150.134415,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11015127,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="148.884766,43.813484,150.215881,0.00016,-0.481351,-151.134293,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934146",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015128,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934146",
	},
	[11015128]={
		["Camera"]="-244.791016,257.330566,392.743347,0.000162,-32.482235,-40.329792,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아빠는 제가 태어나기 전에 엄마에게 '어울리는 사람'이 되기 위해 군단에 들어가 생사를 넘나들며 싸우셨고, 제가 크고 나선 '제 앞길에 방해가 되지 않기' 위해 저와 엄마 곁을 떠나셨죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015128,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-222.087891,284.093262,392.743347,0.000163,-32.482235,-40.329765,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934170",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015129,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Before I was born, he joined the Legion and fought hard to prove himself worthy of my mom. After I grew up, he left us because he didn't want to \"soil my future.\"",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934170",
	},
	[11015129]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 길에서 마주치면 냉정한 얼굴로 아빠라고도 못 부르게 하고선, 깊은 밤 술집에서 저와 엄마 이름을 부르며 술에 취해 울던 분이셨어요. 얼마나 위대한 아버지인가요, 늘 혼자서 모든 걸 짊어지시다니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015129,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93419A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015130,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...In public, he'd scowl and forbid me to call him Dad. But deep in the night, he'd drunkenly shout mine and my mother's name, crying — He was always bearing the weight of everything on his own...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93419A",
	},
	[11015130]={
		["Camera"]="62.044922,-11.649038,139.392792,0.000139,2.917522,0.270603,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만, 아빠는 그 모든 걸 제가 원하는지 묻지 않으셨어요…… 지금 당신처럼요. 당신도 제가 당신 목숨을 밟고 살아남길 원하는지 물어보지 않았다고요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015130,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="63.021484,-11.841919,146.131653,0.000139,-0.682527,0.270605,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9341C4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015131,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="But he never asked if I wanted any of this... Just like you never asked if I wanted to live knowing you sacrificed yourself for me!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9341C4",
	},
	[11015131]={
		["ContentKR"]="당신이나 아빠는 몰라요…… 저는 한 번도 비바람을 대신 막아 줄 사람을 원한 적 없어요. 내가 정말 원하는 건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015131,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9341EE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015132,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Neither of you know what I actually wanted... I never wished for a hero who'd shield me from the rain. My wish is that...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9341EE",
	},
	[11015132]={
		["Camera"]="74.1875,-11.549334,140.752075,0.000139,2.317531,0.270602,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="비바람을 막아 줄 우산이, 오직 한 사람만 지킬 수 있다면, 전 모두와 함께 빗속으로 들어가겠어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015132,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Smile01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="54.34375,-11.712122,143.421494,0.000139,-0.282503,0.470605,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934218",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015133,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=15,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934218",
	},
	[11015133]={
		["ContentKR"]="제가 바라는 건, <Highlight>당신과 함께</> 살아남는 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015133,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934242",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015134,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="I wish that we make it out and live on, together.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934242",
	},
	[11015134]={
		["Camera"]="148.310547,4.638587,138.830399,0.000143,6.517544,-170.927872,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다프네……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015134,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="160.496094,6.583258,134.802444,0.000143,6.317535,-170.927872,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B93426C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015135,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Daphne...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93426C",
	},
	[11015135]={
		["Camera"]="54.921875,23.440533,140.073502,0.000153,1.11843,-18.329687,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다시 한번 잘 생각해 보죠…… 분명 방법이 있을 거예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015135,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Unhappy01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="70.310547,18.636772,139.925446,0.000152,2.918505,-16.931318,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934296",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015136,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's think together… There has to be another way!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110005:Think_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934296",
	},
	[11015136]={
		["Camera"]="-35.435547,164.474655,360.730713,0.000111,20.917017,-153.732254,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="현재 상황을 정리해 보죠. 풀비스는 우리 입을 막는 게 목적이에요. 그래서 우리한테 스파이라는 누명을 씌워서 군단이 우릴 쫓고 있고, 결국 우릴 죽이려고 하고 있죠……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015136,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-35.435547,164.474655,327.571594,0.000111,20.717014,-153.73233,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9342C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015137,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Fulvis wants us silenced. That's our situation. He's labelled us as spies so that our fellow soldiers would kill us for him...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9342C0",
	},
	[11015137]={
