		["ContentKR"]="'그리핀'과 '스노우 울프' 두 선발대에 우리 둘만 남았고, 요새에 있는 병사는 전부 풀비스와 그의 부관인 펄시의 지시를 따르죠…… 요새에 있는 병사……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015137,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9342EA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015138,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We're the only ones left from the Griffins and Snow Wolves. Every soldier here follows Fulvis and his adjutant Falsi... Every soldier in the fortress...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9342EA",
	},
	[11015138]={
		["Camera"]="43.673828,56.272556,139.847488,0.000149,0.117582,-27.726179,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐, 생각났어요……! 아버지가 말씀하신 게 있거든요. \"이 보 전진을 위해 일 보 후퇴를 하고, 위험 속에서 기회를 찾아라\"라고요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015138,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Confident01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="58.037109,42.618416,142.168106,0.000149,1.317605,-24.925119,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934314",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015139,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait, I have an idea...! Father once said a strategic retreat could be a cover for an advance. Sometimes the greatest risks lead to victory.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain01_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934314",
	},
	[11015139]={
		["Camera"]="7.253906,20.019621,143.611893,0.00015,-1.08212,-15.727008,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다른 선택지도 있는데…… 호랑이 굴에 스스로 들어가는 거죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015139,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93433E",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=11015140,
			[2]=11015142,
		},
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110005},AnimationId{\"Explain01_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="We still have one option... We can turn ourselves in.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93433E",
	},
	[11015140]={
		["Camera"]="184.310547,36.038517,134.327988,0.000148,4.518026,-160.7276,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스를 찾아가겠다는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015140,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934368",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015141,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You want to surrender to Fulvis?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934368",
	},
	[11015141]={
		["Camera"]="52.292969,25.010664,127.544891,0.000135,6.718037,-16.930437,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아니요, 풀비스 말고 <Highlight>다른 사람</>요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015141,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934392",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015145,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="No, not to Fulvis. To someone else...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934392",
	},
	[11015142]={
		["Camera"]="209.996094,15.023735,137.484879,0.000148,1.318049,-168.926804,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다른 사람……이라고요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015142,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9343BC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015143,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Turn ourselves in... to someone else?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9343BC",
	},
	[11015143]={
		["Camera"]="52.292969,25.010664,127.544891,0.000135,6.718037,-16.930437,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="네!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015143,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9343E6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015145,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Exactly!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9343E6",
	},
	[11015145]={
		["Camera"]="52.292969,25.010664,127.544891,0.000135,6.718037,-16.930437,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="펄시가 한 말 기억해요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015145,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="48.234375,29.943214,125.579117,0.000142,6.717955,-19.329165,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B93443A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015146,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Remember what Falsi said in the broadcast?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93443A",
	},
	[11015146]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 지하 출구를 봉쇄하고, 반역자들이 나오면 즉시 처형해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015146,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934464",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014411.11014411'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015147,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934464",
	},
	[11015147]={
		["ContentKR"]="시간이 얼마 없으니 서둘러!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015147,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93448E",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014411.11014411'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015148,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110012,
		["Subtitle"]="Hurry up! We're running out of time!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93448E",
	},
	[11015148]={
		["Camera"]="-171.576172,354.275269,321.845215,0.000118,-24.091339,-52.323902,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지금 풀비스가 론샤 요새를 장악하고 있으니, 우릴 잡는 건 시간문제인데 펄시는 왜 서둘렀을까요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015148,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-196.277344,386.265381,339.917847,0.000119,-24.091339,-52.323936,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9344B8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015149,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Lonza Fortress is currently under Fulvis's full control. We're little more than rats in a cage. Then why is Falsi in such a hurry?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=25,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9344B8",
	},
	[11015149]={
		["ContentKR"]="아까 제가 어떤 병사가 하는 말을 몰래 들었다고 했잖아요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015149,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9344E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015150,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Do you remember what I overheard earlier from one of the soldiers—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9344E2",
	},
	[11015150]={
		["ContentKR"]="게다가 전황이 좋지 않아 시빌라 군단장님도 론샤 요새로 오고 계십니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015150,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B93450C",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11014411.11014411'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015151,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93450C",
	},
	[11015151]={
		["Camera"]="154.445312,44.61274,163.534317,0.000121,-6.890936,-151.527649,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그러니까, 시빌라 군단장을 만나 보호를 요청하겠단 말입니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015151,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="177.171875,56.903561,166.748993,0.000123,-8.491031,-151.927643,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934536",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015152,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...So you want to seek protection from Sibylle?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Think_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934536",
	},
	[11015152]={
		["Camera"]="31.996094,51.468288,139.671326,0.000175,-0.491391,-24.739786,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="맞아요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015152,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934560",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015153,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Correct.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934560",
	},
	[11015153]={
		["Camera"]="179.789062,39.516891,181.891464,0.000178,-14.491817,-158.539825,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 풀비스가 거짓 증거까지 준비해서 죄명을 마련해 뒀…… 잠깐, 방금 얘기한 '호랑이 굴'에 들어가는 작전이 그 뜻이었군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015153,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93458A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015154,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="But Fulvis has already condemned us and even fabricated evidence... Wait, I get why you want to turn ourselves in.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93458A",
	},
	[11015154]={
		["Camera"]="42.076172,35.060333,133.820343,0.000195,2.508544,-21.337816,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="네! 시빌라 군단장도 연금원 출신이에요. 제가 아는 그분이라면 어떠한 배반도 용납하지 않을 거예요. 설령 그게 가장 가까운 사람이더라도요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015154,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Confident01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="28.144531,40.503914,129.73497,0.000195,2.508482,-21.537373,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9345B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015155,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Mm-hmm! Chief Sibylle is also a graduate of the Academy. From what I know of her, she wouldn't tolerate betrayal from anyone, not even those she holds dear.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110005:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9345B4",
	},
	[11015155]={
		["Camera"]="-191.923828,110.773376,292.437317,0.000252,-26.092831,-22.740551,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 하지만 그렇기 때문에 신중히 심문할 거예요. 용의자를 함부로 죽여서 단서가 끊어지게 두지 않을 거란 말이죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015155,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-139.972656,126.843193,222.647064,0.000272,-16.892361,-30.148384,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9345DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015156,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="...Which is also why Sibylle would carefully review any acts of treason. She would not make any hasty decisions to execute the suspects because she'd want to get to the bottom of it.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=30,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9345DE",
	},
	[11015156]={
		["ContentKR"]="시빌라 군단장을 만나면, 우린 군교도소에 갇힐 가능성이 커요. 듣기로는 경계가 아주 삼엄해서 새 한 마리도 빠져나갈 수 없대요. 하지만 오히려 그렇기 때문에 우리를 해치려는 모든 위험도 들어올 수 없겠죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015156,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934608",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015157,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="If we manage to meet her, she's most likely to throw us into the Imperial Prison. The Prison is reputedly so well guarded that even a fly could not escape the place. But it'll also keep out anyone who wishes to silence us.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934608",
	},
	[11015157]={
		["ContentKR"]="오히려 그곳이 가장 안전한 장소가 될 거예요. 그리고 심문 과정에서 우리의 무죄를 증명하는 게, 우리가 살아남을 유일한 기회예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015157,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B934632",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015158,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The Imperial Prison will be our safest refuge. We can prove our innocence during interrogations. This is our only chance to survive.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934632",
	},
	[11015158]={
		["Camera"]="47.939453,49.246361,119.444901,0.000288,8.907598,-26.339521,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="문제는 스파이 혐의로 심문을 받으면 당신 명예에 큰 오점이 남는다는 거죠…… 하지만 심문만 잘 견디면, 우리의 결백을 증명하고 진범을 처벌할 수 있을 거예요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015158,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110005:None"],
		["FinalCamera"]="27.193359,59.519375,115.815987,0.000286,7.707581,-26.338728,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B93465C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015159,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Your reputation will suffer though, as you'll be interrogated for espionage... But once we endure the questioning, we will be able to clear our names and bring the real traitors to justice.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93465C",
	},
	[11015159]={
		["Camera"]="243.919922,32.791145,139.274689,0.00031,-0.492122,-160.143555,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 스파이 혐의로 심문을 받으면…… 그 사실이 군단 밖으로, 예를 들면…… 황실에 전해질 수도 있겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015159,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="259.697266,38.494522,139.446808,0.000309,-1.092161,-160.143555,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B934686",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015160,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Being questioned for espionage... Any chance that word gets out beyond the Legion? Perhaps the royal family will hear of this?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934686",
	},
	[11015160]={
		["Camera"]="49.503906,51.240067,154.416092,0.000309,-5.89185,-28.343378,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="율리우스 폐하는 늘 군사를 중시하시고, 제13군단을 직접 창설하셨으니까…… 그럴 수 있겠죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015160,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="49.503906,51.240067,138.708191,0.000309,0.108293,-28.74304,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9346B0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015161,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="The army has always been the focus of Emperor Julius. Moreover, His Majesty personally founded the 13th Legion. I believe it will reach his ears...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9346B0",
	},
	[11015161]={
		["Camera"]="132.001953,71.535721,136.665466,0.000171,6.118688,-133.138336,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그렇다면, <Highlight>그 사람</>이 도움이 될 수도 있겠군요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015161,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="143.138672,83.421745,135.787506,0.000172,4.518669,-132.938339,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9346DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015162,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110022},AnimationId{\"Think_End\"},Duration{2}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Then perhaps... that person can help us.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B9346DA",
	},
	[11015162]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아요, 당신 말대로 하죠. 시빌라를 찾아갑시다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015162,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934704",
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Stop\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0065_story_daphnis_theme\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Alrigh, let's go with your plan and find Sibylle.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B934704",
	},
	[11015163]={
		["ContentKR"]="망설일 시간 없어요. 어서 가요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015163,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93472E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Time's against us. Let's move!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110151/1B93472E",
	},
	[11015201]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래서 전 다프네의 손을 잡고 문틈 사이로 비치는 빛을 향해 걸어갔습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015201,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934D6A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015202,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0066_story_daphnis_surrender\"}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="And thus, I took her hand and we stepped towards that narrow beam of sunlight piercing through the door's gap.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110152/1B934D6A",
	},
	[11015202]={
		["ContentKR"]="마치 찬란하게 빛나는 무덤으로 발을 내딛는 기분이었죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015202,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934D94",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It felt as though we were stepping into a shimmering grave of our own making...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110152/1B934D94",
	},
	[11015203]={
		["ContentKR"]="우린 마지막 힘을 다해 추격자를 따돌리고, 막 요새에 도착한 시빌라 군단장을 찾아갔습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015203,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934DBE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015204,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="We expended our last ounces of strength evading our pursuers, in time to meet Chief Sibylle, who had just arrived at the fortress.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110152/1B934DBE",
	},
	[11015204]={
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 다프네가 예상한 대로, 이곳에 압송된 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015204,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B934DE8",
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Stop\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0066_story_daphnis_surrender\"}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="And just as Daphne had predicted, we were escorted to this very place.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110152/1B934DE8",
	},
	[11015301]={
		["Camera"]="41.0,-2.0,-4.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이야기는 흥미로웠다만 현장에 있던 '나르왈' 병사의 증언과는 완전 딴판이군. 넌 너와 아바르 헤데란이 무죄라고 주장하고 있지……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="76.0,-2.0,-4.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="1B935DD2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015302,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110032},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0043_story_empire\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="What a riveting story, which completely contradicts the testimonies provided by the Narwhals. Since you claim that you and Avar Hrodland are innocent—",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110021:n(110022)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935DD2",
	},
	[11015302]={
		["Camera"]="-638.0,-116.664062,3.0,0.0,0.0,13.002062,75.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그럼 현장에서 발견된 이 증거들은 어떻게 설명할 건가? 왜 포세이큰 동맹에게 쓴 편지의 필적뿐 아니라, 종이에 남은 흔적과 아바르의 전술 장갑의 마모 상태까지도 완벽히 일치하지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935DFC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's talk about the evidence then. How come the letter pledging allegiance to The Forsakens not only bears Avar's handwriting, but also shows faint marks aligning perfectly with the worn parts on Avar's glove?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935DFC",
	},
	[11015303]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="죄를 뒤집어씌우기 위해서입니다. 진범은 아바르를 중앙 관제실로 몰고 가서 아바르가 그 문서를 발견해 지문과 장갑 자국을 남기도록 유도한 겁니다. 필적이야 타인이 모방하기 쉽고 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015303,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B935E26",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015304,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It was a setup. The real culprit lured Avar into the central control room so that Avar would find the letter and accidentally leave the unique marks of his glove on it when he was holding it. As for the handwriting, it could be faked by others.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Invite_Talk02_End",
			[2]="110022:Invite_Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935E26",
	},
	[11015304]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="전사한 병사들의 시신을 부검한 결과 요새 방어 기관에 의한 상처가 많이 발견됐는데, 론샤 요새 중앙 관제실의 조작 기록에는 아바르 헤데란 한 사람의 기록만 남아있더군. 이건 어떻게 설명할 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015304,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935E50",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015305,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="The forensic reports on the fallen soldiers indicate numerous wounds inflicted by the fortress's own defense systems, and only Avar Hrodland's name appears in the operation log of the central control room. How do you explain that?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Think_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935E50",
	},
	[11015305]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 중령님이 요새 조작 권한을 접수한 건 장치의 가동이 아니라 정지를 위해서였습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015305,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B935E7A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015306,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Commander Avar did not use his control to activate the defense systems — instead, he attempted to shut them down.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Invite_Think_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935E7A",
	},
	[11015306]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="조작 기록의 경우, 현장에 아바르보다 조작 권한이 높은 장교가 있었다면 자신의 조작 기록을 삭제하는 것도 충분히 가능했을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015306,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B935EA4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015307,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="As for the operation log, any officer with higher clearance than Sir Avar could easily manipulate the records to remove traces of their involvement.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk03_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935EA4",
	},
	[11015307]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 지금 자신이 무슨 말을 하고 있는지 알고 있는가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015307,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935ECE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015308,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="...Do you have any idea what you just said?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Invite_Talk03_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935ECE",
	},
	[11015308]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="물론입니다. 전 지금 론샤 요새 사건의 진짜 배후, 안토니 풀비스를 정식으로 고발하는 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015308,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110022:Unhappy02",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B935EF8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015309,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"-223.0,-2.90332,5.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}},CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I absolutely do. I'm formally accusing Antonius Fulvis of orchestrating the events at Lonza Fortress.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935EF8",
	},
	[11015309]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스 대령에 대한 고발이 사실이 아닐 경우, 어떤 형벌을 받을 줄도 알고?",
		["DialogueId"]=11015309,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935F22",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015310,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Then are you aware of the consequences if your accusation against Colonel Fulvis are proven false?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Talk03_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935F22",
	},
	[11015310]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 무고죄로 징역 10년형에 처하게 됩니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015310,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B935F4C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015311,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...It's ten years in prison, for making false accusations.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Invite_Talk03_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935F4C",
	},
	[11015311]={
		["Camera"]="-638.0,-116.664062,3.0,0.0,0.0,13.002062,75.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="틀렸어. 반역죄와 간첩죄, 거기에 무고죄가 더해지는 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015311,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935F76",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015312,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="Incorrect. You'll be charged with treason, espionage, and making false accusations.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Invite_Disagree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935F76",
	},
	[11015312]={
		["Camera"]="-638.0,-116.664062,3.0,0.0,0.0,13.002062,75.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="제국 최고형을 받게 될 거다. 가시덩굴에 휘감겨 디즈마니아 중심에 있는 천국의 나무에서 거꾸로 매달리는 공개 처형을 당하게 되겠지. 마지막 숨이 끊어질 때까지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015312,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935FA0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015313,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="And the highest penalty in the Empire awaits you: being hung upside down with thorny vines and crucified on the Heaventree in the centre of Dismania, until your very last breath is taken.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Explain01_Start",
			[2]="110022:Think_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935FA0",
	},
	[11015313]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="전 사실만 말했습니다. 저와 다프네 세오도어를 따로 심문하기로 했다면, 우리의 증언이 서로 일치한다는 걸 아실 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015313,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B935FCA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015314,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm telling the truth. Since you have chosen to interrogate me and Daphne Theodore separately, you must be aware that our testimonies can perfectly corroborate each other.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Invite_Think_End",
			[2]="110032:Invite_Explain01_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935FCA",
	},
	[11015314]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="꽤 심한 부상을 입었는데도 고문을 견디며 증언을 번복하지 않다니, 칭찬할 만하군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015314,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B935FF4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015315,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Despite suffering grievous wounds, you have endured intense interrogation without changing your testimonies. Admirable, I must say.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Invite_Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B935FF4",
	},
	[11015315]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="심문관, 새 심문을 준비해. '불의 지옥'을 사용해야겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015315,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93601E",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110032:p(P11015301)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11015316,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Push the interrogation to the next level — initiate the \"Inferno.\"",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B93601E",
	},
	[11015316]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="네. 최면 주사제가 준비되었습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015316,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B936048",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015317,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, ma'am. The hypnotic agent is ready.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B936048",
	},
	[11015317]={
		["Camera"]="83.922852,-1.549805,-1.0,0.0,0.0,-0.400024,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이번 심문도 버티면 네 증언의 가치를 다시 생각해 보지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015317,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B936072",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110032:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11015318,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Survive this, and I'll consider the veracity of your testimony.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B936072",
	},
	[11015318]={
		["Camera"]="-128.116211,-4.680664,-1.0,0.0,0.0,178.997147,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 좋습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015318,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93609C",
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Stop\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0043_story_empire\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Invite_Agree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110153/1B93609C",
	},
	[11015401]={
		["ContentKR"]="……머리가 너무 아파……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B936E61",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...My head hurts...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110154/1B936E61",
	},
	[11015402]={
		["ContentKR"]="아까 교도소장이…… '심문'한다고……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B936E62",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015403,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The warden just said... the next-level \"interrogation\"...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Sigh_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110154/1B936E62",
	},
	[11015403]={
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐, 저 둘은……! 레온…… 마르코?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015403,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B936E63",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait, isn't that Leon… and Marco!?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110154/1B936E63",
	},
	[11015404]={
		["ContentKR"]="제국의 반역자여……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015404,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B936E64",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015405,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Traitor of the Empire...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110154/1B936E64",
	},
	[11015405]={
		["ContentKR"]="네가 정말 무죄라면, 너의 정의를 내게 증명해 보아라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015405,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B936E8E",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="If you claim to be innocent, prove it to me.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110154/1B936E8E",
	},
	[11015501]={
		["ContentKR"]="레온! 살아 있었나!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B937EA2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015502,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Leon! You are still alive?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110155/1B937EA2",
	},
	[11015502]={
		["ContentKR"]="재판장님도 아시다시피 우리 작전 계획이 전부 노출됐습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B937ECC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015503,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamLaiang",
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, ma'am, all our plans have been leaked...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110155/1B937ECC",
	},
	[11015503]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아바르 중령님은 선발대 작전 계획 수립에 참여하셨습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B937EF6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015504,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamLaiang",
		["Subtitle"]="...Commander Avar participated in the formulation of the vanguard squad's combat plan...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110155/1B937EF6",
	},
	[11015504]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 제 생각에는 카론인 중령님이 포세이큰 동맹에 계획을 누설했을 가능성이 큽니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B937F20",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015505,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamLaiang",
		["Subtitle"]="...He's a Charon. He was the one most likely to reveal our plans to The Forsakens...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110155/1B937F20",
	},
	[11015505]={
		["ContentKR"]="무슨 말을 하는 거야!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B937F4A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What did you just say?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110155/1B937F4A",
	},
	[11015601]={
		["ContentKR"]="마르코!",
		["DialogueId"]=11015601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B938F0A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015602,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Marco!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110156/1B938F0A",
	},
	[11015602]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 포세이큰 동맹이 길마다 함정을 설치해 뒀습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015602,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B938F34",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015603,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamMaerke",
		["Subtitle"]="...The Forsakens set traps in every path...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110156/1B938F34",
	},
	[11015603]={
		["ContentKR"]="재판장님도 아시다시피 누군가…… 우리를 배신했습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B938F5E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015604,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamMaerke",
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, ma'am, someone... betrayed us...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110156/1B938F5E",
	},
	[11015604]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아니, 이건 마르코가 아니야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B938F88",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...No, this is not Marco.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110156/1B938F88",
	},
	[11015701]={
		["ContentKR"]="심문관이 '최면 주사제'라는 말을 했었지……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B939F72",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015702,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="That interrogator mentioned a hypnotic agent...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110157/1B939F72",
	},
	[11015702]={
		["ContentKR"]="여긴…… 현실 세계가 아닌 거야. 이건 꿈인가 보군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B939F9C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm probably not in a real world. This is a dream...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110157/1B939F9C",
	},
	[11015801]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 교관님……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93AFDA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Sir Avar...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93AFDA",
	},
	[11015802]={
		["ContentKR"]="재판장님도 아시다시피 저는 론샤 전투의 선발대 지휘관 아바르 헤데란입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93B004",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015803,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamAware",
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, ma'am, I am Avar Hrodland, Commander of the vanguard squads in this mission...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B004",
	},
	[11015803]={
		["ContentKR"]="저는 휘페르보레아 제국을 배신했고, 13군단을 배신했고…… '그리핀'과 '스노우 울프' 두 선발대를 팔아넘겼습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93B02E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015804,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamAware",
		["Subtitle"]="I turned my back on the Hyperborean Empire. I betrayed the 13th Legion... I sold out the Griffins and the Snow Wolves...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B02E",
	},
	[11015804]={
		["ContentKR"]="저와 협조한 자는…… 전 부인 클로디아 세오도어 사이에서 낳은 딸…… 다프네…… 그리고…… 황립 사관학교에서 가르쳤던 제자…… {nickname2}입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015804,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93B058",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015805,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamAware",
		["Subtitle"]="My accomplices include... my daughter Daphne, from my ex-wife Claudia Theodore... and my protege at the Imperial Military College, ...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B058",
	},
	[11015805]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11015805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93B082",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B082",
	},
	[11015806]={
		["ContentKR"]="풀비스가 날 위해 준비한 '죄명'이 이거구나.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93B0AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015807,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="So this is the charge Fulvis had prepared for me.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B0AC",
	},
	[11015807]={
		["ContentKR"]="닥쳐. 그의 모습으로 말하지 마.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015807,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93B0D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015808,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Shut up. You're not him.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B0D6",
	},
	[11015808]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11015808,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93B100",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamAware",
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110158/1B93B100",
	},
	[11015901]={
		["ContentKR"]="재판장님도 아시다시피 저는 아바르 헤데란의 딸, 다프네 세오도어입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93C042",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015902,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, ma'am, I am Daphne Theodore, daughter of Avar Hrodland...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C042",
	},
	[11015902]={
		["ContentKR"]="제 아버지……와 {nickname2}…… 이 둘은 처음에 포세이큰 동맹에 정보를 팔아넘긴 대가를 똑같이 나눌 계획이었습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015902,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93C06C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015903,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="My father... and ... they planned to split the payment for selling intel to The Forsakens...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C06C",
	},
	[11015903]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 요새 핵심 구역에서…… 이익 분배 문제로……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015903,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93C096",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015904,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="...But at the heart of the fortress... They disagreed on the division of the spoils...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C096",
	},
	[11015904]={
		["ContentKR"]="제 아버지는……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015904,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93C0C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015905,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="My father... was...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C0C0",
	},
	[11015905]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}의 손에…… 계획적으로 살해당했습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015905,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93C0EA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015906,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="He was killed in a ruse woven by  ...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C0EA",
	},
	[11015906]={
		["ContentKR"]="그 후, 그 사람은 저에게 제 아버지 죽음의 진실을 숨겼습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015906,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93C114",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015907,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="{性别2:He|She} then deceived me about how my father died...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C114",
	},
	[11015907]={
		["ContentKR"]="범인을 재판장님 앞에 데려갈 테니…… 공정한 판결을 내려 주세요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11015907,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93C13E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11015908,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_DreamDafu",
		["Subtitle"]="I've brought the murderer to you, ma'am... I humbly request you to deliver a fair and just verdict...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C13E",
	},
	[11015908]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 넌 다프네가 아니야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11015908,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93C168",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...You're not Daphne.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110159/1B93C168",
	},
	[11016001]={
		["ContentKR"]="재판장님도 아시다시피 저는 론샤 요새 중앙 관제실의 콘솔입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93D0AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016002,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, ma'am, I am the control panel in the central control room of Lonza Fortress...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D0AA",
	},
	[11016002]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 헤데란 중령과 그리핀 소대장 {nickname2}, 이 둘이 함께 중앙 관제실에 들어와 조사하는 것을 제가 직접 봤습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016002,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93D0D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016003,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="I observed Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland and  enter the central control room...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D0D4",
	},
	[11016003]={
		["ContentKR"]="조사 중 두 사람 사이에 충돌이 일어났고…… 서로에게 총을 겨눴습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93D0FE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016004,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="A conflict erupted between them, and weapons were drawn...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D0FE",
	},
	[11016004]={
		["ContentKR"]="결국…… 아바르 중령이 제 앞에 쓰러졌고 그리핀 소대장 {nickname2} 혼자 이곳을 떠났습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016004,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93D128",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016005,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="I witnessed the fall of Colonel Avar.  left alone shortly after...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D128",
	},
	[11016005]={
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아 군단 격언 제18조, 과하게 순조로운 전황 뒤에는 적이 매복하고 있을 가능성이 높다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016005,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93D152",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016006,
		["SnapShot"]="ELECTRIC",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Motto 18 of the Hyperborean Legion: An unexpectedly easy victory often leads to an impending ambush...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D152",
	},
	[11016006]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 왜 꿈속에서도 저딴 격언이나 읊고 있는 거야!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016006,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93D17C",
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/poweron\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Um, can't believe you have to recite those mottos even in my dreams.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110160/1B93D17C",
	},
	[11016101]={
		["ContentKR"]="심판은 정의를 위한 것이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93E112",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="All verdicts are in the name of justice.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110161/1B93E112",
	},
	[11016102]={
		["ContentKR"]="모든 질문에 한 치의 거짓이나 숨김없이 사실대로 답해야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93E13C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="All questions must be answered absent falsehood. I tolerate no fabrication, alteration, or concealment of the truth.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110161/1B93E13C",
	},
	[11016103]={
		["ContentKR"]="제국의 군인으로서, 너는 제국을 배신하고 포세이큰 동맹과 접촉한 적이 있는가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93E166",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016104,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="As an Imperial soldier, have you betrayed your Empire by conspiring with The Forsakens?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110161/1B93E166",
	},
	[11016104]={
		["ContentKR"]="제국의 정의를 배신했다면, 반항은 그만두고 목을 바쳐라!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93E190",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Should you betray the justice of the Empire, this blade shall claim your deceit.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110161/1B93E190",
	},
	[11016105]={
		["ContentKR"]="(…… 이 질문은 쉽게 대답할 수 있겠어.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016105,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93E1BA",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(...This is an easy question.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110161/1B93E1BA",
	},
	[11016201]={
		["ContentKR"]="론샤 요새 전투에서 선발대가 전멸한 것이 너와 관련이 있는가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93F17A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016202,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Wardenry",
		["Subtitle"]="The vanguard squads were obliterated in the battle of Lonza Fortress. Were you the architect of their doom?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110162/1B93F17A",
	},
	[11016202]={
		["ContentKR"]="똑똑히 느껴라! 누군가의 배신 때문에 전사들이 이렇게 죽어 갔다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93F1A4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016203,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Wardenry",
		["Subtitle"]="Feel their agony! Betrayal led them to untimely deaths.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110162/1B93F1A4",
	},
	[11016203]={
		["ContentKR"]="동료들의 정의를 저버렸다면, 필토이드의 발톱에 찢겨라!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B93F1CE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016204,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Wardenry",
		["Subtitle"]="Should you betray the justice of your comrades, these Filthoids' claws shall tear you to pieces!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110162/1B93F1CE",
	},
	[11016204]={
		["ContentKR"]="(모두 이런 몬스터에게…… 풀비스…… 이런 몬스터들이 동료들을 물어뜯도록 하다니!)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016204,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B93F1F8",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(They were killed by these monsters... Fulvis... He actually unleashed these monsters upon his own comrades...!)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110162/1B93F1F8",
	},
	[11016301]={
		["ContentKR"]="마지막 질문이다. 아바르 헤데란을 네 손으로 죽였나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9401E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016302,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Wardenry",
		["Subtitle"]="One last question. Are you the cause of Avar Hrodland's demise?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B9401E2",
	},
	[11016302]={
		["ContentKR"]="아바르가 제국을 배반했다 하더라도 그는 항상 널 믿었다. 아바르가 불바다에서 목숨을 잃어갈 때 넌 뭘 하고 있었지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94020C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Despite his faults, he trusted you. Where were you when he was consumed by flames?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B94020C",
	},
	[11016303]={
		["ContentKR"]="(맞아…… 교관님은 <Highlight>확실히</> 날 믿으셨어……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016303,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B940236",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016304,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Yes... He truly trusted me...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B940236",
	},
	[11016304]={
		["ContentKR"]="(복수를 끝내기 전까진 무조건 살아남아야 해…… 이 여자 손에 죽을 순 없어……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016304,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B940260",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016305,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(I must survive... to avenge him... I cannot let this woman kill me...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B940260",
	},
	[11016305]={
		["ContentKR"]="동료의 정의를 저버렸다면 이 지옥 불에 타 죽게 될 것이다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016305,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94028A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016306,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Should you betray the loyalty of friendship, these infernal flames shall burn you to ashes!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B94028A",
	},
	[11016306]={
		["ContentKR"]="(정의…… 정의…… 이 여자는 줄곧 '정의'를 좇고 있다……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016306,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9402B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016307,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Justice... justice... That's what she keeps talking about...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B9402B4",
	},
	[11016307]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이제…… <Highlight>그 일</>을 그녀에게 말해줄 때가 된 것 같아……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11016307,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9402DE",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Time to reveal the truth of that day...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110163/1B9402DE",
	},
	[11016401]={
		["ContentKR"]="교도소장님, 당신이 품고 있는 그 정의를 위해서……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94124A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Ma'am, to satisfy the justice you seek—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110164/1B94124A",
	},
	[11016402]={
		["ContentKR"]="그날 중앙 관제실에서 있었던 모든 '진실'을 말씀드리겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B941274",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Allow me to tell you the truth... of what unfolded in the central control room that day.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110164/1B941274",
	},
	[11016501]={
		["Camera"]="-12.243164,-221.074219,149.612579,0.001641,-5.409393,88.605331,35.932411,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………!!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-14.769531,-324.904297,159.446762,0.001641,-5.209378,88.605347,35.932411,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9422B2",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110039:n(110040)",
			[2]="110040:n(110039)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016502,
		["Scripts"]="\
PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110039},State{\"Sit\"}},\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="...!!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B9422B2",
	},
	[11016502]={
		["Camera"]="43.549805,139.308594,128.25798,0.001613,-1.609104,-101.194138,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 왜 갑자기 깬 거지? 가장 중요한 걸 묻고 있었는데!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="52.8125,137.478516,128.257767,0.001613,-1.209135,-100.994232,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9422DC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016503,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110039,
		["Subtitle"]="...Why did you wake up? My questioning had just reached a pivotal point!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B9422DC",
	},
	[11016503]={
		["Camera"]="55.112305,-650.192383,134.037598,0.001601,-6.609225,97.210686,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮습니다, 교도소장님. 제가 꿈에서 어떤 말들을 했는지 기억하고 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B942306",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016504,
		["Scripts"]="SitOrStand{ActorId{110040},State{\"Sit\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="It's alright, ma'am. I remember what I told you in my dreams.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B942306",
	},
	[11016504]={
		["Camera"]="-1.299805,-125.916016,121.184723,0.001611,-1.209408,90.609695,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그날의 진실을 있는 그대로 말씀드릴 테니 다 들은 후 교도소장님 마음속의 '정의'에 따라 결단을 내려 주십시오.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B942330",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016505,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll tell you exactly what happened that day. Once you've heard the truth, I hope the justice within your heart will guide your decision.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B942330",
	},
	[11016505]={
		["Camera"]="32.214844,139.163086,128.258286,0.001612,-2.00912,-97.193909,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="말해봐라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94235A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016506,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110039,
		["Subtitle"]="Go ahead.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110039:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B94235A",
	},
	[11016506]={
		["Camera"]="-1.37793,-810.395508,591.001038,0.001542,-46.808487,89.804596,16.538609,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그날……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016506,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="-0.708984,-729.607422,508.35968,0.001516,-44.60828,88.804398,16.538609,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B942384",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016601,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="On that day...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110039:Invite_Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110165/1B942384",
	},
	[11016601]={
		["ContentKR"]="우리 좋게 좋게 이야기 좀 하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016601,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94331A",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016601.11016601'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016602,
		["Scripts"]="\
PARA{\
PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}},\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0043_story_empire\"}}\
}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We need to have a *serious* discussion about this.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B94331A",
	},
	[11016602]={
		["ContentKR"]="짧게 얘기하지. 이따 내가 이 총으로 널 쏠 테니 넌 죽은 척해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016602,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943344",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016603,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}\
",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll make this short. Later, I'll shoot you with this gun, and you'll have to play dead.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943344",
	},
	[11016603]={
		["ContentKR"]="완벽하게 꾸미기 위해서 실제처럼 쏠 거다. 급소는 피하겠지만 많이 아플 거다. 소리 내지 말고 꾹 참아야 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016603,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94336E",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016604,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}\
",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="To make it convincing enough, the shot will have to hit. It will miss your vitals but will really hurt. You must endure the pain silently.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B94336E",
	},
	[11016604]={
		["ContentKR"]="뭘 하시려는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016604,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B943398",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016604.11016604'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016605,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What are you going to do?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943398",
	},
	[11016605]={
		["ContentKR"]="우리 이 안에 갇혔고, 외부와 연락도 끊겼다. 풀비스가 여기로 오는 중일 테지. 그러니 시간이 없어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016605,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9433C2",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016606,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We're trapped in here, with all contact to the outside world cut off. Fulvis is already on his way. We are running out of time.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9433C2",
	},
	[11016606]={
		["ContentKR"]="죽은 자는 말이 없는 법이니까 풀비스는 분명 날 없애려 하겠지. 너도 나랑 같이 움직이면서 그 인간이 함정을 파는 과정을 지켜봤으니 너도 살려 보내지 않을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016606,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9433EC",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016607,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Only the dead keep silent forever. Fulvis will definitely kill me. We're both on this mission, and you've seen his fabricated evidence, so he surely won't spare you either.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9433EC",
	},
	[11016607]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………！！",
		["DialogueId"]=11016607,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B943416",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016607.11016607'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016608,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...!!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943416",
	},
	[11016608]={
		["ContentKR"]="걱정 마, 내가 있잖아.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016608,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943440",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016607.11016607'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016609,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="It's okay, I got you.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943440",
	},
	[11016609]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 만약에 내가 '널 죽이고' 그 인간한테 항복하는 척하면, 경계심을 버리고 너는 그냥 둘지도 모른다…… 이게 네가 살 수 있는 유일한 방법이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016609,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94346A",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016610,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...If I \"kill\" you and feign allegiance to him, it'll lower his guard, allowing you to go unnoticed... It's the only way to ensure your survival.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B94346A",
	},
	[11016610]={
		["ContentKR"]="안 됩니다…… 같이 빠져나가면 됩니다. 분명 방법이 있을 겁니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016610,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B943494",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016611,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="No, Sir Avar... Let's just fight our way out... There's got to be a way out!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943494",
	},
	[11016611]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 녀석아, 멋대로 굴지 마. 나도 그냥 죽어줄 생각으로 그러는 건 아니니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016611,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9434BE",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016612,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Not everything can be solved with a fight, kid. My life has more value than you think — it serves a greater purpose.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9434BE",
	},
	[11016612]={
		["ContentKR"]="이따가 우선 풀비스와 협상을 시도해 볼 거야. 물론 성공하지 못할 확률이 높으니까 크게 기대하지 말고. 협상은 단지 중요한 걸 낚기 위한 미끼일 뿐이야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016612,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9434E8",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016613,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'll try to negotiate with Fulvis, though I believe it's going to fail in the end, so don't get your hopes up. The negotiation is for a more important purpose—",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9434E8",
	},
	[11016613]={
		["ContentKR"]="바로 '증거'를 위해서지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016613,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943512",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016614,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="To collect evidence.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943512",
	},
	[11016614]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 녹음기를 몸에 지니고 있어라. 나중에 풀비스를 무너뜨릴 확실한 증거가 될 거다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016614,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94353C",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016615,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Take this recording device. It'll provide the evidence needed to expose and destroy Fulvis.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B94353C",
	},
	[11016615]={
		["ContentKR"]="증거가 없으면 여기서 일어난 일 모두 네 말에만 의존해야 하지 않겠나. 너는 풀비스와 싸울 어떤 무기도 갖지 못하게 되는 거지. 전우들의 억울한 외침도 영원히 론샤 요새 상공에 맴돌게 되겠고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016615,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943566",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016616,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Without it, all you have is your word, which happens to be the most unconvincing evidence. The cries of our fallen comrades will be lost to the winds of Lonza Fortress.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943566",
	},
	[11016616]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 교관님……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016616,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B943590",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016607.11016607'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016617,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Sir Avar...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943590",
	},
	[11016617]={
		["ContentKR"]="인상 펴고 웃어! 전사는 쏟아지는 포탄을 마주하고도 웃으며 한 걸음 한 걸음 앞으로 나아가야 하는 법이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016617,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9435BA",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016618,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Why the long face? Cheer up, kid! A true soldier laughs at adversity.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9435BA",
	},
	[11016618]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016618,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9435E4",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016602.11016602'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016619,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B9435E4",
	},
	[11016619]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… {nickname2}, 내가 자랑스러워하는 제자야…… 널 이런 일에 휘말리게 해서 미안하다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016619,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94360E",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016620,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm proud to have been your instructor, ... And I'm sorry for dragging you into this mess.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B94360E",
	},
	[11016620]={
		["ContentKR"]="그래도 넌 꼭 살아남아서 이곳에서 일어난 진실을 군단장과 폐하께 낱낱이 전해라. 이곳의 모든 병사가 마지막 순간까지 그들의 신조와 사명을 위해 싸웠음을 제국 전체에 알려야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016620,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943638",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016603.11016603'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016621,
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You must survive. Bring the truth to Chief Sibylle and His Majesty. Let the entire Empire know that every soldier here held true to their creed and duty, and everyone fought till their very last breath.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943638",
	},
	[11016621]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 황제 폐하께 영광을.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016621,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B943662",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/11016621.11016621'",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016701,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...All glory to our Emperor.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110166/1B943662",
	},
	[11016701]={
		["Camera"]="7.960938,-132.75,125.071716,0.001531,-4.805598,92.405151,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 이상이 그날 중앙 관제실에서 있었던 일입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016701,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="9.576172,-171.234375,128.310043,0.00153,-5.405521,91.804871,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B944382",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016702,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="...That's exactly what happened in the central control room that day.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110039:Talk03_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B944382",
	},
	[11016702]={
		["Camera"]="570.384766,-248.601562,159.607712,0.001551,-7.005765,175.00383,19.596729,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아바르 교관님은 마지막 순간, 자신보다 천만 배는 더 강력한 음모와 총탄에 맞서 목숨을 걸고 결정적인 증거를 남기는 방식으로 그분의 정의를 지키셨습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016702,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="566.180664,-300.931641,159.606354,0.001551,-7.005704,175.403824,19.596729,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9443AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016703,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir Avar fought valiantly, confronting a conspiracy far greater than any individual could withstand alone. He sacrificed his life to secure crucial evidence — his final act in defence of justice.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B9443AC",
	},
	[11016703]={
		["Camera"]="7.960938,-132.75,125.071716,0.001531,-4.805598,92.405151,36.903526,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다만 안타깝게도 적의 치밀함을 과소평가했던 것 같습니다. 제가 반쯤 정신을 잃은 상태에서, 풀비스의 부관인 펄시가 그 녹음기를 가져가는 걸 어렴풋이 느꼈습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016703,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9443D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="But, we underestimated the enemy's meticulousness. As I drifted in and out of consciousness, I sensed Fulvis's adjutant, Falsi, removing the recording device from me.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110040:Disagree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B9443D6",
	},
	[11016704]={
		["Camera"]="299.907227,-246.0,95.800987,-0.000854,42.006584,-179.996628,36.931984,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="깨어났을 땐 풀비스가 요새 전체를 장악한 후였습니다. 그들과 맞서 싸우는 것은 불빛으로 뛰어드는 불나방처럼 무모한 일이었기에, 다프네와 저는 분명 목숨을 잃었을 것이고, 진실도 영원히 수면 아래로 가라앉았을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016704,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="299.907227,-268.0,95.800987,-0.000854,42.006584,-179.996628,36.931984,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B944400",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016705,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="By the time I fully regained consciousness, Fulvis had seized control of the fortress. Confronting him would have led to our deaths, and the truth would have been buried with us.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B944400",
	},
	[11016705]={
		["Camera"]="76.907227,-660.533203,98.932999,-0.000916,-2.393981,100.607307,48.616428,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래서 이런 방식으로 당신을 만나기로 선택한 겁니다. 교도소장님이라면 그 증거를 얻거나, 최소한 펄시의 자백을 받아낼 수 있을 거라고 믿었으니 말입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016705,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="76.907227,-660.533203,98.932999,-0.000915,-2.193932,104.808258,48.616428,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94442A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016706,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="That's why we decided to come to you like this. I believe that you have the authority to recover that evidence, or at least secure a testimony from Falsi.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B94442A",
	},
	[11016706]={
		["Camera"]="97.474609,-130.279297,69.31456,-0.000915,12.205363,120.609192,36.480843,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="헬파이어 님, 계속 정의를 말씀하지 않으셨습니까? 그럼 소장님의 정의를 어떻게 지켜야 할지 아실 거라 생각합니다. 펄시를 체포하십시오. 당신이 원하는 진실이 거기 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016706,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B944454",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016707,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\9\
\9CameraMoveTo{_delay{4},TargetPosition{\"61.536133,246.100586,83.84462,-0.000915,4.204432,-97.194382,52.299122,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}},\
\9PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110040},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{0}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="Warden Hellfire, I know you hold justice above all else, and I believe you possess the means to defend it. Please, go get Falsi. She holds the truth you want.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110040:Talk02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B944454",
	},
	[11016707]={
		["Camera"]="9.083008,-324.751953,126.839432,-0.000916,-0.795744,-92.992729,35.182552,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아는 거대한 기계와 같다. 이 기계의 모든 톱니바퀴를 올바르게 작동시키려면 그를 위한 규율이 필요하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016707,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94447E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016708,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110039,
		["Subtitle"]="Hyperborea functions like a vast machine, requiring every component to operate flawlessly.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110040:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B94447E",
	},
	[11016708]={
		["Camera"]="10.702148,375.392578,308.213287,-0.000917,-19.995569,-87.991692,27.483997,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="바로 이 규율과 휘페르보레아 제국이 정한 '정의'를 지키는 게 내 역할이고. 누군가 내 손을 빌어 이 규율을 깨트리려 한다면 그에 맞는 대가를 치르게 할 것이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016708,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="7.919922,454.641602,337.067902,-0.000917,-19.995569,-87.991692,27.483997,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9444A8",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016709,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110039,
		["Subtitle"]="My role is to uphold the law and protect the justice defined by Hyperborea. If anyone attempts to manipulate me to subvert this law, they will face severe consequences.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B9444A8",
	},
	[11016709]={
		["Camera"]="53.261719,-424.201172,50.547653,-0.000916,26.401493,-121.377251,21.509003,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="펄시를 조사해 보지. 대신 거짓말로 시간을 끈 거라면 각오하는 게 좋을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016709,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9444D2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016710,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{ActorId{110039},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{8}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110039,
		["Subtitle"]="I will investigate Falsi. Be aware of the consequences if what you said proves to be false and a waste of my time.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B9444D2",
	},
	[11016710]={
		["Camera"]="79.765625,-751.443359,122.242386,-0.001038,-2.792871,101.417664,63.232998,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016710,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="84.628906,-750.515625,122.24234,-0.001037,-2.992859,99.218079,63.232998,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9444FC",
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Stop\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110040,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110039:Talk02_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110167/1B9444FC",
	},
	[11016801]={
		["Camera"]="193.282227,65.876953,181.271759,0.00013,-2.593593,-83.41555,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 헬파이어 님 명령으로 세오도어를 데려왔다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9453EA",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110021:n(110022)",
			[2]="110022:n(110021)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016802,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\9\
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110022},TargetPoint{\"pfix27set1\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110022:n(110021)\"}},\
\9SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}}, \
\9SetLocation{ActorId{110021},TargetPoint{\"pfix27set4\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}}, \
\9SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110021:n(110022)\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}},\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]=", Warden Hellfire has instructed me to bring Miss Theodore here.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9453EA",
	},
	[11016802]={
		["Camera"]="230.419922,-418.010742,165.606293,0.000172,-0.995083,97.199539,35.0,1102.96875,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="심문 중에도 계속 널 만나고 싶어하더군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="204.273438,-421.31543,165.606277,0.000172,-0.995083,97.199539,35.0,1120.102173,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945414",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="During her interrogation, she repeatedly requested to see you.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=8,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945414",
	},
	[11016803]={
		["Camera"]="69.493164,299.783203,128.300293,0.000184,0.404955,-93.799553,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["Content"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94543E",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110041:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110041)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11016804,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0067_story_daphnis_theme_piano\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94543E",
	},
	[11016804]={
		["Camera"]="69.493164,299.783203,128.300293,0.000184,0.404955,-93.799553,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016804,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:Iyada01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B945468",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110041:n(110021)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016805,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945468",
	},
	[11016805]={
		["Camera"]="153.419922,-10.407227,141.247467,0.00019,-0.794802,149.004044,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그렇게 직접적으로 말하면 어떡해요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016805,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B945492",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110041:n(110022)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...You weren't supposed to know that part...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110041:Sigh_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945492",
	},
	[11016806]={
		["Camera"]="192.259766,1029.541992,154.634491,0.000191,-2.394432,-102.391533,80.0,1292.717896,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그, 그러니까…… 저도 이유는 모르겠는데 오늘 오후부터 심문관들 태도가 갑자기 부드러워졌어요. 특별히 바라는 게 있냐고까지 물어보는 거 있죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016806,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="212.216797,1025.15918,154.63446,0.000191,-2.394432,-102.391563,80.0,1292.717896,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9454BC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016807,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Well, I don't know what happened, but the interrogator seemed much more accommodating this afternoon. She even asked if I wanted anything.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9454BC",
	},
	[11016807]={
		["Camera"]="162.259766,160.837891,143.216568,0.000105,-2.195803,-133.409637,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 제 증언 내용은 전과 달라진 게 없는데…… 당신이 한 얘기가 교도소장 마음을 움직인 걸까요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016807,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9454E6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016808,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="My testimony hasn't changed... Did you say something that swayed the Warden?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9454E6",
	},
	[11016808]={
		["Camera"]="78.129883,198.994141,154.352966,0.000115,-7.795902,-99.21273,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 아니면 설마, 사형 전 마지막으로 베푸는 자비일까요?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016808,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="75.573242,183.234375,152.16687,0.000115,-7.795902,-99.21273,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945510",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...Or is this some sort of final kindness before our execution!?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945510",
	},
	[11016809]={
		["Camera"]="82.477539,417.295898,153.85817,0.000117,-1.395571,97.59346,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="맞습니다, 제가 죄를 인정했어요. 우린 곧 처형당할 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016809,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94553A",
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You're right. I pleaded guilty. We'll be executed soon.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94553A",
	},
	[11016810]={
		["Camera"]="759.694336,-1395.495117,592.706726,0.000117,-9.19455,-92.405861,35.0,1120.102173,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그렇군요…… 알았어요. 고문이 정말 고통스럽긴 했으니, 어쩔 수 없죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016810,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="759.694336,-1395.495117,564.983398,0.000117,-10.794617,-93.005852,35.0,1120.102173,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945564",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016811,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...Really...? I see. I suppose you had no other choice. No one can withstand such intense interrogation.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945564",
	},
	[11016811]={
