		["Camera"]="136.317383,187.076172,158.510651,0.000126,-5.79562,-123.207726,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아요. 당신은 저를 충분히 지켜 줬어요. 그러니까 괜찮아요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016811,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="136.317383,187.076172,158.510651,0.000125,-7.395565,-124.00795,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94558E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016812,
		["Scripts"]="LookAt{_delay{2},LookAtDescription{\"110041:p(27look3)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="It's alright. You've done so much to protect me already...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94558E",
	},
	[11016812]={
		["Camera"]="82.477539,417.295898,130.022507,0.000117,-1.395571,97.59346,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="믿으면 어떡합니까, 농담한 건데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016812,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B9455B8",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110041:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110041)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11016813,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="It's not true. I was just messing with you...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9455B8",
	},
	[11016813]={
		["Camera"]="70.383789,195.969727,140.261078,0.000127,-0.195528,-97.007759,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="사람이 어쩜…… 놀랐잖아요…… 빠, 빨리 사과하세요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016813,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:Unhappy01",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="68.392578,179.792969,140.095779,0.000127,-0.195528,-97.007759,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9455E2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016814,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Wha... You really scared me... Y—You owe me an apology...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110041:Disagree",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9455E2",
	},
	[11016814]={
		["Camera"]="143.713867,436.024414,130.43718,0.000134,-0.395509,121.794235,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="교도소장의 조사가 순조롭게 진행되면 조만간 나갈 수 있을 겁니다. 그때가 되면 사과의 의미로 오페라 공연을 보여 드리죠.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016814,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="1B94560C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016820,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="If Warden Hellfire's investigation goes well, we'll be free soon. I'll make it up to you by taking you to the opera house.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94560C",
	},
	[11016815]={
		["ContentKR"]="교도소장님이 제 증언을 믿고 펄시를 조사하러 갔습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016815,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B945636",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The Warden believed what I said and went to investigating Falsi.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945636",
	},
	[11016816]={
		["Camera"]="777.486328,976.563477,422.917694,0.000134,-5.593692,-99.421272,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다행이에요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016816,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:Smile01",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="777.486328,976.563477,363.993347,0.000134,-5.593692,-99.421272,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945660",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016817,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Oh, that's great.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Agree"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=4,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945660",
	},
	[11016817]={
		["Camera"]="66.876953,222.288086,140.23291,0.000128,0.806468,-94.618645,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 몸에 상처가 또 엄청 늘었네요. 많이 아프죠…… 제, 제가 가서 의약품 상자를 돌려달라고 말해 볼게요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016817,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94568A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016818,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...You've got a lot more injuries. They must hurt... I... I'll beg them to give me back my first-aid kit...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94568A",
	},
	[11016818]={
		["Camera"]="82.477539,417.295898,130.022507,0.000117,-1.395571,97.59346,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="전 괜찮으니까 먼저 치료해요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016818,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9456B4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016819,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm fine. You should take care of your own injuries though...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9456B4",
	},
	[11016819]={
		["Camera"]="143.713867,436.024414,132.108551,0.000135,-0.995514,121.594162,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 교도소장의 조사가 순조롭게 진행되면 조만간 나갈 수 있을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016819,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110022:Confident01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B9456DE",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016820,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...If Warden Hellfire's investigation goes well, we'll be free soon.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9456DE",
	},
	[11016820]={
		["Camera"]="69.666016,179.619141,136.28978,0.000127,1.204463,-97.8078,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="네……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016820,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B945708",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016821,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="I hope so...",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110041:Agree",
			[2]="110022:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945708",
	},
	[11016821]={
		["Camera"]="183.896484,144.859375,143.367401,0.000131,-0.395598,-145.405396,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 한 가지 더요. 죄송해요. 아마도 당신에게 좋지 않은 기억을 떠올리게 할 수도 있겠지만, 이번이 마지막 기회일 수도 있어서 꼭 물어보고 싶었어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016821,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="193.796875,130.499023,143.367386,0.000131,-0.395598,-145.405396,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945732",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016822,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...And one more thing. I'm sorry, this might bring back painful memories, but I must ask while I can.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Explain02_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945732",
	},
	[11016822]={
		["Camera"]="86.50293,178.391602,155.725983,0.000122,-7.195741,-105.206223,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저번에 요새에서 위급 상황이라 아버지 일을 얘기하지 못했잖아요. 이제 마음 정리도 됐으니까 얘기해 줄래요? 혹시 아버지가 마지막으로…… 남기신 건 없었나요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016822,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Sad01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="86.50293,178.391602,155.725983,0.000119,-5.195642,-105.206444,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94575C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016823,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Back at the fortress, the situation was so desperate that you didn't have time to tell me about my father's death. But I've sorted out my mood. Can you tell me about it now? Did my father... leave anything behind?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94575C",
	},
	[11016823]={
		["Camera"]="107.063477,366.543945,153.326782,0.000198,-7.795158,102.391647,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016823,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110022:None"],
		["GUID"]="1B945786",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016824,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945786",
	},
	[11016824]={
		["Camera"]="61.652344,183.171875,163.677551,0.000329,-10.99506,-93.201324,35.0,149.323303,false,Manual,1.2",
		["ContentKR"]="이걸 남기셨습니다. 이 사진을 가슴 깊숙이, 심장에서 가장 가까운 안쪽 주머니에 넣고 계셨어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016824,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="60.053711,154.496094,161.086777,0.000329,-10.99506,-93.201324,35.0,116.258575,false,Manual,1.2",
		["GUID"]="1B9457B0",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir Avar kept this with him at all times, in the pocket closest to his heart.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Give"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=12,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9457B0",
	},
	[11016825]={
		["Camera"]="64.836914,439.476562,137.160721,0.000195,-1.795192,91.587936,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="마지막으로 하신 말씀도 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016825,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9457DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016826,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="He wanted you to have this message—",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9457DA",
	},
	[11016826]={
		["Camera"]="238.853516,248.954102,100.612,0.000122,8.404042,-133.804657,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="\"가능하다면 다프네를 찾아 줘. 그 아이가 살아 있거든 그 아이를 데리고…… 도망쳐라. 안전해지면, 다프네한테 전해 줘……\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11016826,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="278.214844,202.386719,100.612,0.000139,8.404042,-145.204102,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B945804",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016827,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_AwaAndMe",
		["Subtitle"]="\"Find Daphne if possible. If she's alive, get her out of here... Once you're both safe, tell her—\"",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945804",
	},
	[11016827]={
		["Camera"]="69.422852,295.832031,183.302109,0.0001,-11.196291,-93.005974,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="\"미안하다, 내 딸아. 실은 네가 어릴 때처럼 다시 '아빠'라고 불러 주길 항상 기다렸어.\"",
		["DialogueId"]=11016827,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="65.113281,213.857422,167.05423,0.0001,-11.196291,-93.005974,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94582E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016828,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="\"I'm sorry, my baby girl. I've always wanted to hear you call me Dad again, just like when you were little.\"",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=16,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94582E",
	},
	[11016828]={
		["Camera"]="132.307617,146.647461,147.840805,0.000218,-2.99542,-128.409409,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 이 사진을…… 아직 가지고 계셨다니……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016828,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"110041:Sad01"],
		["GUID"]="1B945858",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016829,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...He... kept this photo all along...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945858",
	},
	[11016829]={
		["ContentKR"]="나는…… 벌써 이만큼 커 버렸는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=11016829,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:Sad02",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B945882",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016830,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="So long that... I'm not the little girl in the photo anymore...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945882",
	},
	[11016830]={
		["Camera"]="61.861328,101.724609,277.866028,0.000099,28.395302,92.794556,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="거기까지. 너희들은 교도소장님의 또 다른 시험을 통과했다. 다프네, 그대는 우선 여기서 나가라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016830,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9458AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016831,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="Alright. Both of you have again passed the Warden's test. Miss Daphne, you may leave now.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9458AC",
	},
	[11016831]={
		["Camera"]="148.926758,478.189453,146.110291,0.000115,-5.604218,130.595306,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="엿들은 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016831,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["FinalCamera"]="135.760742,493.556641,144.124954,0.000115,-5.604218,130.595306,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9458D6",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110022:p(pfix27look)",
			[2]="110041:p(pfix27look)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016832,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Were you eavesdropping on us?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B9458D6",
	},
	[11016832]={
		["Camera"]="61.861328,101.724609,277.866028,0.000099,28.395302,92.794556,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="교도소장님의 명령이었다. 둘만 있을 때 무슨 얘기를 하는지 들어 보라고 하셨거든.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016832,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B945900",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016833,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110021,
		["Subtitle"]="Per the Warden's orders. I was to confine you both here and monitor your interactions.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945900",
	},
	[11016833]={
		["Camera"]="80.8125,160.513672,173.046204,0.000233,-13.396548,-105.208542,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="'정말 범인이라면 지금이 말을 맞출 기회'였을 테니…… 알겠어요. 결백을 증명할 기회를 주다니 헬파이어 님에게 고마워해야겠네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016833,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94592A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016834,
		["Scripts"]="PlayAnimation{_delay{2},ActorId{110041},AnimationId{\"Agree\"},Duration{3}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Right, if we were guilty, we'd make use of every opportunity to collude in our testimonies... I understand. Thank you for giving us a chance to prove our innocence.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B94592A",
	},
	[11016834]={
		["Camera"]="102.722656,365.685547,129.289413,0.000192,-0.595183,101.589684,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="어쩌면…… 곧 여길 나갈 수 있겠어요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016834,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B945954",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110041:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110041)"],
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Perhaps... we'll leave this place soon.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110041:n(110022)","[2] = \"110022:n(110041)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110168/1B945954",
	},
	[11016901]={
		["Camera"]="289.294922,48.392578,14.576785,0.000002,5.599628,-134.614655,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="너희는 여기서 나갈 수 없다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B946452",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110041:n(110032)",
			[2]="110032:n(110041)",
			[3]="110022:p(28Point3)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016902,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{ActorId{110032},TargetPoint{\"28Point1\"},MoveSpeed{150},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110022},State{\"Sit\"}},\
SitOrStand{ActorId{110041},State{\"Sit\"}},\
PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/mute\"}}\
}\
",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Neither of you are leaving.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B946452",
	},
	[11016902]={
		["Camera"]="-139.155273,290.759766,94.580978,0.000055,13.20436,-117.612434,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………?!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016902,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-155.394531,259.711914,102.802429,0.000055,13.20436,-117.612434,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94647C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016903,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...?!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B94647C",
	},
	[11016903]={
		["Camera"]="-454.707031,119.270508,163.409058,0.000107,-4.59546,14.385503,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="상부에서 모든 심사를 빠르게 처리했더군. 나에겐 너희를 처형하라는 명령서 한 장만 내려왔다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016903,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-435.287109,69.383789,163.409058,0.000106,-4.795469,23.18532,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9464A6",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110041:n(110032)",
			[2]="110022:n(110032)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016904,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
SetLocation{ActorId{110032},TargetPoint{\"28Point2\"},Visibility{\"Show\"}},\
SetRotation{SetRotationDescription{\"110032:n(110041)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="A directive to expedite all procedural reviews has been issued from above. The only document I received is a writ demanding your immediate execution.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Explain01_Start",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B9464A6",
	},
	[11016904]={
		["Camera"]="-98.797852,251.708008,130.888779,0.000049,2.800227,-135.215637,35.0,93.513664,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="교도소장님, 이건 말도 안 돼요. 정당한 재판 절차가 아니잖아요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016904,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:Angry01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B9464D0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016905,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="Ma'am, this is not right — it goes against the standard procedures of interrogation.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B9464D0",
	},
	[11016905]={
		["Camera"]="98.65625,459.628906,98.31208,0.000067,8.600335,-114.812714,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이 문서 마지막의 서명들을 봐라. 최고 권위자인 법무 장관도 서명했다. 시빌라가 온다 해도 막을 수 없을 거다. 상당히 귀찮은 일에 휘말렸군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016905,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110041:None",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="81.865234,467.391602,98.312088,0.000067,8.600335,-114.812714,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9464FA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016906,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110032},AnimationId{\"Explain01_End\"},Duration{2}},\
LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"200005:p(28Point3)\"}},\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{15},TargetPosition{\"-80.416016,348.676758,157.276016,0.000055,-2.399595,10.98434,35.0,150.488785,false,Manual,22.0\"},duration{0}}\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110032},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{2}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Take a look at the writ and the signatures at the bottom. Even the Supreme Minister of Justice has signed it. Not even Chief Sibylle can stop it. Your case has grown beyond anyone's control.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B9464FA",
	},
	[11016906]={
		["Camera"]="161.061523,191.147461,138.637085,0.000092,1.199163,120.586357,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="펄시는 어떻게 되었습니까? 펄시만 찾으면…… 녹음기만 찾으면 진실을……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11016906,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B946524",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016907,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="What about Falsi? As long as we find Falsi and the recording device, we can prove that...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Explain01_Start"],
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110032:n(110022)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B946524",
	},
	[11016907]={
		["Camera"]="402.124023,-2738.086914,403.638306,0.000415,-1.197687,-166.797363,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="펄시는 실종됐다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016907,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="301.542969,-2761.676758,401.478424,0.000415,-1.197687,-166.797363,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B94654E",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110032:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11016908,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="She's missing.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110032:Talk01_Start",
			[2]="110022:Explain01_End",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B94654E",
	},
	[11016908]={
		["Camera"]="-181.301758,412.243164,611.337952,0.000015,-80.204308,-7.00257,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="론샤 요새 전투 중 폭발로 요새 밖으로 떨어졌는데, 병사들이 강가에서 펄시의 총을 발견했고, 피가 묻어 있었다고 하지. 군단에서 아직 펄시의 행방을 찾고 있지만, 이미 사망했을 가능성이 높다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11016908,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-164.539062,480.905273,611.337952,0.000457,-74.398369,-57.202957,15.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B946578",
		["NextDialogue"]=11016909,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110032},AnimationId{\"Talk01_End\"},Duration{2}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="An explosion occurred during the battle. Falsi was last seen outside the fortress. Her bloodstained pistol was found along the riverbank. Although the Legion continues to search, it is likely that she is deceased.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B946578",
	},
	[11016909]={
		["Camera"]="-98.797852,251.708008,130.888779,0.000049,2.800227,-135.215637,35.0,93.513664,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 교도소장님, 정말 그런 우연을 믿으시는 건가요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11016909,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9465A2",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110032:n(110041)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11016910,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110041,
		["Subtitle"]="...Ma'am, do you really believe in such a coincidence?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B9465A2",
	},
	[11016910]={
		["Camera"]="-134.853516,334.290039,149.954697,0.000089,-1.800691,3.384533,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11016910,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-145.541016,333.65918,150.291367,0.000089,-1.800691,3.384533,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B9465CC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017001,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=10,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110169/1B9465CC",
	},
	[11017001]={
		["ContentKR"]="베르길리우스 전하! 여긴 죄수를 심문하는 불결한 곳입니다. 들어가시면 안 됩니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9474BA",
		["SnapShot"]="OUTDOOR",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_EnemySoldier",
		["Subtitle"]="Your Royal Highness Prince Vergilius! This place isn't fitting for someone of your stature. Please don't proceed any further!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B9474BA",
	},
	[11017003]={
		["ContentKR"]="이렇게 많은 서명을 모으는 것도 쉽지 않았겠군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017003,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94750E",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Gathering so many signatures must have been quite the feat.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B94750E",
	},
	[11017004]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 안타깝게도 내 서명만큼의 힘은 없을 것 같은데 말이지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017004,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["GUID"]="1B947538",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Yet, these signatures might weigh less than the one in my hand, I suppose?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B947538",
	},
	[11017005]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11017005,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B947562",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Your Highness.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B947562",
	},
	[11017006]={
		["ContentKR"]="베르길리우스 전하, 황실에서도 이번 론샤 요새 사건에 간섭하시려는 겁니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017006,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["GUID"]="1B94758C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Does the royal family intend to intervene in this military case?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B94758C",
	},
	[11017007]={
		["ContentKR"]="'간섭'이라…… 폐하께서 직접 내리신 특별사면 명령을 '간섭'이라고 하는 건가? 언제부터 황실 군교도소가 '황실' 소속이 아니게 된 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017007,
		["Duration"]=10,
		["GUID"]="1B9475B6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110032,
		["Subtitle"]="Intervene? I must ask, do you view His Majesty's decree of pardon as an \"intervention\"?\
Is the Royal Military Prison no longer under the crown's jurisdiction?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B9475B6",
	},
	[11017008]={
		["ContentKR"]="…………",
		["DialogueId"]=11017008,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9475E0",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B9475E0",
	},
	[11017009]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 이 자와 단둘이 이야기할 것이니 다른 사람은 모두 나가있게.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017009,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94760A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="I need to speak with  alone. Everyone else may leave.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B94760A",
	},
	[11017010]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 드디어 다 나갔군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017010,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B947634",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="...Phew, they're finally gone.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110170/1B947634",
	},
	[11017101]={
		["Camera"]="196.094727,570.057617,131.340271,-0.0,-0.799986,-76.999451,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아슬아슬했어, 정말. 조금만 더 늦었다면 자네와의 만남은 묘지에서 이뤄졌을 지도 모르겠네.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017101,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948522",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110018:n(110018)",
			[2]="110022:n(110018)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11017102,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
TurnTo{_delay{2},TurnToDescription{\"110018:n(110022)\"}},\
LookAt{LookAtDescription{\"110018:n(110022)\"}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110018},AnimationId{\"Disagree\"},Duration{3}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Thank goodness. One moment later and I might have to talk to your headstone instead.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948522",
	},
	[11017102]={
		["Camera"]="-29.333008,-159.782227,120.926056,0.0,0.99994,33.600151,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이번엔 정말 큰 사고를 쳤군, 자네. 형님, 그러니까 폐하를 알현하는 게 얼마나 어려운 줄 알잖나? 그리고 나는 정치에 거의 관여하지 않기도 하고. 그래도 운이 좋았던 건지 오늘 아침 형님이 다른 일로 날 부르셔서 간신히 이 특별 사면령을 얻어낼 수 있었지만 말야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017102,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94854C",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110018:n(110022)",
			[2]="110022:n(110018)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11017103,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{5},ActorId{110018},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{2}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110018},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{5}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="By all that is holy, my friend, you've really landed yourself in some serious trouble. You know how hard it is to meet my brother, and how rarely I get involved with politicians. But fortune favours you today — I was summoned for a different matter and seized the opportunity to secure your pardon.",
		["TurnTo"]={
			[1]="110022:p(90)",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94854C",
	},
	[11017103]={
		["Camera"]="-29.333008,-159.782227,120.926056,0.0,0.99994,33.600151,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="어쨌든 이제 자유의 공기를 마실 수 있게 됐는데 어디로 갈까? 미술관, 오페라 하우스? 개선문 거리의 술집? 아니면 그냥 강변에서 바람이나 쐴까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017103,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948576",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017104,
		["Scripts"]="SEQ{\
PlayAnimation{_delay{8},ActorId{110018},AnimationId{\"Talk02_Start\"},Duration{2}},\
PlayAnimation{ActorId{110018},AnimationId{\"Talk02_End\"},Duration{5}}\
\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Things have finally blown over. You're free at last. Where do you want to go, the art gallery, the opera house, or just a simple stroll along Whisper River for fresh air?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948576",
	},
	[11017104]={
		["Camera"]="567.101562,-226.783203,121.158997,0.000001,0.999789,126.799026,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 감사한 말씀입니다만, 지금은 괜찮습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017104,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9485A0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017105,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...Thanks, but no thanks.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9485A0",
	},
	[11017105]={
		["Camera"]="-29.333008,-159.782227,120.926056,0.0,0.99994,33.600151,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 음…… 안색이 너무 좋지 않은 것 같은데, 갇혀 있는 동안 꽤나 시달렸나 보군. 이따 함께 내 거처로 가지. 주치의한테 치료받을 수 있게 준비해 둘 테니.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017105,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9485CA",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017106,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="...You... look pale. They did go rough on you. Why don't you come to my place? My personal physicians will tend to your wounds.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9485CA",
	},
	[11017106]={
		["Camera"]="190.855469,28.051758,131.700562,0.0,3.799873,13.400437,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="700년이 넘었는데, 제국의 교도소에서는 아직도 야만적이고, 비인도적인 형벌을 집행하고 있어…… 작가로 자신을 포장한 그 많은 권력의 나팔수들이 쓰는 '가장 위대하고, 가장 번영한 시대'는 사실 말도 안 되는 이야기란 말이지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017106,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9485F4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017107,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="I can't believe after seven centuries, the prisons of Hyperborea still resort to primitive, barbaric, and utterly inhumane forms of torture... Those obsequious writers hail this era as \"the greatest and most prosperous of times,\" which is nothing but a tragic farce.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110018:Explain02_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9485F4",
	},
	[11017107]={
		["Camera"]="611.680664,-21.414062,156.442642,0.0,-4.200224,159.999588,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이 얘긴 우선 그만하고…… 다프네는 어디에 있습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017107,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94861E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017108,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's not dwell on that... How's Daphne?",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Talk02_Start",
			[2]="110018:Explain02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94861E",
	},
	[11017108]={
		["Camera"]="190.855469,28.051758,131.700562,0.0,3.799873,13.400437,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="안심해. 자네가 그 여자를 계속 보호하려고 했다는 사실도 알고 있으니까. 이 특별 사면령으로 그 다프네라는 여자도 보호받을 수 있을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017108,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948648",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017109,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="I heard about your efforts to ensure her safety. Fear not, the pardon includes her as well.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948648",
	},
	[11017109]={
		["Camera"]="611.680664,-21.414062,156.442642,0.0,-4.200224,159.999588,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다행이군요…… 죄송합니다. 지금 제 상태로는 당신의 은혜에 보답할 수가 없네요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017109,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B948672",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017110,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="That's a relief... Sorry, I don't have anything to repay your kindness at the moment.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Talk02_End"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948672",
	},
	[11017110]={
		["Camera"]="88.786133,19.023438,133.310699,0.0,2.199806,13.399469,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="보답은 무슨. 음…… 그럼 반년간 내 경호를 맡는 건 어때?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017110,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="110018:Smile01",
		},
		["GUID"]="1B94869C",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017111,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Repay me? Hmm... How about serving as my bodyguard for six months?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94869C",
	},
	[11017111]={
		["Camera"]="412.723633,27.868164,144.340149,0.0,-2.600253,164.598022,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="경호원 말씀이십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017111,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9486C6",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017112,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Bodyguard?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9486C6",
	},
	[11017112]={
		["Camera"]="88.786133,19.023438,133.310699,0.0,2.199806,13.399469,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래. 플래그슨 주의 스칼렛에 다녀올 건데 반년 정도 걸릴 거야. 그 반년 동안 내 경호원이 되어주었으면 하는데.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017112,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9486F0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017113,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes. I'm assigned to oversee matters in Scarletriver in the name of royalty for about half a year. It'd be reassuring to have you by my side.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110018:Think_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9486F0",
	},
	[11017113]={
		["Camera"]="347.854492,-163.452148,133.310699,0.0,2.199717,80.397957,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="어차피 당분간은 군단으로 돌아가기 힘들 거야. 아직 모든 혐의가 깔끔하게 해결된 건 아니라 지금 복귀하면 입지가 곤란할 수 있거든.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017113,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B94871A",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017114,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="And staying away from the Legion might be wise for now. The stigma of a criminal charge lingers. Going back to the Legion at this point could be awkward.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110018:Think_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94871A",
	},
	[11017114]={
		["Camera"]="190.855469,28.051758,131.700562,0.0,3.799873,13.400437,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="오늘 형님이 나한테 황실의 이름으로 스칼렛에 다녀오라고 하더군. 나는 형님께 자네를 근위병으로 데려가고 싶다고 말씀드렸고, 형님도 동의하셨지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017114,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948744",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017115,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="I suggested your name as my aide when I was summoned today, and my brother consented.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948744",
	},
	[11017115]={
		["Camera"]="415.479492,42.601562,144.340149,0.0,-3.200258,169.397827,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="지금 수도를…… 그러니까 디즈마니아를 떠나라는 말씀이십니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017115,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94876E",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017116,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You want me to leave the capital right now?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94876E",
	},
	[11017116]={
		["Camera"]="232.9375,34.347656,148.367645,0.000003,0.999557,11.798789,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="그래. 그 문서에 서명한 사람들을 생각해 봐. 디즈마니아에 있으면 보이지 않는 곳에서 자네를 노리는 사람들이 얼마나 많을지 알 수 없어. 자네의 무기로는 필토이드는 죽일 수 있겠지만, 등 뒤에서 날아오는 총알은 막을 수 없을 테니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017116,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="270.390625,42.170898,149.192215,0.000003,1.399547,11.800114,35.0,151.837296,false,Manual,22.0",
		["GUID"]="1B948798",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017117,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes. Just think of those signatures — how many people are watching you in Dismania. Your prowess may deter approaching Filthoids, but not hidden assassins.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110018:Agree",
		},
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948798",
	},
	[11017117]={
		["Camera"]="528.294922,-6.097656,149.147964,0.0,-3.400116,158.79808,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="자네가 무엇을 걱정하는지 알아. 시빌라 메이슨은 다프네와 오랜 친분이 있고, 이번 사건에서도 자네들이 무고하다는 걸 의심치 않고 있으니 적어도 다프네의 안전은 걱정할 필요 없을 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017117,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9487C2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017118,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="I know what you're worried about. Sibylle Mason is an old friend of Daphne. She is obviously inclined to your innocence, so she will at least ensure Daphne's safety.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9487C2",
	},
	[11017118]={
		["Camera"]="528.294922,-6.097656,149.147964,0.0,-3.400116,158.79808,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="알겠습니다. 그럼 그렇게 하죠. 그러면 어떻게…… 충성 맹세 같은 거라도 해야 되겠습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017118,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9487EC",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017119,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I understand. Then I shall do as you say. Shall I pledge an oath of service, Your Highness?",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110022:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9487EC",
	},
	[11017119]={
		["Camera"]="99.118164,1.243164,125.338486,0.0,3.399863,18.800962,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 하하, 내가 꼰대들이나 하는 허례허식을 제일 싫어하는 걸 알 텐데. 그래도 농담할 정신이 있는 것 같으니 다행이군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017119,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948816",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017120,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="...Come on, you know there's nothing I hate more than these pointless customs and etiquette. But you're in the mood for jokes now, which is a good sign.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110018:Disagree",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948816",
	},
	[11017120]={
		["Camera"]="201.981445,-412.442383,114.285202,0.0,0.799822,76.799767,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="교도소의 이 피비린내는 역시 적응되지 않는군. 준비됐으면 어서 가지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017120,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B948840",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017121,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110018,
		["Subtitle"]="The bloody stench of this prison is proving itself extremely noisome. Let's depart from this dismal place once you're ready.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"110018:Talk02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948840",
	},
	[11017121]={
		["Camera"]="201.981445,-412.442383,114.285202,0.0,0.799822,76.799767,35.0,400.044037,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="예, 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017121,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B94886A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Sure.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="110022:Agree",
			[2]="110018:Talk02_End",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B94886A",
	},
	[11017122]={
		["ContentKR"]="(플래그슨 주…… 스칼렛……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017122,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B948894",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017123,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/redriver\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Scarletriver, Flagson...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B948894",
	},
	[11017123]={
		["ContentKR"]="(거기에는 교도소장에게조차 말하지 않았던…… <Highlight>그것</>이 있어……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017123,
		["DisableMouth"]=1,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9488BE",
		["Scripts"]="StopNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/redriver\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(There is something there... that I didn't even tell the Warden...)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110171/1B9488BE",
	},
	[11017201]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname2}, 아무것도 묻지 않을 생각인 거냐?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9488C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017202,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]=", so you're not going to ask me anything?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C0",
	},
	[11017202]={
		["ContentKR"]="방금 군인은 지시에 무조건 따라야 한다고 하셨잖습니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017202,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9488C1",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017203,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You just said soldiers must obey.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C1",
	},
	[11017203]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 상황에도 넌 여전하구나. 너무 딱딱하게 굴지 말라니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017203,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9488C2",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017204,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Given what we've been through, are you really going to be as rigid as a piece of wood?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C2",
	},
	[11017204]={
		["ContentKR"]="교관님께서도 작전 중에는 긴장을 놓으면 안 된다고 하셨지 않습니까?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017204,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9488C3",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017205,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You also said that one must fully concentrate when engaging in combat.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C3",
	},
	[11017205]={
		["ContentKR"]="아직 안전이 확보되지 않았는데 자꾸 말씀하시다 집중력이 흐트러지기라도 하면 교관님께서 부상당할 위험이 높아질 수 있습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017205,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B9488C4",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017206,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The current circumstances are perilous; being sidetracked by criticism might lead to casualties.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C4",
	},
	[11017206]={
		["ContentKR"]="너, 너, 이 녀석!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017206,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B9488C5",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You sharp-tongued brat!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110172/1B9488C5",
	},
	[11017301]={
		["ContentKR"]="설마 '그리핀'에 너만 남은 건 아니겠지? 다른 녀석들은?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017301,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="1B909E29",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Don't tell me you're the only Griffin left alive. Where are the rest of your squad?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909E29",
	},
	[11017302]={
		["ContentKR"]="상처가 깊어 모두 안쪽에서 쉬고 있습니다. 이쪽입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017302,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GUID"]="1B909E30",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="They're right ahead. Most of them are heavily injured. Please follow me.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/110110/1B909E30",
	},
	[11017401]={
		["Content"]=" ",
		["DialogueId"]=11017401,
		["Duration"]=2,
	},
	[11017402]={
		["Content"]=" ",
		["DialogueId"]=11017402,
		["Duration"]=2,
	},
	[11017403]={
		["ContentKR"]="카지아 일행을 데리고 이곳을 떠났다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017403,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["Subtitle"]="You take Katya and the guys and leave this place...",
	},
	[11017404]={
		["Content"]="这是……继电器，总之先关闭一个",
		["DialogueId"]=11017404,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
	},
	[11017405]={
		["Content"]=" ",
		["DialogueId"]=11017405,
		["Duration"]=2,
	},
	[11017406]={
		["ContentKR"]="움직이지 마세요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017406,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Freeze!",
	},
	[11017407]={
		["ContentKR"]="수위가 낮아지지 않네!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017407,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["GuideFacialId"]="Dafu_Afraid",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017408,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The water is not going down!",
	},
	[11017408]={
		["ContentKR"]="옆으로 돌아서 가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017408,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110005,
		["Subtitle"]="Let's get through from the side.",
	},
	[11017409]={
		["Content"]=" ",
		["DialogueId"]=11017409,
		["Duration"]=2,
	},
	[11017410]={
		["Camera"]="402.354004,84.89209,149.571686,0.000074,4.19976,-153.080948,21.458063,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="권한 확인 완료. 통행이 허가되었습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017410,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="353.715454,60.211914,153.577911,0.000074,4.19976,-153.080948,21.458063,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Access privilege confirmed, please proceed.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=20,
	},
	[11017411]={
		["Content"]="好，月髓连接上了【待包装】",
		["DialogueId"]=11017411,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
	},
	[11017412]={
		["ContentKR"]="앗, 길이 막혔어요. 다른 쪽으로 돌아서 가야 할 것 같아요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017412,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Eh? It's blocked. Seems like we need to take a detour...",
	},
	[11017413]={
		["ContentKR"]="전원이 안 켜지네. 우선 연결된 회전체를 가동해 봐야겠어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017413,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The switch doesn't work, maybe I should activate the connected Phoxynamo Wheel first.",
	},
	[11017414]={
		["ContentKR"]="(…… 어서 전원을 켜야 해.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017414,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(...Gotta turn it on quickly.)",
	},
	[11017415]={
		["Content"]="炮台的能源已经全部连通，回来汇合吧。【待包装】",
		["DialogueId"]=11017415,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["Duration"]=5,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
	},
	[11017416]={
		["ContentKR"]="다 준비됐으면, 회전체를 활성화시켜 출발하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017416,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Go activate the Phoxynamo Wheels once you're ready.",
	},
	[11017417]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이 케이블을 따라가면 회전체를 찾을 수 있을 거야.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017417,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(These cables should lead me to the Phoxynamo Wheels.)",
	},
	[11017418]={
		["ContentKR"]="대단해요……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017418,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="That's amazing...",
	},
	[11017419]={
		["ContentKR"]="(찾았다…… 이제 작동해 볼까?)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017419,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Found it. Gotta activate it now.)",
	},
	[11017420]={
		["ContentKR"]="사람들은 여기를 '시뮬레이션 전장'이라고 불러요. '이번 주제가 아이스레이크 시티 방위전'이라나 뭐라나……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017420,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017421,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="They refer to this place as a \"Simulated Battlefield,\" saying that... \"The theme this time is the Defence of Icelake City.\"",
	},
	[11017421]={
		["ContentKR"]="아이스레이크 시티란 곳은 온통 얼음과 눈이래요. 전 아직 눈을 본 적이 없어서…… 정말 가보고 싶어요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017421,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017422,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="I heard that this Icelake City is covered in snow, something that I've never seen in my entire life... How I wish I could go there and see it myself!",
	},
	[11017422]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 그러니까, 만약에…… 살아서 돌아갈 수 있다면요.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017422,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="...I mean, if, by any chance, I could make it out alive.",
	},
	[11017423]={
		["ContentKR"]="(됐어.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017423,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Done.)",
	},
	[11017501]={
		["ContentKR"]="동력실은 요새의 '심장'이다. 즉, 저 안의 폭시코르가 요새를 움직이는 모든 에너지를 만들어낸다고 할 수 있다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017501,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017502,
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/ex01/signal_on\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The engine room is the \"heart\" of the entire fortress, and all the power that keeps the fortress running comes from the Phoxichor tank in there.",
	},
	[11017502]={
		["ContentKR"]="하지만 폭시코르를 바로 공격하면 폭발할 것이 분명하다. 그러니 넌 먼저 주변의 <H>회전체</>를 제거하도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017502,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="But a direct attack would only lead to explosion, so you need to shut down the Phoxynamo Wheels around it first.",
	},
	[11017503]={
		["ContentKR"]="거기 파란색 회전체들 보이나? 일단 그것들을 노란색으로 바꿔야 한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017503,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017504,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You should be able to recognise those wheels, aka the blue ones, right? What you need to do is turn them yellow.",
	},
	[11017504]={
		["ContentKR"]="교관님, 저도 학생 신분은 벗은 지 오래입니다. 이 정도는 저 혼자서도 할 수 있으니 걱정하지 않으셔도 됩니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017504,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017505,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I graduated a long time ago, Sir. You don't have to lead me through all the basic steps.",
	},
	[11017505]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 이 꼬맹이 녀석! 그래, 그럼 상황을 잘 보고 행동해라. 필요하면 내가 다시 연락하지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017505,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="...You kiddo! Alright, play it by ear then. I'll contact you if necessary.",
	},
	[11017506]={
		["ContentKR"]="(바닥에 있는 이 케이블을 따라가면 회전체를 쉽게 찾을 수 있을 거야. 너무 찾기 어려운 곳에 숨겨져 있진 않겠지?)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017506,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Following the cables on the ground may help me get to the Phoxynamo Wheels. I hope they're not too tricky to be found.)",
	},
	[11017507]={
		["ContentKR"]="(우선 이것부터 해 보자.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017507,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(I'll shut down this one first.)",
	},
	[11017508]={
		["ContentKR"]="(좋아, 종료됐다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017508,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Alright, one down.)",
	},
	[11017509]={
		["ContentKR"]="동쪽으로 향하는 문을 해제했다. 이제 갈 수 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017509,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The door due east is now open. You can go that way.",
	},
	[11017510]={
		["ContentKR"]="(회전체를 이렇게 이상한 곳에 숨겨 두다니, 론샤의 엔지니어들도 참 한가한가 보군.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017510,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Put the Phoxynamo Wheel in such a weird place... Those engineers sure know how to make things involved.)",
	},
	[11017511]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이제 됐어.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017511,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(That should work.)",
	},
	[11017512]={
		["ContentKR"]="(번거롭네……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017512,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(That was complicated...)",
	},
	[11017513]={
		["ContentKR"]="거기…… 무슨 소리 나지 않았나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017513,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017514,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="What's the noise... Everthing okay?",
	},
	[11017514]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>경고: 회전체의 비정상적인 종료가 감지되었습니다. 곧 재시작됩니다.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11017514,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017515,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="WARNING: Abnormal Phoxynamo Wheel shutdown detected. Re-activating Phoxynamo Wheels now.",
	},
	[11017515]={
		["ContentKR"]="……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017515,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017516,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...!",
	},
	[11017516]={
		["ContentKR"]="제길……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017516,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017517,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Damn it!",
	},
	[11017517]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>경고: 현재 폭시코르의 작업량이 너무 많습니다. 과부하 위험이 있으니 가동 중인 회전체를 확인해 주세요.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11017517,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017518,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="WARNING: Phoxichor tank overload risk detected. Please check if more than required Phoxynamo Wheels have been activated.",
	},
	[11017518]={
		["ContentKR"]="과부하 위험……?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017518,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017519,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Overload risk?",
	},
	[11017519]={
		["ContentKR"]="잘 들어라, {nickname2}. 이제 동력실 아래층으로 가서 모든 스페어 회전체를 가동시키고 즉시 철수하도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017519,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017520,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Listen, . I need you to go to the lower floor of the engine room, activate all the back-up Phoxynamo Wheels, then evacuate immediately.",
	},
	[11017520]={
		["ContentKR"]="전원을 종료하는 것만으로는 폭시코르를 멈출 수 없으니 스스로 멈추도록 두는 게 좋겠군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017520,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017521,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Since we can't shut them down our way, we can let them do it in a self-destructive way.",
	},
	[11017521]={
		["ContentKR"]="그러니까…… 과부하로 폭시코르를 폭파하자는 것입니까? 알겠습니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017521,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="You mean... exploding the Phoxichor tank by overloading it? Got it.",
	},
	[11017601]={
		["ContentKR"]="스페어 회전체 1호를 조작할 수 있을 것이다. 한 번 작동해봐라.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017601,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Back-up Phoxynamo Wheel No.1 is ready. Now activate it.",
	},
	[11017602]={
		["ContentKR"]="잘했다. 이제 내가 남은 세 개의 조작 권한도 해제해 주겠다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017602,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Well done. I'll unlock the control authority for the remaining three Phoxynamo Wheels.",
	},
	[11017603]={
		["ContentKR"]="노란색 불이 들어오면 가동시키도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017603,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Activate them once the yellow light is on.",
	},
	[11017604]={
		["ContentKR"]="(회전체에 불이 들어왔어. 교관님이 해제에 성공하셨나 보네.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017604,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(The light is on. Looks like Sir Avar has made it on his side.)",
	},
	[11017605]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>경고: 폭시코르의 작업량이 너무 많습니다. 남은 작업 가능량이 50% 미만입니다. 스페어 회전체의 사용을 즉시 중단하고 무단으로 자리를 이탈하지 마십시오.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11017605,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017606,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="WARNING: Phoxichor tank is overloaded by 50%. Please shut down the Phoxynamo Wheels immediately; unauthorized departure is not permitted.",
	},
	[11017606]={
		["ContentKR"]="(…… 서둘러야 해.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017606,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(...I need to hurry up.)",
	},
	[11017607]={
		["ContentKR"]="3호도 됐다. 서둘러라!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017607,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="No.3 is also ready. Go get it!",
	},
	[11017608]={
		["ContentKR"]="(후……)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017608,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017609,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Phew...)",
	},
	[11017609]={
		["ContentKR"]="아주 깔끔하게 잘했군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017609,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Quick and clean! Well done, kid.",
	},
	[11017610]={
		["ContentKR"]="이제 마지막 하나 남았다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017610,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The control authority is unlocked. This is the last one!",
	},
	[11017611]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>경고: 폭시코르가 곧 폭파됩니다. 자수하십시오.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11017611,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017612,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="WARNING: Phoxichor tank sabotage detected. Anyone held responsible should confess your crime.",
	},
	[11017612]={
		["ContentKR"]="서둘러! 어서 안전문 뒤로 물러서!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017612,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="{type:Guide;style:Communicator}",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017613,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Run! Get behind the safety door!",
	},
	[11017613]={
		["ContentKR"]="<W>경고: 폭시코르가 곧 폭파됩니다. 자수하십시오.</>",
		["DialogueId"]=11017613,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_MechVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="WARNING: Phoxichor tank sabotage detected. Anyone held responsible should confess your crime.",
	},
	[11017701]={
		["ContentKR"]="이쪽입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017701,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="This way, sir...",
	},
	[11017702]={
		["ContentKR"]="이쪽으로 내려가면 지하수도입니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017702,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017703,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, we can get into the sewer tunnels from here.",
	},
	[11017703]={
		["ContentKR"]="카론, 빨리 앞장서라고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017703,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110016,
		["Subtitle"]="You go first, Charon.",
	},
	[11017704]={
		["ContentKR"]="예? 아, 알겠습니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017704,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, sir...",
	},
	[11017705]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 뜨거운 연기는……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017705,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017706,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="The hot steam...",
	},
	[11017706]={
		["ContentKR"]="조심하세요! 앞에 냉각기가 있어서 가까이 가면 다칠 수 있어요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017706,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Watch out! There's a condenser up ahead. You'll get hurt if you get too close!",
	},
	[11017707]={
		["ContentKR"]="냉각기에서 나오는 스팀은 정말 위험합니다. 멀리 떨어지시는 게 좋을 겁니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017707,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir... Steam produced by the condenser is dangerous. We should not stay too long.",
	},
	[11017708]={
		["ContentKR"]="하아, 후…… 너무 덥네요…… 괜찮으세요?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017708,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Huff, huff... It's so hot... Are you okay, sir?",
	},
	[11017709]={
		["ContentKR"]="이쪽입니다……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017709,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017710,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110017,
		["Subtitle"]="This way, sir...",
	},
	[11017710]={
		["ContentKR"]="피, 필토이드예요……!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017710,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017711,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Fil...Filthoids!",
	},
	[11017711]={
		["ContentKR"]="일반인들은 모두 내 뒤로!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017711,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="The unarmed retreat behind me.",
	},
	[11017712]={
		["ContentKR"]="살려주셔서 감사합니다! 제국 병사라고 해서 다 나쁜……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017712,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["NextDialogue"]=11017713,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Thank you for saving our lives! It turned out not all the Imperial soldiers are...",
	},
	[11017713]={
		["ContentKR"]="앗, 죄송합니다! 그러니까 제 말은, 제국 병사들도 포세이큰 놈들처럼 폭력적이거나 피도 눈물도 없을 거라고 생각했는데, 제 오해였군요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017713,
		["GuideFacialId"]="Kajia_Idle",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Ah, sorry! I mean, I used to think that Imperial soldiers were no different from those Forsaken rotters. But now I know I was wrong!",
	},
	[11017714]={
		["ContentKR"]="저기 저 사람은…… 아바르 중령님입니다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017714,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017715,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110015,
		["Subtitle"]="Over there is... Sir Avar!",
	},
	[11017715]={
		["ContentKR"]="(휴, 드디어 만났네.)",
		["DialogueId"]=11017715,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="(Nice, safely join force with them.)",
	},
	[11017801]={
		["ContentKR"]="멈춰.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017801,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Here it is.",
	},
	[11017802]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 시야가 괜찮은 것 같군. 여기에서 중앙 관제실을 포격한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The view is good. Let's bombard the central control room from here.",
	},
	[11017803]={
		["Content"]="该死……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
	},
	[11017804]={
		["ContentKR"]="필토이드부터 처리한다. 저들이 방해하지 못하게 해야 한다!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017804,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Take down the Filthoids first. Don't let them distract you!",
	},
	[11017805]={
		["ContentKR"]="좋아, 모두 처리했군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017805,
		["NextDialogue"]=11017806,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Alright, all cleared out.",
	},
	[11017806]={
		["ContentKR"]="자, 그러면 지금부터는 비교적 금방 부서질 것 같은 <Highlight>옆문</>부터 포격한다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017806,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Next, let's start with the relatively thin side door.",
	},
	[11017807]={
		["ContentKR"]="멈추지 말고 계속 포격해! 고성능 폭탄 사용하는 것 잊지 말고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017807,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Keep it up! Use the High-Explosive Shells!",
	},
	[11017808]={
		["ContentKR"]="거의 다 됐다! 남은 필토이드들을 모두 처리하고 가보지.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017808,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="That should do it. Let's go check it out after we get rid of the remaining Filthoids.",
	},
	[11017809]={
		["ContentKR"]="멍하니 서있지 말고, 서둘러!",
		["DialogueId"]=11017809,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Snap out of it! Keep firing!",
	},
	[11017810]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮나? 어디 다친 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11017810,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Are you okay? Did you get hurt?",
	},
	[11017811]={
		["ContentKR"]="그렇게 두드려서 어느 세월에 다 부순다는 건가! 어서 가서 포격이나 해.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017811,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="By the time you break the door, my baby would've become a granny! Go back to the cannon.",
	},
	[11017812]={
		["DialogueId"]=11017812,
		["IsBlack"]=1,
	},
	[11017901]={
		["ContentKR"]="어서 가라. 계속 통신할 테니 내 지시 잘 듣고.",
		["DialogueId"]=11017901,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Go, stay in touch, and be careful.",
	},
	[11017902]={
		["ContentKR"]="빅……",
		["DialogueId"]=11017902,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110020,
		["Subtitle"]="Vic...",
	},
	[11017903]={
		["Content"]="准备好了，就激活髓动轮出发吧。",
		["DialogueId"]=11017903,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
	},
	[11018001]={
		["Camera"]="-1073.244873,-684.664551,284.910217,0.000064,-10.800045,35.801655,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="잠깐!",
		["DialogueId"]=11018001,
		["NextDialogue"]=11018002,
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
MoveTo{ActorId{110017},MoveSpeed{150},TargetPoint{\"fulankemoVe\"}},\
MoveTo{ActorId{110022},MoveSpeed{150},TargetPoint{\"qiannanzhumoVe\"}},\
MoveTo{ActorId{110034},MoveSpeed{150},TargetPoint{\"kajiamoVe\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="Wait.",
	},
	[11018002]={
		["Camera"]="893.186401,25.45752,279.184875,0.000065,-11.400057,-178.796768,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="다음 임무는 절대 실수하면 안 되니 위험 요소부터 배제하는 게 좋겠군. 그러니 애와 노인은 함께 갈 수 없다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018002,
		["NextDialogue"]=11018003,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We cannot afford any mistakes in our mission moving forward. We have to rule out all the potential risks — this girl and the old man, they should stop here.",
	},
	[11018003]={
		["Camera"]="-436.817322,-107.248535,156.288452,0.000065,-5.200526,23.397694,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 왜요? 방금 보셨잖아요. 주변에 필토이드가 잔뜩이에요. 여기서 나눠지면 저와 할아버지는 죽은 목숨일 거예요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11018003,
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018004,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="...Why? As you can see, there are Filthoids all over this place. If you leave us here, Mr Frank and I will die!",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110034)"],
	},
	[11018004]={
		["Camera"]="400.032715,25.615723,196.094727,0.000082,-9.400423,-173.596512,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="중령님, 제가 도울게요! 지금까지 길도 잘 안내했잖아요…… 제발…… 제발 저희를 버리지 말아 주세요!",
		["DialogueId"]=11018004,
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110022)"],
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Sir, please! We offered help, we led you all the way here so you could rendezvous with them... Please... I'm begging you, don't leave us behind!",
	},
	[11018005]={
		["ContentKR"]="카지아를 믿는다",
		["DialogueId"]=11018005,
		["Subtitle"]="Trust Katya",
	},
	[11018006]={
		["Camera"]="164.204712,-125.830078,175.844971,0.000082,-6.600346,172.404846,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="교관님 걱정하지 않으셔도 될 것 같습니다. 이 사람들이 우리 편이 아니었다면, 지하수도의 길도 제대로 알려주지 않았을 게 분명합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018006,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018007,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="Maybe you're overthinking it, sir. If they were enemies, misleading us in the sewer tunnels would be a better idea, but they didn't do that.",
	},
	[11018007]={
		["Camera"]="164.204712,-125.830078,175.844971,0.000082,-6.600346,172.404846,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="저들이 다른 속셈이 있는 거라면? 방금도 이 요새를 '너무 잘 알고' 있다는 생각 안 드나?",
		["DialogueId"]=11018007,
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018011,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="What if they're up to something else? Don't you think that they are \"too familiar\" with everything of this fortress along the way?",
	},
	[11018008]={
		["ContentKR"]="카지아를 믿지 않는다",
		["DialogueId"]=11018008,
		["Subtitle"]="Do not trust Katya",
	},
	[11018009]={
		["Camera"]="164.204712,-125.830078,175.844971,0.000082,-6.600346,172.404846,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 교관님 판단에 동의합니다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018009,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110022:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018010,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="...I agree with Sir Avar.",
	},
	[11018010]={
		["Camera"]="400.032715,25.615723,196.094727,0.000082,-9.400423,-173.596512,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 관제실에 들어가기 전이라면 모를까 아무래도 넌 이 요새에 대해 '너무 잘 알고' 있는 것 같군.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018010,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="EXPlayer",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110010:n(110022)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018011,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110022,
		["Subtitle"]="I could have trusted you if we haven't got into the central control room. But now it seems to me that you're just \"too familiar\" with this fortress.",
	},
	[11018011]={
		["Camera"]="164.204712,-125.830078,175.844971,0.000082,-6.600346,172.404846,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="중앙 관제실은 론샤 요새의 심장부다. 포세이큰 동맹이라고 해도 길에서 마구잡이로 데려온 사람들이 이런 핵심 지역을 돌아다니도록 놔두지 않았을 것이다.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018011,
		["NextDialogue"]=11018012,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="The central control room is the core of Lonza Fortress, even the Forsakens wouldn't let their enslaved labor hang out in such an essential place.",
	},
	[11018012]={
		["Camera"]="893.186401,25.45752,279.184875,0.000065,-11.400057,-178.796768,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="이렇게 내부 동선을 제 집인 양 잘 알고 있다는 건 말이 안 돼.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018012,
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="110010:n(110034)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=11018013,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="You're not supposed to know the routes so well.",
	},
	[11018013]={
		["Camera"]="-617.911438,-261.13623,155.121704,0.000066,-3.600466,25.796782,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="아…… 그건……",
		["DialogueId"]=11018013,
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"110034:n(110010)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=11018014,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110034,
		["Subtitle"]="Umm... That's because—",
	},
	[11018014]={
		["Camera"]="42.482666,4.081055,168.668091,0.000089,-4.800325,-178.804871,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="꼬마 아가씨, 연기력이 대단한데. 황성의 극단에 들어가 보는 건 어떤가?",
		["DialogueId"]=11018014,
		["NextDialogue"]=11018015,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="If you're so interested in acting, little girl, I suggest you find a job in the Grand Theatre in the capital.",
	},
	[11018015]={
		["Camera"]="-1073.244873,-684.664551,284.910217,0.000064,-10.800045,35.801655,35.0,100000.0,false,Manual,22.0",
		["ContentKR"]="시간이 없으니 이만 가지. 레온, 넌 여기 남아서 저들을 잘 지켜보도록.",
		["DialogueId"]=11018015,
		["Scripts"]="LookAt{_delay{2},LookAtDescription{\"110010:n(110015)\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=110010,
		["Subtitle"]="We're running out of time. Let's go. Leon, stay here and keep an eye on them.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"110010:p(180)"],
	},
	[20000401]={
		["ContentKR"]="어이.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000401,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211A3CA",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="？？？",
		["Subtitle"]="Hey.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200004/3211A3CA",
	},
	[20000402]={
		["ContentKR"]="거기, 젊은이…….",
		["DialogueId"]=20000402,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211A3CB",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Hey, you! Yes, you! The kid over there.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200004/3211A3CB",
	},
	[20000501]={
		["Camera"]="-542.267822,716.428223,226.794922,0.000311,-12.200985,-51.821339,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…… 응? 누구?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000501,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FinalCamera"]="-515.233643,682.045898,217.337891,0.000311,-12.200985,-51.821339,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B432",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:n(200024)",
			[2]="200025:n(200024)",
			[3]="200024:n(100001)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=20000502,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundPriority{\"StoryCustom\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},SoundUnitKey{\"sidestory_tiejiangjiaojiao\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0041_story_jiaojiao_tiejiang\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Who is it?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B432",
	},
	[20000502]={
		["Camera"]="32.240723,-224.577148,83.257812,0.000319,-5.400637,91.577522,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="스노우랑 닮은…… 꼬맹이?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FinalCamera"]="34.119629,-224.525879,83.257812,0.000319,-5.400637,91.577522,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B45C",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000503,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="A girl who looks just like... Snow?",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B45C",
	},
	[20000503]={
		["Camera"]="-141.834106,56.707031,63.160034,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822062,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="…….",
		["DialogueId"]=20000503,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211B486",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200025:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000504,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="...",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B486",
	},
	[20000504]={
		["Camera"]="-141.834106,56.707031,63.160034,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822062,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="누, 누굴 보고 꼬맹이라고 하는 거야! 하여간 요즘 젊은것들은 버릇이 없다니까.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000504,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Tiejiang20000504",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="-4.205322,-7.019043,62.62915,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.621468,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B4B0",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000505,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Who are you calling \"girl\"? The younger generation nowadays is so disrespectful.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.14,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B4B0",
	},
	[20000505]={
		["Camera"]="-189.967529,23.575195,137.539185,0.000127,-21.003595,31.56946,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="예의를 지켜야지! 루나는 모두 스노우와 같이 어려 보이지만, 사실 이 분은 네 할머니의 할머니의 할머니 뻘이라구…….",
		["DialogueId"]=20000505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211B4DA",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:n(200025)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=20000506,
		["Scripts"]="CameraMoveTo{_delay{2},TargetPosition{\"10.811279,-22.046387,62.690186,0.000332,-4.000947,-11.027665,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8\"},duration{0}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200025,
		["Subtitle"]="You should watch what you say! Although all Lunarians look young, she's actually as old as your great-great-grandmother.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200025:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B4DA",
	},
	[20000506]={
		["Camera"]="-233.424561,133.374023,162.173096,0.000339,-22.60074,-16.829603,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="(눈앞의 망치를 든 '여자아이'는 전에 알게 된 스노우랑 외모와 목소리가 너무 비슷했다. 하지만 나이와 경험의 정도가 전혀 다르다니, <H>루나</>는 정말 불가사의하다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=20000506,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="Voiceover",
		["Duration"]=1,
		["GUID"]="3211B52E",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:n(200024)",
		},
		["Subtitle"]="(The young \"girl\" with a hammer had a similar voice and appearance as Snow, but their age and experiences were completely different. Lunos are indeed peculiar.)",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B52E",
	},
	[20000508]={
		["Camera"]="-97.633606,36.260742,62.989868,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822792,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그래, 착하네.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000508,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Satisfy01"],
		["GUID"]="3211B558",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200024:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000511,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Very well. I'll let it slide this time.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"200025:n(200024)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B558",
	},
	[20000509]={
		["Camera"]="-97.633606,36.260742,62.989868,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822792,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이게…… 허!",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000509,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Confident02"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-64.05127,20.728027,62.859619,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822519,35.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B582",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200024:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000510,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="You! Hmph!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.2,
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"200025:n(200024)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B582",
	},
	[20000510]={
		["BlendTime"]=3,
		["Camera"]="-97.633606,36.260742,62.989868,0.000304,-0.200958,-24.822792,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="됐다. 늙은이가 어린아이랑 싸워서 뭘하겠다고.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000510,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Syouganai01",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B5AC",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000511,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Never mind, arguing with a youngster isn't worth my time.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B5AC",
	},
	[20000511]={
		["ContentKR"]="사실, 자네들이 방금 지나갈 때 이 늙은이가 엄청난 냄새를 맡았지.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000511,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:None",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B5D6",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000512,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Actually, I caught a whiff of something remarkable as you passed by just now.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B5D6",
	},
	[20000512]={
		["Camera"]="-448.745361,204.227051,210.797119,0.000268,-16.801117,-22.812357,80.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="틀림없어. 바로 <H>희세신병</>의 냄새야! 젊은이, 뭔가 대단한 무기를 숨기고 있는 것 아닌가?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000512,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Confident02"],
		["GUID"]="3211B600",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000513,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="That's right. It's the scent of a legendary weapon! Do you have any special weapons on you, kiddo?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B600",
	},
	[20000513]={
		["Camera"]="253.773926,-337.633301,21.098633,0.000319,6.39889,126.584137,80.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="무기? 나한텐 이 검밖에 없는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=20000513,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Shock01"],
		["GUID"]="3211B62A",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000514,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="This sword is all I have.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Give"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B62A",
	},
	[20000514]={
		["Camera"]="-77.902344,12.708496,47.934082,0.00031,5.598692,-20.219845,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="……！",
		["DialogueId"]=20000514,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Shock02",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="-56.127686,4.689941,50.209229,0.00031,5.598692,-20.219845,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B654",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000515,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="!!!",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=0.2,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B654",
	},
	[20000515]={
		["Camera"]="531.82373,-296.837891,419.457764,0.000302,-28.00165,146.776627,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="(그녀는 검의 무늬에서 무언가를 읽으려는 듯 검을 자세히 들여다보았다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=20000515,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="Voiceover",
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="529.768066,-299.975586,419.457764,0.000302,-28.00165,146.776627,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B67E",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000516,
		["Subtitle"]="(She carefully examined the sword, attempting to glean some information from its pattern.)",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B67E",
	},
	[20000516]={
		["Camera"]="-86.726807,71.786133,114.906494,0.00029,-19.401581,-37.820877,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="좋은 검, 좋은 검이야! 검의 재질이나 검을 만든 기술을 보아하니 휘페르보레아의 범재들이 만든 것은 아닐 테지. 자넨 나이도 어린데 어떻게 이런 보물을 얻은 거지?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000516,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Happy01",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B6A8",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000517,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Jesus! That's incredible! Look at the texture and the craftsmanship! This clearly wasn't made by those mediocre Hyperborean blacksmiths. Where did you get it?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B6A8",
	},
	[20000517]={
		["Camera"]="-197.926575,232.563965,156.319824,0.000096,-15.201227,-51.775345,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="(이 루나 대장장이는 이 검이 예사롭지 않다고 생각하는 것 같다.)",
		["DialogueId"]=20000517,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="Voiceover",
		["Duration"]=2,
		["GUID"]="3211B6FC",
		["GraphPath"]="Texture2D'/Game/UI/UI_PNG/Story/Recall_Pictures/20000518.20000518'",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:p(200005Point2)",
		},
		["Scripts"]="PlayNormalSound{EventPath{\"event:/sfx/common/story/01/flashing\"},PlayAs2D{true}}",
		["SnapShot"]="MEMORY",
		["Subtitle"]="(The Luno blacksmith recognised that this sword was no ordinary weapon. )",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B6FC",
	},
	[20000519]={
		["Camera"]="47.933167,48.183594,106.281372,0.000106,0.998942,164.023529,50.0,162.033707,false,Manual,14.755679",
		["ContentKR"]="잘 모르겠는데……",
		["DialogueId"]=20000519,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Uninterested01"],
		["GUID"]="3211B750",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000520,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="I'm not sure...",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B750",
	},
	[20000520]={
		["Camera"]="47.933167,48.183594,106.281372,0.000106,0.998942,164.023529,50.0,162.033707,false,Manual,14.755679",
		["ContentKR"]="내가 어릴 적부터 쭉 이 검은 나와 함께였어. 어쩌면 부모님이 남겨주신 게 아닐까?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000520,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Shock01"],
		["GUID"]="3211B77A",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200024:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000522,
