		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="I got it when I was young. Maybe it was passed down to me by my parents?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B77A",
	},
	[20000522]={
		["Camera"]="-189.288086,203.751465,151.934326,0.000147,-16.40097,-49.57642,50.000008,162.033707,false,Disable,14.755679",
		["ContentKR"]="재미있군, 재미있어. 평생 대장장이로 살아왔지만, 이 검을 만든 사람의 실력에는 미치지 못하는군.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000522,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="3211B7CE",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000523,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["Subtitle"]="Intriguing. Very intriguing. I've been a blacksmith my whole life, yet I've never seen a weapon like this before.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B7CE",
	},
	[20000523]={
		["ContentKR"]="젊은이, 나는 오랫동안 떠돌아다니며 정착할 곳이 없었네. 한동안 자네를 따라다녀도 괜찮겠는가?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000523,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Smile02",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B7F8",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000524,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Kiddo, I'm Lunosmith, a wandering blacksmith. Would you mind if I accompanied you on your journey?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B7F8",
	},
	[20000524]={
		["Camera"]="-38.022217,110.633789,44.966553,0.000129,4.598534,-58.971298,50.000008,162.033707,false,Disable,14.755679",
		["ContentKR"]="휘페르보레아에서 엘리시안까지, 못 본 무기가 없고 안 만든 무기가 없지! 무기를 만들고 싶다면, 나에게 맡기게.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000524,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FinalCamera"]="-38.022217,110.633789,46.349609,0.000129,4.598534,-58.971333,50.000008,162.033707,false,Disable,14.755679",
		["GUID"]="3211B822",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000525,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="I've travelled all over the land, from Hyperborea to Elysium, and I've forged countless weapons. If you require any weapons, I'm at your disposal.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B822",
	},
	[20000525]={
		["Camera"]="232.871338,-185.234375,83.503784,0.000127,-5.002772,134.234024,60.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="우와, 대장장이셨구나!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000525,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200025:Shock02",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B84C",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000526,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200025,
		["Subtitle"]="Wow! So you're an experienced master blacksmith!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200025:Bai_Idle",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B84C",
	},
	[20000526]={
		["Camera"]="-189.288086,203.751465,151.934326,0.000147,-16.40097,-49.57642,50.000008,162.033707,false,Disable,14.755679",
		["ContentKR"]="가격은 다른 대장장이들보다 저렴할 걸세. 하지만 내게 그 검을 연구할 시간을 좀 주게나. 하하.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000526,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="3211B876",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="All I request is a basic salary, and an opportunity to examine your sword, hehe.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B876",
	},
	[20000528]={
		["Camera"]="136.670654,-162.65918,42.805908,0.000123,7.198541,129.018112,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="허…… 젊은이 표정을 보아하니, 이 늙은이를 의심하는 구나.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000528,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200024:Shock01",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B8CA",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200024:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000529,
		["OptionTopic"]="（无事献殷勤，令人不安。）",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Look, I can see scepticism written on your face.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Think_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B8CA",
	},
	[20000529]={
		["Camera"]="-69.666748,-17.761719,56.248047,0.000116,1.798375,-8.383431,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="걱정하지 말게. '루나는 결코 먼저 다른 이를 해치지 않는다'. 이건 아트라시아 대륙의 모두가 알고 있는 사실이지.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000529,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Ahaha02"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-69.666748,-17.761719,57.486084,0.000116,1.798375,-8.383431,50.000008,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B8F4",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000530,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="You can trust me. You must know the saying, \"Lunos never harm.\" Everyone in Atlasia knows that.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B8F4",
	},
	[20000530]={
		["Camera"]="-189.967529,23.575195,137.539185,0.000127,-21.003595,31.56946,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="맞아 맞아!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000530,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200025:Doubt01",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211B91E",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200025:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000531,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200025,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, exactly!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200025:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B91E",
	},
	[20000531]={
		["Camera"]="-323.842682,160.363281,181.997314,0.000124,-20.003445,-19.029608,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="(그래, 루나인 스노우도 따뜻한 마음을 가졌으니까. 게다가 대장장이가 빈털털이인 우리 둘을 노릴 이유가 있을까?)",
		["DialogueId"]=20000531,
		["DialoguePanelType"]="Voiceover",
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Confident01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-334.550018,164.056152,186.12085,0.000124,-20.003445,-19.029608,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B948",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000532,
		["Subtitle"]="(She was right. You could see that trait in Snow. Besides, what could she get from you? You have nothing to offer.)",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Think_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=3,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B948",
	},
	[20000532]={
		["Camera"]="206.982422,-216.162598,48.215332,0.000051,3.198202,128.827377,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그래, 내 생각이 짧았네. 같이 가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000532,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Happy02"],
		["GUID"]="3211B972",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000533,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Yeah, you're right. Let's head back together then.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Agree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B972",
	},
	[20000533]={
		["Camera"]="-746.762939,237.070801,157.04248,0.000057,-8.601871,-15.777027,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="젊은이가 동의한 모양이군. 좋아, 좋아! 어서 자네들이 사는 곳으로 가자고!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000533,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-780.178955,246.51123,162.294189,0.000057,-8.601871,-15.777027,50.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211B99C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="So you'll have me? Excellent! Then take me to where you live.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=5,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200005/3211B99C",
	},
	[20000601]={
		["Camera"]="-292.966644,154.842773,118.082466,0.00036,-6.801147,-27.194166,50.0,87.874474,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="역시 대단해! 연륜은 못 속인다니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000601,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Shock02",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="-325.906586,171.767822,122.499214,0.00036,-6.801147,-27.194166,50.0,87.874474,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211C49A",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:n(200024)",
			[2]="200002:n(200024)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=20000602,
		["Scripts"]="PlayOrStopBGM{PlayType{\"Play\"},SoundPriority{\"StoryCustom\"},SoundType{\"SOUND_BGM\"},SoundUnitKey{\"sidestory_tiejiangjiaojiao\"},EventPath{\"event:/bgm/cbt02/0041_story_jiaojiao_tiejiang\"}}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Awesome! You're truly amazing!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C49A",
	},
	[20000602]={
		["BlendTime"]=2,
		["Camera"]="-325.906586,171.767822,122.499214,0.00036,-1.600948,-28.19408,50.0,87.874474,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그러고 보니 길에서 스노우와 대장장이님이랑 비슷하게 생긴 사람들을 봤는데, 그 사람들도 <H>루나</>인 건가?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000602,
		["Duration"]=2,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3211C4C4",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200024:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000603,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="I've seen many who resemble you and Snow. Are they also Lunos?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C4C4",
	},
	[20000603]={
		["Camera"]="59.853943,-166.88916,214.35289,0.000196,-26.400045,123.746819,50.000008,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="젊은이, 어디 외진 곳에서 왔나?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000603,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211C4EE",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000604,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Did you come from a remote village or something, kiddo?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C4EE",
	},
	[20000604]={
		["Camera"]="-342.55246,95.091553,79.582237,0.000212,6.399976,-15.852588,50.0,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["CameraTransform"]="0,0,0,0,0,-2.59741199999999,1.3",
		["ContentKR"]="맞아…… 내 고향은 번화했다고 보기엔 힘든 곳이야.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000604,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Ahaha02"],
		["FinalCamera"]="-342.55246,95.091553,76.370575,0.000212,6.399976,-15.852588,50.0,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211C518",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000605,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Yes, my hometown isn't a big city.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Sigh_Start"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C518",
	},
	[20000605]={
		["Camera"]="19.357758,-127.272217,91.144363,0.000197,-2.200106,122.743927,50.000008,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="하하, 어쩐지, 어쩐지. 이 늙은이가 머물렀던 곳은 말이야, 사람이 있는 곳엔 항상 루나가 있었지. 자네처럼 우리 일족을 본 적이 없는 아이는 많지 않아.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000605,
		["Duration"]=1.5,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Ahaha02"],
		["FinalCamera"]="20.991241,-126.221924,91.144363,0.000197,-2.200106,122.743927,50.000008,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211C542",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=200006051,
		},
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Ha, that explains it. In all my travels, wherever there are humans, Lunos can always be found. It's quite uncommon to come across someone like you who's never heard of us.",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Sigh_End"],
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C542",
	},
	[20000606]={
		["Camera"]="-160.688599,-128.167725,207.659622,0.000225,-26.39786,40.338581,70.0,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="우리 루나는 모두 스노우처럼 귀엽고 긴 수명을 가지고 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000606,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200002:Confident02FM"],
		["GUID"]="3211C56C",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="100001:n(200002)",
			[2]="200002:n(100001)",
			[3]="200024:n(200002)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=20000607,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="We share a similar appearance. Everyone is as attractive as me. And we live very long lives.",
		["TurnTo"]=["[1] = \"200002:n(100001)"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C56C",
	},
	[20000607]={
		["BlendTime"]=2,
		["Camera"]="-344.833038,-44.149414,119.483681,0.000247,-6.598085,13.348303,60.0,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 여기 대장장이님처럼, 각자 잘하는 것이 있다구!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000607,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Happy01",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211C596",
		["LookAt"]={
			[1]="200002:n(200024)",
			[2]="100001:p(200006Point1)",
		},
		["NextDialogue"]=20000608,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Like the master blacksmith, every Luno has a particular forte.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C596",
	},
	[20000608]={
		["Camera"]="-158.591736,96.465637,150.463928,0.000243,-3.398285,-39.256855,60.000004,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="호오, 그럼 스노우도 잘하는 게 있겠네?",
		["DialogueId"]=20000608,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="100001:Nvzhu20000608",
			[2]="200002:None",
			[3]="200024:None",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211C5C0",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000609,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["Subtitle"]="Wow. Do you have any unique talents, Snow?",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C5C0",
	},
	[20000609]={
		["Camera"]="-53.756592,-28.97467,118.807129,0.000367,-16.997889,48.141529,30.0,200.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="음…… 그게…… 당연히…… 있지!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000609,
		["Duration"]=6,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Bai20000609",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211C5EA",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200002:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000610,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Yeah... Hmm... Of course, I do!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200002:Bai_Shock2Think2Confident",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C5EA",
	},
	[20000610]={
		["BlendTime"]=2,
		["Camera"]="-37.272095,-35.071838,150.928223,0.000288,-28.800686,55.991592,43.813869,87.874474,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이거, 이거, 보이지! 스노우는 다른 루나랑 다르게 생겼다니까!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000610,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200002:Confident02FM"],
		["GUID"]="3211C614",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200002:n(100001)"],
		["NextDialogue"]=20000611,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="As you can see, I have demonic appendages on my head. No other Lunos have these!",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C614",
	},
	[20000611]={
		["Camera"]="143.773865,-23.390625,93.131493,0.000283,-2.003294,160.616302,50.0,269.812469,false,Manual,7.549713",
		["ContentKR"]="확실히, 이 늙은이가 이렇게 나이를 먹었지만, 너처럼 생긴 루나는 처음 보는 것 같군. 네 모습은, <H>카론</>이랑 비슷하게 생겼어…….",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000611,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211C63E",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000612,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Indeed. In all my years, I've never seen a Luno with horns like those. You look just like those Charons.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C63E",
	},
	[20000612]={
		["Camera"]="-182.069244,-6.723083,32.482788,0.000299,14.193228,15.831282,50.0,150.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["CameraTransform"]="0,0,0,74.818618,21.215271,19.668945,1000",
		["ContentKR"]="그러니까, 스노우는 하나밖에 없는 마왕 루나라고! 어쩌면 스노우는 루나를 이끌어 세계를 정복하기 위해 태어났을지도!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000612,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211C668",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000613,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Sooo, I'm the special and unique Luno the Demon King. Perhaps I was meant to lead the Lunos and dominate the world!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200002:Bai_Talk03Quick",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C668",
	},
	[20000613]={
		["Camera"]="135.591232,104.631104,31.726992,0.000289,10.395903,-160.587448,50.0,269.812469,false,Manual,7.549713",
		["ContentKR"]="허…… 젊은이가 야망이 크군!",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000613,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200024:Satisfy01"],
		["FinalCamera"]="135.591232,104.631104,33.634769,0.000289,10.395903,-160.587448,50.0,269.812469,false,Manual,7.549713",
		["GUID"]="3211C692",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000614,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200024,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_Duanzao",
		["Subtitle"]="Oh... that's quite the aspiration.",
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=6,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C692",
	},
	[20000614]={
		["Camera"]="-139.60199,-69.295654,99.295784,0.000341,-3.803889,32.809063,50.0,150.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="휴, 보통 루나는 정말 야망이라고는 찾아볼 수 없다니까. 그저 인간을 따라다니는 것을 좋아하고, 인간의 칭찬을 받으면 기뻐서 빙빙 돌기나 하고…… 하지만 이런 걸로는 이 스노우 님을 만족시킬 수 없지!",
		["DialogueId"]=20000614,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Syouganai01",
		},
		["FinalCamera"]="-155.81485,-79.747559,100.578346,0.000341,-3.803896,32.809238,50.0,150.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211C6BC",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000615,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Unfortunately, most Lunos lack ambition. They'd rather follow the humans, and are content with just a few words of appreciation. But for me, I want so much more!",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200002:Talk01_Start",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C6BC",
	},
	[20000615]={
		["BlendTime"]=2,
		["Camera"]="-120.544693,-69.264526,180.491455,0.000487,-27.803499,36.808578,35.0,150.0,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="시종아! 이 스노우 님을 잘 따라다니면서 열심히 수행하라고! 스노우가 세계 정복을 하면 널 마왕군의 군단장으로 임명해 줄 테니! 그때 대장장이 루나님한테 우리 모습을 다시 보여주는 거야!",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000615,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Confident02",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211C6E6",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"200002:n(100001)"],
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="My little minion, you must stick with me. After I conquer the world, you'll be the leader of my legion! Just you wait and see!",
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200002:Confident_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C6E6",
	},
	[20000618]={
		["Camera"]="-100.573456,-44.273193,82.943001,0.000289,2.394917,38.210751,50.0,255.910919,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="음…… 매일 마왕님의 친필 사인이 담긴 칭찬 편지 20장을 받을 수 있는 거? 에이, 어쨌든, 절대 푸대접하지 않는다니까.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=20000618,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200002:Bai20000618",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211C764",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000619,
		["OptionTopic"]="你说的那个军团长给开多少工钱啊？",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["Subtitle"]="Hmm... How about 20 letters of praise written by this Demon King? Anyway, we can talk about the details when the time comes. All you need to know is that I'll never let you down.",
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200002:Bai_Think2Confident",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200006/3211C764",
	},
	[20000619]={

		["Camera"]="-87.992676,-34.369141,83.612671,0.000289,2.394917,38.210526,50.0,255.910919,false,Disable,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="히힛…… 히히힛……",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="Self",
		["DialogueId"]=20000619,
		["Duration"]=4,

	[20000620]={

		["ContentKR"]="(평범한 루나랑 다를 바 없잖아!)",

	[20000808]={
		["Camera"]="-16.298828,8.800781,120.371094,0.000001,-2.199949,178.990051,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="응, 잠깐 또 흐릿하게 보이긴 한데…… 괜찮아, 원래도 있던 증상이야.",

	[20000809]={
		["Camera"]="-16.298828,8.800781,120.371094,0.000001,-2.199949,178.990051,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아마 요즘 좀 피곤해서 그런 것 같아. 며칠만 쉬면 괜찮아지니까 걱정 마!",

	[20000819]={

		["ContentKR"]="응, 나도 노란 꽃을 좋아해. 태양을 떠올리게 해서 마음이 따뜻해지거든……",

	[20000824]={

		["ContentKR"]="맞아…… 살짝 만져볼래? 나는 꽃잎 가장자리를 만지는 걸 좋아해. 꽃잎마다 손끝에 닿는 느낌이 달라서, 마치 각자의 이야기를 들려주는 것 같아……",
		["DialogueId"]=20000824,
		["Duration"]=3,

		["ContentKR"]="그런데 지금은 꽃잎에 윤기가 없고, 꼭 불에 탄 것처럼…… 약간 갈색에 끝도 말려들어간 것 같아.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000825,

	[20000827]={

		["ContentKR"]="꽃잎에 부드러운 무늬가 있어. 안쪽에서 바깥쪽으로 퍼져 있는데, 잎맥이랑 좀 비슷해. 그런데 엄청 생기있어 보이진 않아……",
		["DialogueId"]=20000827,

		["ContentKR"]="사람들은 주로 꽃에만 관심을 가지지만, 사실 꽃과 잎은 그렇게 다르지 않아. 둘 다 열심히 숨 쉬며 자라고 있는 거지.",
		["DialogueId"]=20000829,

		["GUID"]="3211EA02",

		["ContentKR"]="가지치기랑 거름 주기, 습도와 온도만 잘 관리하면 아주 오래 예쁘게 필 수 있는데…… 내가 잘 관리하지 못한 것 같아. 아빠랑 엄마 같은 훌륭한 정원사가 되기에는 아직 멀었나 봐.",

		["ContentKR"]="예전에도 아이스레이크 시티에서 키웠으니 환경 같은 것도 이전과 다르지 않을 텐데…… 아, 생각났다!",

		["ContentKR"]="맞아. 우리 집에서 키우는 꽃은 특별한 흙을 써. 아빠가 아이스레이크 시티 밖 어느 동굴에서 가져온 거야.",

	[20000905]={

		["ContentKR"]="(프시케가 흙을 만지작거리며 기뻐한다. 문득 프시케한테 받은 꽃이 생각난다.)",

		["ContentKR"]="(꽃을 꺼내 본다. 시간이 꽤 지났지만, 아직 시들지 않은 모습이다.)",

	[20000907]={

		["ContentKR"]="아, 그 꽃이구나…… 계속 잘 가지고 다녔네!",

		["ContentKR"]="소중한 선물이니까. 근데 너한테도 이 꽃들이 모두 소중할 텐데, 이렇게 꺾어줘도 괜찮은 거야?",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",

	[20000909]={

		["ContentKR"]="음…… 예전에 꽃을 꺾으면 안 된다고 생각한 적도 있긴 해. 어렸을 때 말이야.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000909,
		["Duration"]=3,

	[20000910]={

		["ContentKR"]="꽃집에서 파는 생화 본 적 있어? 사실 그때는 생화를 별로 안 좋아했어…… 꺾인 꽃이 불쌍하다고 생각했거든.",

	[20000911]={
		["Camera"]="-53.115234,95.914795,124.0,0.000002,0.0,-104.788063,35.0,100.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="꽃도 뿌리, 줄기, 잎과 마찬가지로 식물의 일부잖아. 그런데 사람들은 꽃의 아름다움을 감상하겠다고 줄기에서 잘라내서 관상용으로 쓰고, 가지에서 떨어트려 외롭게 시들게 하니까.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000911,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FinalCamera"]="-53.115234,95.914795,140.0,0.000002,0.0,-104.788063,35.0,100.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="3211F776",

	[20000912]={
		["Camera"]="278.988281,10.379639,123.230469,0.0,0.0,-157.596741,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="우리 입장에서 보면 그렇게 생각할 수도 있겠네……",

		["ContentKR"]="아까 '어렸을 때'라고 했는데…… 지금은 생각이 바뀌었어?",

		["ContentKR"]="먼저 너한테 물어봐도 될까? 넌 꺾인 꽃에 대해 어떻게 생각해?",

		["ContentKR"]="음…… 역시 꽃을 너한테 준 게 잘한 일이었네. 너라면 분명 잘 돌봐줄 거야.",

		["ContentKR"]="응…… 그렇구나, 나도 그렇게 생각해.",

	[20000918]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="어렸을 때 내 생각이랑 똑같네.",

	[20000919]={

		["ContentKR"]="지금의 나는 말이야, 꺾인 꽃을 보면 여전히 조금 슬퍼. 하지만 동시에 그 꽃들이 대단하다는 걸 깨달았어. 내가 생각했던 것보다 훨씬 더 대단해.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000919,

		["GUID"]="3211F8C6",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000920,

	},
	[20000920]={

		["ContentKR"]="꺾이는 순간부터 열매를 맺을 수 없고 천천히 시들 수밖에 없는데도……",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000920,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211F8F0",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000921,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"100001:Think_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200009/3211F8F0",
	},
	[20000921]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="그래도 그 꽃들은 필사적으로 물을 빨아들이고, 짧은 시간 동안 온 힘을 다해 활짝 피어. 마치 아직 뿌리가 있는 것처럼, 마치 한 번도 꺾이지 않은 것처럼 말이야.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000921,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211F91A",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000922,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="100001:Think_End",
			[2]="200027:Talk02_Start",

		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200009/3211F91A",

		["ContentKR"]="그래서 이제는 그 꽃들을 불쌍히 여기지 않아. 오히려 대견한걸.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",

	[20000924]={

		["ContentKR"]="넌 정말 착하구나…… 응, 네 말이 맞아…… 꺾이지 않았다면 더 좋았겠지.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",

	[20000925]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 갑자기 분위기가 무거워졌네. 나 때문이야, 나 때문……",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000925,

			[1]="200027:Sad02",

		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200027:Sigh_Start"],

	},
	[20000926]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아, 맞다. 흙 가져와줘서 고마워. 습도랑 부드러운 정도가 딱 좋은 것 같아…… 어쩌면 넌 원예 쪽으로도 재능이 있을지도 몰라!",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000926,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200027:Smile01"],
		["GUID"]="3211F9EC",
		["NextOptions"]={
			[1]=200009261,
			[2]=200009262,
		},

			[1]="200027:Sigh_End",

	[20000927]={
		["Camera"]="278.988281,10.379639,123.230469,0.0,0.0,-157.596741,35.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="좋아, 내가 아는 모든 비법을 알려줄게! …… 시간이 된다면 말이야.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000927,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211FA16",

	[20000928]={
		["Camera"]="13.677734,-53.802979,122.230469,0.0,0.0,-7.995706,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="응, 그렇게 하자.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000928,

	[20000929]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname}, 넌…… 정말 좋은 사람이야.",

		["DialogueId"]=20000929,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",

	},
	[20000930]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="아빠랑 엄마 말고는 아무도 내 말에 귀 기울여주지 않았어. 화분 하나 때문에 이렇게까지 힘써줄 사람은 더더욱 없었고.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000930,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]=["[1] = \"200027:Happy01"],
		["GUID"]="3211FA94",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000931,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200009/3211FA94",
	},
	[20000931]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이건 보답이야. 엄청 비싼 건 아니지만, 그래도 내 마음이니 받아줘.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000931,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="3211FABE",
		["NextDialogue"]=20000932,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["TalkActionId"]={
			[1]="200027:Give",
		},
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200009/3211FABE",
	},
	[20000932]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="이 꽃들이 다시 예쁘게 피면, 꼭 다시 와서 봐줘.",
		["DefaultLookAt"]="TalkNpc",
		["DialogueId"]=20000932,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["FacialId"]={
			[1]="200027:Happy02",
		},
		["GUID"]="3211FAE8",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200027:Explain02_Start"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200009/3211FAE8",
	},
	[20001001]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 흙은 좀 건조한 것 같아…… 다른 곳도 살펴보자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001001,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212063A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200010/3212063A",
	},
	[20001201]={
		["ContentKR"]="찾았다……! 여기 흙이 좀 더 부드럽고, 습도도 적당해 보여. 좀 더 가져가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001201,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212270A",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200012/3212270A",
	},
	[20001301]={
		["ContentKR"]="{nickname}, 아까 말한 흙은 찾았어?",
		["DialogueId"]=20001301,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="32123772",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001302,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200013/32123772",
	},
	[20001302]={
		["ContentKR"]="아직 못 찾았어.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001302,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212379C",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001303,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200013/3212379C",
	},
	[20001303]={
		["ContentKR"]="못 찾아도 괜찮아, 무리하지 마……",
		["DialogueId"]=20001303,
		["GUID"]="321237C6",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200013/321237C6",
	},
	[20001401]={
		["ContentKR"]="맞다맞다, 너한테 물어볼 게 몇 가지 더 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001401,
		["GUID"]="321247DA",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200014/321247DA",
	},
	[20001402]={
		["ContentKR"]="혹시 천국의 나무 아래에 직접 가본 적 있어? 정말로 전설처럼 그~~렇게 크고, 하늘을 다 가릴 정도야? 아래에서 위를 올려다보면…… 마치 하늘 전체가 수정으로 가득 찬 것처럼 보여?",
		["DialogueId"]=20001402,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="32124804",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001403,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200014/32124804",
	},
	[20001403]={
		["ContentKR"]="그리고 그리고…… 바닷가 모래는 정말 보들보들해? 밟으면 밀가루처럼 푹신푹신하고, 전혀 까칠하지 않아?",
		["DialogueId"]=20001403,
		["GUID"]="3212482E",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001404,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200014/3212482E",
	},
	[20001404]={
		["ContentKR"]="물어볼 게 좀 많을지도 몰라! 다들 대신 물어봐 달라고 해서…… 헤헤, 귀찮아하면 안돼!",
		["DialogueId"]=20001404,
		["GUID"]="32124858",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200027,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200014/32124858",
	},
	[20001501]={
		["ContentKR"]="음…… 이 정도면 충분할 것 같아. 프시케에게 가져다주자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001501,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="32125842",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200015/32125842",
	},
	[20001601]={
		["Camera"]="1700.51709,233.67041,1259.031372,0.0,0.0,-179.999985,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["Content"]="嗯等。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20001601,
		["GUID"]="321268AA",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001602,
	},
	[20001602]={
		["Camera"]="1700.51709,233.67041,1259.031372,0.0,0.0,-179.999985,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["CameraBlendCurve"]="easeInOutQuad",
		["Content"]="等不耐烦了。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20001602,
		["FinalCamera"]="1700.51709,233.67041,212.238281,0.0,0.0,-179.999985,20.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["GUID"]="321268D4",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001603,
		["ToFinalCameraBlendTime"]=4,
	},
	[20001603]={
		["Content"]="赛琪怎么还没出来，我们去瞅瞅吧。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20001603,
		["GUID"]="321268FE",
	},
	[20001701]={
		["Camera"]="-303.460938,-78.082214,123.142578,0.000001,1.399991,97.004822,35.0,310.0,false,Manual,2.5",
		["ContentKR"]="침식자를 막는 건 쉬운 일이 아니야. 먼저 준비를 잘 하고 성 밖으로 나가서 프시케를 찾아보자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001701,
		["GUID"]="32127912",
		["LookAt"]=["[1] = \"100001:n(200021)"],
		["Scripts"]="PARA{\
CameraMoveTo{_delay{5},TargetPosition{\"-369.230469,214.921021,133.806641,0.000008,-2.000091,-40.793766,25.0,100.0,false,Manual,3.5\"},duration{0}},\
LookAt{_delay{5.5},LookAtDescription{\"100001:n(100001)\"}}\
}",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["TalkActionId"]=["[1] = \"200021:Disagree"],
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200017/32127912",
	},
	[20001801]={
		["Camera"]="136.048828,-53.867432,128.230469,0.0,0.0,-169.194504,30.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="와…… 날아갈 것 같아!",
		["DialogueId"]=20001801,
		["GUID"]="3212897A",
		["IsBlack"]=1,
		["NextDialogue"]=20001802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200018/3212897A",
	},
	[20001802]={
		["ContentKR"]="스노우, 우리 뒤에 붙어. 바람이 잠잠할 때 함께 앞으로 가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001802,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="321289A4",
		["NextDialogue"]=20001803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200018/321289A4",
	},
	[20001803]={
		["ContentKR"]="바람이 너무 세면 바위 뒤에 숨어도 돼. 너무 서두르지 마.",
		["DialogueId"]=20001803,
		["GUID"]="321289CE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200018/321289CE",
	},
	[20001901]={
		["Camera"]="-362.765625,-80.016602,-24.530273,0.000006,17.167358,25.771385,15.0,100000.0,false,DoNotOverride,2.8",
		["ContentKR"]="먼 곳의 아이스레이크에서 폭풍이 몰아치고 있다. 프시케는 아마도 그 방향에 있을 것이다……",
		["DialogueId"]=20001901,
		["GUID"]="321299E2",
	},
	[20002001]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 나비? 겨울에 어떻게 나비가?",
		["DialogueId"]=20002001,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212AA4A",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002002,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200020/3212AA4A",
	},
	[20002002]={
		["ContentKR"]="마치…… 우리를 안내하는 것 같아……",
		["DialogueId"]=20002002,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212AA74",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200020/3212AA74",
	},
	[20002101]={
		["ContentKR"]="여기 필토이드들은 거의 죽어가는데. 아마도 프시케와 싸웠던 것 같아.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002101,
		["GUID"]="3212BAB2",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002102,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200021/3212BAB2",
	},
	[20002102]={
		["ContentKR"]="그렇다면 이놈들이 온 길을 거슬러 가면 프시케를 찾을 수 있겠네……",
		["DialogueId"]=20002102,
		["GUID"]="3212BADC",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200021/3212BADC",
	},
	[20002201]={
		["Content"]="兄弟，你还好吗。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20002201,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="3212CB1A",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002202,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
	},
	[20002202]={
		["Content"]="不太好。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20002202,
		["GUID"]="3212CB44",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002203,
	},
	[20002203]={
		["Content"]="外面情况怎么样？【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20002203,
		["GUID"]="3212CB6E",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002204,
	},
	[20002204]={
		["Content"]="刮了好大的风，秽兽的行为也很反常。【临时版】",
		["DialogueId"]=20002204,
		["GUID"]="3212CB98",
	},
	[20002301]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이성을 잃은 프시케가 침식과 싸우고 있다…… 뭔가 해야 할 것 같다……)",
		["DialogueId"]=20002301,
		["GUID"]="3212DB82",
	},
	[20002401]={
		["ContentKR"]="…… 프시케가 성 밖으로 간 것 같아.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002401,
		["GUID"]="3212EBEA",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002402,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=700049,
	},
	[20002402]={
		["ContentKR"]="아마도 성 밖에 사람이 적어서겠지. 마지막 이성이 남아있을 때 최대한 사람이 적은 곳으로 가려고 한 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002402,
		["GUID"]="3212EC14",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=700049,
	},
	[20002501]={
		["ContentKR"]="너희…… 프시케를 찾으러 가는 거야?",
		["DialogueId"]=20002501,
		["GUID"]="3212FC52",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002502,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200045,
	},
	[20002502]={
		["ContentKR"]="프시케를 찾게 되면…… 망설이지 말고 그 아이의 고통을 끝내줘. 프시케도 그러길 바랄 거야……",
		["DialogueId"]=20002502,
		["GUID"]="3212FC7C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200045,
	},
	[20002601]={
		["ContentKR"]="아빠, 방금 그 언니는 왜 그렇게 빨리 뛰어간 거예요?",
		["DialogueId"]=20002601,
		["GUID"]="32130CBA",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002602,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc1",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130CBA",
	},
	[20002602]={
		["ContentKR"]="쉿! 빨리 가자. 성 안으로 들어가. 저건 침식자야!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002602,
		["GUID"]="32130CE4",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002603,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc2",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130CE4",
	},
	[20002603]={
		["ContentKR"]="당…… 당황하지 마…… 이미 누군가 수비대를 부르러 갔어!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002603,
		["GUID"]="32130D0E",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002604,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc3",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130D0E",
	},
	[20002604]={
		["ContentKR"]="이런 식으로 몰래 들어가려는 건 아니겠지. 통행증, 통행증을 보여줘!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002604,
		["GUID"]="32130D38",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002605,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc4",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130D38",
	},
	[20002605]={
		["ContentKR"]="제발 들여보내 주세요. 통행증은 정말 실수로 잃어버렸을 뿐이에요!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002605,
		["GUID"]="32130D62",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002606,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc5",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130D62",
	},
	[20002606]={
		["ContentKR"]="이런 때에 무슨 통행증이야. 어차피 밖에 있어도 죽을 텐데 그냥 들어가버리자고!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002606,
		["GUID"]="32130D8C",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002607,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc6",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130D8C",
	},
	[20002607]={
		["ContentKR"]="멈춰, 멈추라고! 더 가까이 오면 쏘겠어!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002607,
		["GUID"]="32130DB6",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002608,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc7",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130DB6",
	},
	[20002608]={
		["ContentKR"]="쏴봐! 쏴서 침식자를 이리로 불러와 우리 다 같이 죽자고!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002608,
		["GUID"]="32130DE0",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002609,
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc8",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130DE0",
	},
	[20002609]={
		["ContentKR"]="정말…… 독하구나. 좋아, 일단 들어와. 수비대가 침식자를 처리하면 그때 다시 얘기하자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002609,
		["GUID"]="32130E0A",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_FindSaiqiNpc9",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200026/32130E0A",
	},
	[20002701]={
		["ContentKR"]="바람이 너무 세…… 직접 뛰어내리면 날아갈 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002701,
		["GUID"]="32131D22",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002702,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200027/32131D22",
	},
	[20002702]={
		["ContentKR"]="저기, 우리 승강기를 타고 내려가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002702,
		["GUID"]="32131D4C",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200027/32131D4C",
	},
	[20002801]={
		["ContentKR"]="괜찮아, 우리는 프시케가 어디로 갔는지 알았으니 따라가기만 하면 돼.",
		["DialogueId"]=20002801,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="32132D8A",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002802,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200021,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200028/32132D8A",
	},
	[20002802]={
		["ContentKR"]="맞아, 프시케만 찾으면 반드시 방법이 있을 거야!",
		["DialogueId"]=20002802,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["GUID"]="32132DB4",
		["NextDialogue"]=20002803,
		["SpeakNpcId"]=200002,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200028/32132DB4",
	},
	[20002803]={
		["ContentKR"]="고마워……",
		["DialogueId"]=20002803,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
		["GUID"]="32132DDE",
		["SpeakNpcId"]=100001,
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/2001/200028/32132DDE",
	},
	[20002901]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이미 아웃사이더와 스노우에게 오늘 있었던 일을 다 얘기했는데.)",
		["DialogueId"]=20002901,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=20002902,
	},
	[20002902]={
		["ContentKR"]="(이제 할 수 있는 건, 약속 장소에서…… 기다리는 것뿐이야.)",
		["DialogueId"]=20002902,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["ExStoryInfo"]="Player",
	},

	[20004501]={
		["ContentKR"]="세상에서 가장 사랑하는 아가, 이 세상에 태어나줘서 고마워.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004501,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004502,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA87",
	},
	[20004502]={
		["ContentKR"]="넌 우리 인생 최고의 자랑이란다.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004502,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004503,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA88",
	},
	[20004503]={
		["ContentKR"]="프시케, 자, 약속! 이제 우리는 영원한 친구야!",
		["DialogueId"]=20004503,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004504,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA89",
	},
	[20004504]={
		["ContentKR"]="네가 살아있었음을 기억할게.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004504,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004505,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA90",
	},
	[20004505]={
		["ContentKR"]="우리가 널 기다리고 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004505,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004506,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA91",
	},
	[20004506]={
		["ContentKR"]="운명이여, 한 번이라도 자비를 베풀어 그 아이의 소원을 이뤄줄 수 있게 해 주오.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004506,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004507,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Fate, please have mercy on me. Let me help her fulfill this wish.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA92",
	},
	[20004507]={
		["ContentKR"]="이 꽃을 가져가렴, 행운을 가져다줄 거야.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004507,
		["Duration"]=4,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004508,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="Take this flower with you. It will bring you good luck.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA93",
	},
	[20004508]={
		["ContentKR"]="작은 섬에 가면 집 몇 채를 짓고, 집 주변에 하얀 꽃을 가득 심을 수 있어.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004508,
		["Duration"]=5,
		["NextDialogue"]=20004509,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["Subtitle"]="You'll go to a small island, where you can build a house by the sea and grow white flowers around it.",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA94",
	},
	[20004509]={
		["ContentKR"]="프시케, 집에 가자.",
		["DialogueId"]=20004509,
		["Duration"]=3,
		["SnapShot"]="HEART",
		["SpeakNpcName"]="UI_Npc_Name_MemoryVoice",
		["VoiceName"]="voice/$Locale$/story/1002/200045/1950CA95",
	},
